story:
"Beat in rhythm with BTB, active game to release all the stress in the music you love!"

Also, you can use all the songs on YouTube, so enjoy the game with all the songs you want!

 

 

 

 

There are a variety of rhythm games that have been enjoyed through cell phones or tablets. However, it was hard to fully engage in the rhythm with a small screen with a delicate tap of your finger. With BTB, players may hit the beat in rhythm with drumsticks. Release all the stress and fully engage in the beat.

 

 

 

 

 

Pick your favorite genre/music via YouTube and play as much as you'd like! Unlike existing rhythm games, you can use all the music on YouTube for "free" with BTB.

 

 

 

 

 

You can easily play by connecting to any device from mobile to computer. Also, it is so easy to use that no separate tutorial is required

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Lightweight, foldable, and portable! Take it anywhere you wish to beat in rhythm.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As a hardware, software, and IoT product development company, we have experience in developing “Smart Palette”, a digital art education device for smart devices.​

Currently, we are developing to lead the domestic IoT market by converging with various contents such as education/play.​

 

 

Risks and challenges

Products/orders/pledges are expected to be shipped on time (please refer to the timeline provided from the campaign page). We understand unexpected situations might occur, and we promise to keep our backers updated at all times.

story:
What if you could be the star of your very own story?  A story that was larger than life and more colourful then your ever imagined? 

Welcome to The Bollywood Game, a competitive card game where every problem can be solved with a bit of song and dance, and if that doesn’t cut it, how about you punch the bad guys square in the face? 

Take this filmy journey as your friends turn foes, your romance is put to the test and you gotta fight for what is right at every turn. While you’re at it, make sure you make it look gooood…. 

Think you have that combination of beauty, brains and bravado to be a Bollywood star? Only one way to find out, play The Bollywood Game! 

"The Bollywood Game is a fun game, it played out like a Bollywood movie. Just when you think you may win, someone comes in and back stabs you. I would recommend this game for anyone's collection." 

Amanda Harcrow - Play & Take Volunteer at MechaCon 

"The Bollywood Game is a fun way to introduce a different culture, it taps into elements of Indian Cinema with charm and creativity." 

Edu "Cammyplayer" - Support Team at Vale do Ludo

"The Bollywood Game is a wonderful new medium to experience the intensity of this phenomenal industry through this ancient yet contemporized form of table top gameplay. It's a testament to the power of ideas & the evolution of concepts into different forms of engagements."

Kenneth Hopkins - Founder at Bollycon

One of the main reasons why Bollywood is so popular around the world is because of certain patterns. From song and dance to unexpected plot twists, a movie is not Bollywood if it doesn’t live up to common expectations.

The Bollywood Game has been designed around such patterns, bringing to life a typical Bollywood movie but in a card game format. It allows fans to immerse in a world they are familiar with, but in a different and engaging format. It also introduces a whole new genre to people who have never watched a Bollywood movie before.

In Bollywood, the leading stars are known colloquially as heroes and heroines. In The Bollywood Game, players get a chance to become one. Our premise started from translating what it takes to be a hero or a heroine in Bollywood through attribute points. 

Players are able to keep track of each of their attribute points (Strength, Charm and Kindness) through round tokens.

Each Hero or Heroine card comes with a set of attribute points, then becoming the objective of the game - win over the card on the table with enough points along with the Happy Ending card.

But before the happy ending, each aspiring hero(ine) will fight for points by playing Song cards - what's Bollywood without them?

In Bollywood, song and dance are rarely performed alone, so get your Extras ready or better yet your Best Friend, who will never leave your side... errr sometimes. 

You must be careful while playing your Song cards, other players might Steal the Scene or play an Unrehearsed Choreography card against you.

As in the movies, luck will sometimes be by your side - what if all of a sudden you acquire Superhuman Power or when sometimes one of the Gods of Bollywood decides to do a cameo appearance alongside you taking you one step closer to stardom.

Be strategic with the fights you pick, you might end up facing the Auntie, the Vamp and the Crime Lord and his pack of thugs all in the same movie! And if drama is what you are in for, play no other than Bollywood, because after an Intermission, the most unthinkable Plot Twist can happen and your opponent becomes you!

Our first attempt towards bringing the game to life was thought around the concept of hand-painted Bollywood posters, and bring this almost extinct tradition to a new medium. In the end we were inspired by early Raj Comics' publications and opted for a more fresh concept around a game-friendly and action-oriented look, the idea of merging Bollywood and game gave us the space to adopt a Japanese manga-inspired art work.

 

When it came down to designing the card itself, we took inspiration from a staple design presence in India: matchbox labels. The idea was to not only frame the illustration but bring a certain Indian kitsch look and feel.

Each card tells a story, basically a situation which will take your own story further. These 2-liners are written using a font created for the game inspired by such classics as the font used for 1978's 'Don'.

The logo and cover art had to depict a movie poster, we decided to adopt bright bold and all caps lettering inspired mainly by 1970s Bollywood, while the cover art brings together the 'cast', including protagonists and their supporting stars, the good and the evil sides of the story. 

And for the packaging our goal was to emulate movies, since this is a card game that plays out just like one. The idea of a VHS-inspired packaging was a natural fit, not only as a beautiful and different case for the components of the game but also because it brings back the feeling of an analog experience, much like tabletop gaming in general.

 

 

  • All items will be shipped from Vancouver, Canada, primarily using Canada Post. 
  • One box of 'The Bollywood Game' weighs approximately 0.5kg/1.1lbs.
  • Shipping will be charged once the campaign ends.
  • As per our research with Canada Post, shipping cost should be between CAD$11 and CAD$25 depending on your location. 
  • Shipping cost may rise due to weight increase as a new item can be unlocked via stretch goal.
  • Taxes and duties may apply depending on your location.

 

 

100% of the project has been developed prior to the campaign, including art, layout, copy and packaging. As this is our first crowdfunding project we had to make sure everything is in place before the campaign goes live. We will start the production process with our selected printing partner in the Vancouver area as soon as the campaign is over, and we will work towards delivering the product before the estimated delivery date.

All backers will be periodically informed about the status of the project.

 

'The Bollywood Game: Horror Expansion' is a deck of 45 cards based on Bollywood horror films that will be played along with your original 'The Bollywood Game' deck. The expansion deck will add new gameplay, new strategies and new stories to your original game experience, including:

  • 12 music cards (1 all-new music card)
  • 14 actor cards (1 all-new actor card)
  • 13 action cards (8 all-new action cards)
  • 5 counter cards (2 all-new counter cards)
  • 1 double-sided card, showcasing an all new Hero/Heroine and respective attributes
  • Packaging 

'The Bollywood Game: Horror Expansion' will be shipped for FREE along with every box of the original 'The Bollywood Game' once the stretch goal funding is totally backed.

 

What will be finalized after the campaign:

  • Art work for  7 cards
  • Copy work for 12 cards
  • Layout work for 12 cards
  • Packaging design (standard card game package with original illustration based on the cards of the expansion deck)

All backers will be periodically informed about the status of the project.

 

The Bollywood Game was first conceived in 2015, when 3 friends decided to share their love for Bollywood in a game format.

Since then, and after an initial positive feedback from close friends, they decided to take the idea forward and after extensive testing sessions across India, Brazil, Canada and the US the game is made available first on Indiegogo.

What started as a side project has now enticed the creation of a game studio called Joguinhu, based in Canada and Brazil and working on different analog gaming projects.

The Bollywood Game is Joguinhu’s first crowdfunding project.

 

 

For any queries or requests, you can also write to: play.joguinhu@gmail.com

 

 

 

Risks and challenges:

100% of 'The Bollywood Game' has been developed prior to the campaign, once it ends we will start production with our printing partner in the Vancouver area. Our decision to print in Canada has to do with the fact that we will be able to keep a close eye at all steps of the production process.

All items we decided to take ahead into our campaign are game-related and print-related, which means they are within our scope and we will be able to deliver them along with the product itself thus saving on shipping costs.

If we reach the stretch goal the remaining cards for 'The Bollywood Game: Horror Expansion' will go into illustration and layout work as soon as the campaign ends - according to the experience we've had with the game so far, this would require approximately 3-4 weeks to start printing the expansion deck.

All items will be shipped from Vancouver, Canada, primarily using Canada Post. We calculate the shipping cost for 1 box to be between CAD$11 and CAD$25 depending on your location. The actual cost will be sent to all backers once the campaign ends - it will also depend on whether a new item might be unlocked via stretch goal.

story:
The Gnostic Tarot has been 20 years in the making. Begun in 2000, each card is a reproduction of a uniquely created, full-size oil painting. Based on the Perennial Wisdom of the Gnostics, the entire deck has been carefully researched and thought out with a special focus on Querents reading for themselves. Using the psychology of Carl Jung, a self-described modern-day Gnostic, this deck is uniquely geared for soul-searching, spiritual contemplation, and Shadow work. 

 

The Gnostics were a sect of spiritual seekers who relied on a first-hand experience of the Divine rather than the orthodox pontifications of a self-appointed clergy. As a result, they were branded heretics by the Catholic Church. Their pursuit of inner experience continued in secret, appearing through the ages in such groups as the Cathars, the Alchemists, the Theosophists, and mystics the world over. Jung viewed Gnosticism as a map to the development of the human psyche based on an experiential awareness of the Self. The Gnostic Tarot is an expansion of this idea of psychological Individuation and spiritual awareness drawing on the traditional understanding of Tarot meaning as refined by the Golden Dawn. 

 

Each suit of the Minor Arcana is represented by its corresponding element: Fire [Wands], Water [Cups], Air [Swords], and Earth [Pentacles]. The 22 cards of the Major Arcana echo the traditional Marseille and Rider-Waite-Smith Tarots, while adding unique meanings and allusions of their own from psychology and esoteric teaching. Each Court card is represented by an Archetype. In place of out-dated royalty, these Archetypes are represented by a Boy and Girl and a Man and Woman. The Male suits of Fire and Air are headed by patriarchs while the Female suits of Water and Earth are led by Matriarchs. Aside from the Court Archetypes, many of the characters in The Gnostic Tarot exhibit an unspecified gender, leaving the question of gender open for the Querent.

In 2019, the final painting for The Gnostic Tarot was completed. Throughout 2020, tarot-maker and founder of Welkin Tarot assembled the material for the deck and edited the accompanying notes into the deck's companion book. The result is a 300-page colour trade-paperback packed with invaluable information and insight. Each card is reproduced in the book alongside a simplified version of the card, outlined and coded with letters for easy identification in the text. Each card's explanation is presented in point form, to keep ideas clear and themes bundled in easily accessed groupings. Each exegesis ends with a simplified set of interpretations, single-word definitions for upright and reversed pulls, and relevant quotes from the author, Jung, Gnostics, and scripture.

The book ends with some sample spreads. The following is an example to give you an idea of The Gnostic Tarot's scope: 

The Gnostic Spread

1. Who am I?

2. What do I know?

 3. What do I have to unknow?

 4. How do I experience God?

1. Boy of Air – Idealist/Saboteur: The prominent Archetype my current head-space best reflects is the idealistic Boy of Air. Being attuned to deceit and focused on the truth is a high ideal, but I must be careful that doesn't become an excuse to be cruel or indulge in deceit myself. 

 

2. 5 of Water – Hawthorne: I know the past well; I have gone over it many times, focusing on those moments about which I feel most ashamed. I also know that along the way I had the distinct feeling at times that it had happened before. 

 

3. 10 of Water – Shadow Graft: I have been loved by my family and been accepted which has helped me realize myself, but rather than remain in what is safe and reassuring I need to use that grounding to explore new vistas and learn new things – even if that includes the fact that not all people are accepting and consoling. 

 

4. Temperance XIV Mackerel: God exists in allowing yourself to be healed. God exists in moderation rather than excess. God exists in the grand and majestic of the earth [elephant] as well as the lowest unsung fish of the sea [mackerel]. God exists in the ferment and where you're not looking.

The cards are large format, 3.5" x 5.75", printed on 320 GSM card stock. They come in an individually sealed 2-piece rigid box.

 

This Kickstarter campaign is essentially a pre-order for The Gnostic Tarot, allowing for a deferment of printing expenses. A galley proof of the book has been printed and corrected, as has a proof of the deck itself. All corrections have been made and the book and deck are at the printers for production in January. Rewards will be sent out to contributors soon after The Gnostic Tarot Kickstarter campaign ends. As with all products by Welkin Tarot, contributors are assured of the finest quality and customer service. For example, every customer review for Welkin on Etsy is 5 stars, which can be viewed here. Welkin's previous Tarots can also be viewed here.

Thank you to everyone who has supported Welkin Tarot in the past, and to everyone who supports The Gnostic Tarot.

story:
Let us present you with a unique board game: “True Bid - 2020 Political Battle: Fun Board Game with Handicrafts”, a game with unique handmade elements. We made this game as a tribute to the most important political event of 2020 – the election of the U.S. President. 

Who will win the battle between Republicans and Democrats? Who will occupy the Oval Office? In this game, you will become the key participant of this year's most important political event.

A real historical event is right in front of you. You can make an important impact on U.S. history. In this game, it is a joke. In the real election, however, it is not. 

«True Bid. 2020 Political Battle» simulates a comic battle between the main presidential candidates. Take a side and win the presidential race as one of them. End your carefree political debate with friends and family while playing True Bid.  

 

 A fun, dynamic, and unpredictable game is already waiting for you. Choose the candidate you will play for. If you cannot determine the side for which you want to play, just throw the dice and let chance decide this for you! 

You will enjoy displaying presidential candidates in your home. This limited-edition game set marks an important event in American history. Your family can save and pass a part of this history to the next generation.

True Bid is not only a fun game, but it is also a great piece of decor

A set of nesting dolls will also be appreciated by collectors; it is a great keepsake. If you want to make a truly unique gift to your friend or your significant other, this game is a great choice.

The game board reflects the main stages of the presidential race. Head for victory step by step, assemble the nesting dolls, and watch your candidate’s emotions! The White House – the symbol of victory – is in the center of the board.

 

The set includes 2 dice. If the players cannot decide which of the candidates to play for, you can use the dice to make that choice. You can also use the dice to determine which player will be the first to draw a playing card. You are also able to use them in place of the playing cards to play the game faster. 

The game is not complicated, but it does have certain rules. For you to get maximum pleasure, we strongly recommend watching the video. 

We came up with very fun gameplay. On the game board, arrange the nesting dolls depicting each candidate according to the size and color of the Republican or Democratic party. In the center of the board, place the biggest nesting doll, the one depicting the White House and the Oval Office. 

Choose your game method: playing cards or dice.  The game is more fun when you play with cards, but it goes faster when you play with dice.

Decide for which of the candidates each player will play. If both of you support the same candidate, let the dice solve this dispute – the one who throws the most points gets first choice of candidates.

The aim of the game is to go through each stage of the race and assemble your candidate. The winner of each stage puts a smaller nesting doll into the one next in size until the winner reaches the biggest nesting doll with the White House and the Oval Office. Long live the new President!

Throw the dice to determine who will be the first to draw a card. Shuffle the deck and put the cards face down.

At each stage of the game, players take turns and draw cards one by one until one of them matches 2 cards of the same color. When this happens, the player who gets the match announces: "True Bid". If at this moment, the other player turns out to have one card less, they draw another card to even out their number of cards. 

Then players count the number of points on their cards, and the one with the most points wins this round. If the opponents have an equal number of points, they each draw one more card. The winner of the round puts the smallest nesting doll into the one next in size. All the cards used in the current round are moved to the bottom of the deck. In the next round, the winner of the previous round draws the first card and the steps are repeated.

The player who puts their candidate into the White House wins. Long live the new President! 

 

For a faster game, you can use the dice provided in the set instead of playing cards.

Players take turns and throw the dice. If both players roll an equal number of points, the dice are thrown again. The player with the most points puts the smallest nesting dolls into the one next in size. The winner of the previous round begins the next round. When one of the candidates ends up in the White House, it means victory for that player! 

This product is for entertainment and education only. Its purpose is to foster political debates and capture historical moments. It is not endorsed, sponsored, or affiliated with any individuals or political parties represented either expressly or by implication.

Do you want to feel like an election participant along with the other presidential candidates? Choose a reward with a personalized nesting doll, and we will make an exclusive, hand-painted nesting doll according to your photo!

We can paint you, your friend, or your significant other. Such a set of nesting dolls will be a real treasure or a great gift idea.

1. Just send us 4 photos displaying different emotions.

2. Specify who you want to be – a Republican or a Democrat.

You will have a unique piece of art made entirely by hand.

Our nesting dolls are absolutely safe. Only eco-friendly materials are used in the process of their creation. We make timber blanks from alder, birch, and aspen wood. We paint nesting dolls by hand using non-toxic acrylic paints. To preserve the paint, the product is finished only with an acrylic varnish that does not have a pungent odor.

Matryoshka is the most famous Russian souvenir and is considered a phenomenon in world culture. 

Risks and challenges

We did all of our design work and we already have our own manufacturing. So the game only needs a few remaining tweaks and then we're ready to send it out. We anticipate mailing out copies before the end of summer. It's important to us that everybody gets to play this game during 2020, while the election is dominating the news cycle! Once the campaign ends, and we have enough to pay manufacturing costs, we're ready to go!

We made this game as a tribute to the most important political event of 2020 – the election of the U.S. President. Who will win the battle between Republicans and Democrats? Who will occupy the Oval Office? In this game, you will become the key participant of this year's most important political event.A real historical event is right in front of you. You can make an important impact on U.S. history. In this game, it is a joke. In the real election, however, it is not. «True Bid. 2020 Political Battle» simulates a comic battle between the main presidential candidates. Take a side and win the presidential race as one of them. End your carefree political debate with friends and family while playing True Bid.     A fun, dynamic, and unpredictable game is already waiting for you. Choose the candidate you will play for. If you cannot determine the side for which you want to play, just throw the dice and let chance decide this for you! You will enjoy displaying presidential candidates in your home. story:
Short Summary

We are a small team that loves to play board games.
We had the wonderful idea of ​​creating a game that brought together all the favorite game elements.

www.jrcr.pt

About the Game 

 

Resources War Game brings to the table a lot of strategy, short term planning, long term planning, battles for key locations, and a lot of fun.

Resources are scarce, troops are expensive and of 2 types, lots of key territories, lots of options, and the luck of the dices, all combined leads up for a really exciting game.

Each players has a choice to make early in the game, a choice between expanding as fast as possible for control of the resources in the field and be ready to battle to hold them and be spread too thin risking been attacked even more and even at their own “Main Quarters”, or have a more protective approach and risk been left behind in the resources war.

In every game resources are placed randomly in the field with the help of dices, the game as 4 different types or resources 3 of each, Gold, Petroleum, mostly used to buy troops, those are separated 1 in each continent to make for a more evenly matched games, and Silver and Diamonds that are used in currency to buy for example really necessary “Main Quarters”, those are placed completely randomly in the field with the help of the dices with a maximum of 3 resources in each continent.

 

The Game, the beginning:


 

The evolution:

 The Box:

 

Inside the Box:

 

Playing the game:

 

We want to improve the prototype and bring this beautifull game to the market.

 

The team is as follows:

Jaime Lopes: Dreamer entrepreneur, who always wanted to fulfill his dream of creating something from scratch and turning it into a product. And that the product is a "life changer", as we believe that "Resources War Game" can come to be through the joy and leisure moments that it will provide. Responsible for development and design.

Cátia Lopes: Young girl who wants to transform the world by making it a better place. She believes that board games can be a teaching tool that provides knowledge and fun for everyone who plays them. Responsible for design and testing.

Etiene Barbosa: Passionate about games since there is memory. It intends to bring to this team all its knowledge in order to incorporate in this and other games the best possible game elements. Responsible for improving gameplay.

 

 what contributors will help us to achieve:

Contributors  will make possible the dream of launching a board game on the market.


Your contributions will serve two important stages, which are as follows:

Laboratory tests: All products sold in the European Union need to be CE marked.
Board games fall into the toy category, so they must comply with the toy standard (EN71).
A portion of the money raised will be used to carry out laboratory tests (mechanical and physical properties, flammability, chemicals).

Production: The remainder of the contributions will be used to carry out the first production. And make the first deliveries of the product.

RoadMap:

Contact us and see the updates and news:

Website:

http://www.jrcr.pt

Email: 

geral@jrcr.pt

story:
About this project

Quick and easy tabletop game including an electronic color sensor that determines outcome of a game figure dispute. As  delivered, 2 - 4 players engage in discovering an ever changing maze and rooms, looting, and gaining ranks (mostly).

The StrifeStone

The board

How does it work?

 

Timeline

Miniature wargaming

Are you into miniature wargaming. Struggle to get non-wargamers to join games, try applying color to the base of a set of your miniatures representing private, sergeant, lieutenant, captain, major, and general. 

 

Prototyping

Here are some pictures and videos that show the development progress. What if the idea could be implemented in one day? I surely would miss the travel, trail and error, prototyping, fine tuning, designing. Not in one day, no way. It was a journey and still is ...

From the lab

Artwork

Artwork and lead design StrifeStone Christian P.Koch, partial artistic credit GreyTale, The Sim and others for which proper licencing has been obtained.

,

story:
The Seas of Vodari is a full-color book that we are offering in hardcover and PDF. This book provides 200+ pages of material for gamemasters to run exciting seafaring campaigns for 5th Edition. Your players will get tons of options for creating characters and you'll get support to run a world full of swashbuckling action and magical adventure. 

We need your support to fund the additional artwork, book layout, and to print the hardcover book.  

Long ago, a vast continent was annihilated and all but the outer edge of the continent sank to the bottom of the sea. The devastation left only a scattered few to start rebuilding their civilization on a ring of islands…

The Seas of Vodari campaign setting contains all of the iconic things you’d expect in a fantasy setting, but in a world with more water than land, much of the familiar becomes surprising and new. 

  • Dungeons can be found deep below the surface of the sea in the form of shipwrecks and lost cities.
  • The most dangerous monsters are found below the waves, such as sea dragons, megalodons and krakens.
  • Nature becomes as deadly as the most powerful monsters with furious hurricanes, catastrophic tsunamis, and fiery volcanoes.

Islands are modular by nature and the book was designed for you to use as a detailed setting or to pick and choose what you like for your own game world.

 

 

The Seas of Vodari campaign setting was created to support seafaring adventures that focus on the crew of a ship hunting sea monsters, exploring mysterious uncharted islands, visiting bustling port cities, following maps to find buried treasure, and battling cutthroat pirates. The setting is also well suited to running campaigns in its large port cities, with swashbuckling heroes getting mixed up with fierce rivals, notorious crime syndicates, feuding nobles, and scheming politicians. 

 

Sceptre, the capital of the Pirate Isles.

The Seas of Vodari will provide you with tons of material to run an entire seafaring campaign or just a single adventure...

  • New races and subraces, classes and subclasses, backgrounds, and feats for your players to create seafaring adventurers.
  • Swashbuckling and sorcery inspired options for all 12 classes to fit a seafaring world
  • Gunslinger class with three subclasses (Arcane Gunmaster, Pistolero, and Musketeer) 
  • A full pantheon for clerics and paladins

  • New weapon, armor and equipment options to offer your players. 
  • You'll find flintlock pistols and rifles, cutlasses and sabres, compasses, spyglasses, and more.

  • New spells, magic items, and powerful ancient relics with a focus on sailing, naval combat, and underwater exploration. 

  • Explore countless islands, with details for over thirty islands, a dozen cities, wilderness encounters, ruins, and more.

  • Advice for running swashbuckling adventures
  • Rules for duels, social combat, naval chases, plunder tables, the code of the sea, and more.

  • 'Island with No Name' starter adventure for levels 1 to 3. 
  • Quick run scenarios including a haunted ship, sunken shipwreck, treasure hunt, and more.

  • Sloops, brigatines, galleons, gnomish submersibles, dwarven ironsides, elven swan ships, ships of the damned, and more. 
  • Plus, we didn't forget to add lots of cannons.

  • NPCs for your players to befriend or face as adversaries. Stats, motivations, illustrations, and more will be provided for each. 

  • Monsters to challenge, amuse, and terrify your players including sea dragons, windsurfing goblins, sirens, technofish, megalodons, and sea titans.  
     

When the campaign ends we'll send out a survey to all of our backers where you'll have the option to pick-up additional copies of the book and add-ons on Backerkit. 
 

Add-on prices are in Canadian dollars.

Our current team on the project.

Shawn Ellsworth - Project Lead
Co-founder of ENnie nominated Tribality.com, platinum selling author on DriveThruRPG, web designer, and gamemaster sailing the Seas of Vodari since 2014.

Brandes Stoddard -  Game Designer & Writer
Freelance game designer/writer and fantasy LARPer. Has worked on past projects for Rite Publishing, Atomic Overmind, ENworld's EN5ider, Tribality, and others. 

Colin McLaughlin - Game Designer & Writer
Freelance game designer and writer. Has worked on past projects for ENworld's EN5ider, Tribality, and others.

Rich Howard - Game Designer & Writer
Freelance game designer, podcaster, co-designer of Descent into Midnight RPG and the best selling Alchemist for 5e through Tribality Publishing on DriveThruRPG.

Michael Long - Writer
Co-founder of Tribality.com, author on DriveThruRPG, D&D Adventurer's League DM, founder of D&D 5e Facebook fan page, and Seas of Vodari player.

Mark Cookman - Writer
Author of Pirate GM series and zombie apocalypse campaign supplement book, Welcome to Mortiston, USA, and captain of a 36' sailboat that he lives aboard with his family.

Dave Jumaquio - Graphic Design & Layout Artist
Provides all of Tribality's branding and layouts for PDF publications. Dave designed the website and logo for Seas of Vodari and will be responsible for the layout of the book.

Mariam Trejo - Character Design & Illustration
Illustrator who designs characters for comics, animation and children books. Ara illustrated all of the character concepts and the cover illustration for Seas of Vodari. 

Daniël Hasenbos - Map Illustration
Freelance cartographer and illustrator who specializes in hand-drawn fantasy maps. Daniël will be drawing the world map and other maps for the book.

Want to help us get the word out? Follow Seas of Vodari on social media and let your friends and family know about the campaign.

  • https://www.instagram.com/seasofvodari/
  • https://twitter.com/seasofvodari
  • https://www.facebook.com/seasofvodari/

story:
We've taken these valuable life priorities into consideration and have thus created for you the perfect plan of action.  Clean beer pong while you do important stuff like study and watch hockey, and stuff.  All to your door before the new year.  FTW!

 

 

 

 

 

d

 You've got a choice of red or clear and our inserts fit all sizes of standard beer cups, from 12oz to 20oz.  So if you have some other cups kicking around you need to use up, they will totally suffice!  PS - we are aware that there is a random "D" hovering above this section which we are unable to remove... Not a matter of lack of attention to detail.  Ourselves and the Indie platform just can't seem to agree on it.

 

***Specify colour of choice @ pongerzwithaz@gmail.com. Otherwise, we will send Pongerz Original Clear cups and inserts***

 

 

 

 

***When making a purchase of $35 or more in the perks section, please specify if you would like to receive the hat provided we meet our stretch goal @ pongerzwithaz@gmail.com***

 

 

We want to take this twist of pong and turn it into action.  This isn't just about beer pong, this is about building an empire.  And YOUR pledges support this cause!  

Drink on, Ballers.  Keep your balls dry, keep your beer clean.

IT'S TIME FOR PONGERZ. 

Our biggest risk, obviously was (and is) investing the time, money, people and resources into making this thing come to life.  Beer pong isn't much of a tapped market, but we know that the fundamental issue every gamer faces is, of course, drinking the nasty cess-pool beer that gives you stomach aches and sicknesses the next day (don't you want to keep your beer tasty and fresh the way it was made for you to enjoy)?!  

Your pledges go towards the expansion of Pongerz and getting it off the ground.  Your pledges also go towards the many wonderful people involved and continuing to be involved in making it all happen :) 

Indiegogo seemed like the perfect place to go to for help: we love being so heavily involved with this project and want to continue doing so.  In helping us, we can give back to our community with clean beer pong and the awesomeness that goes with it - and keeping our creativity, brand and vision!  Cheers, guys!  xxx

Pongerz

www.pongerz.com

Our biggest risk, obviously was (and is) investing the time, money, people and resources into making this thing come to life.  Beer pong isn't much of a tapped market, but we know that the fundamental issue every gamer faces is, of course, drinking the nasty cess-pool beer that gives you stomach aches and sicknesses the next day (don't you want to keep your beer tasty and fresh the way it was made for you to enjoy)?!  
Your pledges go towards the expansion of Pongerz and getting it off the ground.  Your pledges also go towards the many wonderful people involved and continuing to be involved in making it all happen :) 
Indiegogo seemed like the perfect place to go to for help: we love being so heavily involved with this project and want to continue doing so.  In helping us, we can give back to our community with clean beer pong and the awesomeness that goes with it - and keeping our creativity, brand and vision!  Cheers, guys!  xxx
Pongerz
www.pongerz.com

story:
¡Para ver la versión en español haced clic el siguiente botón!

Sanctorvm is an adult game. Its narrative (Adventure Mode) uses free and explicit violence to drive the players through the atmosphere, and surround them with all the concepts that trigger disturbance and immorality in human beings. Players will be forced to take part in different events which may cause discomfort to those playing or viewing it.

Our objective is NOT to promote this way of thinking. We created this unique universe to show the worst side of human beings.

For those who just want a quick, fun, goreless game session, we also offer the Arcade Mode which includes missions for 1 to 6 players and doesn't follow the narrative or need an Overlord.

 
Because Sanctorvm is a narrative adventure, our long-term goal is to bring it to the digital world. Using pixel art style, we will create an application that will act as a storyteller itself, facilitating the Overlord's job. This application will not be required for the gameplay, but it will help!
 

    

 

We knew that there had to be more than just a board game to define the Sanctorvm project, and in this case, we chose to create an album that could evoke the needed atmosphere.

Thanks to 12 artists around the world that joined our project, we now have 12 tracks to enhance the ambience of our game sessions. It has an exclusive OST retro-wave style, mixing the sounds of the 80’s/90’s with some kind of dark background, and the final results sound amazing.

The album (THE DEPTH) itself represents a journey. Cooperlay’s Daughter 401 might now be a living hell, but the music is great!

Our vinyls will be produced by Deepgrooves company. 

 

After selecting a main pledge perk from the campaign page, the next screen will show you all the available add-ons under "Perks you may also like."

 

The idea of Sanctorvm was born during a role-playing session combined with the essence of Sci-Fi movies like Event Horizon, Pandorum, or Alien.

Once we had the main story, we went looking for visual references to develop the different factions of the Colony and define the style not just of the different creatures and enemies, but also the whole game pack, trying to mix ideas from Dead Space, Borderlands, or Dark Souls for example.

We used Christian references to create a distorted version and develop the Edentronic Order ruled by Savior.

Tribal and Mad Max-Cyberpunk references were used to create the Virgul Tum’s Stigia Herd.

In order to create the Leviathan Cult, we took the aesthetics of different Satanic cults and combined them with the idea of the cult from Dead Space.

For the Scarlet Pantheon and the military world of Didier, we have the Colonel Kurt and his brigade from Apocalypse Now as the idea of an army ruled by a madman.

Finally, we have Proteus, a virus inspired by the unleashed power of the movie Akira, growing grotesque organic forms with different powers.

These powers are known as Ethermancy and are the representation of magic in this world, so we chose a style closer to Tarot or Sakura - the anime - to create them, using just black and white and a classic composition.

To complement the art, we have all the music created by various artists that gives the final touch of colour and spirit, taking the sounds and aesthetics from the retro wave music and giving power to neons and powerful colours.

Mixing all of this, we finally have a product that tries to manage a constant duality between order and chaos, organic and inorganic, life and death, to finally fit it all into a box lost in space.

 

We took this project to Indiegogo because we love what we do! We have put our maximum effort into this project and we need your help to get it out across the globe!

If you like sci-fi, survival horror games, and terror atmosphere, please back this project and help us create Sanctorvm.

story:
Welcome to the World of I Built It Miniatures!

 

Detailed gaming terrain exponentially increases the immersion factor of tabletop games.

However, not everyone has the time or skills to craft their own terrain, and commercially available terrain can be notoriously difficult and time-consuming to build and paint! Not to mention the vague instructions that come along with the kits simply serve to increase frustration and prolong the build.

At I Built It, we aim to change that!

 

 

Our model kits do not need tools, glue or paint to be completed. 

All the parts snap together using a unique friction fit system that allows you to assemble and disassemble each kit as you please. Our kits come pre-painted using only non-toxic paints. This pre-painted layer also acts as a primer should you wish to paint or whether your model.

 

Standard Texture vs Pro Texture

 

Our models feature working components and mechanisms varying from doors and windows that really open, to drawbridges that lower, and siege engines that launch projectiles! 

    

Our instruction booklets are thorough, detailed, and clearly illustrated with step by step instructions and handy suggestions to make each assembly quick and painless.

 

Most importantly, all our building kits are "Super-Modular," giving you the ability to combine our sets with almost no limit!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Comparative photo showing the Eyrie Rampart on the left (120mm length) and the regular Rampart on the right (100mm length)

 

Super Modularity: 

Our sets have multiple levels of modularity and are designed to maximize your ability to customize your model as well as expand your collection to build entire villages, towns, and castles.

All our sets are made up of individual modular blocks that can be stacked vertically as well as horizontally. These modular blocks come in a variety of sizes and materials, allowing you to model buildings of different sizes and material finishes which can be interchanged with ease. For example, brick, stone, wood, and plaster facades can be combined and swapped with each other to create multiple material combinations.

Putlogs:

Putlogs are a series of wooden pegs of varying lengths that we use to join modules together both horizontally and vertically. They are not essential but offer additional rigidity to your gaming setup if used.

Modular base plate: This system comprises a set of modular base plates that join together to form a rigid base on which to assemble your model. To use this base plate, a variety of modular road and pavement plates can be attached using putlogs.

Grid system: The façade of each modular block is covered with a uniformly spaced grid of slots. These slots allow you to fit a wide variety of architectural features such as balconies, walkways, garderobes, hoardings, bay windows, signage, chimneys, and a whole lot more. These slots come with detachable covers that need to be removed before the installation of accessories. These covers can be replaced to hide the slots if the accessory is to be moved or is no longer needed. This grid system also allows you to rigidly fix blocks together using wooden pegs called putlogs.

Interchange-able Facades:

Every facade piece provided with our kits is engineered to be modular allowing you to interchange facades from one building to another. 

DETAILING BOTH INSIDE AND OUT: 

All our sets are filled with realistic architectural and structural detailing both inside and out. They boast masonry, arches, vaults, buttresses, fenestration with a depth effect, intricate patterns, stained glass windows, openable doors, windows, realistic roofing systems with trusses, rafters, purlins, beams, shingles, brackets, corbels, machicolations, crenellations, timber joinery, and realistic flooring patterns. You can even simulate damage by cutting away various layers of the model to expose the authentic structure beneath.

Image: Picassawi

Image: Picassawi

Image: Picassawi

Image: Picassawi

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping will be charged separately after the campaign ends via our Pledge Manager. The above are estimates of Shipping & Handling costs based on current rates & expected price changes with our carriers.

Shipping & Handling estimates for Add-Ons are not included.

Backers will be charged VAT via the Pledge Manager based on the country in which they live.

For backers in the USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand and Europe, rewards will be shipped so that the backer does not have to pay additional fees or duties in order to accept delivery. For all other backers, we cannot guarantee 'friendly' shipping of rewards.

 

MADE BY US, BUILT BY YOU.

At I Built It, we design and manufacture intricately detailed architectural model kits that also function as gaming terrain. We are avid gamers who have a passion for history and are also practicing architects and engineers in everyday life. We have distilled our practical expertise and combined it with our love for history and gaming to bring to you the I Built It range of model kits.

As engineers we take delight in beautiful, precise, and efficient engineering; as Architects we delve into the functionality of our buildings; and as history buffs we try to capture the everyday lives of those who lived in those olden times.

The kits you see on display are a result of 5 years of painstaking research , exhaustive experimentation, and painful failures that ultimately led to success.

We pay keen attention to detail in every stage of a kit's design and manufacture. Each kit has been rigorously tested and optimized to offer a pleasurable user-friendly build.

We precision cut our products in our own production facility using state of the art equipment with accuracy measured in the fraction of a millimeter. Each kit goes through multiple checks at various stages of production before being packed and shipped.

The raw material we use is of the highest grade and has been sourced keeping in mind all relevant safety regulations.

 

Why Indiegogo?

At I Built It, we love crafting and model making. Our goal is to enable people, no matter their skill level, to be able to make amazingly detailed and immersive worlds and environments. We want to turn people into master builders. Let no one say, "I am not crafty, therefore I shall not build." 

To that end, our goals are:

1) To increase our market presence and brand awareness.

2) To increase our capacity to produce kits by adding additional machinery and hiring more talent.

3) To speed up the development of a wide range of model kits that we have incubating at the moment.

 

I Built It was founded by engineer-architect team Zoeya and Sunil with the goal of making gaming terrain and model kits that are intricately detailed yet enjoyable to assemble.

Zoeya is a former software engineer and computer hardware tester with a keen interest in architecture and gaming. 

Sunil is a practicing architect, enthusiastic model maker, and gamer.

The idea behind I Built It started when Sunil was in architecture school, but the idea only took when he met his partner Zoeya. Merging their combined skills and experience, together they have created the full range of I Built It's fully modular friction fit kits. 

As an organisation, I Built It Miniatures has a marketing office in Sydney, Australia and a design and production center in Bangalore, India.

Our family:

Our Family is Sunil, Zoeya and our daughter Amber and we are happy that we can make things that others like!

As a family we love to work hard and play hard, so it is really awesome that for us our work is also our play. Our daughter Amber can't keep her hands off of the models, though she is too young to build them herself; however, she has no problems dismantling them! Lucky for us there is no glue involved so as quickly as she breaks them, we put it back together.

 

Risks and challenges

We currently design and also manufacture our kits in-house. This is to give us the rigid control we need to maintain quality. We have tried outsourcing production to third-party factories, but invariably quality suffers. This imposes a limitation on how many pieces we can produce. We are currently capable of averaging 700 units a month. Scaling up production is simply a matter of adding more machines, as in order to ensure the quality that is demanded, a strict system is already created and needs to be enforced to ensure no mistakes slip through the cracks.

We have already planned and designed this system and are ready for implementing it with the addition of more machines. We currently operate our production facility with two machines and we are ready to easily expand it to accommodate 8 more machines. With each machine doing on average 350 units a month, we potentially have the capacity to produce 3500 pieces a month.

 

However, in order to streamline the production line, it becomes essential to have a strict plan in place to prevent bottlenecks at any point in the production line. We implement a strict training procedure for the new staff we need to hire to handle the additional machines.

That being said, we do have experience manufacturing, shipping and selling internationally, We have Version 1 of our products in the market since late 2018. Version 1 also has friction fit parts, is functional and requires no tools glue or paint. Version 2 which is being offered here differs in being "super-modular" which sets it in a class apart.

story:
Know Thy Neighbor is a hilarious card game of guessing and confessing. Players take turns reading highly inappropriate questions while others guess what they believe is the card reader's answer. The Neighbors who guess correctly are safe, but those that don't receive a Bad Neighbor card.

The first Neighbor(s) to receive 5 Bad Neighbor cards loses the game and must submit to a penalty decided by the Neighborhood. 

Know Thy Neighbor was created by Matt Deaton and Paras Tiwari, a couple of friends who are exhausted of boring conversation. The game is a hilarious way to ask the questions you've always wanted to ask but without a slap in the face or red-eyed stare of judgment. 

Know Thy Neighbor is a fun way to learn more about yourself and your friends (if you're 18 or older). So, we put together this Kickstarter because we can not build this new edition without you. 

So, if you're the type of person who's not easily offended, appreciates a good d*ck joke, has ridden a mechanical bull, suffers from #FOMO, loves to party, or just doesn't give a f*ck, then please help us bring this game to life and to a Neighborhood near you. 

Thanks, and welcome to the neighborhood!

- Matt & Paras

story:
OUR TEAM

Andrei Detesan, exquisite Art Director at work and whimsical illustrator at home.

Andreea Cristea, talented Copywriter at work and magical storyteller at home. 

Our skills combined have brought to life the immersive Twisted Fate - The card game. 

OUR CAMPAIGN
After 3 years of working on our game, we are ready to launch it and bring it to you. It has been designed and thought independently from scratch, with a unique story, compelling mechanics and visual craft.
After long AB testing, Twisted Fate - The card game is now ready to be on every table and shelf with the promise to keep you entertained, competitive and even sneaky.
And those chillies keep their promises.

By supporting us you are helping to upgrade our game with more durable and high-quality materials, 3D figurines, faster shipping, creative packaging, thus giving us more time to create an amazing customer experience for all of you and that's not all. 

We're launching a game with a powerful story that starts right here with you reading our mission.

 

Let me explain the rules shortly - is that simple.

 

Download the Rulebook

 

What We Need & What You Get

All of the funds will go towards creating the best experience there is for you, our backers.

With your help and support you are allowing us to upgrade our materials, enhance the experience and make better deals with shipping companies to make sure all of you get the packages from us.
This also allows us to create more goodies: stickers, 3D figurines, postcards and other memorabilia for you to enjoy our game to the fullest.
 

The Pre-launch event

We've received amazing feedback from people when we organised the pre-launch party and managed to make a lot of people come and play our game.
They left with stickers, signed posters, postcards and some even bought the game from our first produced batch.

 

Let's get in touch



TWISTED FATE - THE CARD GAME TERMS & CONDITIONS

By confirming your order, you agree that this sale is final, and no refunds will be issued except at our absolute discretion. You further acknowledge that the final look, materials, and content of the order (and the project) are subject to change and may differ from what is presented on Indiegogo.

You agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities.

Typically, import duties are paid up front as part of your shipping costs (which is what “friendly shipping” means), however, there are certain countries where regulations prevent advance payment by a third party, and you may be responsible to pay customs taxes directly.**

**These countries include, but are not limited to the following: Central and South America (including Brazil), Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Turkey, UAE, Indonesia, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, and Taiwan. All customers in these locations must handle their own tariffs, and they order at their own risk, not ours. For Brazil, in particular, we suggest you have your product shipped to an address of someone you know outside Brazil who plans on traveling there to hand deliver.

You are also responsible for providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods.

REFUND POLICY

As per the terms stated on Indiegogo, a full refund will be provided if the request is received within 14 days of the close of the campaign.

Otherwise, such a refund will be at our exclusive discretion and will be net of handling costs, Indiegogo commissions and credit card processing fees.

If you fail to check out and pay for your order, including shipping costs, before the posted payment deadline, you may be forfeiting your products. Unclaimed games will be released after the closing date to online and retail sales since we lose money on unclaimed games due to storage fees.

Refunds and/or cancellation requests will only be considered before we set the print run size for mass manufacturing with our factory, which takes place upon the posted payment deadline for the Pledge Manager.

Read the full policies, here.

All of the funds will go towards creating the best experience there is for you, our backers.
With your help and support you are allowing us to upgrade our materials, enhance the experience and make better deals with shipping companies to make sure all of you get the packages from us.This also allows us to create more goodies: stickers, 3D figurines, postcards and other memorabilia for you to enjoy our game to the fullest. 

The Pre-launch event
We've received amazing feedback from people when we organised the pre-launch party and managed to make a lot of people come and play our game.They left with stickers, signed posters, postcards and some even bought the game from our first produced batch.

 
Let's get in touch


TWISTED FATE - THE CARD GAME TERMS & CONDITIONSBy confirming your order, you agree that this sale is final, and no refunds will be issued except at our absolute discretion. You further acknowledge that the final look, materials, and content of the order (and the project) are subject to change and may differ from what is presented on Indiegogo.You agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities.Typically, import duties are paid up front as part of your shipping costs (which is what “friendly shipping” means), however, there are certain countries where regulations prevent advance payment by a third party, and you may be responsible to pay customs taxes directly.****These countries include, but are not limited to the following: Central and South America (including Brazil), Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Turkey, UAE, Indonesia, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, and Taiwan. All customers in these locations must handle their own tariffs, and they order at their own risk, not ours. For Brazil, in particular, we suggest you have your product shipped to an address of someone you know outside Brazil who plans on traveling there to hand deliver.You are also responsible for providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods.REFUND POLICYAs per the terms stated on Indiegogo, a full refund will be provided if the request is received within 14 days of the close of the campaign.Otherwise, such a refund will be at our exclusive discretion and will be net of handling costs, Indiegogo commissions and credit card processing fees.If you fail to check out and pay for your order, including shipping costs, before the posted payment deadline, you may be forfeiting your products. Unclaimed games will be released after the closing date to online and retail sales since we lose money on unclaimed games due to storage fees.Refunds and/or cancellation requests will only be considered before we set the print run size for mass manufacturing with our factory, which takes place upon the posted payment deadline for the Pledge Manager.Read the full policies, here.

story:
I've been designing games since childhood, when I painted over an old Monopoly board and created "Phalanx", a Greek combat game that rewarded armies that had superior depth and breadth. I was 10. Since then, I've made at least half a dozen games; (an RPG & several card games). But they are all packed in boxes.

This time, Submerge: Echo 51 is going out into the world. This is the game I like to play. It's fast, strategic, brutal and one card away from victory.

Submerge: Echo 51 is based on the movie of the same name by Demetrius Witherspoon.  See: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5THMJaWoQPk or watch the movie at https://www.amazon.com/Submerge-Echo-51-Shonna-...

I was fortunate to work with Demetrius on this movie, and when he floated the idea of a card game based on his series of films, I said, "YES!"

It took three years to put the whole thing together. We playtested versions at Indianapolis cons such as Gen Con & PopCon and optimized the game play. Generous fans (including Todd Floe, who showed much love) jumped on the original Indiegogo that raised $2,000 to pay for the amazing art from Albert Sawal Dela Cruz, an astonishing artist from the Phillippines. THEN, the talented Ben Porter formatted the final deck so we could actually print the decks. 

The game LOOKS great, it PLAYS great, and it's a blast.

  • Why are we doing a 2nd funding event?

Great question. Selling the deck by "print on demand" (https://www.drivethrucards.com/product/302515/S...) costs over $20 just to break even. The truth is, the more decks we print, the lower the price. Our goal is to get at least a few hundred pre-payed buyers so that we can push the cost to $9.99. (Not bad for a game with 181 cards!)

Goal: $1,000

What happens if we get our goal?: We print the deck(s) and send them to you.

What happens if we do NOT get our goal?: We will alert you, the print will not happen, and you will recoup your cash.

Extras: Box, wrapped in amazing art from the game; Easy Instructions, and access to a short video to get you started in minutes.

NOT Extra: 6 sided dice. You'll need a few, and I assume you have them.

NOT Extra: Shipping costs will be $5, which means the contribution is in 14.99

Thanks for reading and thanks for helping make Submerge: Echo 51 a success.

Sincerely,

Bret Robinson

story:
What We Need & What You Get

We aren't a wealthy plug & play camp— we built this bar in our early twenties, with our bare hands, sweating profusely, bleeding occasionally, using mostly recycled material and an infantile understanding of carpentry. After many years of hard use, it's falling apart and it's time to rebuild it so we can keep serving this goddamn soup. And we need your help! Please, get involved and be a part of this magical project, and help us keep serving you soup for the rest of your life! We will love you forever. And you will have the pleasure of knowing you supported the playa's best late night hangout spot, which you can flaunt in front of your coworkers! Don't make us beg. We will beg! 

Settlers On The Playa is based on the rules of Settlers of Catan, and the game play is similar, but mixes in inspiration from the sights and concepts you'll find on the Playa.

Each early-bird Settlers of the Playa game will include:

  •  An 18'x18' quad-fold custom board inspired by the Playa

 

  • 60 roads                                                                                    
  • 20 Camps                                                                                      
  • 16 Villages                                                                                        
  • 1 "Sparkle Pony"                                                                                        
  • 95 resource cards (Flames, Sparkles, Wind, Water, Dust)
  • 25 development cards (14 Ranger, Darkwad, Playa Terraforming, Center Camp, Groundscore & Temple)
  • 4 "Camp Dues" cards
  • 2 Special Cards "Longest Trip", & "Largest Camp"
  • 28 number tokens
  • 11 "Black Rock Desert" markers
  • 2 dice
  • 1 Rulebook including the names of our early-bird supporters 

The Impact

The new bar design is super dope; it's the same sexy vibe you know and love, but it will be sleeker, safer, and more durable. This time, our famous two-story bar is being designed by structural engineers to be safe and long lasting, made from steel.  So we won't have to bother you for money again after this. 

And fear not! We will still have a stripper pole!

 

Risks & Challenges

We've partnered with "The Game Crafter", a company produces custom board games, to bring Settlers of the Playa to life. We're still play testing our new concept to make sure there aren't any surprises in our novel Playa-inspired board design. Once we've designed cards for all the resources, 

A note about our inspiration

"Settlers of the Playa" is based on "Settlers of Catan". Settlers of Catan is a trademark property of Catan GmbH. All rights reserved by their respective owners. The included board and pieces are derivative works of the original game set, which is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. In compliance with this license, "Settlers of the Playa" is also licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. See you on the Playa!

story:
Getting from point A to B should be easy, and with Blizwheel, we believe we’ve changed the game. 

The Blizwheel e-scooter is fast, ultra light, and portable so you can take it with you everywhere. With its smooth ride and compact design, you’ll never have to worry about getting stuck in traffic or finding a parking space again.

 

 
 
Blizwheel e-scooters are 70% lighter than average e-scooters which makes it easy to carry around and even faster to ride.

 

Blizwheel is a 15.6-inch e-scooter that’s so compact, you can put it in your backpack or place it nicely in your desk drawer while you work. 

 

When you’re not riding around, you can leave Blizwheel standing without needing to hold it. So if you need to stop by a store or use your phone while waiting for the train, you can comfortably do so.

 

Depending on your needs, Blizwheel can be folded completely to be carried around by its handle or halfway so you can tow it around on its wheel.

 

Safely maneuver the city with rear and front LED lights equipped with a fully functioning turn signal.

 

Tired of walking a long way for that "last mile"? Blizwheel can connect you much faster to your destination, after getting off at the bus stop, metro, or a distant parking lot. It’s also perfect to get around campus. Parking won’t be a problem -  just fold it up and take it with you inside the classroom.

 

Blizwheel is incredibly smooth to ride thanks to a special PU suspension which gives it the same height clearance as larger scooters and makes it easier to turn.

 

But cutting corners isn’t an option in Blizwheel’s power. Its dual motors give greater speed and better acceleration. Blizwheel will become your all-around personal commute from bumpy, tight street corners to flat, open spaces.

 
Please just refer to the raw footage above, no any editing or speeding up. Then you can see how Blizwheel performs when going over a speed bump.

 


Our team integrated all the parts into Blizwheel, and every part is at right place without any waste of space. That's why blizwheel E-Scooter is so small.

 

To know more about Blizwheel E-Scooter and the story behind the product, just watch the video above. It shows the team background, product demo, detailed features, etc.

 

 

 

 

Earlier version of Prototype 

Nine prototypes were developed until we settled on the best and current version of Blizwheel.

At

Testing The Control Board 

At present, our supply chain has been set up, and we have gotten quotes for every component of Blizwheel. With years of experience in the electric vehicles industry, our team is confident that we can make the delivery on time if we reach the funding goal.

 


 

The Blizwheel team is spread across the United States and China and has years of working experience in manufacturing (particularly in portable electric vehicles), electronics, industrial design, supply chain, software development and marketing. We are enthusiasts of innovative product development. In late 2017, our team launched Blizwheel E-Skates. Although the campaign was unsuccessful, we were able to acquire all the technologies required to develop extremely small electric vehicles. Being optimists, we didn't give up and got together again as a team in 2019. This time around, we hope Blizwheel will reach more people and encourage the use of electric vehicles.

Partners

braag - A boutique pre-launch to post-launch marketing agency leveraging data-driven customer acquisition to fuel record-breaking Kickstarters.

story:
Ride into your next adventure on Rocket Bike—the first eBike with 100-mile range, regenerative braking, all-terrain tires and a compact foldable frame.

Commute to work, ride mountain trails or cruise the beach—Rocket Bike takes you anywhere you want to go with ease.

Many eBikes have short range, but not Rocket. Rocket Bike has an industry-leading range of 100 miles thanks to the perfect combination of innovative regenerative braking and a lightweight frame.

This beast of a bike is kitted out the with highest-quality features for maximum performance.

High quality and fully-spec'd bikes are expensive, and affordable bikes have low-quality materials or poor design. We cut out the middleman and created the coolest affordable eBike that has all the features you want packaged in a bold, record-setting-performance design. 

Rocket Bike comes pre-assembled so you can ride ASAP. Yewww!

Rocket Bike is a faithful steed on long-distance adventures. With a range that’s 3x the industry standard, you can embark on any adventure without worrying about your eBike dying halfway through.

Juice up your battery on the move with Rocket Bike’s Kinetic Energy Recovery System that transfers energy to your battery while gliding, braking or going downhill.

Easily fold Rocket Bike in seconds for efficient storing in your car, office, garage or closet! 

Jet to your destination at up to 28mph! Rocket Bike is rear-wheel drive with either a 750W (US buyers) or 250W (EU buyers) engine from Bafang with high torque and uphill efficiency.

Plus, it has Cruise Control! Switch it on and when the bike has the same speed for 5 seconds, it locks in that speed and you turn it off by braking.

 

Rocket Bike is perfect for any rider or occasion. It gives you the freedom to go longer than ever before, over any terrain. 

This weatherproof ride can tough out the rain, rocky trails and sand, and still give you a smooth city commute. Take this baby to work or on a long biking adventure and trust that you can cruise home when your energy is running low. 

Rocket Bike stands out in the long list of eBike offerings for one reason: we designed it around what people love most in their eBikes. We designed the snazzy frame ourselves and optimized the regenerative braking system, then handpicked the electronics and features that the bike has today so you are never limited by your bike. 

Your bike doesn’t determine where you do and don’t go, you do. Own your ride.

Our cool, clean and innovative design makes a bold statement as you roll by on the color of your choice. 

At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey to get your shipping information and deliver your Rocket Bike when manufacturing is complete!

User-friendly and loaded with smart features. Theft tracking, bike customisation, GPS, trip data, social features and more, the My Rocket App is built for a life on the go. Free to use for Rocket owners.  

 

Rocket Bike is born and bred in Belfast, UK. By us: a group of tight knit friends. We have backgrounds in: industrial design, mechanical engineering and supply chain management. We met each other as colleagues with a shared interest in electric modes of transportation. We love all things action and fun. 

Our founder Georg used to work to in the renewable technology sector. We all sat down for a beer and talked about a big change taking place: Electric cars becoming mainstream. But why only cars? We believe anyone should use electric modes of transportation.

Especially bikes: that’s precisely why our product was born. Rocket Bike is the product we desired, but that didn’t exist yet. We decided to join the mission of making electric modes of transportation an option for any lifestyle.

The biggest challenge for our team has been to find ways to manufacture our electric bike with high quality: while at the same time being able to offer it at a reasonable price. Electric bikes of high quality can be incredibly expensive to manufacture. We’ve had to spend a lot of time sourcing the right components and make manufacturing as efficient as possible down to the smallest details. This is to ensure Rocket Bike is affordable without having to sacrifice its high quality or performance.

Fast forward over one year of R&D.  We finished the arduous process of full patent approval, meaning our custom built frame is truly unique and that riding Rocket eBike is truly an experience like no other.

We have developed the Rocket Bike frame fully from scratch. We have perfected the regenerative braking system. We have optimized the engine. We have carefully sourced the best quality components. The result: the most smooth and efficient electric bike you can find. And the most fun, believe us.

From left to right: Fiona – Customer Success, Graham – Technology Lead, Patrick – Design, William – Global Logistics, Georg - General Manager.

Our mission is for Rocket Bike to be a leading global brand in the eBike field and set the trend for fun as well as innovative modes of transportation. This model, with the folding frame, is our first in a series of upcoming launches. We are launching two new models for summer 2021, and three new models for summer 2022. We will have a full lineup of 6 electric bike models suited for any type of rider by 2022. Just like the original Rocket Bike, all future models are characterized by their industry leading range, industry leading performance, sporty design, impeccable quality and affordable price range.

We have worked extremely hard to make this product ready for full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.
