story:
Pure engineering excellence, secured with world-class triple-barrier security and built around a strong, lightweight core with a sleek stealth black finish.

 

 

Comes fully-equipped with a powerful electric drivetrain and superb safety features to make every ride safe and exceptional.

The most striking bike ever built is also the most secure bike ever built! It’s virtually theft proof, featuring a one-touch fingerprint sensor, and integrated, automatic lock and GPS tracking.

 

 

 

Shred the streets in style that rides as good as it looks.

 

 

Heavy on features, high on value

 

Reevo’s slick looks and smart security features flip the script on what to expect from an e-bike.

This premium ride cuts a unique silhouette,  night or day.

 

An ambient light sensor detects darkness and automatically turns on and off the ultra bright headlamps and tail light. So you can stay safe no matter when you ride.

 

Put those arms down! Reevo’s built-in turn signals prove that safety can be cool.

 

Reevo's hubless wheels are meticulously impact tested in our lab to be safe up to 265lbs. The wheels are triple-sealed from the elements for superb long term reliability.

 

 

One can never be too cautious! Reevo’s redundant fail-safe measures, like a removable main battery with internal security system backup battery keep your bike just that—yours.

 

...and that’s just in North America! Reevo is intelligently designed to withstand today’s most cunning thieves. It’s time to ride freely on the most high-tech, secure, bike ever conceived!


 

Accessories available for purchase upon checkout.

Reevo is now available in 3 new color options in addition to Stealth Black! Introducing Satin Blue, Saddle Brown, and Wine Red. Here's how to get yours:

Existing backers

You will be given the option to upgrade via a BackerKit survey (check your emails!). You can also enter in your shipping details and select your bike variant. 

New backers

You can select the new colors as an add-on during the checkout process.

 


Alec (CEO)

As a product designer and an avid cyclist, Alec always found passion in introducing innovative design elements in bikes. In 2016, Alec rejected a dream job offer at Shimano, and co-founded Beno Technologies with the goal of pioneering e-bike innovation and creating the perfect e-bike for the modern urban cyclist. Reevo is the result of that dream - an innovative hubless e-bike brought to life by a team of experienced engineers and manufacturing specialists. Alec has previously worked at a Fortune 500 company as a senior mechanical design engineer. His expertise and experience led to the creation of the first hubless wheel prototype based on an innovative novel design. 

When he’s not busy designing bikes, Alec can be found riding them and keeping up to date with the latest in the biking world. He also enjoys modifying Harley Davidsons and has a slightly unhealthy obsession with devising new destructive tests for bikes.

 

Ivan, Ph.D. (CTO)

Ivan’s love of technology started early from a young age. He was always fascinated by the latest gadgets and dreamt that one day, he could invent something just as cool. That passion led him to join Beno Technologies to work on novel e-bike technologies. Prior to this, Ivan has accumulated research and manufacturing experience in various world-renowned companies, notably in the semiconductor industry. He also holds a degree and doctorate in Electrical Engineering, and has authored several research papers in the field of IoT and smart lighting.

He loves building over-engineered gadgets to simplify mundane tasks and has a particular weakness for the latest gadgets in the tech world. Ivan is also an avid soccer fan, and tunes in to watch his beloved Liverpool F.C. at every opportunity.

 

Andrea (Lead Engineer)

Andrea is a leading expert in ASIC, PCBA and FPGA design, with over 20 years of experience in various engineering-related fields. He is also the founder of KERR Srl, an R&D company with a strong focus on ASIC, electronic and custom software development. His wealth of expertise also extends to product design and manufacturing prepardness. Andrea led work on the signature Triple Barrier AntiTheft system, overall system engineering design, and quality testing.

He can often be found exploring new hiking trails and taking his various bikes out for a ride on beautiful sunny days. Andrea’s love of the outdoors also extends to camping and living off-grid whenever possibl

Beno is short for Be Innovative, which has been our compass since Beno was established in 2016. We are a team of engineers with a passion to build amazing things that contribute towards a smarter, more connected future. We focus on solving modern mobility challenges through technological advancement. Building wonderful things that make people happy makes us happy; and that is our goal – which we’ve summed up in The Beno Promise.



Our corporate offices and manufacturing hub are based in Malaysia, with  Design, Research and Development based in the United States. 

 

 

 

 

Reevo will turn heads, without turning your wallet inside-out.

 

 

 

The Wheel Bag has to be purchased as an Add-On at checkout. 
 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide.  VAT and GST not included. Shipping charges may vary depending on the country it is shipped to. Covid-19 and ocean freight availability may affect shipping charges.

Bikes ordered now are expected to be shipped out in December 2021. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date. Please confirm your shipping address on the order survey we send to you after the campaign ends. 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

Press kit 


 

Beware of illegitimate websites selling Reevo

It has recently come to our attention that there are a few parties running illegitimate ads using our brand assets and passing it off as their own. We've received multiple emails from people who have lost money. Rest assured that we will be taking the appropriate course of action against these websites. We also ask for your help to report the ads on Facebook or Google when they appear on your feed.

Reevo is only available for order exclusively here on Indiegogo. Our official websites are www.reevobikes.com and www.beno.io. All other websites featuring Reevo are not affiliated with us in any way. 

 

Invest in Beno

We're pioneering the future of electric mobility. Interested to invest in Beno? Click on the banner below to check out our equity crowdfunding campaign on Wefunder.

story:
STRØM CITY W

More affordable and feature-packed than EVER

 

We are very proud to introduce the new STRØM CITY W. The most stylish step-through e-bike without compromise on design, durability, and convenience.

 

 

From the biking capital of the world, Denmark, it comes in the perfect combination of minimalistic design, great quality, and affordable prices.

The best performing LG battery hidden inside the frame – detachable for easy charging and with a built-in locking system to prevent theft. The most powerful, silent motor. A light aluminum frame in 3 timeless cool colours. And a fully integrated lighting system, operated by a built-in power switch. 

We’ve packed all of this into one outstanding and affordable e-bike.

 

 

COLOUR OPTIONS

 

STRØM CITY W is available in 3 cool colours to match your personal style. Choose between black, fire red, or shiny white.

 

 

 

ONE SIZE

 

STRØM CITY W comes in a one-size-fits-all model (155 cm / 5 feet up to 205 cm/ 6 feet 7 inches) to fit just about any height and with weight limits approved for up to 130 kilos / 286 pounds.  

 

 

MODEL OPTIONS

 

 

* The difference between the EU and US model is the motor size and automatic drive function.
Please note that the US model is not allowed in most European countries. Check your country before placing your order.
* The backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, and VAT. Taxes, duties, and VAT vary from country to country.

In the US, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0%. In Europe, the amount is 25% in VAT and 6% in duties. For other countries, please check the regulations in your country before purchasing.

Please note that taxes, duties, and VAT will be collected after the campaign and before shipping.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

FEATURES

 

We’ve listened to feedback from test riders and customers from all around the world in the making of the new feature-packed STRØM CITY W. Check out all the cool features below:


 

 

Hidden battery - detachable for easy charging
STRØM CITY W comes with a 10,4 Ah LG battery that is hidden inside the lower frame. The integrated locking system makes it easy to detach for charging. Charging time is approximately 3-4 hours.
With our standard 10Ah LG battery, you get a range of up to 60 km/38 miles. Or upgrade to our 14Ah “GO Further” LG battery and get up to 80 km/50 miles.

 

Integrated lighting system
STRØM CITY W comes with a fully integrated lighting system that starts at the push of a button. This lighting system makes your rides safer and more convenient with brake lights and multi blinking functions. Say goodbye to lost or stolen bike lights and hello to peace-of-mind commuting.

Tiny Powerful & silent motor
Take advantage of up to 350 Watt* of electric motor power, which can take you from 0 to 32 km/h* in a matter of seconds. The mini front motor is built to be durable, powerful, and silent. Choose between a 250W (EU model 25kmh/15mph) or 350W (US model 32 kmh/20mph) motor.

 

Displays
STRØM CITY comes with an LED display that allows you to adjust to 6 different assist levels (1-5) and shows the battery level. It also features a fully integrated USB charging system, so you can charge your mobile device on-the-go. Or you can upgrade to our intelligent computer display, which shows battery level, assist level, distance, trip meter, speed in km/h or mph, and more. And of course, the computer display also has a fully integrated mobile device charging system.

 

Automatic drive function
The automatic drive function (turbo throttle) allows you to ride fully electric without using the pedal assist. Please note that this function is only available on our US version, as current legislation does not permit the throttle function in most European countries.

Shimano Nexus - 3 Speed
STRØM CITY W Works like a regular bike and comes with a single-handed 3-speed Shimano inner-gear system that lets you use it just like a regular bike. This is what we call the “exercise level” (0 assist from the motor). Very useful if you want to exercise or if your battery runs out of juice.

Plug and play wires
We have an innovative screw wire system that will make you able to switch our component quickly. The system is IP68 waterproof. A smart system for remote repairs and new accessories.   

Puncture-proof tires
There is nothing more discouraging while out biking than hearing that distinctive hiss from a tire. Say goodbye to flat tires and hello to STRØM CITY W’s puncture-proof tires.

Hand-stiched grips
We only use the best high-quality hand-stitched grips. More importantly, we have installed grips that are very ergonomic for hands and wrist. The wide surfaces add to the pleasure of your daily commutes. 

Ergonomic saddle
A well-shaped saddle matching your grips. The ergonomic wide shape makes you sit most comfortably. We have also added a convenient handle in the back excellent for parking the bike. 

Rust-free components
The component has been carefully selected to ensure your e-bike will last for years. It is built to be as rust-free as possible – from top to bottom. We’ve even added a chain protector to keep mud and dirt out of your chain. Less cleaning, more biking!

 
 


ADD-ONS



 

PREMIUM PACKAGE (€495 Euro) 
 

The premium package takes your bike to the next level of riding. All our luxury comfort and convenience components all gathered in one package for extra spoiled riders ⚡️

 

1x Magic rear carrier
1x Supercharger (4 AH)
1x STRØM Colour display
1x Hydraulic performance brakes
1x Hydraulic suspension fork 
1x Mobile on the go
1x Secret gift from Nichlas 

 
 

 
 
Magical front basket design (€75 Euro) 
 
The design you already know and love. An exclusive STRØM innovation being the first basket design on the market being fully integrated with lights built into the design controlled from the handlebar. 

The front basket with a one-click removable system makes shopping and picnics a breeze. The design is not only designed for a basket but can also be replaced with 3 kinds of wooden plates making it the typical Copenhagen front carrier solution ⚡️ 

 

 
STRØM COLOUR DISPLAY (€139 Euro)
Top recommended by backers and STRØM Bikes 
 

STRØM Colour display is an amazing display full of specs, tech, and cool features.
Here are the main features:


Speedometer real-time speed - average speed - maximum speed, trip distance, and total kilometers ridden.
Build-in test center - which will show you if there is anything wrong with your STRØM Bike by testing all electronic components giving you an on-screen analysis of any given potential issue.

Exact battery read in percentages & voltages, Clock, logo colour animations and the possibility to set up your own personal password making
 

 

PICTURE COMING SOON

We are finishing up our new prototype - stay tuned ⚡️

 
Rear-Rack Magic-design (€65 Euro) 
 
The new magical rear rack design is one of our brand new inventions.
The design is naturally made by us and will match the magical front Carrier design we have received a lot of great feedback on. 

Experience a fully integrated rear rack design only attached by our smart system light holes. Stylish but also durable with strength up to 20 KG / 45 Pounds.
The light will naturally also be controlled from the handlebar and running on the main battery with 20.000 hours of light time.

 

 
 
 
HYDRAULIC PERFORMANCE BREAK (€119 Euro) 
 
Make breaking a lot smoother year around - feel the hydraulic fluid injecting into the disc brake caliper. Great for winter rides as the hydraulic oil fluid never freezes.

The performance brakes are made for smoother more powerful braking. Hydraulic performance brake is one of our top recommended add-ons.
 
 

 

 

HYDRAULIC SUSPENSION FORK (€129 Euro)

For the ultimate comfortable city ride - feel the suspension working under you making holes and uneven surfaces seem a lot smoother!
Our beautiful new Suspension fork is coming with a hydraulic system making it durable and easy to ride.

The suspension is recommended for everyone but especially for people with weak wrist, shoulders and back.

 

 

STRØM SUPERCHARGER (€80 Euro)

Get a superpower station for charging your battery. This charger will fully supercharge your battery in half the time of your standard charger.


Supercharger = 2 hours and 20 minutes - Standard charger = 4 hours and 40 minutes. 
 

14 AH Extra “Go Further” battery  (€325 Euro + VAT & duties)

Get an extra 14 AH (504 WH) battery for your bike for biking trips or just for an easy swab.
Our batteries are swappable in seconds and are super-easy to take off and on.


Super charger = 2 hours and 20 minutes - Standard charger = 4 hours and 40 minutes. 

 

10,4 AH Extra “Go Further” battery  (€245 Euro + VAT & duties)

Get an extra 14 AH (504 WH) battery for your bike for biking trips or just for an easy swab.
Our batteries are swappable in seconds and are super-easy to take off and on.


Super charger = 2 hours and 20 minutes - Standard charger = 4 hours and 40 minutes. 

 

 

“MOBILE ON THE GO”​ (€35 Euro)

Handy mobile holder having your mobile handy with GPS, answering calls and controlling your mobile without getting into an accident.

Our Mobile phone holder will come with an extra rubber protection wrap that will keep your phone safe on even the bumpy rides.

 

 

 

IN HOUSE DESIGN

 
We’ve spent countless hours designing and building what we believe is the most stylish, affordable, and feature-packed e-bike ever.
 
 
 
 
 

 

Direct to you

 

We have removed all intermediaries and rely on an online model where we only sell our electric bikes online. First through crowdfunding at a special campaign price for setting up production of new models and later directly from us to you through our webshop.

This means that you are guaranteed a high-quality electric bike at the lowest possible price without any expensive middlemen. We simply think it's a great business model for all parts involved.

 
 
 
 
     Questions?  +45 61 60 61 60    

 

 

STRØM Bikes is the brainchild of entrepreneur Nichlas Lloyd (age 29).
Nichlas is in charge of industrial design and production spending more than 3+ years in factories all over Asia designing unique components for our lights, frames and all the way down to our custom screw wires connecting our e-bike system.. 
 

STRØM Bikes started in November 2016 when we designed our first FATBIKE model, which later raised more than $450,000 here on Indiegogo out of a campaign goal of $40,000.

We then experienced a high demand for a city bike. The City bike was launched in 2018 rasing more than $2.050.000 million here on Indiegogo with the increased goal of $50.000.

 

 

WHAT A RIDE we have been through as a relatively young company with amazing experiences and the darkest of days! We have struggled, we have been challenged, we have fought to the extreme - but most importantly we have learned a lot from all of it!

 

 

'Thank you to the whole team and most importantly the people that have backed our mission in making inner-city commuting more sustainable and convenient' ⚡️

"Founder, Nichlas Lloyd"



To start up production we need €50,000. As an Indiegogo exclusive, we’re offering more than 50% discount to make sure we reach our goal. This is a UNIQUE limited offer only available on Indiegogo.

Running a crowdfunding campaign requires a 100% transparent approach to our backers. We’ll do everything we can to keep you fully informed about the campaign, production, and shipping. At the same time we promise to deliver the coolest e-bike EVER!

Don’t just take our word for it. Listen to what other backers have to say..

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

https://www.gearhungry.com/strom-city-e-bike/​

"22 century design"

 

https://techstartups.com/2018/05/12/meet-strom-city-affordable-feature-packed-e-bike-secret-weapon-traffic/

"Secret weapon against traffic"

 

https://newatlas.com/stroem-city-ebike/54072/

"Strøm slims down its e-bike for life in the City"

 

https://www.manners.nl/strom-city-de-elektrische-stadsfiets-maar-net-iets-anders/

STRØM city: dé elektrische stadsfiets, maar dan nèt iets anders

 

https://aartjan.nl/blog/strom-city-review/

"STRØM City: mooie voordelige ebike"

 

What is a turbo throttle?

A turbo thumb throttle is an automatic speeder featured on the US model that allows you to run fully electric when the throttle is pushed. The thumb throttle is not permitted on the EU model due to current European legal requirements.

What is the pedal-assist?

Pedal-assist is featured on both models and allows you to choose between 6 levels of assist from the electric motor (0-5). The electric pedal assist kicks in as soon as you start pedalling.  

What size do I need?

STRØM City W is available in a one size fit all design (155-200 cm/61-77 inches) The bike comes with adjustable handlebar and saddle 

Can I buy the US model if I don't live in the US?

Yes. We deliver both models worldwide. Please note, however, that the US model is not legal in most European countries. Please check your country’s legislation before purchasing.

What's the warranty?

2 years electronic warranty & 5 years frame warranty world-wide

How can you sell your e-bike at such a low price?

We’re selling our e-bike at a significant discount to ensure we can start up production. We can sell STRØM CITY at this affordable price, because you are buying directly from us (the manufacturer) and skipping all intermediaries

Can everybody get a 50 % discount?

No. This is a strictly limited offer available ONLY on Indiegogo for a short period of time. The price will rise to the expected retail price after the campaign.

Where is the battery located and how do I charge it?

The battery is located inside the frame to achieve a streamlined look. However, it is detachable, so you can remove it from the frame and charge it at home, the office or wherever you happen to be. You can also charge the battery while it is attached to the bike.

Please note that the actual distance varies from your battery size pick and different factors like temperature, weight, driving habits and more.

Can the bike handle my weight?

The bike is tested to handle riders up to 130 kg (286 pounds)

Do you offer test-rides?

We offer test rides in Copenhagen and occasionally other parts of Denmark. Contact us by email to ride@stroembikes.com to book an appointment. We will also be hosting demo days in bigger cities in Denmark, Netherlands, Sweden and Germany. We will be scheduling the events on our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/stroembikes/

We hope to be able to offer test rides and demonstrations in other countries in the future.

How is the bike delivered?

The e-bike is delivered almost fully assembled. An easy-to-follow assembly video guide is included. If you don't like to do it yourself we recommend you to bring it to your local bike dealer - they will put it together for aprox. 50 Euros including adjustments to brakes and gear.

What about spare parts and repairs?

All parts on the e-bike can be bought at our online store at an affordable price. In case something happens to your bike, we’ve produced a selection of helpful video tutorials on how to fix the most common issues.

Who is responsible for taxes and duties?

The backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, and VAT. Taxes, duties, and VAT vary from country to country.

In the US, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0% + sales tax. In Europe, the amount is 25% VAT and 6% duties. For other countries, please check the regulations in your country before purchasing.

Please note that taxes, duties, and VAT will be collected after the campaign ends and before we start shipping.

What is your refund policy?

We are subject to Indiegogo's refund policy. Click here to read more about refunds.

What is your return policy?

We offer a 14-day money back guarantee when you have received your bike if you are not satisfied. If you decide to return your bike it must be in new and resellable condition. The bike must be returned to our warehouse and the shipping cost must be covered by you.
 

Please note: A 15% refund charge will be applied as they will be lost to Indiegogo as a platform and administration fee.  

 

Read more in our Terms & Conditions:
 

https://stroembikes.com/terms-and-conditions/

Additional questions?

Chat with us
 Email us

 * Elaboration

1. The actual range varies depending on your battery size and various other factors like temperature, driving habits etc.
2. Our EU model features a 250W motor (25 kmh). Our US model features a 350W motor (32 kmh). The 350W motor is not street legal in most European countries.
3. Only our US model features the throttle function (automatic drive/scooter function), as this function is not legal in most European countries.

ORDER US MODE
story_txt:
STRØM CITY WMore affordable and feature-packed than EVER
 We are very proud to introduce the new STRØM CITY W. The most stylish step-through e-bike without compromise on design, durability, and convenience.  From the biking capital of the world, Denmark, it comes in the perfect combination of minimalistic design, great quality, and affordable prices.The best performing LG battery hidden inside the frame – detachable for easy charging and with a built-in locking system to prevent theft. The most powerful, silent motor. A light aluminum frame in 3 timeless cool colours. And a fully integrated lighting system, operated by a built-in power switch. We’ve packed all of this into one outstanding and affordable e-bike.  COLOUR OPTIONS STRØM CITY W is available in 3 cool colours to match your personal style. Choose between black, fire red, or shiny white.   ONE SIZE STRØM CITY W comes in a one-size-fits-all model (155 cm / 5 feet up to 205 cm/ 6 feet 7 inches) to fit just about any height and with weight limits approved for up to 130 kilos / 286 pounds.    MODEL OPTIONS  * The difference between the EU and US model is the motor size and automatic drive function.Please note that the US model is not allowed in most European countries. Check your country before placing your order.* The backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, and VAT. Taxes, duties, and VAT vary from country to country.In the US, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0%. In Europe, the amount is 25% in VAT and 6% in duties. For other countries, please check the regulations in your country before purchasing.Please note that taxes, duties, and VAT will be collected after the campaign and before shipping.       FEATURES We’ve listened to feedback from test riders and customers from all around the world in the making of the new feature-packed STRØM CITY W. Check out all the cool features below:  

Hidden battery - detachable for easy chargingSTRØM CITY W comes with a 10,4 Ah LG battery that is hidden inside the lower frame. The integrated locking system makes it easy to detach for charging. Charging time is approximately 3-4 hours.With our standard 10Ah LG battery, you get a range of up to 60 km/38 miles. Or upgrade to our 14Ah “GO Further” LG battery and get up to 80 km/50 miles.
 



Integrated lighting systemSTRØM CITY W comes with a fully integrated lighting system that starts at the push of a button. This lighting system makes your rides safer and more convenient with brake lights and multi blinking functions. Say goodbye to lost or stolen bike lights and hello to peace-of-mind commuting.


Tiny Powerful & silent motorTake advantage of up to 350 Watt* of electric motor power, which can take you from 0 to 32 km/h* in a matter of seconds. The mini front motor is built to be durable, powerful, and silent. Choose between a 250W (EU model 25kmh/15mph) or 350W (US model 32 kmh/20mph) motor.

 

DisplaysSTRØM CITY comes with an LED display that allows you to adjust to 6 different assist levels (1-5) and shows the battery level. It also features a fully integrated USB charging system, so you can charge your mobile device on-the-go. Or you can upgrade to our intelligent computer display, which shows battery level, assist level, distance, trip meter, speed in km/h or mph, and more. And of course, the computer display also has a fully integrated mobile device charging system.
 



Automatic drive functionThe automatic drive function (turbo throttle) allows you to ride fully electric without using the pedal assist. Please note that this function is only available on our US version, as current legislation does not permit the throttle function in most European countries.


Shimano Nexus - 3 SpeedSTRØM CITY W Works like a regular bike and comes with a single-handed 3-speed Shimano inner-gear system that lets you use it just like a regular bike. This is what we call the “exercise level” (0 assist from the motor). Very useful if you want to exercise or if your battery runs out of juice.


Plug and play wiresWe have an innovative screw wire system that will make you able to switch our component quickly. The system is IP68 waterproof. A smart system for remote repairs and new accessories.   


Puncture-proof tiresThere is nothing more discouraging while out biking than hearing that distinctive hiss from a tire. Say goodbye to flat tires and hello to STRØM CITY W’s puncture-proof tires.


Hand-stiched gripsWe only use the best high-quality hand-stitched grips. More importantly, we have installed grips that are very ergonomic for hands and wrist. The wide surfaces add to the pleasure of your daily commutes. 


Ergonomic saddleA well-shaped saddle matching your grips. The ergonomic wide shape makes you sit most comfortably. We have also added a convenient handle in the back excellent for parking the bike. 


Rust-free componentsThe component has been carefully selected to ensure your e-bike will last for years. It is built to be as rust-free as possible – from top to bottom. We’ve even added a chain protector to keep mud and dirt out of your chain. Less cleaning, more biking! 

 
 



ADD-ONS

 

PREMIUM PACKAGE (€495 Euro) 
 

The premium package takes your bike to the next level of riding. All our luxury comfort and convenience components all gathered in one package for extra spoiled riders ⚡️
 
1x Magic rear carrier1x Supercharger (4 AH)1x STRØM Colour display1x Hydraulic performance brakes1x Hydraulic suspension fork 1x Mobile on the go1x Secret gift from Nichlas 

 

 

 
 

Magical front basket design (€75 Euro) 
 
The design you already know and love. An exclusive STRØM innovation being the first basket design on the market being fully integrated with lights built into the design controlled from the handlebar. The front basket with a one-click removable system makes shopping and picnics a breeze. The design is not only designed for a basket but can also be replaced with 3 kinds of wooden plates making it the typical Copenhagen front carrier solution ⚡️ 
 



 

STRØM COLOUR DISPLAY (€139 Euro)
Top recommended by backers and STRØM Bikes 
 

STRØM Colour display is an amazing display full of specs, tech, and cool features.Here are the main features:
Speedometer real-time speed - average speed - maximum speed, trip distance, and total kilometers ridden.Build-in test center - which will show you if there is anything wrong with your STRØM Bike by testing all electronic components giving you an on-screen analysis of any given potential issue.Exact battery read in percentages & voltages, Clock, logo colour animations and the possibility to set up your own personal password making
 


 
PICTURE COMING SOON
We are finishing up our new prototype - stay tuned ⚡️
 

Rear-Rack Magic-design (€65 Euro) 
 
The new magical rear rack design is one of our brand new inventions.The design is naturally made by us and will match the magical front Carrier design we have received a lot of great feedback on. Experience a fully integrated rear rack design only attached by our smart system light holes. Stylish but also durable with strength up to 20 KG / 45 Pounds.The light will naturally also be controlled from the handlebar and running on the main battery with 20.000 hours of light time.
 

 

 
 

HYDRAULIC PERFORMANCE BREAK (€119 Euro) 
 
Make breaking a lot smoother year around - feel the hydraulic fluid injecting into the disc brake caliper. Great for winter rides as the hydraulic oil fluid never freezes.The performance brakes are made for smoother more powerful braking. Hydraulic performance brake is one of our top recommended add-ons.
 

 



 



 
HYDRAULIC SUSPENSION FORK (€129 Euro)
For the ultimate comfortable city ride - feel the suspension working under you making holes and uneven surfaces seem a lot smoother!Our beautiful new Suspension fork is coming with a hydraulic system making it durable and easy to ride.The suspension is recommended for everyone but especially for people with weak wrist, shoulders and back.

 




 
STRØM SUPERCHARGER (€80 Euro)
Get a superpower station for charging your battery. This charger will fully supercharge your battery in half the time of your standard charger.
Supercharger = 2 hours and 20 minutes - Standard charger = 4 hours and 40 minutes. 
 


14 AH Extra “Go Further” battery  (€325 Euro + VAT & duties)

story:
Rolley+ uses motion detection, predictive routing algorithms, and A.I. to learn how you ride. When you enable Smart Mode Acceleration, the A.I. takes over and adjusts acceleration levels and tune with your motion and your route, and conserves battery power for the smoothest, most carefree ride ever.

As the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked for you. Share with your friends to keep the new upgrade releases coming!
 

$300K: Drive System Upgrade


This means that Rolley+ will get a drive system upgrade on motor and battery capacity. The max speed will be upgraded from 20mph to 25mph and the range will be increased from 30 miles to 35 miles!

Our flagship model Rolley+ was designed from scratch, using the latest technologies and space-age materials, and features a range of intelligent features for a seamless riding experience. 

A piece of Art. At Scooterson we believe that all things around us should be beautiful. This is why we worked relentlessly and achieved this spectacular Award-Winning Design.

 

Scooterson App. The Perfect Dashboard, and more. The best display is already on your smartphone. Install the App, and transform your phone into the best scooter dashboard, with the coolest features.

Rolley is fully controlled through the Scooterson Mobile App. Your smartphone connects with Rolley+ via Bluetooth or LTE and your phone number acts as your unique user ID. Once you unlock your scooter, you can snap your phone right into the built-in holder for easy access to the dashboard as you ride. Rolley can also be unlocked using the optional Scooterson NFC Card.

Packed with features to give you peace of mind and increased safety: In-App tampering notification, charging notifications, Find-my-Scooter, Dark-Mode, and more features will be added with updates.

Can’t ride a bicycle? No problem. Rolley+ is the easiest scooter to ride because it self-balances due to its fat tires and extremely low center of gravity. Learn instantly. The passive Auto-Balance design makes Rolley very easy to ride even for those who are having difficulties riding a bicycle or a kick-scooter. 

When you hop off Rolley+, it automatically activates Sentry Mode to prevent theft. And if someone tampers with it, you get alerts sent right to your phone. The anti-tampering alarm will send a notification to your phone each time someone tries any shenanigans with your Rolley+.

Only your phone unlocks Rolley+, but the Sharing Feature allows you to unlock it for friends with the Rolley+ App and let them ride your scooter. You can also disable access at any time. Show them you care by giving them the opportunity to experience the joy of riding and feel loved.

When you let someone ride it, you will know your Rolley+ location anytime using the ‘Find My Scooter’ feature from the Scooterson App. This feature use GPS Tracking to  shows where is your Rolley+ on the map. 

Rolley is the only scooter that can make money for you. Using the Sharing features you can choose to monetize it when you lend your scooter to your coworkers or neighbors or anyone else you feel comfortable with. You can set your own rates by the minute, hour, or day. Let your scooter make you money or Bitcoins when you are not using it, when you sleep, work, or you are on a holiday. Yes, we just invented the 'Decentralized Scooter Sharing', taking the power from Lime and Bird, giving it to you!

The App notices when you’re at home or the office and it sends you charging reminders at a convenient time.


*Huge discounts on IndieGoGo from Rolley+ MSRP of $3490

The most exquisite materials ever on a scooter. Carbon-reinforced polymer body and precision-machined aerospace-grade alloy parts, on a 3D bent aluminum alloy chassis.

Most scooters are made of steel, which is heavy and rusts quickly. We replaced steel with aerospace-grade aluminum alloys to reduce Rolley+’s total weight by 40lbs and eradicate rust issues.
 

Welding areas are the weakest points on the frame and can develop cracks and structural failure over time. For Rolley, we used space-age adhesive bonding with powerful force resistance that maintains its integrity even after years of use.
 


Instead of using thermoplastics that are easy to damage, we used a sandwich of composite materials and  carbon-fiber-reinforced polymers to create a strong yet light body.
 


Golf buggy tires are commonly used on fat-tire scooters but they present maneuverability problems when cornering. Rolley+’s customer tires are designed to have superior handling and are half the weight of golf buggy tires, optimized for energy efficiency.

 

Rolley+ and Rolley side-by-side comparison

 

Unlike cars that emit 4.6 metric tons of carbon dioxide annually, on average, Rolley+ gives you an affordable and fun way to get around with zero carbon emissions and zero trips to the gas station.

The ScootPack is a high-end backpack with a solid front shell made from Forged Carbon-Fiber composite material. Waterproof and extremely lightweight, ScootPack can fit your 16' inch laptop!

While all the Scooterson color options are made from carbon-fiber reinforced composites, the Carbon Fiber Finish Upgrade will showcase a visible carbon fiber on the exterior.

A need to have design detail for ideal color coordination on your new ride!

The extra 750Wh battery means convenient swapping for immediate riding when your main runs out of charge.

Hook and unhook your smartphone in less than a second with the best quick-release holder in the market.

Instantly unlock your scooter when your phone is dead without connecting your phone to the USB charging port. 

A definitive must-have for golfers. 

An optional upgrade for maximum precision and control when braking. 

A simple statement piece for those who love the classic look of vintage leather. 

Show your allegiance to Scooterson and Ride with the Tribe! 

Run errands and store belongings in style with our custom designed-for-Rolley shopping basket.

Can't find your preferred color in our existing options? Want to match your Rolley color with your Ferrari custom paint job? Then our custom color wrapping is for you!

Shipping and Fulfillment will be handled by Easyship Survey.  Due to the current volatility of the market producing extremely high shipping costs, collection of payment for shipping will be done well after the end of the campaign, close to our ship date. This will allow us to present the most accurate and up-to-date prices, to pass savings on to you, our valued backers. In that survey- backers will be able to:

Pay for shipping costs on the spot- you will have 3 tiered options to choose from. 

Pay for taxes and duties (if due) on the spot as well.

Have the ability to add insurance to the package. 

The Rolley+ development phase has been completed and the manufacturing phases started by building a limited batch of 20 Rolley scooters for the last tests. Some of the molds, fixtures, and jigs required for mass production are already manufactured and the rest will be completed by the end of 2021. The first batch, code-named 'Indiegogo Batch' is entering mass production in January 2022 and planned to be shipped in May 2022, just in time for the springtime and summer.

Using the Scooterson Business App you can rent our scooters to neighbors and to the tourists coming to your neighborhood. The Scooterson team will provide you all training and support needed. Quit your boring job and join now! Get the Scooterson Business Perk to put a downpayment and start your new business! For more information about the Scooterson Business Perk, please see the FAQs.

Rolley+ was created by serial entrepreneurs Mihnea de Vries and Deepansh Jain. They combined their respective passions of building amazing mobility devices and creating AI algorithms to create the smartest, most intuitive scooter ever.

The Scooterson Story

Mihnea de Vries started his entrepreneurial journey in 1996, at age 27, when he created the first Internet Service Provider in his hometown. Then, he worked as a film director for 15 years. Next, he created KopterX, a company that created custom-built cinematography drones.

In 2015, Mihnea developed a prototype electric scooter. After seeing "wow" reactions on the street, he soon realized that electric scooters were the next big thing in urban mobility, and went on to start the Scooterson project.

Deepansh Jain is a serial entrepreneur from India. In 2011, he founded his first startup, Juvenis, which was acquired within two years for half a million dollars. He then co-founded Shifu App, an AI-powered, context-aware personal assistant application, whose investors included Google executives. Shifu App was acquired by the leading Indian mobile wallet and e-commerce company, Paytm/Alibaba, in January 2016.

Mihnea and Deepansh met at an event in Budapest where Deepansh was speaking about how he incorporated AI algorithms into Shifu App. 

Mihnea approached him after the event to discuss how AI algorithms could be implemented into smart electric scooters. A few days later, Deepansh joined Scooterson to implement A.I. optimizations and further the mission to create the best user experience on two wheels!

DeepTech Innovation - Self-Driving and Tele-Operations

In 2019 Scooterson Team presented the world's first functional prototype scooter with teleoperation and self-driving capabilities built by the same company.

Some of the extraordinary people who helped build Scooterson:
story_txt: Rolley+ uses motion detection, predictive routing algorithms, and A.I. to learn how you ride. When you enable Smart Mode Acceleration, the A.I. takes over and adjusts acceleration levels and tune with your motion and your route, and conserves battery power for the smoothest, most carefree ride ever.As the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked for you. Share with your friends to keep the new upgrade releases coming! $300K: Drive System UpgradeThis means that Rolley+ will get a drive system upgrade on motor and battery capacity. The max speed will be upgraded from 20mph to 25mph and the range will be increased from 30 miles to 35 miles!Our flagship model Rolley+ was designed from scratch, using the latest technologies and space-age materials, and features a range of intelligent features for a seamless riding experience. A piece of Art. At Scooterson we believe that all things around us should be beautiful. This is why we worked relentlessly and achieved this spectacular Award-Winning Design. Scooterson App. The Perfect Dashboard, and more. The best display is already on your smartphone. Install the App, and transform your phone into the best scooter dashboard, with the coolest features.Rolley is fully controlled through the Scooterson Mobile App. Your smartphone connects with Rolley+ via Bluetooth or LTE and your phone number acts as your unique user ID. Once you unlock your scooter, you can snap your phone right into the built-in holder for easy access to the dashboard as you ride. Rolley can also be unlocked using the optional Scooterson NFC Card.Packed with features to give you peace of mind and increased safety: In-App tampering notification, charging notifications, Find-my-Scooter, Dark-Mode, and more features will be added with updates.Can’t ride a bicycle? No problem. Rolley+ is the easiest scooter to ride because it self-balances due to its fat tires and extremely low center of gravity. Learn instantly. The passive Auto-Balance design makes Rolley very easy to ride even for those who are having difficulties riding a bicycle or a kick-scooter. When you hop off Rolley+, it automatically activates Sentry Mode to prevent theft. And if someone tampers with it, you get alerts sent right to your phone. The anti-tampering alarm will send a notification to your phone each time someone tries any shenanigans with your Rolley+.Only your phone unlocks Rolley+, but the Sharing Feature allows you to unlock it for friends with the Rolley+ App and let them ride your scooter. You can also disable access at any time. Show them you care by giving them the opportunity to experience the joy of riding and feel loved.When you let someone ride it, you will know your Rolley+ location anytime using the ‘Find My Scooter’ feature from the Scooterson App. This feature use GPS Tracking to  shows where is your Rolley+ on the map. Rolley is the only scooter that can make money for you. Using the Sharing features you can choose to  monetize it when you lend your scooter to your coworkers or neighbors or anyone else you feel comfortable with. You can set your own rates by the minute, hour, or day. Let your scooter make you money or Bitcoins when you are not using it, when you sleep, work, or you are on a holiday. Yes, we just invented the 'Decentralized Scooter Sharing', taking the power from Lime and Bird, giving it to you!The App notices when you’re at home or the office and it sends you charging reminders at a convenient time.*Huge discounts on IndieGoGo from Rolley+ MSRP of $3490The most exquisite materials ever on a scooter. Carbon-reinforced polymer body and precision-machined aerospace-grade alloy parts, on a 3D bent aluminum alloy chassis.Most scooters are made of steel, which is heavy and rusts quickly. We replaced steel with aerospace-grade aluminum alloys to reduce Rolley+’s total weight by 40lbs and eradicate rust issues. Welding areas are the weakest points on the frame and can develop cracks and structural failure over time. For Rolley, we used space-age adhesive bonding with powerful force resistance that maintains its integrity even after years of use. Instead of using thermoplastics that are easy to damage, we used a sandwich of composite materials and  carbon-fiber-reinforced polymers to create a strong yet light body. Golf buggy tires are commonly used on fat-tire scooters but they present maneuverability problems when cornering. Rolley+’s customer tires are designed to have superior handling and are half the weight of golf buggy tires, optimized for energy efficiency. Rolley+ and Rolley side-by-side comparison Unlike cars that emit 4.6 metric tons of carbon dioxide annually, on average, Rolley+ gives you an affordable and fun way to get around with zero carbon emissions and zero trips to the gas station.The ScootPack is a high-end backpack with a solid front shell made from Forged Carbon-Fiber composite material. Waterproof and extremely lightweight, ScootPack can fit your 16' inch laptop!While all the Scooterson color options are made from carbon-fiber reinforced composites, the Carbon Fiber Finish Upgrade will showcase a visible carbon fiber on the exterior.A need to have design detail for ideal color coordination on your new ride!The extra 750Wh battery means convenient swapping for immediate riding when your main runs out of charge.Hook and unhook your smartphone in less than a second with the best quick-release holder in the market.Instantly unlock your scooter when your phone is dead without connecting your phone to the USB charging port. A definitive must-have for golfers. An optional upgrade for maximum precision and control when braking. A simple statement piece for those who love the classic look of vintage leather. Show your allegiance to Scooterson and Ride with the Tribe! Run errands and store belongings in style with our custom designed-for-Rolley shopping basket.Can't find your preferred color in our existing options? Want to match your Rolley color with your Ferrari custom paint job? Then our custom color wrapping is for you!Shipping and Fulfillment will be handled by Easyship Survey.  Due to the current volatility of the market producing extremely high shipping costs, collection of payment for shipping will be done well after the end of the campaign, close to our ship date. This will allow us to present the most accurate and up-to-date prices, to pass savings on to you, our valued backers. In that survey- backers will be able to:Pay for shipping costs on the spot- you will have 3 tiered options to choose from. Pay for taxes and duties (if due) on the spot as well.Have the ability to add insurance to the package. The Rolley+ development phase has been completed and the manufacturing phases started by building a limited batch of 20 Rolley scooters for the last tests. Some of the molds, fixtures, and jigs required for mass production are already manufactured and the rest will be completed by the end of 2021. The first batch, code-named 'Indiegogo Batch' is entering mass production in January 2022 and planned to be shipped in May 2022, just in time for the springtime and summer.Using the Scooterson Business App you can rent our scooters to neighbors and to the tourists coming to your neighborhood. The Scooterson team will provide you all training and support needed. Quit your boring job and join now! Get the Scooterson Business Perk to put a downpayment and start your new business! For more information about the Scooterson Business Perk, please see the FAQs.Rolley+ was created by serial entrepreneurs Mihnea de Vries and Deepansh Jain. They combined their respective passions of building amazing mobility devices and creating AI algorithms to create the smartest, most intuitive scooter ever.The Scooterson StoryMihnea de Vries started his entrepreneurial journey in 1996, at age 27, when he created the first Internet Service Provider in his hometown. Then, he worked as a film director for 15 years. Next, he created KopterX, a company that created custom-built cinematography drones.In 2015, Mihnea developed a prototype electric scooter. After seeing "wow" reactions on the street, he soon realized that electric scooters were the next big thing in urban mobility, and went on to start the Scooterson project.Deepansh Jain is a serial entrepreneur from India. In 2011, he founded his first startup, Juvenis, which was acquired within two years for half a million dollars. Shifu App was acquired by the leading Indian mobile wallet and e-commerce company, Paytm/Alibaba, in January 2016.Mihnea and Deepansh met at an event in Budapest where Deepansh was speaking about how he incorporated AI algorithms into Shifu App. Mihnea approached him after the event to discuss how AI algorithms could be implemented into smart electric scooters. story:
Don't even think about buying an e-bike until you see this!

 

Built with you in mind, the pXcycle E-XC+ is the world’s most versatile e-bike. Designed to hold up to the varying weather and terrain in Portland Oregon, it can easily take a beating in the mountains and crush your commute to work on Monday.

Questions?

You can call Gunther of pXcycle directly at 971-212-7706.

 

We guarantee delivery!

 

One Bike Can Do it All!

At Your Beach

 

 

On Your Trail. 

 

On Your Date.

 

 

On Your Commute.

 

What's so Different Anyway?

I’ve been building e-bikes out of Portland Oregon for over 7 years!  Time and time again I kept hearing my customers ask, “Can you make me a mountain I can use on the trails but also as a daily driver?”  It was then that I built the EX-C+

You see, the electric bike so often seen today comes in many forms; either a sleek road-going commuter or a rugged off-road mountain bike.  One does not really do what the other will quite nearly as well as a rider would like.

Why not combine the best of both worlds so that just like we have all come to expect of our modern sport utility, we get rugged off-road capability combined with smooth high-speed power, and handling.  This vehicle was a truly evolutionary step in the daily driver that many drivers have come to love.  

It’s your ticket to a total biking adventure!

 

How Far Can I Go?

 

Your new pXcycle will take you over 60 miles on a single charge and the industry-leading pXcycle motor & drivetrain gives you a combination of incredible speed and climbing ability!  With the battery upgrade, you can bump that up to 100 miles.

 

 

What's it come with?

 

 

Mid Drive Motor
• Seamless engagement is immediate upon pushing a pedal
• Quick power from stop to and quick climb right from the start
• Torque Sensor optimizes power based on the effort you exert
• Throttle add-on overrides & provides a power boost when needed
• Class-leading reliability from our exclusive Mid Motor System
• A motor built and designed for the E-XC’s unique demands of efficiency and high torque 
 

 
 

Cargo System
• Hard welded rear rack system strong with a 150 lb. load-carrying capacity
• Hard-mounted front rack solid with a 30 lb. carrying capacity
• The cargo system makes the E-XC+ a SUV of e-bikes!



Minimal cockpit

 
 
 
 

 

 

  • Minimal design for a clean look
  • Trigger shifting for quick, seamless gear changes
  • Ergonomic handlebar grips for long-distance comfortability
  • Brake levers within a fingertip’s reach
  • Computer display in the center of the handlebar

 


LCD Computer Display

  • Easy-to-read backlit LCD display
  • 5 speeds: ranges from 0 (no assist) to 5 (full assist)
  • On-the-go power-assist level adjustment
  • Displays all data such as speed, distance, battery life
  • Configurable for personalized settings
  • Dustproof and water-resistant
  • Built-in USB charger
 
 

 

 


Color Display (optional upgrade)

  • Full-color LCD Display for effortless viewing
  • Includes all functions of the original display
  • Advanced Setting options
  • Up to 9 different speed settings
 

 


All Terrain Tires Street Comfort Trail Tough

  • 2.1” (27.5” wheels) for ultimate comfort on the large frame bike
  • 2.1" (26" wheels) on the small/medium frame bike
  • 25-40% more efficient, faster, and smoother than a fat tire
  • Super quick handling

 

 

Suspension Front Fork

  • Extra comfort for a longer ride
  • Built to handle all-terrain adventures and high speed

 


Pedals

  • Alloy platform mountain bike pedal with reflectors
  • Easy to operate
  • Solid to ensure leg power transformed into ground speed

 


Control Panel

  • Easy to locate the power switch
  • Provides access to lighting and walk mode
  • Easily toggle through trip odometer, avg. speed, time ridden, and total miles

 


Easy Adjustment

  • Effortless handlebar rotation for a chosen ergonomic position
  • Seat height can be quickly adjusted on the go
  • Forks can be adjusted for preload and rider weight

 

Battery

  • Highly powerful 48v and 36v lithium NMC battery
  • Durable ascending and acceleration capabilities
  • Built-in handle and level indicator - easily removes from frame
  • The standard Battery for the E-XC is the 36v 13ah
  • The standard Battery for the E-XC+ is 48v 14ah


Hydraulic Disc Brakes

  • Smooth, reliable braking
  • Easier to operate and easier to maintain
  • Less lever effort 


     
 

 

 

 

May the E-XC+ Rise With You

The pXCycle E-XC+ has been designed from the ground up in Portland, Oregon to enhance every adventure, conquer every commute, and accommodate all ages! It will take you over 60 miles on a single charge and the industry-leading pXcycle motor & drivetrain gives you a combination of incredible speed and climbing ability!

 

 

 

Higher Value for the Investment

 

Hop on. And hit the road or the trail!
 

 

 

Choose Your Bike

 

 

E-XC 250 - our entry level, yet fully customizable design.  The perfect option to get you started in the bike world.  



E-XC+ 250 - Ready to level up?  This option has the same motor as the E-XC but a bigger battery giving you more range and boasts a front and rear cargo system.  

 


E-XC+ 400 - For those of you looking to get a little more serious, the 400 steps up the motor game with a motor that is over 2x more powerful than either of the 250's!  This bike climbs hills easily has a bigger battery and also features the front and rear cargo system.  
 


E-XC+ 600 - Looking for the absolute best?  Look no further.  The 600 features our biggest baddest motor that shreds hills.  Want to take the back way after work?  No problem.  This bike is our most powerful and also has the largest battery.  There isn't much this bike can't do!  

 


How To Order



 

Shipping

To give you the lowest price possible available for your address, we are collecting quotes from multiple logistics partners.  Our estimates based on the numbers we’ve received are as follows…

$149 Domestic US (Lower 48 States)

$249 EU (Western Europe), Alaska & Hawaii

$349 AU, New Zealand & the rest of the world

These costs do not include VAT, tax, or GST fees

NOTE:  Application of extra shipping costs:  If you are in a “difficult to ship area”, such as remote locations, extra shipping costs may be applied. Please also note that some destinations, such as remote islands, can prove simply impossible to ship to. If you think you live in a hard-to-reach location, then please contact us before placing your order.

Keep in mind these are estimates and are subject to change, but we will keep you informed every step of the way!

We're committed

PXcycle is fulling committed to delivering your bike.  This is a pre-order of a bike directly from pXcycle in Portland, OR

 

Choose your size

 

E-XC+ Add-on Accessories

You can add-on these accessories after you've chosen your  EX-C model. Click on the pictures to go to the checkout page. 

    

 

We have a goal. Let's get to the top together.

We need your help to develop the best and greatest electric mountain bike in the industry that hauls more climbs more, and travels further with a price that no one can match. By funding our campaign one will receive one of the greatest sport utility bikes on the market. Thank you for your support!

 


Timeline
 

Behind the scenes into the making of the E-XC+

 

This isn't our first rodeo

We’ve been building bikes for 7 years out of Portland Oregon.  Below are a few of our early models.

 

Hi!  I’m Gunther!

Since 2014, the founder of pXcycle, Gunther Nuissl has designed and delivered over 500 conversions and 150 pXcycle bikes. pXcycle is the marketer of the only torque-sensing mid-drive system for bike conversion. In 2017, pXcycle introduced the E-XC to the e-bike scene and building on that experience and success, he's invested his time, passion and expertise to create and unveil the E-XC+.

"It's a complete joy for me to create an e-bike that can reliably travel long distances over extreme terrain. Adventuring on two wheels, further, faster and funner and sharing these stories with my customers is what pXcycle for me is all about." - Gunther Nuissl

 

As Seen On

 

elektrek called the pXcycle E-XC+ "a no-brainer with a powerful, torquey motor that can give the European heavyweights a run for their money."

story:
SPLACH TRANSFORMER

A Transformable Motorbike-like Monster

If you are tired of regular escooters merely created for the daily commute, SPLACH-TRANSFORMER, aimed at stylish rides and weekend daredevils, will not let you down.

SPLACH-TRANSFORMER is recreation-oriented for all and can act as an unconventional commuting vehicle. Playful, sporty, versatile, and practical.  High torque with various options of customization regarding the stem, casings, and riding modes.  You’ll definitely turn many heads when riding on this transformable motorbike-like monster!

 

 

 

 

 

The patented proprietary beefy motor delivers great torque up to 960W to take your ride over various terrains, bustling urban jungles, unpaved rail trails, rocky roads, or even 28% incline hills can be zipped up from the crazy boost.  Plus the 10 x 2.5" pneumatic fat tires provide enhanced traction and stability as well as the superior dual suspension system, they stick you to the route and smooth out the bumps for you.  The dual wave disc brakes prevent them from overheating, ensuring the ride safe non-stop.

 

 

The powerful motor with mighty torque up to 960W  gives you the strong boost you need.

 

 

28% hill-climbing capability propels you to power through slopes and hills effortlessly.

 

 

Shred on all terrains for all kinds of exhilarating adventures. 10" pneumatic tires are interchangeable, meaning you could choose between road bike tires or off-roading tires, depending on your destination and purpose for the cruise.

 

 

Plush front & rear suspension setup provides you with comfort through rough conditions.

 

 

The front and rear wave disc brakes provide the maximum braking power without compromising safety & stability as well as prevent brake fade.

 

 

 

Electrek:  The fun-looking Transformer is a small electric dirt ‘bike’ that fits in a trunk (and in your budget)

Autoevolution:  Transformer E-Scooter Is Also a Powerful Motorbike, Built for Rugged Terrains

New Atlas:  Mini-moto and e-scooter hybrid kicks up some dirt

Intelligent Living:  SPLACH to Launch New E-Scooter/Mini-Moto Hybrid Next Week!

Geeky Gadgets:  Splach off-road electric scooter for adults 40km range, 38km top speed

Omicrono:  Esta unión de minimoto y patinete eléctrico es perfecta para derrapar por el monte

Urbantecno:  Splach Transformer, una motocicleta eléctrica a escala con un montón de cualidades

Newsby:  Splach Transformer: un po’ moto da cross un po’ monopattino

Techcult:  Мощный электроскутер Splach Transformer потягается с любым бездорожьем

LOG:  Mini motosiklet ile elektrikli scooter bir araya geldi: Transformer [izle]

and more...

 

 

 

 

 

The foot peg extension is an optional add-on.  The foot peg can be extended to enlarge the area for the foot stand, withstanding the rigors of the most demanding of road riding and increase stability and comfort along the way.

 

 

 

If you’re craving more excitement and fun, SPLACH Transformer is the best fit for you! The constant acceleration can be reached at 24mph（38 km/h）within 4-6 seconds, allowing you to blaze through whatever underneath speedily. 

The clever design of the low center of gravity is built for easier control for riders of any height, optimizing the weight distribution, ensuing stability and brilliant maneuvering on the road.  Complete with the unique truss design with durable and solid steel construction, ripping through gravel, gripping over snow, and even taking on jumps will be without a hiccup.

 

 

Max. speed at 24mph/ (38 km/h) gets your adrenaline pumping.

 

 

The low center of gravity ensures stable handling and riding all the way through.

 

 

The truss design with durable steel construction delivers a countable firm ride.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Never will you find the limit of fun from this talented SPLACH Transformer as it has so many customizable parts you have never thought of.  Feel free to choose the riding position you like: standing, sitting, scrunching or jumping.  Road biking or off-road biking can be achieved in one scooter due to the interchangeable tires.  Loaded with 4 riding modes, Eco, Middle, High, and Sport, riders for different purposes get to choose the most fitting mode for their speed.  This monster can be a beauty if you know how to make it. 5 pieces of casing can be changed to freely mix and match the kits and colors you like. The unique stem design lets you have it long or short to dial in the riding position you prefer.  Long stem for you to stand and enjoy the view and short stem for you to sit back and relax. 

 

 


One scooter for 4 different types of riding: Standing, sitting, scrunching, and jumping.

 

 


It suits your mood and suits your different purposes on the road.  Tires interchangeable for road biking or off-road biking fully satisfy your ambition to conquer heady challenges. 

 

 


The battery can be changed swiftly and easily within 7 seconds.
The 48V and 10.2Ah battery is suitable for most riders’ daily commute and can travel up to 22-25 miles on one charge. With the swiftly-swappable feature, it takes you less than 7 seconds to change a new battery.

 

 


The battery can be charged while it's stored in the scooter and can also be charged alone while it's taken off from the scooter.

 

 

The switch of the long stem and short stem enables you to get a different riding position whenever you desire a change.

Not only convenient to switch for different stems, but also easy storage and quick steps to carry Transformer anywhere with you!

 

 

 

 

 

 

5 pieces of the casing can be changed to freely mix and match the kits and colors you like.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


The color temperature and brightness of lights comply with German STVZO safety standards, protecting the rider properly without blinding oncoming bikers.

 

 


Safe wiring with the IPX4 water resistance rating, resistant to water splashes from any direction.

 

 


Max. range of 25 miles (40 km) fulfills your demand for the daily commute and excursion.

 

 

 

To be cool and stand out, you got to ride on this beast to show off!

 

Cool and various appearances accentuate your personality and bring out the soul of the high-tech avant-garde element from SPLACH Transformer.

 

Never settle for mundane while you deserve an extraordinary escooter that can be transformed like a motorbike that’s powerful, colorful, and most importantly, useful!  Start your daily routine distinctively & do whatever needed to answer the call of the wild!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The design of the SPLACH Transformer derives from the shapechanging robots in the comic world where they can transform into vehicles or machinery at will. The versatile and playful features completely fit the goal we peruse to be embodied on our E-Scooter that can be practical and recreation-oriented for users. The most distinctive part lies in its changeable casings that can be freely mixed and match to make the look colorful and unique. From the stem, riding positions, tires to the casings, these are the parts that can be changed to add various tastes and styles to your ride.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Not only are we making a brand and electric vehicles, but we’re also building a big family to have members joining in to create a rider-friendly environment to expand the use of green gadgets made by SPLACH and have fun together.

Our family members are happy riders that ride SPLACH for commute and for leisure, exploring the world in all kinds of adventures without limit. Tangible testimony are these happy & content smiles! 

 

 

 

SPLACH has been a remarkable creator of stylish, practical, and eco-friendly vehicles which are ideal substitutes to cars and other means of transport.

We offer premium electric vehicles that are cutting-edge and user-friendly. They embody quality, comfort, functionality and entertainment. SPLACH-TRANSFORMER is a comfortable, versatile vehicle combining city and sport use. Commuting to work and hanging out with friends in a race can both be done on just one bike: SPLACH-TRANSFORMER.

SPLACH was established in Los Angeles and Taiwan by passionate entrepreneurs. Dennis, the CEO of SPLACH, is committed to designing products that fulfill customers' needs. Graduated from USC, he's well familiar with the US market. Born in Taiwan, he precisely maneuvers state-of-the-art technology in producing high-end e-scooters. With his and the whole team's great ambition and devotion, more advanced items are still to come!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please refer to the refund policy of Indiegogo. The perk(s) is “Locked”, which means the campaign owner has indicated the perk(s) is ready for shipment, or “Shipped” by the campaign owner. As stated by Indiegogo, when the perk is locked, it means the perk is ready for shipment and is not refundable.

In receiving your donations, we use them for production.  Money received is fully put into our investment in material sourcing, labor, production, shipping arrangement, etc.  Hence, money contributed to our campaign is not refundable since this process follows this procedure is not reversible.  As stated on Indiegogo, “selecting a perk as a part of your contribution is not the same thing as buying something online." Details can be referred to at this link: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles... 

Especially when the TRK# is generated, it means the perk is on the way. The perk can't be refunded.
story_txt:

Playful, sporty, versatile, and practical.  High torque with various options of customization regarding the stem, casings, and riding modes.  You’ll definitely turn many heads when riding on this transformable motorbike-like monster!   
 
 


The patented proprietary beefy motor delivers great torque up to 960W to take your ride over various terrains, bustling urban jungles, unpaved rail trails, rocky roads, or even 28% incline hills can be zipped up from the crazy boost.  Plus the 10 x 2.5" pneumatic fat tires provide enhanced traction and stability as well as the superior dual suspension system, they stick you to the route and smooth out the bumps for you.  The dual wave disc brakes prevent them from overheating, ensuring the ride safe non-stop.
 
 


The powerful motor with mighty torque up to 960W  gives you the strong boost you need.
 
 


28% hill-climbing capability propels you to power through slopes and hills effortlessly.
 
 


Shred on all terrains for all kinds of exhilarating adventures. 10" pneumatic tires are interchangeable, meaning you could choose between road bike tires or off-roading tires, depending on your destination and purpose for the cruise.
 
 



Plush front & rear suspension setup provides you with comfort through rough conditions.
 
 


The front and rear wave disc brakes provide the maximum braking power without compromising safety & stability as well as prevent brake fade.

story:
We formed Tenways for an age of carbonless transportation. Our CGO 600 is the ultimate solution for urban commuting.  

Commutes should be fun. So we are here.

We found the most suitable power solution to match with a Gates CDX carbon belt drive. The motor, sensor, and controller are made just for each other, for max compatibility and performance.
 
With the high accuracy torque sensor, no ride will be too hard, no slope will be too steep.

 Unlike conventional metal chains, the Gates carbon belt will not suffer from metal fatigue. It is care-free for 30000km, and will “unchain” you from mechanical noises or oily hands.

 Thanks to our aero aluminium alloy frame, the full weight is only 15 kg, which is 40% lighter than the industry average of 25 kg.

 After around 2.5 hours of charging, you can ride up to 130 km. If your daily commute is around 10km, one-time full charge means 7 days of riding*.
*This result was obtained from road test and mathematical model.

 

For your riding life, we want 100% fun and 0% trouble.

When you are required to push your bike, you won't need to spend the effort. Push and hold the “Down” button under the display, and your CGO 600 will enter walking-assistance mode. 

 

High quality reflective stripes help you to shine safely in the night.

 

Extra styles, for the extra-ordinary you.

Combining 20 years of bike expertise with the passionate idealism of young cyclists, we formed Tenways in 2019. Dissatisfied with what the eBike industry is routinely producing, we designed the CGO600 to make daily commutes the carbon-less fun they should be.
