Simply click to close without the need for a key.  A key is only required to unlock your bike. Each LITELOK CORE is supplied with 3 keys plus a unique key code to enable you to order more keys at a later date.An innovative in-line lock enables two LITELOK CORE locks to be paired together in parallel for additional length or on separate wheels for extra security. Twin lock packs are keyed alike (identical keys) so that they operate from the same unique key.  We've built, tested and broken 1,054 prototypes and counting in the pursuit of our final lock design. LITELOK CORE has already passed stringent, independent security tests - simulating attack from the most common theft tools.LITELOK CORE has been independently tested to withstand sustained attack from the most common theft tools, achieving Sold Secure Bicycle Diamond (the highest level of bike security) as well as Sold Secure Motorcycle Gold.LITELOK CORE has been submitted to ART in the Netherlands (the internationally recognised bike and motorcycle security certification body) and has already passed comprehensive preliminary ART3 tests. The full certification will follow in the next few weeks and we will update you once we receive it. 


CORE FLEXI-O fits perfectly in your frame, whilst CORE WEARABLE has three larger sizes providing either longer locking circumference or ability to be worn round your waist whilst riding.


For the last ten years the LITELOK team have been obsessed about designing better ways to secure your bike when you need to leave it.  We've travelled the world photographing thousands of locked bikes and talking to hundreds of riders. Consistently everyone talks about how much they love to ride and how devastated they would be if their bike was stolen.  Since launching our first Kickstarter campaign in 2015, we've protected over 50,000 bikes but we're always looking to build better locks and we think we've created our most secure lock to date.
 


 
LITELOK is based in Wales, UK and made up of riders who share a passion for protecting bikes and e-bikes. We work with some of the world's leading material scientists and engineers from universities to advance our technical knowhow. All of our locks are designed and manufactured in the UK with love and care by our own team.  

 Why Indiegogo?LITELOK CORE was designed following feedback from the crowdfunding community and we now want as many of you to own it first. We've finalised the product design, passed independent security testing and with you're support we're ready to scale production and deliver your product this Summer. Your pledge will help fund in-house production with our team in the UK. Thanks to...All of the LITELOK team; Tom S, Tom G, Rhys L, Rhys G, Neil P,  Neil B, Will, Rachel, Adam, Beverley, Ceri, Iwona, Rickie, Morwenna, Maciej, Vicky, Ramon, Lewis, James, Gabi, Ellie and Alex.Plus thanks for the creative support of Tudor and James @ Yoke Creative, Jonathan Wright @ I Want to Ride My Bike Café in Cardiff, Michael and his team @ M&P Swansea and Tredz Swansea. Risks and challengesLITELOK has been manufacturing and shipping bike locks all over the world since our first Kickstarter in 2015 and in that time we have sold over 50,000 locks and protected 50,000 bikes. We have an experienced engineering, operations and fulfilment team based in S. Wales who know exactly what it takes to build and ship products all over the world.We are forecasting to fulfil all orders by Aug/Sep 2021. Product designs have been finalised and our teams in the UK are ready to build but there is always a small potential risk of delays to component sourcing or assembly. However, we are committed to ship your LITELOK to you in time to enjoy the summer and we will keep you updated.  Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting designAll of our products are manufactured to last. We employ rigorous testing in the development of our products and materials. Litelok Core has been extensively tested against corrosion, fatigue and long term use. We have developed our own machines in order to perform accelerated testing to simulate years of operation. As an example, the locking cylinder is designed and engineered to deliver a minimum of 5,000 open-close cycles.Reusability and recyclabilityWe use very minimal packaging. The packaging we do use is either cardboard or completely reusable, for example we will supply a durable drawstring bag which protects the lock within the box in transit but which, after initial opening, can be used by the backer for their lock, or for some other use eg gym shoes.Sustainable materialsWe use recycled cardboard in our packaging. One of the polymers we use is a plant based polymer which is made from bio materials. Where we use steel it is of a high grade, contains a proportion of recycled material and is itself completely recyclable. We have designed our product to separate into the different materials groups relatively easily within a recycling plant.Environmentally friendly factoriesWe carefully audit our suppliers to ensure that they are compliant with the strictest of environmental regulations. We have our own manufacturing operation in Wales, UK which follows strict environmental regulations and is operated by us, so we can monitor and control everything very closely. This is important to us.Sustainable DistributionWe try to minimise the miles/km our products travel by operating a few transportation hubs. We have a hub in EU and a partner in USA in order to ensure that our products do not travel back and forth unnecessarily.Something elseLightweight products require less energy to transport but also, more significantly, in use. For ebikes and motorised scooters & e-bikes this means less electricity and/or fuel and therefore emissions. Encouraging more people to use personal transportation other than cars results in well established positive health and environmental benefits. Furthermore, if a bike is stolen there is about a 20% chance the victim will not replace it, losing their transport, exercise, and potentially access to local services (source: Guardian report Feb 2019).

story:
Display messages without taking your eyes off the road. Wayvemote is pre-programmed with six messages so you can share what’s on your mind with the touch of a button. Messages include common driving phrases and an option you can customize. The remote has a magnetic mount to attach anywhere in your car, and is easily charged with the same micro-USB cable provided with the display.

Turn your road rage into road respect with the RoadWayve mobile app. Inspired by Wayvemote, the app’s distinct and user-friendly interface allows you to exchange customized messages with other drivers. Just connect your smartphone (Android or iOS) via Bluetooth to the app, select the voice control option and share your specific thoughts with a driver who lets you in their lane (or one who cut you off)! If you choose not to utilize the voice control option, there are more preset messages offered on the app in addition to the six on Wayvemote.

John Stanley, CEO and Founder of RoadWayve, experienced an incident of road rage as a child. The sympathy he felt for his mother in that instance inspired this product. John’s goal is to create a device that could prevent these incidents from happening to other drivers.

story:
You love bikes and to explore the world? But, What if

You are fed up with paying huge fuel expenses and still can't feel the comfort!

Most often you need to check the fuel and also have spare time to get it filled

and imagine being late for work then you notice your bike is almost out of fuel

That's a rider biggest nightmare !

Another big problem is oil changing after every 1000-2000 miles and you're well aware of the expenses (In U.S. local shops charge between $25 and $49 for an oil change).

No need to worry, now we are in the 21st century and everything is at your doorstep

Then what is pulling us to get queued up for hours for fuel if we have Electric Bikes?

Electric Bikes are the best alternative to fuel Bikes to get rid of the expanses of fuel energy and energy of ourselves too….

JIGSAW Electronics are after marvelous achievements in electronic products, presenting

 

THE BUZZSAW BOSS HOG CHOPPER

This new line of Bikes are designed for minds like yours. Our mission is quite simple, We just want to design trendy quality bikes people can rely on to take them places. By focusing on quality and durability we don't want our customers to miss out on the fun.

Intending to take the bike ride to next level we put everything together so you can fully enjoy yourself with our products. Whether you’re on bike lanes, in the street, or anywhere else, there’s a world out there and it deserves to be explored by you.

Just keep moving!

​BENEFITS OF BUZZSAW BOSS HOG CHOPPER : AN AFFORDABLE E-BIKE

  • Powerful brakes

  • Lightweight

  • High-quality components

  • Great mile range

  • Great even for uphill climbs

  • Battery has excellent mile range

Intending to deliver the best products on the market, JIGSAW electronics focused on a few key features. These are the most appealing features that differentiate the product from existing ones.

 

It’s as sleek as it looks and can be customized as per your needs , delivering a ravaging power of 3000 watts, and can hit up to 50 mph. The removable lithium battery is just at go-to hand to get charged. There’s no competing with this bike when it comes to the combination of all three features. It’s the sweetest deal you can lay your hands on in the market right now!

It comes with a supercharged durable 60v 30ah battery that allows you to travel up to 50 miles. The Battery can be removed easily and it's also very handy so you can charge it anywhere.

 

 

The 12-inch Aluminum Alloy hub wheels are puncture-free. With this bike, you don't have to worry about parking spots, gas prices, crowded buses, or trains. It’s in and out of anywhere you want to go with ease. 

 

 

Intending to deliver the best product on the market, JIGSAW Electronics focused on a few key features. These are the most appealing features that differentiate the product from existing ones;

 

WE’VE GOT YOU COVERED WITH CUSTOM MODIFICATIONS!

Do you love fancy art on your bike?

We took it to a whole another level. There’s no limitations to the logo style or design you want to be added to your chopper.

The chopper comes in four custom colors to choose from just so we don’t bore you.

This will by far be the most entertaining electric bike of 2021 so don't miss out on this opportunity to own this road beast. Your adventures are counting on you. 

Understated but unique; pick the one that best fits your style.

Now, the market is full of bikes like these that are not only pocket-friendly but eco-friendly also. Then what features will make you choose JIGSAW electronics Product?  

Here is a comparison chart of our product with the similar product or self claiming eco-friendly product out there in the market, take a look!

Meet Matthew Linder and Derrick Wilson, founders of Jigsaw Electronics. After a few failed E-Bike orders from China suppliers, the two came up with the Boss Hog Electric Chopper.

A single question pondered their minds

 'Why can’t sleek Electric Scooters and Bikes be made in the United States?'

Their goal was not to make Electric Bikes and Scooters but to cut the production and shipping time down. 

 

"If we design and manufacture these electric products in the United States, we can save a lot of customers time, money, and keep them around!”, said Matthew Linder.

The Jigsaw Electronics team comprises two creative geniuses who've worked together for the past few years refining every corner of the company. The two have the most experienced hands on deck dedicated to crafting the very intricate details that make the Boss Hog Electric Chopper so SPECIAL. We've cut through various angles, made mistakes, made even bigger mistakes, and most importantly, learned from them to create the perfect product.

Matthew and Derrick have gotten to share their dreams with the rest of the community, enabling every e-bike and scooter lover to lay hands on a trendy design to ride and take pride in!

We can't exist without our customers, and that's why we will have a reliable customer support team to handle all inquiries and demands 24/7.

 

Make your moves anyway you want, anywhere you want!

Don’t hesitate, invest in something that will take your adventure ride to the next level.

Make the right choice. 

 

 

Media Coverage

We are on a mission to create products that enhance our functionality and productivity. Like you, we believe in complete freedom and openness when it comes to electronics. We’ve been listening closely to our community, and have taken their feedback onboard in creating the Buzzsaw Boss Hog Chopper. 

 

Join the Jigsaw Community

For those of you that are not already part of the Jigsaw community, we would like to invite you to join us on this exciting journey. Make a pledge today and join the thousands of existing community members and customers. 
We can’t do this without you so show us your support by following us on social media and help us to spread the word!

 

Why Indiegogo?

We are a new startup electronic company and have been completely self funded to date. So I guess you could say we are not your typical Indiegogo campaign… Having already launched & delivered our other products to many happy customers through other partnership companies we have chosen to launch the Jigsaw Buzzsaw Boss Hog Chopper exclusively on our own through IndieGoGo. 
The way in which this product came about both with Jigsaw community members and with our partnership with Megagoods (one of the largest tech communities online) we wanted to bring this to market on a community based platform. Community feedback is really important to us and we are keen to hear first hand how you think we are doing. The Buzzsaw Chopper have already been carefully reviewed and tested by the Jigsaw Electronics. The Electric Scooter communities have given their support, so this is our opportunity to show you all that we have been listening & now it's our turn to give something back to you.

SCOOTER CUSTOMIZATION

Once a customer makes a purchase they can visit www.jigsawelec.com scroll to the bottom of the page where you can provide your name, email address, then upload the design.


YOU CAN HAVE A GREAT IMPACT BY SHARING THIS CAMPAIGN TO YOUR FRIENDS, FAMILY, RELATIVES, CONTACTS, NEIGHBORS TO HELP THE CAMPAIGN GET THE BEST EXPOSURE.

SHARE THE CAMPAIGN THROUGH THE BELOW BUTTON ACROSS ALL SOCIAL MEDIA CHANNELS.

story:
Meet HUDWAY Drive, the heads-up display designed for you to enjoy everyday commutes and long journeys to the unfamiliar places — with maps, directions, incoming calls, messages and notifications projected through your windshield.

HUDWAY Drive is our third hardware product since 2015. It was built through numerous rounds of R&D, prototyping, testing, revisions, based on the vast feedback from our community — and today we're happy to introduce it to you. 

All that you've been asking for — simple installation, quick set-up and pairing, troubleproof connection, reliable complementary software, ability to use any app of your choice — is made real with HUDWAY Drive. Which, in our opinion, makes it the best & most powerful heads-up display among existing aftermarket models. And it's the most affordable as well.

HUDWAY Drive is serving the modern driver, someone on the go who needs to stay connected without sacrificing their safety or the safety of others, with something that can't be found anywhere else.


It's for those looking to upgrade the vehicles they already own with a heads-up display — at a fraction of the price charged for built-in OEM solutions, and with a more advanced functionality.

It's for the daily commuter, the traveler on the move, the mothers and fathers. It's for drivers everyday, everywhere.

Search for places in the app and navigate there with concise directions floating in front of your eyes. Follow timely voice hints on upcoming manoeuvres. Powered by MapBox.

See when someone is calling you and accept the call the way you normally do. If you have a Voice Assistant button on the steering wheel, a Bluetooth headset, or Apple Watch, you can connect it to your phone and respond to calls this way. Otherwise, you will need to pick up your phone.

View messages and other notifications from your phone projected through your windshield — it’s automated, no extra actions are needed. Preset what you want to see on the head-up display and leave out all the rest.

Customize your driving experience with the dashboard widgets:  pitching and rolling, GPS speedometer, clock, weather, ETA, compass, eco driving index, and more.

Listen to the voice directions played on your smartphone, Bluetooth headphones, or car media system — and receive phone calls hands-free.

One of the most exciting things about an aftermarket heads-up display is its portability. You purchase one, and can take it from one vehicle to another. And this calls for a versatile design that would look good on any vehicle dashboard, as well as for a thought-out mounting system.

The HUDWAY Drive mount is one of our favorite innovations. Not only it affixes neatly and securely to almost every vehicle dash, but also makes using the device hassle-free. 

Flexible flaps follow the dash curves

From our previous experience we know how important it is to mount the device firmly on the dash. In our earlier devices, we tried to achieve it with selecting a very flexible base material that would adjust to the curves, but that was not sufficient for some very curvy dashes. In HUDWAY Drive, we've built a mount that consists of more components — base and sectional flaps. Such construction allows for better flexibility and closer adhesion. 

Provided that it's affixed firmly, the mount absorbs dash vibration — so that it doesn't interfere with viewing the projected information, which used to be an issue reported by some of the customers of our earlier devices.

As for adhesive on the base of the mount — as usual, it's very strong and will keep the device in place on all sorts of dash surfaces, except for suede-like ones. And it leaves no traces when removed.

The cables run straight to the mount not to the device 

This means, you only need to deal with wires once, when you first install HUDWAY Drive. After you install the device, plug the cable in the mount power port, secure the cable with dash clips, hide it between the dash and the windshield, then thread it behind the driver's seat to further plug it in the cigarette lighter receptacle. So, whenever you need to use the device, just plug the cable in the cigarette lighter receptacle, and it will power on automatically.

Same is true for connecting the cameras — the video input port is located on the mount.

Slide-in mechanism to easily dismount the device

There may be situations, when you want to drive without the device on the dash, or remove it when parking the car — or you may want to use it on your other vehicle (there will be extra mounts available for purchase later). Anyway, the slide-in mechanism makes removing the device and placing it back very quick and simple. 

By now, we have manufactured a small test batch and took the device to a range of vehicles to see how it would fit in the most popular models — and on some of the most challenging dashboards. It did awesome. See for yourself:

HUDWAY Drive on Mercedes C-class
 

HUDWAY Drive on BMW 3 E46
 

HUDWAY Drive on BMW X5
 

HUDWAY Drive on BMW X6
 

HUDWAY Drive on Toyota Camry
 

HUDWAY Drive on Volkswagen Atlas
 

HUDWAY Drive on Volkswagen Jetta
 

HUDWAY Drive on Ford Mustang
 

HUDWAY Drive on Mini Countryman
 

HUDWAY Drive on Tesla Model S

To make sure it will fit in your vehicle, download and print out the device mock-up. Then cut it out and take to your dash to check.



One-time quick setup: as easy as connecting earphones to smartphone

HUDWAY Drive connects to the smartphone via Bluetooth, which is why you once you have paired the two once, every next time HUDWAY Drive will connect to your smartphone automaticaly, even when the latter stays in your pocket.

See the full overview of connection options and what each offers in the FAQ.

Directions, calls, texts and notifications brought to HUD over Bluetooth — while your phone stays in your pocket.

Google Maps, Waze, or any other app you want to use behind the wheel — mirrored over AirPlay/ Miracast, or HUDWAY Drive private mirroring protocol. Whatever you see on your smartphone screen — you can now see in head-up display mode.

HUDWAY Drive has a video input (CVBS) port to connect a camera to it — sounds simple, but let's dig in detail to see why we consider it a supervaluable addition to HUDWAY Drive — and how it can augment your driving experience.

The rearview camera automatically turns on when selecting the reverse gear. It's equipped with rear parking distance sensors and and LED lights. 

Parking sensors measure the distance to the obstacles. Lights ensure that you get a legible video of what’s behind the vehicle when it’s dark.

Not only the camera displays the video of what's behind the rear bumper, but also visualizes the space around the vehicle alerting on the proximity to the obstacles.  

The viewing angle is 170°, and the waterproof rating is IP69 (will withstand any weather conditions).

Sideview camera allows you to control blind spots when turning or overtaking. The video starts streaming automatically when your turn signal is on.

We recommend that the side view cameras are installed on the fender close to the front door gap. This way, it involves no drilling of the body, and the wires can be hidden more neatly.

The viewing angle is 120°, and the waterproof rating is IP69 (will withstand any weather conditions). Each of these cameras can be used as front/rear/left/right side view camera according to your need.

Night vision thermal camera displays the objects ahead that are otherwise beyond your headlights reach. 

It detects heat from the objects without a need for light, allowing you to see up to four times farther down the road. You’ll have visibility through dust, smoke, or fog, and better capability to avoid an accident. 

With the operating temperature range of -40 °F to 155 °F (-40 °C to 70 °C) and IP67 waterproof rating, the camera will withstand most extreme weather conditions. 

Each camera set comes with a video selector unit so that you can preset which video signal you want to appear on HUD — and with a remote control to actually configure such a preset.

The cameras connect to video selector using S-video cables — these allow to power the cameras and transmit the video signal. Then, you'll need to plug the RCA cable running from the video selector unit in HUDWAY Drive — and hide all the wires.

Note: Please note that installing cameras, especially the night vision one, may require a qualified specialist. Detailed information and instructions how to connect the cameras are posted in one of our updates.

At the moment, HUDWAY Drive is on a prototype stage. But it's a prototype ready for production. 

We have selected the vendors and component suppliers, signed the manufacturing contracts — and even prepaid the tooling for major components. Production and assembly will be done in China by our trusted partners.  

To launch mass production and maintain the pricing we offer, we need a large order — and we're asking you to join in and contribute to that amount.

Production leadtime is 2 months since the end of the crowdfunding campaign, which is why the delivery date is set to August. 

We do not foresee any major risk factors or complications. As usual, the lens is the most complicated component to manufacture and get ready for assembly. Luckily, we've been dealing with HUD lenses since 2015, and know well how to make them great. 

Join in, back the project — and rest assured, we will deliver.

Many of the customers of HUDWAY Cast (our earlier device) ask us how HUDWAY Drive is different from that. In short, HUDWAY Drive addresses most of the issues the users of both our earlier devices faced. The key differences are:

Improved connectivity

HUDWAY Drive connects to the smartphone via Bluetooth, which is quick, hassle-free and reliable. With this type of connection you will be able to use navigation powered by MapBox and driving widgets. Also, incoming calls and notifications will be fetched and visualised to HUD — and sound will be played via the output source you select.

Alternatively, you can mirror any application (your exact phone screen contents) to HUD. This is how you can view Waze, Google Maps, or any other app on HUD. This time we're using a different way to do the mirroring — and not relying on AirPlay or Miracast. However, the latter two will be still supported in HUDWAY Drive.

Learn more on the connection options in the Help Center.

Slimmer & improved design

HUDWAY Drive uses an extra slim and flexible mount which follows the curves of your dash and looks integral to the vehicle interior. And — it now fits in the vehicles where there’s very little space between the dash and the windshield (like in some BMW models).

The lens is now also smaller and flatter, of a much better quality and with more advanced coatings — thus, the projection will not be blurry or distorted.

Convenient mounting

HUDWAY Drive affixes to the mount using a slide-in lock, and the power cable plugs in the mount not in the device, which is why it’s now easier to take the device off and place it back.

The mount also absorbs vehicle vibration which was the issue reported by some of HUDWAY Cast users.

Video input

For those using additional cameras in their vehicles, HUDWAY Drive offers a video input port (CVBS) which was impossible with HUDWAY Cast.

Reliable software

By default, HUDWAY Drive uses navigation and routes provided by MapBox. Alternatively, you can use HUDWAY Go or any other app (using screen mirroring) if you choose to.

On the whole, HUDWAY Drive is superior to HUDWAY Cast in terms of functionality, design and usability.

Having started in 2013, we've been focusing on a very specific range of solutions — HUD & ADAS software and hardware products. This is our core competence.

It is our mission to bring safety on the road through ongoing innovations, and we keep improving and enhancing our products to make this possible. Today, the HUDWAY team consists of 40 members in 4 countries around the world.

Meet the key team members behind the HUDWAY Drive creation:
story_txt: Meet HUDWAY Drive, the heads-up display designed for you to enjoy everyday commutes and long journeys to the unfamiliar places — with maps, directions, incoming calls, messages and notifications projected through your windshield.HUDWAY Drive is our third hardware product since 2015. It was built through numerous rounds of R&D, prototyping, testing, revisions, based on the vast feedback from our community — and today we're happy to introduce it to you. All that you've been asking for — simple installation, quick set-up and pairing, troubleproof connection, reliable complementary software, ability to use any app of your choice — is made real with HUDWAY Drive. Which, in our opinion, makes it the best & most powerful heads-up display among existing aftermarket models. And it's the most affordable as well.HUDWAY Drive is serving the modern driver, someone on the go who needs to stay connected without sacrificing their safety or the safety of others, with something that can't be found anywhere else.It's for those looking to upgrade the vehicles they already own with a heads-up display — at a fraction of the price charged for built-in OEM solutions, and with a more advanced functionality.It's for the daily commuter, the traveler on the move, the mothers and fathers. It's for drivers everyday, everywhere.Search for places in the app and navigate there with concise directions floating in front of your eyes. Follow timely voice hints on upcoming manoeuvres. Powered by MapBox.See when someone is calling you and accept the call the way you normally do. If you have a Voice Assistant button on the steering wheel, a Bluetooth headset, or Apple Watch, you can connect it to your phone and respond to calls this way. Otherwise, you will need to pick up your phone.View messages and other notifications from your phone projected through your windshield — it’s automated, no extra actions are needed. Preset what you want to see on the head-up display and leave out all the rest.Customize your driving experience with the dashboard widgets:  pitching and rolling, GPS speedometer, clock, weather, ETA, compass, eco driving index, and more.Listen to the voice directions played on your smartphone, Bluetooth headphones, or car media system — and receive phone calls hands-free.One of the most exciting things about an aftermarket heads-up display is its portability. You purchase one, and can take it from one vehicle to another. And this calls for a versatile design that would look good on any vehicle dashboard, as well as for a thought-out mounting system.The HUDWAY Drive mount is one of our favorite innovations. Not only it affixes neatly and securely to almost every vehicle dash, but also makes using the device hassle-free. Flexible flaps follow the dash curvesFrom our previous experience we know how important it is to mount the device firmly on the dash. In our earlier devices, we tried to achieve it with selecting a very flexible base material that would adjust to the curves, but that was not sufficient for some very curvy dashes. In HUDWAY Drive, we've built a mount that consists of more components — base and sectional flaps. Such construction allows for better flexibility and closer adhesion. Provided that it's affixed firmly, the mount absorbs dash vibration — so that it doesn't interfere with viewing the projected information, which used to be an issue reported by some of the customers of our earlier devices.As for adhesive on the base of the mount — as usual, it's very strong and will keep the device in place on all sorts of dash surfaces, except for suede-like ones. And it leaves no traces when removed.The cables run straight to the mount not to the device This means, you only need to deal with wires once, when you first install HUDWAY Drive. After you install the device, plug the cable in the mount power port, secure the cable with dash clips, hide it between the dash and the windshield, then thread it behind the driver's seat to further plug it in the cigarette lighter receptacle. So, whenever you need to use the device, just plug the cable in the cigarette lighter receptacle, and it will power on automatically.Same is true for connecting the cameras — the video input port is located on the mount.Slide-in mechanism to easily dismount the deviceThere may be situations, when you want to drive without the device on the dash, or remove it when parking the car — or you may want to use it on your other vehicle (there will be extra mounts available for purchase later). Anyway, the slide-in mechanism makes removing the device and placing it back very quick and simple. By now, we have manufactured a small test batch and took the device to a range of vehicles to see how it would fit in the most popular models — and on some of the most challenging dashboards. It did awesome. See for yourself:HUDWAY Drive on Mercedes C-class HUDWAY Drive on BMW 3 E46 HUDWAY Drive on BMW X5 HUDWAY Drive on BMW X6 HUDWAY Drive on Toyota Camry HUDWAY Drive on Volkswagen Atlas HUDWAY Drive on Volkswagen Jetta HUDWAY Drive on Ford Mustang HUDWAY Drive on Mini Countryman HUDWAY Drive on Tesla Model STo make sure it will fit in your vehicle, download and print out the device mock-up. Then cut it out and take to your dash to check.One-time quick setup: as easy as connecting earphones to smartphoneHUDWAY Drive connects to the smartphone via Bluetooth, which is why you once you have paired the two once, every next time HUDWAY Drive will connect to your smartphone automaticaly, even when the latter stays in your pocket.See the full overview of connection options and what each offers in the FAQ.Directions, calls, texts and notifications brought to HUD over Bluetooth — while your phone stays in your pocket.Google Maps, Waze, or any other app you want to use behind the wheel — mirrored over AirPlay/ Miracast, or HUDWAY Drive private mirroring protocol. Whatever you see on your smartphone screen — you can now see in head-up display mode.HUDWAY Drive has a video input (CVBS) port to connect a camera to it — sounds simple, but let's dig in detail to see why we consider it a supervaluable addition to HUDWAY Drive — and how it can augment your driving experience.The rearview camera automatically turns on when selecting the reverse gear. It's equipped with rear parking distance sensors and and LED lights. Parking sensors measure the distance to the obstacles. Lights ensure that you get a legible video of what’s behind the vehicle when it’s dark.Not only the camera displays the video of what's behind the rear bumper, but also visualizes the space around the vehicle alerting on the proximity to the obstacles.  The viewing angle is 170°, and the waterproof rating is IP69 (will withstand any weather conditions).Sideview camera allows you to control blind spots when turning or overtaking. The video starts streaming automatically when your turn signal is on.We recommend that the side view cameras are installed on the fender close to the front door gap. This way, it involves no drilling of the body, and the wires can be hidden more neatly.The viewing angle is 120°, and the waterproof rating is IP69 (will withstand any weather conditions). Each of these cameras can be used as front/rear/left/right side view camera according to your need.Night vision thermal camera displays the objects ahead that are otherwise beyond your headlights reach. It detects heat from the objects without a need for light, allowing you to see up to four times farther down the road. You’ll have visibility through dust, smoke, or fog, and better capability to avoid an accident. With the operating temperature range of -40 °F to 155 °F (-40 °C to 70 °C) and IP67 waterproof rating, the camera will withstand most extreme weather conditions. Each camera set comes with a video selector unit so that you can preset which video signal you want to appear on HUD — and with a remote control to actually configure such a preset.The cameras connect to video selector using S-video cables — these allow to power the cameras and transmit the video signal. Then, you'll need to plug the RCA cable running from the video selector unit in HUDWAY Drive — and hide all the wires.Note: Please note that installing cameras, especially the night vision one, may require a qualified specialist. Detailed information and instructions how to connect the cameras are posted in one of our updates.At the moment, HUDWAY Drive is on a prototype stage. But it's a prototype ready for production. We have selected the vendors and component suppliers, signed the manufacturing contracts — and even prepaid the tooling for major components. Production and assembly will be done in China by our trusted partners.  To launch mass production and maintain the pricing we offer, we need a large order — and we're asking you to join in and contribute to that amount.Production leadtime is 2 months since the end of the crowdfunding campaign, which is why the delivery date is set to August. We do not foresee any major risk factors or complications. As usual, the lens is the most complicated component to manufacture and get ready for assembly. Luckily, we've been dealing with HUD lenses since 2015, and know well how to make them great. Join in, back the project — and rest assured, we will deliver.Many of the customers of HUDWAY Cast (our earlier device) ask us how HUDWAY Drive is different from that. In short, HUDWAY Drive addresses most of the issues the users of both our earlier devices faced. The key differences are:Improved connectivityHUDWAY Drive connects to the smartphone via Bluetooth, which is quick, hassle-free and reliable. With this type of connection you will be able to use navigation powered by MapBox and driving widgets. Also, incoming calls and notifications will be fetched and visualised to HUD — and sound will be played via the output source you select.Alternatively, you can mirror any application (your exact phone screen contents) to HUD. This is how you can view Waze, Google Maps, or any other app on HUD. This time we're using a different way to do the mirroring — and not relying on AirPlay or Miracast. However, the latter two will be still supported in HUDWAY Drive.Learn more on the connection options in the Help Center.Slimmer & improved designHUDWAY Drive uses an extra slim and flexible mount which follows the curves of your dash and looks integral to the vehicle interior. And — it now fits in the vehicles where there’s very little space between the dash and the windshield (like in some BMW models).The lens is now also smaller and flatter, of a much better quality and with more advanced coatings — thus, the projection will not be blurry or distorted.Convenient mountingHUDWAY Drive affixes to the mount using a slide-in lock, and the power cable plugs in the mount not in the device, which is why it’s now easier to take the device off and place it back.The mount also absorbs vehicle vibration which was the issue reported by some of HUDWAY Cast users.Video inputFor those using additional cameras in their vehicles, HUDWAY Drive offers a video input port (CVBS) which was impossible with HUDWAY Cast.Reliable softwareBy default, HUDWAY Drive uses navigation and routes provided by MapBox. Alternatively, you can use HUDWAY Go or any other app (using screen mirroring) if you choose to.On the whole, HUDWAY Drive is superior to HUDWAY Cast in terms of functionality, design and usability.Having started in 2013, we've been focusing on a very specific range of solutions — HUD & ADAS software and hardware products. This is our core competence.It is our mission to bring safety on the road through ongoing innovations, and we keep improving and enhancing our products to make this possible. Today, the HUDWAY team consists of 40 members in 4 countries around the world.Meet the key team members behind the HUDWAY Drive creation:

story:
Meet MaxTracker

Real-Time GPS, Motion Sensors & Instant Notifications

All Hidden in a Water Bottle Cage

 
Force bike thieves to go through 2 levels of security:
A top-of-the-line bike lock & MaxTracker's high-decibel alarm & GPS tracking.
 
Motion-Sensor
High-Decibel Alarm
Real-Time GPS Tracking
Smartphone App w/ Instant Notifications
5G/LTE Connection
2+ Month Rechargeable Battery
Built for Extreme Weather
 

 

As Seen On...

 

 

Track your bike in real-time with 5G/LTE connectivity - whether it’s parked or on the move.

 

Know the moment your bike is moved or jostled. Motion detectors signal your phone within 10 milliseconds of being tampered with.

 

MaxTracker is discreetly hidden in a water bottle cage made from aerospace-grade polycarbonate and nylon-12.

Any tampering or movement can also set off a piercing alarm to deter thieves from further pursuit.

 

*Alarm is optional. Can be turned on/off in app settings.

 

 

 

Charge MaxTracker while installed on the bike, or take it off to charge in your home, car, or anywhere else.

 

 

Smart and efficient battery management with the app always displaying your battery level.

 

 

*Armed mode disables automatic battery management.

 

 

 

 
Designed to last in extreme temperatures and weather conditions (IP67) - through any adventure, rain or shine.

 

Choose when to be notified - when your bike is jostled, directionally moved, pushed past a geofence, or a mix of the three.

 

 

 

 

Capture waypoints of your ride with the MaxTracker app, and allow family & friends to track your ride in real time. 

 

 

Install or remove in seconds. All you need is your key, unique to each MaxTracker.

 

 

If a water bottle holder isn’t your style, or your bike doesn’t allow room for one, MaxTracker’s wings can be removed for a more streamlined look.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Steve is a lifelong entrepreneur with deep experience in creating systems and building talented teams to create new products and services across a number of business categories.

The development of MaxTracker fulfills Steve’s passion and mission: To reverse the past outcomes of bicycle theft so the owners win and the thieves go to jail.

 

Jim is an experienced technology entrepreneur with several ventures in the sports and fitness industry. He started out as a software engineer and moved on to systems architect and then to CTO roles. He has received two patents in the sports and fitness area.  

Jim remembers the trauma of having his brand new mountain bike stolen while on a biking trip to Breckenridge. Even though it was a few years ago, it is easy to recall and relive the sorrow he felt at the time.

 

MaxTracker In Action:

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship to United States and Canada. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in November 2021 We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of Max Tracker.

 

 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

 

 

Create your own referral link below and earn 10% cash back!

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory’s experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
Customize your very own vehicle

Each unit is made bespoke for each rider’s purpose and personal style.
Pick from 3 motor levels (500W, 1000W, 2000W), dual battery bays with two performance level batteries (500Wh & 550Wh), and 7 distinct colors (basic & premium).. 
Check it out now in our LIVE Studio Configurator

 

Also, unlike most scooters on the market, the Scotsman was made with the connected generation in mind and is the world’s first scooter that has 

  • Built-in dashcam, 
  • 4G cellular connection 
  • Companion App (iOS & Android) integration 
  • GPS 
  • Color display
  • Auto-unlock & more​

A vehicle of the future.
COMMUTE WITHOUT COMPROMISE. Power, comfort, and portability unite.

Curious about the secret behind all of these features? 

Let us tell you all about it below:

1. Ultra-premium Materials, Extraordinary Product Value

For Scotsman the ENTIRE FRAME is crafted from ultra-premium thermoplastic AS4 (aerospace grade) carbon fiber composite, including the handlebar, stem, fork, baseboard, suspension, battery bay, and other support structures. 
So while Scotsman is a large, full-sized scooter with the power of high-performance electric vehicles, it is lightweight and portable like smaller, lower powered scooters. Scotsman has the best of both worlds, with speed, comfort and portability.

Many of our competitors like to boast that they use carbon fiber. But only Scotsman uses a 100% carbon fiber composite body, giving you the full benefits of the material and nothing short of it.

Carry Your Commute

Folds down in seconds for easy transport and compact storage.

Sleek Goes Steady

Thanks to carbon fiber’s high strength-to-weight ratio, we don’t have to use much of it to create a large, strong, but light structure. Our large ten-inch wheels, generous 8-inch wide deck, and long-wheelbase work together to ensure a comfortable and safe ride.

Roll with the Punches

Suspension system integrated right into the baseboard. 
Proprietary to only our advanced 3D printing process.

2. Your Personal Power Station

Each PowerPack doubles as a power bank with a USB-C (100W PD) port to charge your computer, phone, or other electronics. 
More demanding users can opt to get a Performance PowerPack that has more energy capacity (550 Wh) and enables a special turbo mode on the Scotsman (still in development - more on this after we exit beta). 
Note: the Scotsman 2000 comes standard with a Performance PowerPack.

More Power to You

Dual battery bays satisfy the power-hungry. Add a second battery to double your range.

 

Take Charge, Give Charge

Easily remove your PowerPack and charge it at your desk.

With pass-through charging capability built into the battery management system, you can charge your Mac while charging your PowerPack.

3. A Mode for Every Road

Choose from three different motor power levels. 

….more SPECS below!

4. Connected Software

Aside from the advanced product design, you will not miss out on connected features. 

Ultra Wide-Angle 1080p Dashcam

The world's first built-in dashcam that enables you to capture photos (anytime) during your ride. You can even snap a shot of your scooter’s surroundings when the Find My Scooter feature is triggered, letting you know exactly where your Scotsman is, together with its GPS location. 

Enter the Cockpit

The LCD panel displays battery level, speed, riding mode, turn-by-turn navigation, distance traveled, and distance remaining. Your Scotsman will remind you when to charge your scooter battery or replace it with a new one.

Scotsman App: Smart and Connected

Being a truly modern vehicle, the Scotsman is of course fully connected (4G cellular and Bluetooth) and comes with the Scotsman App which enables a range of functions.

 

Below is the sneak-peak of how the Scotsman App is turning out. The full Scotsman App will be ready for both iOS and Android by the time we ship.

 

REVIEW

On June 17th, 2021, we welcomed Ilan Cohen - Director of Crowdfunding at Indiegogo and KhanFlicks - Tech YouTuber, to visit Scotsman HQ and try out Scotsman's first prototype. 

Below is an up close look at our robotic arm 3D printing a Scotsman deck:

 

Khanflicks also made an in depth review of the Scotsman on his Youtube channel; check it out here:

 

Colors

The Scotsman comes in five standard colors. Understated but unique; pick the one that best fits your personal style.

 

We also have two premium colors for an added splash of class. Both can be found under our special perks for a limited 33%-off price of $199.

International Upgrade Kit

We're providing an upgrade kit for Scotsman riders to add on accessories such as a license plate holder, horn, two separate brakes, rearview mirrors, tail & brake lights, blinkers, and reflectors.

Use these to comply with your countries' local regulations while increasing functionality and customizability. 

 

3D Printing = Mass Customization and Impossible Designs

Vroom en Vogue

The Scotsman was designed by Branch Creative, an award-winning design team with deep experience in scooter design. Because each scooter is individually 3D printed for each owner, we are able to provide an unprecedented level of customization as well as achieve design forms not possible using traditional manufacturing methods.

 

Light has Found its Might

Early in its history, carbon fiber composites were much more expensive to make than they are now, leaving the only possible applications to military planes and spacecraft. It wasn’t until the late 1970’s, that formula one racing teams began looking towards carbon fiber to improve their performance and designs. With its undeniable performance gains, carbon fiber is now found in many supercars, aircrafts, spacecrafts… and scooters.

Traditional methods rely on long, expensive processes involving making molds to create each substructure, autoclaving the parts, and then assembling the different parts together to form the complete structure. Incredibly time-intensive, expensive, and slow. Such methods are also limited in the types of design shapes that can be created.

With our 3D printing technology, we can achieve similar (and in many cases better) levels of strength and performance while also providing a major advantage in flexibility - any shape done quickly (hours vs. months) without heavy investment.

Each unit is individually crafted according to a number of precise measurements, accommodating riders from 4’8” to 6’8” (142cm to 203cm).

In the News

Autopresse: Scotsman E-Scooter - Der Roller aus dem 3D-Drucker

CNET: Scotsman is a 3D-printed electric scooter custom made for your body size, riding style

Composites World: Arevo debuts custom, 3D-printed composite scooter

Electrek: This new dual motor carbon fiber electric scooter is 3D-printed to the exact size of the rider

Input Mag: The Scotsman is the spiritual successor to the Boosted Rev

Motor Exclusive: Scotsman E-Scooter - Der Roller aus dem 3D-Drucker

New Atlas: Scotsman electric scooter rolls with 3D-printed carbon fiber unibody

PNP: Der Roller aus dem 3D-Drucker

T3: Electric scooter: meet your new favorite Scotsman

TCT Magazine: Scotsman electric scooter produced with Arevo composite 3D printing tech launches on Indiegogo

Tom's Guide: This $4,500 carbon-fiber electric scooter hits a scary 45 miles per hour

Velobiz: Flaggschiff E-Scooter mit exklusiven Spezifikationen

Welt: Der Roller aus dem 3D Drucker Scotsman E-Scooter

Zarabaza: Scotsman: il primo monopattino elettrico in fibra di carbonio stampato in 3D

and more.....

 

More Specs for You

 

Perks

 

Japanese Edition

Given the interest we've seen in Japan for electric scooters, we made a special Japanese Edition for the Scotsman with lights, reflectors, blinkers, rearview mirrors, and a license plate to ensure legal compliance in Japan.

This edition is an upgrade option for all products and only available for Japanese backers - simply choose this perk as you check out. 

 

Timeline

 

Team

Khanflicks also made an in depth review of the Scotsman on his Youtube channel; check it out here:
 ColorsThe Scotsman comes in five standard colors. Understated but unique; pick the one that best fits your personal style. We also have two premium colors for an added splash of class. Both can be found under our special perks for a limited 33%-off price of $199.International Upgrade KitWe're providing an upgrade kit for Scotsman riders to add on accessories such as a license plate holder, horn, two separate brakes, rearview mirrors, tail & brake lights, blinkers, and reflectors.Use these to comply with your countries' local regulations while increasing functionality and customizability.  3D Printing = Mass Customization and Impossible DesignsVroom en VogueThe Scotsman was designed by Branch Creative, an award-winning design team with deep experience in scooter design. Because each scooter is individually 3D printed for each owner, we are able to provide an unprecedented level of customization as well as achieve design forms not possible using traditional manufacturing methods. Light has Found its MightEarly in its history, carbon fiber composites were much more expensive to make than they are now, leaving the only possible applications to military planes and spacecraft. It wasn’t until the late 1970’s, that formula one racing teams began looking towards carbon fiber to improve their performance and designs. With its undeniable performance gains, carbon fiber is now found in many supercars, aircrafts, spacecrafts… and scooters.Traditional methods rely on long, expensive processes involving making molds to create each substructure, autoclaving the parts, and then assembling the different parts together to form the complete structure. Incredibly time-intensive, expensive, and slow. Such methods are also limited in the types of design shapes that can be created.With our 3D printing technology, we can achieve similar (and in many cases better) levels of strength and performance while also providing a major advantage in flexibility - any shape done quickly (hours vs. months) without heavy investment.Each unit is individually crafted according to a number of precise measurements, accommodating riders from 4’8” to 6’8” (142cm to 203cm).In the NewsAutopresse: Scotsman E-Scooter - Der Roller aus dem 3D-DruckerCNET: Scotsman is a 3D-printed electric scooter custom made for your body size, riding styleComposites World: Arevo debuts custom, 3D-printed composite scooterElectrek: This new dual motor carbon fiber electric scooter is 3D-printed to the exact size of the riderInput Mag: The Scotsman is the spiritual successor to the Boosted RevMotor Exclusive: Scotsman E-Scooter - Der Roller aus dem 3D-DruckerNew Atlas: Scotsman electric scooter rolls with 3D-printed carbon fiber unibodyPNP: Der Roller aus dem 3D-DruckerT3: Electric scooter: meet your new favorite ScotsmanTCT Magazine: Scotsman electric scooter produced with Arevo composite 3D printing tech launches on IndiegogoTom's Guide: This $4,500 carbon-fiber electric scooter hits a scary 45 miles per hourVelobiz: Flaggschiff E-Scooter mit exklusiven SpezifikationenWelt: Der Roller aus dem 3D Drucker Scotsman E-ScooterZarabaza: Scotsman: il primo monopattino elettrico in fibra di carbonio stampato in 3Dand more..... More Specs for You Perks Japanese EditionGiven the interest we've seen in Japan for electric scooters, we made a special Japanese Edition for the Scotsman with lights, reflectors, blinkers, rearview mirrors, and a license plate to ensure legal compliance in Japan.This edition is an upgrade option for all products and only available for Japanese backers - simply choose this perk as you check out.  Timeline Team

story:
Since 2010, EUNORAU E-MOBILITY USA has been manufacturing electric bicycles and selling them internationally. With over 130 employees and multiple warehouses and solid supply chains. The brand specializes in producing premium quality eBikes and kits and sells primarily through e-commerce channels and wholesale networks. The brand commits an annual output of 50,000 units including ebike kits, ebikes, and other related components. With more than ten years of experience in the e-bike industry, EUNORAU has achieved 289 customized project goals and is going to the public in the next few years.

The DEFENDER S is the Project to Help more people get a quality electric bike at 

a reasonable Price and Spread the EUNORAU brand Anywhere in the World&

We need your Support!

After Visit 45 Countries' Customers, CEO Kevin Fang states: “Our objective is to change people’s way of transportation and contribute our effort on environmental sustainability.” 

 

Las Vegas Office Introduce By Amy

 

Delivery Guaranteed

 

Your contribution with us is a  guaranteed purchase, That means if you order a bike with us, you will get the bike, guaranteed. Don't just take our word for it though, check out what these satisfied riders have already sent in!

 

 

 

"1st ride! Love it! 33° with a 16 mile an hour wind, chili! Plenty of power and speed! Great traction in the snow! Lots of fun!"-Jimmy Jameson

 

 

"I love my EUNORAU eBike so much! We’ve been doing laps around Lake Hollywood lately and the weather couldn’t be better for it! I saw a couple of bikes from other manufacturers and I was definitely feeling an e-bike superiority complex! (You may have to zoom in to see the Hollywood sign over my right shoulder!)"-Axel Shalson

 

100000+ Happy Customers All Over The World

 


It's Dual Motor——Go Anywhere

This 1500 watt electric bike was designed to conquer everything standing in your way. Whether it be difficult trails, changing conditions outdoors, or carrying additional weight, EUNORAU’s DEFENDER S has the power and capability to get you through anything. Especially capable of helping on any hunting trip, our 1500 watt electric bike can easily pull or carry the game back to your vehicle!

 

 

Commute to work, ride mountain trails, or cruise the beach—DEFENDER S takes you anywhere you want to go with ease. 

 

 

Make a Statement

 

This beast of a bike is kitted out the with highest-quality features for maximum performance.

 

Runs up to 2200-watts of peak power with our twin motor, twin battery, and twin suspension design. No other manufacturer in the world offers all these features at this price(1999$). We went to Bafang and had built special front and rear 48V750W motors. Also, this bike has an 18 MOSFET controller that blasts out over 44 amps of power! That’s total peak power of 2200 watts certified!

 

 

 

High quality and fully-spec'd bikes are expensive, and affordable bikes have low-quality materials or poor design. We cut out the middleman and created the coolest affordable eBike that has all the features you want to be packaged in a bold, record-setting-performance design.

 

 

 

More Beautiful. More Range. More Powerful.

 

 

The DEFENDER S has a variety of customizable options, so you can really make it your own. Choose your motor, choose your color, choose your size, and GO.

 

 

1.Choose Your Motor

 

 

 

2.Choose Your Size

 

 

 

3.Choose Your Color

 

 

4.Choose Your Add Ons

Select any add ons you like to take your ride to the next level.

    1.Extra Build-in Battery 48V 17AH

 

 

    2.Second Battery 48V 14AH or 48V 17AH

   3.Extra 3AH Fast Charger

 

 

    4.Fender and Rear rack

   

5.Two Year Extended Warranty

The standard warranty is one year, the warranty is under the INITIAL PURCHASER and the one-year warranty would be started since the initial owner has received it.

 

Let's Go!!

 

 

Stretch Goals

 

As the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked for you to purchase. So share with your friends to keep the new releases coming!

 

$500K: Team EUNORAU Shirt

 

The most requested stretch goal so far. Look for this item in the perks section and show your EUNORAU spirit!

 

$1M:Team EUNORAU Shirt and EUNORAU Bicycle Bags

 

The EUNORAU Bicycle Bag universal to use. Suitable for road vehicles, mountain bikes, bicycles, etc.Independent department and large capacity. You can put your clothes, mobile phone, and other outdoor products separately. Which is easy to find out

 

$2M: Free Upgrade of the Built-in Battery from 14Ah to 17Ah and One EUNORAU Z1

 

This battery from EUNORAU with original SAMSUNG 35E cells.It generates 816 Wh of battery power and gives your DEFENDER S up to 40 Miles of range!+30PC Free 2021 EUNORAU Z1  Selected from All Backers

 

$5M: Free Upgrade Battery to 17AH and One SPECTER-S(1000W M620 With Torque Sensor)

 

Free upgrade of the Built-in battery from 14Ah to 17Ah+30PC Free 2021 EUNORAU Specter S or ST(Value 3800USD/PC) Selected from All Backers

 

Guaranteed Delivery

We have been working hard for the last year to ensure we can guarantee delivery of your EUNORAU eBike.

 

 

BAFANG RECOMMEND EBIKE BRAND

 

 

About Our Team

 

We have a rock-solid track record and we guarantee the shipment of every single bike.

Marketed&Promoted by

Suitable for road vehicles, mountain bikes, bicycles, etc.Independent department and large capacity. You can put your clothes, mobile phone, and other outdoor products separately. Which is easy to find out $2M: Free Upgrade of the Built-in Battery from 14Ah to 17Ah and One EUNORAU Z1 This battery from EUNORAU with original SAMSUNG 35E cells.It generates 816 Wh of battery power and gives your DEFENDER S up to 40 Miles of range!+30PC Free 2021 EUNORAU Z1  Selected from All Backers $5M: Free Upgrade Battery to 17AH and One SPECTER-S(1000W M620 With Torque Sensor) Free upgrade of the Built-in battery from 14Ah to 17Ah+30PC Free 2021 EUNORAU Specter S or ST(Value 3800USD/PC) Selected from All Backers Guaranteed DeliveryWe have been working hard for the last year to ensure we can guarantee delivery of your EUNORAU eBike.  BAFANG RECOMMEND EBIKE BRAND  About Our Team

story:
Hey guys, welcome to our Indiegogo page!

My name is James and I'm the lead designer and founder of Three Phase. 

 

 

For the past 18 months, I've worked tirelessly on creating an E-Bike that I think is going to make a real change. An E-Bike that looks great, rides smoothly, and won't cost you a fortune. With that said, say hello to the Three Phase One.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Whether you’re 5'2 or 6'7 the Three Phase One is designed to suit all shapes and sizes. Plus, it even has a throttle to make it easy for you to just step on and go, perfect for if you don’t want to pedal. The frame is produced from aerospace-grade aluminium too, meaning the bike weighs just 20kg including battery and motor! Oh, and did you spot the concealed in-stem front suspension? Perfect for taking the lumps and bumps out of the city without spoiling the design...

 

 
 
 
 

The Three Phase One features a removable, lockable battery with a fast charger so there's no need to carry the bike upstairs. And if you feel like pushing yourself then you don’t even have to turn the power on as it functions perfectly without it. And by the way, all electrical parts are waterproof rated too. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Check out this great review we got from our friends at digitalphat:

 

Check out our friends from Tommy's Tech Review (German):

 
 
 
 

 

You’re probably thinking “yeah it looks nice, but what makes it better than the rest?”

Well, the Three Phase One comes equipped with leading components (like Shimano gears, Tektro brakes and a Samsung battery) along with innovative technology meaning, you’ll be cycling smoother, going further, stopping faster, and turning more heads, all whilst looking awesome. Check out the features below... 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Rather than messing around with stretch goals (like a lot of other products on Indiegogo), we’re giving you it all at once. Yep, you read that right.  When you buy a Three Phase One, you’ll get the same industry-leading components as everyone else, whether you buy right at the beginning, or a little later.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you want the more hipster look, simply take the mudguards, lights and rear carrier off and WHAM! You got yourself a matte black, slick rick racing machine.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We’re offering two versions of the Three Phase One, the base and the boost model.

Both come with the same sleek design and core features, but the boost model comes with some extra perks that make it perfect for those looking for something with a little more oomph. See their specs below.

 

 

Enhanced LCD Display on Boost Model

 

 

 

 

 

The Three Phase One comes in either black or white, but why?

Reduced colours mean quicker production, quicker logistics and quicker deliveries, so you’ll get your bike sooner - plus reduced carbon emissions. It’s a win-win.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We love cycling and we love the environment! That’s why we've teamed up with ONE TREE PLANTED to plant one tree for each bike sold. 

Carbon emissions could be reduced by 12 percent if just 15 percent of urban transportation miles travelled were instead made by e-bike.*

*Transportation Research Part D: Transport and Environment

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Production Has Begun

We didn't want the Lunar New Year's celebrations to slow us down, so we fired up the assembly lines early and have already begun our first production line. 

 

 

 

 

You’ll be glad to know we’re not amateurs, but a keen bunch of cyclists looking to make a change to the E-Bike game. We know what it’s like out there, we’ve lived it, breathed it and decided that it wasn’t good enough, on top of that, our founder James has 15 years in the cycle industry, so it’s safe to say we know our sprockets from our disc brakes.

Our vision is to increase the number of cycle journeys world-wide. We all know cycling reduces carbon emissions and E-bikes enable the cyclist to travel that extra mile that could have been a car journey. Plus, two wheels are better than four!

 

 

 

Designed and powered by Agency 2.0, the first crowdfunding agency in history. Launch with us today!
