Unprecedented impact resistance in a frame with a weight close to other high end carbon fiber bikes. There’s just one thingYes, really. True unibody design. No glue, no joints, no bolts. Just continuous carbon fiber composite that won’t splinter and construction that won’t fail. Our proprietary composite 3D-printing manufacturing technology fabricates industry-strength unibody carbon fiber frames stronger than Kevlar and lighter than 2 bottles of water. Unquestionably CustomIf a unibody bike frame that is made to accommodate your down body frame sounds too good to be true, it was. Once the campaign ends, we will move into Indiegogo In-Demand with Retail Price.    Have any questions? Check out our FAQ tab.

story:
Two years ago, we launched LEFEET S1: A Powerful & Compact water Scooter. In doing so we became the first brand in the world to develop and produce a modular underwater scooter. And now we are back with an even more powerful water scooter -- LEFEET C1.

Featuring Classic, Kickboard & Pool Float Mode, LEFEET C1 is a modular, transformable, multifunctional water scooter, which allows an entire family to enjoy aquatic activities without sacrificing its professional functions to explore the ocean. Whether you’re an experienced swimmer or a beginner, you can enjoy a superior water experience.

Over the years we have reviewers all over the world who reviewed our product, the LEFEET S1.

Here is a video demonstrating the powerful thruster of the LEFEET C1.

With a weight of only 2.7kg, LEFEET C1 is lighter than ever before, which means you can take it with you anywhere. Despite its portability, the LEFEET C1 packs a lot of power thanks to that efficient BLDC motor.

LEFEET C1 has two speed gears that allow you to go as slow as 1.3m/s or as fast as 1.6m/s under water up to 30 meters. Choose the gear that fits your preferences the most in different environments.

Featuring dual 200W motors, LEFEET C1 offers a powerful thrust underwater. Its compact and modular design bring excellent user experience, and the dual-motor is stable and easy to operate.Thanks to its powerful dual-motor, now you can feel the massive thrust of the LEFEET C1 both underwater and on the water. Unlock your water adventure now with the LEFEET C1.The Posstive buoyancy of the LEFEET C1 it perfect for you or your family to learn how to swim, or simply just hanging at the pool, giving you limitless options for water entertainment.

Thanks to the built-in camera mount, you can attach your GoPro to LEFEET C1, and start regarding your most thrilling water activities. With the max depth of 30m underwater, this is your go-to water scooter!What’s more, you can control your LEFEET C1 wirelessly, making it even better for any type of aquatic activities. Whether it’s at home, in the pool, and out at sea — LEFEET C1 is your ideal companion. 

LEFEET C1 is made out of space grade materials, which gives it an unprecedented endurance and life expectancy. With its ultra endurance, aquatic activities have never been more fun and exciting!The LEFEET C1 features an unique Ergonomic Grip Design, which gives you limitless opportunities underwater

LEFEET C1 is also compliant with airline regulations, bring it anywhere with you and start your own adventures without breaking a sweat.

Check out the TSA standard here, and you are safe to fly with LEFEET C1's battery.

LEFEET is an innovative technology company focused on researching and developing aquatic products. The founder and development team members have strong design and technological backgrounds, as they all used to work in top technology companies. The team is committed to grounding every product on advanced technology and unique design concepts, enriching user experience and making water sports more interesting.

story:
`Hey Friends, if you need to change anything at all to your pledge or have any Qs, please email: INFO@UNGOVERNED.COM.AU and we'll sort that straight up!
Product 1: The UNGOVERNED VENDETTA "BLACK"


Product 2: The UNGOVERNED VENDETTA "GOLD"

"Gold" includes lighting below:





















The Ungoverned Vendetta unlocks landscapes that were are un reachable on other platforms. Compact, robust & lightweight, the Ungoverned Vendetta has been engineered without compromise.

Designed and built on arguably the worlds toughest island (Australia) this little ripper knows harsh terrain better than any other.
Below, rider is highlighting just how rugged the ground is out here with sharp stones everywhere yet the Vendetta glides smoothly over them thanks to puncture proof tracks.


...A victorious traverse over many a sharp stone




-Top speed 50kms/hr (31miles/hr)
-Weighs 19.5 kilograms
-Swappable central battery pack (no down time)
       
I know right! Thought that would get you amped up.

WHAT & WHERE?
I design and build high-end, off-road electric vehicles for board riders, right here in my garage in a little town on the Coffs Coast of Australia. You should drop by!

WHO AM I?
My name is Dan, I am a carpenter, I was an FX technician in film and always will be a surfer, skater, snowboarder. I am also a Dad, Hubby & the Inventor/Founder of Ungoverned Pty Ltd.

I have been designing these vehicles since the previous century but, 18 months ago I made an EPIC breakthrough, both in the chemistry of my tracks which I mould myself, along with other intellectual property surrounding the vehicle's geometry and as a result, the Ungoverned Vendetta is proving itself unstoppable.


Now generating a tonne of interest, not only locally but also from the US, NZ, Canada, Russia, Sweden & more!
Crazy right, I know, and I must now take the leap from prototype to bar-code.
So I am first building a small run of just 10 vehicles to assist perfecting the engineering.

WHY THIS WILL WORK & HOW I WILL DELIVER
I think humble steps are important at this stage, it would be product suicide to attempt to deliver hundreds internationally today. 
Just a little while back I sold my first vehicle and instantly realised I had a pretty good market fit:

...So, now happy with the core design, I am fine tuning all aspects of the vehicles to make them lighter, faster, stronger and more affordable right here in Australia prior to servicing OS markets and I would LOVE for YOU to be a part of this development!

By Christmas Eve, I will be delivering a limited number of vehicles ONLY 10 based on your support I receive here.

How NOT to miss out:

GOLD OPTION, 10 VEHICLES AVAILABLE, minimum pledge $6995.00 AUD
These 10 vehicles are being auctioned to the highest bidders with a starting pledge of $6995.00.




We want to hit $69,995.00 with this campaign,

SPECIFICATIONS & FEATURES
I will be supplying your vehicle as depicted in the attached video/photographs or a very close representation to this.





-240V battery charger, you remove your battery from the vehicle, place it on/in/connect to the charger, charge time is 8 hrs yet I am working on a 4hr fast charger because why wait? Right.
Hey, if you are off the grid and need a DC charger, no prob, that is also available!

-A much lower centre of gravity than my previous vehicles.

-An increased ground signature yet reduced frictional elements within the tracks.

-4 x times the surface drive area of a motor cross bike, but just 20% of it’s weight.

-2 x track drive with variable front-to-rear traction control.

-Fast change/swap-out of central battery pack. Reputable & reliable Lithium Ion batteries!!!

-100% waterproof wireless controller, vehicle is splash proof and soon hose-able.

-Centrally mounted internal drive brushless hub motors within the drive rollers (also proudly designed in house).

-Convenient drop-and-charge wireless charger for the controller.



ABOVE These were the first lighting tests in Ungoverned's workshop.
 ​
 

WHO ARE YOU?
Some of you may want to go on casual rides, some of you may want to race and some may just want to have our vehicle sit in a display case where you can admire it.
What ever you're thinking, do think out loud, please tell us, you can comment here or on any of our social media.
Where will Ungoverned take you?




 

RISKS & CHALLENGES
I want to be completely up front with you, to pull off a project of this nature will require backers that understand there is some risk here. The main risk being that vehicle performance may not be spot on what we hope for at first iteration, but we must also recognise that for every challenge there is a solution.

I am not afraid of a challenge.

...Are you?

Cool, secure your vehicle

I hope it is you that I am lucky enough to meet before Christmas!

If you have any questions feel free to call me directly.
BTW, don't think for a second that I am not interested in you. Perhaps you are in Manufacturing? Sports? Events? Film? Tours? Advertising? Startups? Co-founding? Acquisitions? Everything is on the table here, nothing is impossible. So reach out, I may just say yes!

Thanks and Best Regards,
Dan Baldwin
info@ungoverned.com.au
Ungoverned Pty Ltd
story_txt:
`Hey Friends, if you need to change anything at all to your pledge or have any Qs, please email: INFO@UNGOVERNED.COM.AU and we'll sort that straight up!Product 1: The UNGOVERNED VENDETTA "BLACK"Product 2: The UNGOVERNED VENDETTA "GOLD""Gold" includes lighting below:The Ungoverned Vendetta unlocks landscapes that were are un reachable on other platforms. Compact, robust & lightweight, the Ungoverned Vendetta has been engineered without compromise.Designed and built on arguably the worlds toughest island (Australia) this little ripper knows harsh terrain better than any other.Below, rider is highlighting just how rugged the ground is out here with sharp stones everywhere yet the Vendetta glides smoothly over them thanks to puncture proof tracks....A victorious traverse over many a sharp stone-Top speed 50kms/hr (31miles/hr)-Weighs 19.5 kilograms-Swappable central battery pack (no down time)       I know right! Thought that would get you amped up.WHAT & WHERE?I design and build high-end, off-road electric vehicles for board riders, right here in my garage in a little town on the Coffs Coast of Australia. You should drop by!WHO AM I?My name is Dan, I am a carpenter, I was an FX technician in film and always will be a surfer, skater, snowboarder. I am also a Dad, Hubby & the Inventor/Founder of Ungoverned Pty Ltd.I have been designing these vehicles since the previous century but, 18 months ago I made an EPIC breakthrough, both in the chemistry of my tracks which I mould myself, along with other intellectual property surrounding the vehicle's geometry and as a result, the Ungoverned Vendetta is proving itself unstoppable.Now generating a tonne of interest, not only locally but also from the US, NZ, Canada, Russia, Sweden & more!Crazy right, I know, and I must now take the leap from prototype to bar-code.So I am first building a small run of just 10 vehicles to assist perfecting the engineering.WHY THIS WILL WORK & HOW I WILL DELIVERI think humble steps are important at this stage, it would be product suicide to attempt to deliver hundreds internationally today. Just a little while back I sold my first vehicle and instantly realised I had a pretty good market fit:

...So, now happy with the core design, I am fine tuning all aspects of the vehicles to make them lighter, faster, stronger and more affordable right here in Australia prior to servicing OS markets and I would LOVE for YOU to be a part of this development!By Christmas Eve, I will be delivering a limited number of vehicles ONLY 10 based on your support I receive here.How NOT to miss out:GOLD OPTION, 10 VEHICLES AVAILABLE, minimum pledge $6995.00 AUDThese 10 vehicles are being auctioned to the highest bidders with a starting pledge of $6995.00.
We want to hit $69,995.00 with this campaign,SPECIFICATIONS & FEATURESI will be supplying your vehicle as depicted in the attached video/photographs or a very close representation to this.

-240V battery charger, you remove your battery from the vehicle, place it on/in/connect to the charger, charge time is 8 hrs yet I am working on a 4hr fast charger because why wait? Right.Hey, if you are off the grid and need a DC charger, no prob, that is also available!
-A much lower centre of gravity than my previous vehicles.
-An increased ground signature yet reduced frictional elements within the tracks.
-4 x times the surface drive area of a motor cross bike, but just 20% of it’s weight.
-2 x track drive with variable front-to-rear traction control.
-Fast change/swap-out of central battery pack. Reputable & reliable Lithium Ion batteries!!!
-100% waterproof wireless controller, vehicle is splash proof and soon hose-able.
-Centrally mounted internal drive brushless hub motors within the drive rollers (also proudly designed in house).
-Convenient drop-and-charge wireless charger for the controller.
ABOVE These were the first lighting tests in Ungoverned's workshop. ​ 
WHO ARE YOU?Some of you may want to go on casual rides, some of you may want to race and some may just want to have our vehicle sit in a display case where you can admire it.What ever you're thinking, do think out loud, please tell us, you can comment here or on any of our social media.Where will Ungoverned take you? 
RISKS & CHALLENGESI want to be completely up front with you, to pull off a project of this nature will require backers that understand there is some risk here. The main risk being that vehicle performance may not be spot on what we hope for at first iteration, but we must also recognise that for every challenge there is a solution.I am not afraid of a challenge....Are you?
Cool, secure your vehicleI hope it is you that I am lucky enough to meet before Christmas!If you have any questions feel free to call me directly.BTW, don't think for a second that I am not interested in you. Perhaps you are in Manufacturing? Sports? Events? Film? Tours? Advertising? Startups? Co-founding? Acquisitions? Everything is on the table here, nothing is impossible. So reach out, I may just say yes!Thanks and Best Regards,Dan Baldwininfo@ungoverned.com.auUngoverned Pty Ltd

story:
​

 

Tired of dealing with clunky vehicles, traffic jams, and public transportation? 

It’s time to ride in style with a bike that has it all. 

Tell your old run-of-the-mill bike to move aside, because the powerful HIMO Z20 is here. 

 

Dynamic Dual Mode Cycling - HIMO Z20 is optimally designed for both electric and manual cycling – and everything in between. Equipped with a casual riding Cool Mode and a quick & sporty Dynamic Mode – HIMO Z20’s dual modes can easily be switched between with the press of a button according to your riding preferences. It’s up to you to decide how much force to exert on HIMO Z20’s pedals and throttle, which determines acceleration and power.  

Going for a leisurely ride through the park? Switch on Cool Mode and apply a bit of electric acceleration to aid your pedaling for a carefree joyride. 

Want to feel the thrill of maximum riding energy? Switch to Dynamic Mode to reach top speeds and new horizons. 

Ride your own way. 

 

Transportable, versatile, & sleek - HIMO Z20’s deliberate compact design allows for easy folding, storage, and transportability. Z20’s innovative built-in battery box is closely connected to the body for space-efficiency, while its lightweight aluminum frame perfectly matches its inner wirings to create an elegant visage. Don't want to leave the battery in the bike? No worries, the Z20 comes with a dedicated key for the battery so you charge it wherever you want!

Highly sensitive, precise controls – HIMO Z20 is equipped with a meticulously designed intelligence center. Its interconnected vector control system analyzes vehicle information and provides users with real-time feedback, enabling efficient use and control of the kinetic energy produced while riding. 

HIMO Z20’s smart control system promotes efficient movement for an extraordinarily powerful riding experience. 

Integrated in-seat air pump – Ever found yourself with a flat tire at the worst possible time? HIMO Z20’s in-seat air pump travels everywhere with you, so your tires will always be in tip-top shape. 

 

Incredibly lightweight & compact – HIMO Z20 folds in three places and only takes about 10 seconds to fold and unfold. It can easily be stored in a car trunk, taken in elevators, offices, etc. 

 

Simple three-step folding: Just unlatch the Z20's easy lock system on the frame and handle bar stem and you're ready to go!

Patented aluminum frame – E-biking is now breezier than ever before thanks to HIMO Z20’s modern aerodynamic frame. Our exclusive patented frame underwent extensive road-friendliness testing and received a 3C safety rating. HIMO Z20’s aluminum frame is ergonomically designed to be both lightweight and durable for increased riding efficiency, mobility, and safety. 

 

HIMO Z20 is equipped with a Shimano 6-speed Transmission System for fast and reliable gear adjustment. Select the best gear for the job and experience Z20’s light, effortless riding. 

 

HIMO Z20’s advanced High-efficiency DC Brushless Motor is powerful enough to ride completely pedal-free if you so choose, but also dynamic enough to enable a variety of riding options! Each acceleration level is a unique travel experience. The rear-hub motor provides the traction you need no matter the environment. With the slick yet grippy tires, the Z20 will really take you wherever you want to go, however you want to get there!

 

Thanks to HIMO Z20’s Flexible, Powerful 10Ah Lithium Battery, you will be well equipped for both long excursions and vigorous fast-paced circuits. The battery is equipped with 10Ah of power for lasting energy output and the ability to ride 50miles/80km on one charge. Travel freely from the city to the countryside and beyond.

 

HIMO Z20’s Protective Battery Management System accurately calculates power and comprehensively monitors important functions such as current, voltage, and temperature. Through the heat of Summer and severe Winters, HIMO Z20 provides sustained power regardless of environmental conditions. 

 

HIMO Z20’s Intelligent vector control system functions as the vehicle’s “brain” – containing multiple interconnected parts that send signals to communicate valuable information. This real-time data collection helps provide the user with feedback that optimizes Z20 riding. 

 

HIMO Z20’s Crystal Clear Display conveys useful riding data to help users navigate and ride more efficiently. We’ve extensively tested, refined, and calibrated our Real-time Performance Analysis system to create a more personalized e-biking experience. Z20’s intuitive interface enables swift navigation and switching between gears and modes for a more enjoyable e-ride. 

 

The HD display is readily equipped to handle the harshest of weather conditions! HIMO Z20’s monitor has received an IPX7 waterproof rating for outstanding resistance to the elements. 

 

Shanghai HIMO Electric Technology specializes in the research, development and production of two-wheeled electric vehicles! We strive to provide the best comprehensive digital solutions for green, urban mobility. Our aim is to give people a smart and convenient way of getting around, all while having more fun!

With a rise in consumers needs, HIMO has been at the forefront of leading the vast tech and digital solutions that are allowing us to create limitless opportunities. We’re committed to setting the trend in smart, eco-friendly vehicles, and to be the leading brand in the two-wheeler vehicle industry! 

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

 

What is the warranty and after sales service for HIMO Z20?

 

18 Months Battery Warranty; Controller, main wiring harness, frame charger: 12 months warranty; Instrument, headlamp, rotating brake handle, 6 months warranty; Fragile parts, artificial reasons do not include the scope of warranty

 

How's the battery life? How is it guaranteed?

 

1500 charge times + original warranty 18 months, 3 years battery life.

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

 

we cover all additional taxes, duties or VAT  for US and EU , you only need pay for shipping fee.

story:
Bad Bike, one of the most innovative brands in the Italian urban micro mobility sector and one of the first to introduce FOLDING e-bike with 10x4,00” Fat tires, is proud to present in worldwide preview, the MIG, a FOLDING e-scooter equipped with 10x4,00” TUBELESS FAT tires.

 

After an intense research, design and production, we are finally ready to launch on this platform one of the most high-performance, comfortable and safe e-scooter on the market.

 

MIG has been designed to improve your urban mobility needs while respecting the environment and a more sustainable world.

Whether you are a professional, a student, a sportsman, with MIG you can forget city stress.


The specific configuration of the motor and the battery, the frame, the platform
and the FAT tubeless tires features, make the MIG one of the best micro-urban
mobility solution to face even the most arduous climbs and the
roughest roads and to move in fully freedom and autonomy.

 

 

The majority of e-scooters owners deals with the problems of battery life and the resulting limited mileage; MIG solves this problem thanks to a 48V Samsung battery that will allow you to effortlessly reach long distances (40km).

Moreover, thanks to the simple and intuitive removable battery system you can recharge it wherever you want, while you are at work or at the bar with friends, you just need the practical adapter included!

 

READY TO GO?

 

 

MIG is equipped with a very simple and intuitive folding system. Just 2 moves and you're done! It’s ideal for people who are always on the move. Thanks to its low weight -17,5 including battery- you can take it everywhere without any effort! 

 

 

Finding yourself facing bumpy roads seems hard? We at Bad Bike want to make your ride more comfortable and safer, so we have developed for the MIG 10x4.00” tubeless tires with vibration absorption system to make your ride STABLE, SAFE and FLUID even on bumps and bad roads.

Thanks to its ergonomic footboard made of the best non-slip materials, it guarantees safety with any kind of shoe and in the rain. In addition, its width allows greater stability on all kinds of ground. 

 

MIG is equipped with an extensive lighting system that includes a high-brightness LED front light, green LED lights positioned under the footboard for optimal visibility of the road surface and a rear light that increases in intensity in case of braking, to ensure greater safety during all hours of the day.

 

You will never be tired again thanks to our steady, lightweight, practical e-scooter, MIG!

MIG is covered by a 2 years warranty on all electrical and mechanical parts. To register your MIG and get your warranty follow the instructions on the compliments supplied with the MIG and register your scooter!

Since the beginning, Bad Bike has always stood out for its ability to combine high quality products and cutting-edge technologies to ensure a truly sustainable mobility that can improve people's quality of life.

In line with this approach, Bad Bike has launched several items such as Bad, the first folding e-bike with FAT wheels or Beach Vintage FAT, the first e-bike with a sidecar, which have become over time true icons of style, design and innovation such that it is among the most imitated products in the world. 

In line with Bad Bike style, we decided to take on a new challenge today by presenting, exclusively and as a world premiere, on Indiegogo, the most important crowdfunding platform for tech products at the international level, MIG BAD BIKE, an innovative made in Italy electric folding e-scooter with FAT wheels.

 

Our MIG will be shipped with all the necessary precautions so that the product will not be damaged; the package will contain: 

1x MIG BAD BIKE 

1x CHARGER 

1x Compliments with useful information 

NB: OUR MIG DOES NOT PROVIDE: 

1. FOR GERMANY: NO ABE CERTIFICATION WILL BE ISSUED 

2. FOR THE NETHERLANDS: NO DOUBLE BRAKING SYSTEM NOR FRONT AND REAR DIRECTION INDICATORS.

3.SHIPPING TO THE USA MAY TAKE LONGER

story:
Lightest is the most advanced and light ebike kit to give superpowers to your bike, quickly.

It's designed for high performance and for longevity.  The system can be installed on any bike adding approx. 4 Kg - 8 lbs ( including the battery) . 

 

Since our last crowdfunding campaign in 2017,  we've delivered the BEST ebike kit to thousands backers, which greatly appreciated our systems for their staggering torque and impressive power.  

We were also frequently asked for a lighter and low cost kit. Since we don't like compromises, we accepted the challenge of designing a high performance and light ebike drive, which is super affordable. And, of course, we wanted to manufacture it in Italy. 

The result is a state-of-the-art ebike drive system, smart, with industrial design, giving you high performance and a perfect integration with your bike.

We're super excited to announce that we're ready to bring this high-tech beauty out to you.

 

Bikee Bike's team is well known for high-end and high-performance ebike motors. The first product is called BEST and it's recognized for its high torque and power.  We worked to deliver the highest quality components combined with the latest IoT technologies. During the years, we've been able to develop a reliable electronics which connects our system with your phone, so that you can adjust the system parameters and eventually lock the system as antitheft prevention. 

Since 2017, Bikee Bike has manufactured thousands of ebike kits and now has developed a cutting edge product to revolutionize the ebike market.  

Matteo, the founder, has been a former engineer in a US corporation, which was specialized in designing and manufacturing custom electric motors. During his 6 years of activity there, he managed more than 80 projects of different electric motors, from customer specifications to mass production, for a wide variety of applications.  In the last years, he decided to focus on electric mobility since there was a market gap for a rising sector: in those years he developed with his team, among the other projects, a 60kW drivetrain for electric vans, and a 4kW drivetrain for electric mopeds . That's when he left the company to start his own engineering consultancy firm. That was dedicated to support the entrepreneurs who wanted to develop their own electric vehicles.

In those years, one of his friends in the ebike sector challenged him to design an ebike drivetrain with superior torque: that's when the BEST ebike kit was initially conceived. After the first publications of the project, some investors contacted Matteo for financially supporting the development of the BEST kit. It was the 2014: that's when Bikee Bike was born,

In 2016 Bikee Bike got recognition from FORD Motor Company, getting a prize of 50'000 USD as best automotive startup in a worldwide challenge.  In the below video, the CEO of FORD, Mark Fields, chats with Matteo at CES 2016, announcing the award. That's what really kicked off the journey of Bikee Bike.

Mark Fields, CEO of Ford Motor Company, announcing the award to Bikee Bike for the BEST ebike system in 2016 at the Consumer Electronic Show of Las Vegas.

 

Bikee Bike drive systems are proudly designed, developed and manufactured in Mantua, Italy. 

Light... well the Lightest

The Drive Unit only weights 1.6Kg (3.5 lbs). It's the lightest electric bicycle mid drive motor on the market. That's the weight of a bottle of water. That's awesome because you keep your bike agile in the trails, you can carry your bike with less effort on the stairs. or while loading it on your car... Or simply when you decide you want to pedal without assistance for a bit!


 

High Performing

Don't trade off performance for lightness: you can have them all. Power up to 1000W, equivalent torque* in excess of 90Nm (66 ft/lb).  Result: a 1.6Kg motor can tow a van ( see the following video).

 

 

Mid Drive Motor

Mid drive motors are superiors comparing to hub motors because can take advantage of your bike shifter. That allows them to deliver more torque at the wheel (depending on the gear) and, for that reason, they're more efficient uphill. Just as you, pedaling with the right gear.

 

Silent

In this video you can appreciate the motor sound during operation. We left the raw footage so that you can compare the sound of the rope against the wheel with the motor sound.
 

 

 

Torque sensor for a natural feel

Direct torque sensing system gives you true feeling of the bike, making the ride a very natural experience.


Smartphone connected 

You can connect your system with your smartphone with two different configurations: standard ( see display section) and Superhero ( see Superhero app section).  The standard version allows you to visualize and control the assistance with your Heart Rate. The Superhero will unlock a world of possibilities. 

 

Outstanding Ground Clearance

Improved capability of overcoming obstacles without damaging the motor.

 

Heart Sensor Assist

With the HRM feature, just set the BPM you'd like to keep and the assistance level will be adjusted automatically to keep that on track. See video in the display section. 

 

And much more!

 

 

 

Affordable
The launch price is 499 Euro (549 USD) for the complete kit with the 250Wh battery. That is an amazing price for a real mid drive system which is Made in Italy. 

Extremely Compact
Overall dimensions are 85x90x128mm (3,3 x 3,5 x 5 inch); That allows a clean installation on your bike for a motor that fits in one hand.

 

Retrofit kit or OEM component
You can install the Lightest e-bike Drive Unit on your existing bike to make it electric.

Otherwise, if you own a bike company, you can create a custom frame for seamless integration. We can provide adapting plates to match the motor with existing OEM frames made for the most common ebike motor brands.

 

Durable
In order to get such a weight reduction, we use premium components. Aluminum alloy shields with extra-large cooling fins for optimal heat dissipation, case hardened steel gears, premium silicone steel to name a few.

 

Quick Release 

Take the motor off in just 5 minutes: only two bolts lock the motor in place. Use your motor when you feel it and take it down when you want to. With two sets of mounting plates you can power alternatively two bikes. If you use two chain quick links, you'll do it even better!

Independent drive pinion
Gives you the opportunity to have different transmission ratios between human power and motor power. In addition the inner freewheel will give you ZERO DRAG when OFF.

 

Perfect chainline
Keep the same chainline as on your original bike. You won't have any problem with bad alignment or chain that falls off.

 

 

 

Easy and quick installation
Converts your bike into a pedal-assisted bicycle in few minutes. 

Wide Battery choice
Pick the battery you deserve! They are ranging from 250Wh up to 840Wh, from 30 up to 180km (from 19 to 112 miles) and are made with premium Samsung cells.

You can choose between different configurations: bottle battery, rear rack or backpack!

See the dedicated section below for details. After selecting a perk, you can upgrade your battery in the checkout section.

Anti-theft Lock
(Superhero version only)
You can lock your system with your smartphone so that it will be useless if stolen. Your unique PIN number will make you the only one to control it.

 

KERS - regen braking
(on request)
The system will be able to use the braking energy to charge the battery. This will be possible only with fixed gear on internally geared hubs. 

 

Included Components

Motor only perks:

  1. Lightest Motor with high efficiency sinewave controller;
  2. LCD Display;
  3. Crankarms and Chainring;
  4. Crankarms' locking screws;
  5. Motor mounting plates;
  6. Long screws and nuts;
  7. Spacers;
  8. Battery support locking screws;
  9. Wheel sensors and wheel magnet;

Complete kits include the above and:

   10. Battery with genuine premium Samsung cells;

   11. Battery mount with connector;

   12. Gummy frame protection for the battery; 

   13. Battery locking keys

   14. Battery Charger ( power depending on the battery size). 

Tools not included into the perks, but necessary to perform the installation:

15. Allen Wrench
16. Allen Keys' Set
17. Bottom Bracket remover
18. Crank remover

 

 

Lightest system can be considered as universally compatible with four different installation options. It fits to road bikes, city bikes, MTBs , Fat bikes, cruisers and much more. 

IMPORTANT: At the end of the campaign we'll send you a survey to ask your bike details so to send you the matching accessories . So you'll choose the adapter plates, spacers (for standard BB, 73mm, 83mm or Fat bike BB) as a second step. You'll be also able to select additional accessories ( for instance if you got a Couple kit Perk and you want the Superhero version on both, you'll be able to ask for the second one in that survey.

 

 

This configuration is perfect for most of bikes: city bikes, front MTBs, full suspension MTB with straight downtube, gravel bikes.

The drive unit is mounted below the downtube, the mounting plates integrate the chain guide. The torque-sensing feature is preserved and there will only be one chain on the bike.

You can download the drawing of this configuration: by printing the image in 1:1 scale ( please refer to the dimension indication on the drawing to verify the scale) you can check whether this configuration works with your bike. Download the drawing here.

 

 

This configuration is indicated when your frame doesn't allow you to use the Standard Mount or when you want to have a double chainring. 

The drive unit is mounted below the downtube, the mounting plates are very short.

The torque-sensing feature is not active and there will be two chains on the bike: the first chain for transmitting the power from the motor to the crank, the second one for transmitting the power from the crank to the wheel. Because of that, you can mount three chainrings and dedicate two of them to the crank-to-wheel transmission. 

You can download the drawing of this configuration: by printing the image in 1:1 scale ( please refer to the dimension indication on the drawing to verify the scale) you can check whether this configuration works with your bike. Download the drawing here.

 

 

This configuration is indicated on full suspension MTBs with curved downtube.

The drive unit is mounted below the downtube, the mounting plates are long to preserve the ground clearance, even in curved frames, and are integrating the chain guide. The torque sensing feature is preserved and there will only be one chain on the bike.

You can download the drawing of this configuration: by printing the image in 1:1 scale ( please refer to the dimension indication on the drawing to verify the scale) you can check whether this configuration works with your bike. Download the drawings here ( part 1) and here ( part 2).

 

When you have enough room in your frame and you want to take ground clearance and motor protection to the next level, then that configuration is perfect for you. 

You can download the drawing of this configuration: by printing the image in 1:1 scale ( please refer to the dimension indication on the drawing to verify the scale) you can check whether this configuration works with your bike. Download the drawings here 

 

Five configurations to get exactly what you need to give superpowers to your standard bike, whatever it is. 

*Equivalent torque gives you the opportunity to compare the Lightest torque with conventional ebike motors, which have their output at the bike's bottom bracket. Equivalent torque is the torque that a conventional ebike motor should exert at the bottom bracket in order to get the same wheel torque as the Lightest system. Not enough clear? Check the further explanation. 

*Average Battery Range is estimated on flat and paved ground, on a mountain bike with a 70kg (154lbs) rider and assistance from the motor around 200W. 

*EARLY BIRD PRICES are limited to 50 units per each perk. After those 50 units will be purchased, please select the standard version.


Lightest complete kit also includes a Li-ion Battery with genuine Samsung cells. We coupled different batteries with the four power versions of the kit, but it's also possible to receive only the motor and its mounting accessories, without battery. 
Here the standard combos: 

• Lightest motor 250W + 250Wh (5.2Ah) 
• Lightest motor 500W + 550Wh (11.6Ah)
• Lightest motor 750W + 670Wh (14Ah)
• Lightest motor 1000W + 840Wh (17.5Ah)

After the perk's selection, you will have the opportunity to ask for a battery upgrade. The price is in the below chart,  right after the batteries' descriptions. 

 

Four battery types for all requirements

 

None of the above batteries fits your bike? We have the Backpack option for you.

Don't worry we have the backpack option as well. You can select that in the accessory selection of the checkout page. Backpack option is a cable extender that can connect your Lightest Unit with one of the above battery packs. In the middle of it, there's a magnetic connector, which detaches when pulled more than 2 kg ( 4 lbs ). See in the Accessory section below.

 

 

Need a battery upgrade for Lightest complete kit?

Yes, of course!

The chart below shows the additional fee to upgrade your standard kit. In the vertical column you'll see the battery which comes as standard with your kit, in the horizontal lines you'll see the price for the upgrade, basing on the battery you want. See the Accessory section below.

 

One's not enough? Get a second battery pack

( available in the checkout section as add-on)

 

Full Battery Tech Specs

 

Typical e-bike motors exert the torque at the crankset. The motor torque follows the same path as the rider torque through the chain till the final sprocket at the wheel.  If the chainring is larger than the sprocket, then the speed increases and the torque is proportionally reduced and vice-versa. If you're using a rear sprocket which is larger than the chainring then you're increasing the torque at the wheel by lowering its speed. 
That's true also for bikes without a motor: the transmission works the same way. 
When e-bike mid motors made their appearance, someone decided that the motor had to exert its power directly on the crank-set. That implied the need for a consistent reduction from the motor ( which usually spins at 2000/3000 rpm) to the crank-set, that typically spins around 60/90rpm.  So the torque from the motor is greatly increased with a consistent reduction ( 20 or 30 to 1 ) by multiple gears and then, from the crank-set on the torque is decreased by the bike gears.

 

 

So if a top performing e-bike motor has 90Nm of torque at the crank, you'll feel only 30Nm (22 ft/lb) at the wheel if you're using a 36T chainring and a 12T sprocket.
It's the torque at the wheel that counts. You understand that when you face a steep ascent and you shift gear to increase the torque at the wheel. The torque your muscles can exert on the pedals stays the same, just by shifting the gears you increase the torque at the wheel.
Wouldn't be better to avoid that multiplication and then reduction of torque?
As you probably guessed, the answer is YES.

 

 

Some asks themselves: how possibly such a small motor can compete with motors which are double the weight? Well, the answer is that we are not messing around with useless multiplication and reductions.

That allows us to have the same torque at the wheel as a 90Nm motor, but we're getting that torque with a 30Nm motor.

So if you were skeptical about the torque of the Lightest Drive, you were right, the torque is limited to 30Nm (22 ft/lb). But those 30Nm (22 ft/lb) will produce a the same torque at the wheel than a 90Nm (66 ft/lb)  motor. 

Where's the catch?
There no catch. Just we're not multiplying and demultiplying torque in order to match the human rpm at the crank-set.

That's how we've been able to reduce weight to the astonishing record of 1.6Kg (3,5lbs) for the drive unit, while keeping at the same time the same effective torque as top performer ebike motors.

If you'd like to get more than one system, please select one in the campaign page, then in the checkout section you'll be able to add accessories and additional perks as add-ons.

Feel like a Supehero!

The Superhero pack is an optional electronic board which you can get on any Lightest motor: you'll find that option after you'll have selected you perk ( by clicking on the  "GET THIS PERK" button), in the CHECKOUT section. 

This electronic board will be attached to the controller and will communicate with your smartphone by Bluetooth, enabling you to get endless customization parameters..

 

 

 

 

 

Complete your Lightest kit with these useful accessories

After that you'll have selected your perk, in the checkout page you will find all the accessories to create your unique Lightest ebike kit.

 

Regen is available on SuperHero version only. The motor is capable of converting the motion into current feeding the battery, creating a braking force.

In order to achieve that, the chain needs to transmit power to the motor pinion. That is usually prevented by the freewheel on the rear wheel hub. In addition, when regenerating the chain will be tensioned on the lower part rather than the upper one as it usually happens.
That means that in order to achieve Regen you'll have to switch to an internally geared hub with the freewheel locked.

You'll take advantage of the freewheel inside the crankarm so that your pedals won't be dragged by the rear wheel. This will allow you to regenerate when pressing the brakes. Although the motor is capable of generate 10A of current ( 480W at 48V), the amount of energy you can regen depends on the battery you choose: all the batteries have a charging current limit. That's 2A for the 250Wh battery, 5A for the 550Wh and 670Wh batteries and 7A for the 840Wh battery.

In order to calculate how much energy you can regen, consider that 10 minutes of regen ( which can be achieved by going downhill) at 5A will give you 40Wh. That's a 7% recharge on a 550Wh battery.

In order to achieve REGEN, we locked the inner freewheel of the motor: for that reason, you'd feel a drag when pedaling with the motor turned off. Our suggestion to avoid that is to get a little bigger battery to make sure that we'll have a little of charge to get the motor spinning so that there won't be any drag.

We welcome Dealers worldwide to expand Bikee Bike service network. We already have a huge number of requests from people who would like to get their system installed by professionals in both USA, Canada and Europe.

For this purpose, when you're going to place your order for any perk, please drop us a note telling us that you're a dealer and you'd like to work with us. We'll keep that in great account when we'll assign the dealership in your area.

Supporting us at this stage is the first step to join our team,

If you have questions about the conditions, please contact us at info@lightest.bike 

Creating a cutting edge technology always brings risks . We have been facing them for the past years but our expertise and strong team, made us overtook them.

We faced the skeptics who didn’t think what we wanted to do was possible. It always happens when the technology is disruptive. We had our share of satisfaction make them try the finished products and compliment us.

Now the feeling you get riding a bike with our motor, is something not easy to be explained. 

We know in detail all the technologies available and how to implement them in a production line in order to cut costs because of our experience in motor manufacturing.

All the 3D drawings for parts and molds are ready. Suppliers have been selected and tested for quality. All the machineries we will need, already have been negotiated and designed for our specific needs.

All is in place to start manufacturing, all we need is a first batch big enough to keep the initial cost acceptable and to make the downpayment for moulds and toolings.

We are aware that having many different suppliers to work together might be not easy and lead to some production delays. Knowing this and having manufacturing experts in our team, we will try to avoid and anticipate all the possible problems and respect all the deadlines.
story_txt:
Lightest is the most advanced and light ebike kit to give superpowers to your bike, quickly.
It's designed for high performance and for longevity.  The system can be installed on any bike adding approx. 4 Kg - 8 lbs ( including the battery) . 

 
Since our last crowdfunding campaign in 2017,  we've delivered the BEST ebike kit to thousands backers, which greatly appreciated our systems for their staggering torque and impressive power.  
We were also frequently asked for a lighter and low cost kit. Since we don't like compromises, we accepted the challenge of designing a high performance and light ebike drive, which is super affordable. And, of course, we wanted to manufacture it in Italy. 
The result is a state-of-the-art ebike drive system, smart, with industrial design, giving you high performance and a perfect integration with your bike.
We're super excited to announce that we're ready to bring this high-tech beauty out to you.


 

Bikee Bike's team is well known for high-end and high-performance ebike motors. The first product is called BEST and it's recognized for its high torque and power.  We worked to deliver the highest quality components combined with the latest IoT technologies. During the years, we've been able to develop a reliable electronics which connects our system with your phone, so that you can adjust the system parameters and eventually lock the system as antitheft prevention. 
Since 2017, Bikee Bike has manufactured thousands of ebike kits and now has developed a cutting edge product to revolutionize the ebike market.  
Matteo, the founder, has been a former engineer in a US corporation, which was specialized in designing and manufacturing custom electric motors. During his 6 years of activity there, he managed more than 80 projects of different electric motors, from customer specifications to mass production, for a wide variety of applications.  In the last years, he decided to focus on electric mobility since there was a market gap for a rising sector: in those years he developed with his team, among the other projects, a 60kW drivetrain for electric vans, and a 4kW drivetrain for electric mopeds . That's when he left the company to start his own engineering consultancy firm. That was dedicated to support the entrepreneurs who wanted to develop their own electric vehicles.
In those years, one of his friends in the ebike sector challenged him to design an ebike drivetrain with superior torque: that's when the BEST ebike kit was initially conceived. After the first publications of the project, some investors contacted Matteo for financially supporting the development of the BEST kit. It was the 2014: that's when Bikee Bike was born,
In 2016 Bikee Bike got recognition from FORD Motor Company, getting a prize of 50'000 USD as best automotive startup in a worldwide challenge.  In the below video, the CEO of FORD, Mark Fields, chats with Matteo at CES 2016, announcing the award. That's what really kicked off the journey of Bikee Bike.


Mark Fields, CEO of Ford Motor Company, announcing the award to Bikee Bike for the BEST ebike system in 2016 at the Consumer Electronic Show of Las Vegas.
 

Bikee Bike drive systems are proudly designed, developed and manufactured in Mantua, Italy. 



Light... well the Lightest
The Drive Unit only weights 1.6Kg (3.5 lbs). It's the lightest electric bicycle mid drive motor on the market. That's the weight of a bottle of water. That's awesome because you keep your bike agile in the trails, you can carry your bike with less effort on the stairs. or while loading it on your car... Or simply when you decide you want to pedal without assistance for a bit!
 
High Performing 
Don't trade off performance for lightness: you can have them all. Power up to 1000W, equivalent torque* in excess of 90Nm (66 ft/lb).  Result: a 1.6Kg motor can tow a van ( see the following video).
 

 
Mid Drive Motor
Mid drive motors are superiors comparing to hub motors because can take advantage of your bike shifter. That allows them to deliver more torque at the wheel (depending on the gear) and, for that reason, they're more efficient uphill. Just as you, pedaling with the right gear.

 
Silent
In this video you can appreciate the motor sound during operation. We left the raw footage so that you can compare the sound of the rope against the wheel with the motor sound.
 

 
 
Torque sensor for a natural feel
Direct torque sensing system gives you true feeling of the bike, making the ride a very natural experience.


Smartphone connected 

You can connect your system with your smartphone with two different configurations: standard ( see display section) and Superhero ( see Superhero app section).  The standard version allows you to visualize and control the assistance with your Heart Rate. The Superhero will unlock a world of possibilities. 

 
Outstanding Ground Clearance
Improved capability of overcoming obstacles without damaging the motor.

 
Heart Sensor Assist 
With the HRM feature, just set the BPM you'd like to keep and the assistance level will be adjusted automatically to keep that on track. See video in the display section. 

 
And much more!


 
 




 

AffordableThe launch price is 499 Euro (549 USD) for the complete kit with the 250Wh battery. That is an amazing price for a real mid drive system which is Made in Italy. 



Extremely CompactOverall dimensions are 85x90x128mm (3,3 x 3,5 x 5 inch); That allows a clean installation on your bike for a motor that fits in one hand.





 


Retrofit kit or OEM componentYou can install the Lightest e-bike Drive Unit on your existing bike to make it electric.
Otherwise, if you own a bike company, you can create a custom frame for seamless integration. We can provide adapting plates to match the motor with existing OEM frames made for the most common ebike motor brands.





 

DurableIn order to get such a weight reduction, we use premium components. Aluminum alloy shields with extra-large cooling fins for optimal heat dissipation, case hardened steel gears, premium silicone steel to name a few.




 


Quick Release 
Take the motor off in just 5 minutes: only two bolts lock the motor in place. Use your motor when you feel it and take it down when you want to. With two sets of mounting plates you can power alternatively two bikes. If you use two chain quick links, you'll do it even better!




Independent drive pinionGives you the opportunity to have different transmission ratios between human power and motor power. In addition the inner freewheel will give you ZERO DRAG when OFF.

 


Perfect chainlineKeep the same chainline as on your original bike. You won't have any problem with bad alignment or chain that falls off.


 
 




 

Easy and quick installationConverts your bike into a pedal-assisted bicycle in few minutes. 




Wide Battery choicePick the battery you deserve! They are ranging from 250Wh up to 840Wh, from 30 up to 180km (from 19 to 112 miles) and are made with premium Samsung cells.
You can choose between different configurations: bottle battery, rear rack or backpack!
See the dedicated section below for details. After selecting a perk, you can upgrade your battery in the checkout section.




Anti-theft Lock (Superhero version only)You can lock your system with your smartphone so that it will be useless if stolen. Your unique PIN number will make you the only one to control it.

 


KERS - regen braking (on request)The system will be able to use the braking energy to charge the battery. This will be possible only with fixed gear on internally geared hubs. 



 


Included Components
Motor only perks:

Lightest Motor with high efficiency sinewave controller;
LCD Display;
Crankarms and Chainring;
Crankarms' locking screws;
Motor mounting plates;
Long screws and nuts;
Spacers;
Battery support locking screws;
Wheel sensors and wheel magnet;

Complete kits include the above and:
   10. Battery with genuine premium Samsung cells;
   11. Battery mount with connector;
   12. Gummy frame protection for the battery; 
   13. Battery locking keys
   14. Battery Charger ( power depending on the battery size). 
Tools not included into the perks, but necessary to perform the installation:
15. Allen Wrench16. Allen Keys' Set17. Bottom Bracket remover18. Crank remover

We are aware that having many different suppliers to work together might be not easy and lead to some production delays. Knowing this and having manufacturing experts in our team, we will try to avoid and anticipate all the possible problems and respect all the deadlines.

story:
From the Makers of America’s Most Desired Lube

TriboTEX Transmission: Power + Endurance

We changed the crowdfunding game with our award-winning engine treatment. Now, we're ready to disrupt the automotive market again with TriboTEX Transmission, a powerful drop-in treatment that protects and reverses wear in your drivetrain with nanoparticles, so you can have peace of mind that your vehicle will be there for you when you need it most.

 

 

Experience unparalleled power and an endurance boost with a drop-in treatment that’s quicker than checking your oil. We designed this advanced technology to repair damaged bearings and gears, and protect the most precise and delicate components of gearboxes with diamond-like armor.  

 

 

With a single application, TriboTEX Transmission will protect and improve your vehicle for thousands of miles. Made in the USA and developed with the support of the U.S. Department of Defense, the U.S. Department of Energy, the National Science Foundation, and NASA.

 

 

 

 

Since the beginning, our company set its sights on flight. With the help of the United States Air Force, we're bringing our wear-reversing nanotechnology to flying machines. If successfully funded, our project will be matched with a Phase II SBIR grant to achieve the major milestone of FAA certification. That means, your dollar gets us twice as close to the dream of aviation applications for our wear-reversing nanoparticles.

 

 

watch our winning pitch to the Air Force SBIR program
 

 

The engine revs but you move nowhere...

 

It’s a cold Monday morning. You have an important meeting and you cannot miss it. You start your car and shift into reverse. The engine revs but you go nowhere; your transmission has just given out! You are experiencing the invisible, multi-billion-dollar problem faced by drivers every day—a problem Big Oil hopes you will ignore.

Transmission or gearbox failure is often the bitter end for cars and trucks. Millions end up in the junkyard every year when they wear out or become too costly to maintain. The environmental impact alone is staggering, and for you it means the sudden death of a daily driver or a timeless classic.

 

We have a small solution for this big problem.

We offer diamond-like armor to protect all kinds of engines and machines from the perils of friction. Our treatments are simple to apply and activate while you drive. The armor activates at the highest friction points, fills in worn spots, and leaves an ultra-low friction surface. This gives you a better running vehicle and added insurance against transmission failure. 

 

 

The Technology

TriboTEX is pioneering a new landscape of lubrication technology. We can reverse wear in your transmission in as little as 15 minutes! Our dual-sided nanoparticles activate under the high heat and pressure present during normal operation. 

 

 

These powerful little particles are anisotropic, meaning they are different in different directions and have two functionally different sides; one side binds, and the other glides. The grippy side reinforces and strengthens by binding to engine surfaces, exposing the slippery side to fight friction. This killer combination reduces friction so low, there's a term for it—superlubricity.

 

 

TriboTEX nanoparticles only activate under high heat and pressure, so they aren’t wasted on surfaces that don’t generate friction. Instead, they intelligently self-align into a super-strong lattice structure on top of compromised surfaces, compensating for years of wear, thereby REVERSING WEAR ™. The treatment’s smart activation puts the coating only where it’s needed without affecting clutches or solenoids. TriboTEX is also non-toxic, biocompatible, and environmentally safe.

After an activation period, which takes roughly 500 miles in a normal vehicle, the critical components of the gearbox are coated with a porous, lubricious tribofilm (tribo means friction) boasting excellent embeddability and oil retention. The slippery surface contains select catalysts, added to accelerate the formation of a Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC) cap on top.

When you invest in our protective products, your money is used to improve our lubricants and develop new products for all sorts of machines. Your investment also goes toward improving lubrication standards for military, transit, and infrastructure. We recently received an esteemed Air Force research grant to re-engineer gearbox lubricants for helicopters, which can ultimately save lives.

Read more on our Science page.

 

Based in the beautiful Palouse region of the Northwest United States, we take advantage of our close proximity to two research institutions. Washington State University and the University of Idaho. We're proud to research, develop, and manufacture all in the USA. 

For a deeper look at our company history, see the Milestones section below.

 

 

Our Background

Ten years ago, Dr. Pasha Rudenko met with industry executives to show how his research in tribology (the study of lubrication) could solve important problems facing our world. They responded that life-extending technologies simply don't help corporate profits. Determined to bring his technology to the people, Dr. Rudenko set out on his own. TriboTEX was born, and with the success of our first Kickstarter tens of thousands of people have joined the cause for superior lubrication that makes our machines last longer and run more efficiently.

 

 

It took thirty years of combined experience, extensive research at universities and national labs, and a dedicated team to bring TriboTEX to you. If it was not for the thousands of people who first adopted our groundbreaking technology, we would not have made it this far. That investment has paid off, and we estimate our treatments have saved hundreds of thousands of gallons of fuel and kept countless daily drivers, work vehicles, and classic cars running smoothly and safely.

 

Instructions vary by vehicle, but most automatic transmissions allow you to easily apply TriboTEX Transmission through the dipstick tube. You may also ask a mechanic to treat your vehicle by any shop the next time you have your fluids checked. 

 

 

 

 

 

Share your experience with our technology on social media or post a review on our website. Contribute to a safer, more efficient future. Help us build a world with less friction and waste!

Share with your boss on LinkedIn | Email to your grandmother

 

 

 Watch the original video that put TriboTEX in more than 35,000 vehicles. 

 

Skeptical? So was Brian. Biofuel engineer reviews TriboTEX.

 

See Brian's review and hundreds more like it on our website:

available EXCLUSIVELY on Indiegogo

Take advantage of the following benefits for your vehicles:

Dramatically extend the life of at-risk metals in your transmission
Reduce heat generated by friction thus extending the life of your lubricant
Deliver more energy to the wheels rather than wasting it on cooling
Boost and protect your towing capacity
Defend your transmission from shock loads during towing and rough shifting 

 
 
Taking Flight
Aviation-grade lube hasn't changed since the '70s—not since M*A*S*H was on the air. We want to change that.
 
Your dollar is doubled by a matching grant from the U.S. Air Force

TriboTEX is also non-toxic, biocompatible, and environmentally safe.After an activation period, which takes roughly 500 miles in a normal vehicle, the critical components of the gearbox are coated with a porous, lubricious tribofilm (tribo means friction) boasting excellent embeddability and oil retention. The slippery surface contains select catalysts, added to accelerate the formation of a Diamond-Like Carbon (DLC) cap on top.When you invest in our protective products, your money is used to improve our lubricants and develop new products for all sorts of machines. Your investment also goes toward improving lubrication standards for military, transit, and infrastructure. We recently received an esteemed Air Force research grant to re-engineer gearbox lubricants for helicopters, which can ultimately save lives.Read more on our Science page.   
 
Who We Are
TriboTEX is a technology company developing smart nanomaterials to prevent wear, reduce friction, and repair machinery. Our products improve the efficiency and lifetime of industrial machines and combustion engines.
 The Palouse Based in the beautiful Palouse region of the Northwest United States, we take advantage of our close proximity to two research institutions. Washington State University and the University of Idaho. We're proud to research, develop, and manufacture all in the USA. For a deeper look at our company history, see the Milestones section below.   Our BackgroundTen years ago, Dr. Pasha Rudenko met with industry executives to show how his research in tribology (the study of lubrication) could solve important problems facing our world. They responded that life-extending technologies simply don't help corporate profits. Determined to bring his technology to the people, Dr. Rudenko set out on his own. TriboTEX was born, and with the success of our first Kickstarter tens of thousands of people have joined the cause for superior lubrication that makes our machines last longer and run more efficiently. Dr. Pasha Rudenko, Ph.D.—Founder & CTO         It took thirty years of combined experience, extensive research at universities and national labs, and a dedicated team to bring TriboTEX to you. If it was not for the thousands of people who first adopted our groundbreaking technology, we would not have made it this far. That investment has paid off, and we estimate our treatments have saved hundreds of thousands of gallons of fuel and kept countless daily drivers, work vehicles, and classic cars running smoothly and safely.   
 
How to Use Instructions vary by vehicle, but most automatic transmissions allow you to easily apply TriboTEX Transmission through the dipstick tube. You may also ask a mechanic to treat your vehicle by any shop the next time you have your fluids checked.  
 
STEP 1: Warm up your engine, then shut it off. Driving for 15 minutes is recommended.
 
 
STEP 2: Locate your transmission dipstick and remove it. Always check your fluid levels regularly. The volume of the treatment is small enough not to affect your fluid level.  
 
STEP 3: Add the entire treatment, put the dipstick back, close the hood and continue to drive normally.
 
 
STEP 4: Drive normally. The treatment fully activates after about 500 miles of driving.

story:
Our Story

Thomas J Wright began working on Horizon Hover in 2015 with a dream to change the way people get around forever. Of course, there have been designs for hovering vehicles for some time but Wright challenges the notion that people want planes that can drive. He believes the future is cars that can fly.

Wright took his ideas to New York after being accepted to an incubator for the Locator paging system. Entering the Sikorsky Open Innovation Challenge, he presented his hovering car and made it to the final round of the competition. Unfortunately, his lack of a technical team at the time let him down.

Since then, Wright has assembled a team of experts and advisors from Space X and NASA as well as the Air Force that has been working on the prototype. Horizon Hover will give the average person the ability to hover for the first time in history thanks to a ducted fan verticle take-off system and artificial intelligence. 

The Vision

Imagine being able to safely hover instead of relying on roads and tires. This eliminates much of the danger and inconvenience of travel in inclement weather like sliding tires on wet or icy roads, being snowed in, or flood damage. In fact, it could massively reduce the number of road deaths as up to 22% of all fatal road accidents are caused by inclement weather.

Hovering could also save billions of dollars on infrastructure.  There would be no need for new roads or to repair damage to old ones. Businesses will also be able to utilize our manned heavy lift drone technology in the form of hoverbikes and hovercars to transport people and goods with ease.

The way we get around hasn't changed much in decades. It's time to innovate. It's time for Horizon Hover to change the way we get around.  

Get an Exclusive NFT

When you donate $100 to our campaign, you will receive one of only 300 exclusive NFTs.  NFT stands for Non-Fungible Token, a one-of-a-kind asset that can be bought and sold but not changed. Each NFT has unique properties which means no one else in the world will have exactly the same one as you. 

You will be able to place your NFT in real-life situations using augmented reality (AR) to see how stunning a hoverbike could look parked in front of your house or anywhere else you would like to see it. 

We are the very first crowdfunding campaign to offer an NFT as a perk, so by donating you are helping to pave the way for others to do the same. This is a historic moment!

The Horizon Team

The Horizon Hover team is an exciting mix of multi-talented people led by TJ Wright, an ex-NFL player with over 10 years of experience in consumer products, wearables, product design, fashion design, marketing, sales, distribution, management, partnerships, and fundraising.

Co-founder Donna Fabian brings a huge amount to the table as a registered patent attorney specializing in startups, intellectual property, and technology licensing. She is also a mechanical engineer, product designer, entrepreneur, and business strategist with 10 years of experience in nanotechnology, materials science and manufacturing, and more. 

The rest of the team is made up of:

Tim Worley, former VP at Trek Aerospace and co-creator of the Springtail personal flying vehicle, OVIUWUN unmanned aerial vehicle, and Dragonfly versatile manned, remote, or unmanned vehicle.

Luke Workman, brilliant engineer and one of the world's leading experts in electric vehicle battery systems.  Luke is the brains behind the advanced power systems deployed by the world's best selling electric motorcycles (Zero Motorcycles) and he has worked on power systems for numerous electric vehicles. 

Ron Palermo, an inertial sensors and flight control systems expert and a former US Air Force Pilot with 25 years of experience in aerospace, defense, engineering, advanced airframes, high performance/end computing, engineering management, sales, and business development. Ron provides systems design expertise to numerous organizations including Xilinx, United Technologies, Google, and NASA.

Guido Carballo Guerrero, a mechanical and automation engineer with a MA in Dynamic Systems & Control specializing in Artificial intelligence. Guido has over 10 years of experience in electronic circuit design, computer programming, software development, algorithms, robotics, mechatronics, and more. He has worked at NASA's Advanced Space Propulsion Laboratory, Panduit, XMobots , Gemito, Smart Widgets, and Imerys.

Kuldip Ahluwalia, an applied physicist, serial entrepreneur, and advisor with deep expertise in technology, transportation, aviation, manufacturing, marketing, and management.  He has helped lead Fortune 100 companies like GE and Toshiba to become industry leaders.

Viet Le, a design engineer and materials science expert with experience at SpaceX.

John McInnis, a designer with experience at leading electric motorcycle companies Lightning Motorcycles and Alta Motorcycles.

Rob Bulaga, the co-founder and President of Trek Aerospace.  Rob is an aeronautical and astronautical engineer specializing in propeller propulsion systems, structural design, CFD analysis, performance analysis, component testing, and flight testing.

Darnell Kemp, an investor/advisor and MIT engineer with expertise in product development, manufacturing, business development, and venture capital.

Vehicle Features

Horizon Hover has designed two beautiful vehicles, a single passenger hoverbike, and a 4 seat hovercar. Both are cleared by the FAA as light, experimental aircraft that can be flown without a pilot's license. They will be able to hover 12-36 inches above the ground over any terrain with zero risk of hydroplaning.  

The first prototype to be released will be the sleek and elegant hoverbike is a 780lb vehicle with a 500lb payload fitted with an AR lighting system. The bike is powered by an electric battery and lifted with innovative ducted fans.  It will feature real-time artificial intelligence and advanced inertial systems to make it simple for anyone to ride with the complimentary training and support offered by Horizon Hover. Setting it apart from any other vehicle is not only that it can hover, but it has 360-degree movement and reverses without stopping. 
 

What Happens Next

TJ and the Team at Horizon see hover vehicles being used in a number of sectors, not only as consumer transportation. Hoverbikes and cars will be a huge asset to action and adventure businesses, search and rescue, the military, and entertainment logistics.

However, Horizon Hover is not just a product, but a company that is designing a physical infrastructure in detail. Parking spaces and charging docks will be essential for hover vehicles to become a viable way to travel.  By partnering with Stak mobility,  hoverbikes and cars will be able to integrate into society. To facilitate this, TJ has lobbied in Washington DC on behalf of the industry. 

With your help, hover vehicles could be much more than a futuristic vision of years to come. Below is insight to our future use of funds and plans for development concluding a successful campaign:

 

 

Phase 1
1. Horizon Hover will purchase 2 motors, 2propellers, 2 speed controllers and a battery. Blainjett Aviation
will Purchase a motor test stand, enough raw materials to build 2 cams and begin designing the cams.
2. Once the components arrive, Blainjett Aviation will combine the motors, propellers and other power components and test them. The data will be shared with Horizon Hover for the purpose of moving to the next phase. The goal will be to complete this phase within 2 months of the agreement date.
Phase 2
3. lf both parties agree the design is adequate and the data supports the thrust and control requirements,
the rest of the power components should be ordered by Horizon Hover. This includes frame structure, miscellaneous hardware, a flight controller and raw materials to build 11 more cams and 11 more sets of motor and propeller units. Blainjett Aviation will purchase a Carbon Fiber 3D printer with a large print bed and supply all labor at no cost to build and test the full power assembly.
4. Blainjett Aviation will then begin designing the shell and control mechanisms for the craft and will generate 3D printed components.. Horizon Hover will supply all other body components to complete the project. All of the body components will be designed and fabricated by Blainjett Aviation within 4 months of the date of this agreement.
Phase 3
5. Assembly and testing of the prototype will begin and be completed within 6 months of this agreement.
6. The prototype Hover Ski is the property of Horizon Hover. The testing station and 3D printer will remain the property of Blainjett Aviation.
While development of the Hoverski project is ongoing, Blainjett Aviation will assist with marketing efforts.

 

 

 

A Horizon Hoverbike or Hover car  could be your next vehicle! 

Join us on Discord for updates and to ask any questions you might have.
