story:
Snapbag is the ultimate driver friendly car waste bin that offers you the perfect solution to an everyday problem, with zero compromises to your driving experience and to your car's functions thanks to all of these features and benefits:

With so much of our time spent in the car commuting from point A to point B, it’s inevitable that we accumulate those sandwich papers, chocolate wrappers, water bottles, empty cans or used wipes. As we can all attest to, there’s only so much those tiny side compartments in the doors can hold.

Snapbag is used with no distractions, allowing you to focus on what matters most while you're on the road, the road itself. 

Just like most of the features in your car, it stays out of the way, serves its purpose, and remains concealed. There is no need to take your eyes off the road for even a split second; you simply reach your hand back and dispose of your waste on the go. 

  • Snapbag is made from premium materials that match your car’s interior, allowing it to seamlessly blend in.
  • While accommodating as a disposable garbage bag, it is meticulously attached and perfectly concealed for maximum functionality. 

Dispose of waste, replace bag, repeat.

Every inch of our car’s interior has an important role in shaping our driving experience. Measured to perfection, the specifications of every car are tailored to suit the requirements of the driver and all passengers. 

Mindful of not infringing upon the desirable features of a car, we designed Snapbag with particular attention to its size and position.  Strategically mounted onto the back of the front seat with an expandable yet slim body, Snapbag does not compromise the legroom for passengers in the backseat, or any other function of your car.  

Snapbag is designed in a flexible V-shaped fashion with a patent pending mechanism. 

It expands progressively as it fills up, and conceals a standard ‘small size’ disposable garbage bag. The choice of disposable garbage bag is yours; however, we recommend a biodegradable disposable garbage bag to manage waste in an Eco-friendly manner.

The innovative design of Snapbag delivers both functionality and ease of use. With the magnetic closure function, Snapbag opens and closes with extreme ease and ensures a tight seal. 

Note: we do not recommend keeping waste for extended periods of time inside Snapbag.

​

An additional benefit of Snapbag's magnetic closure is its tight seal. The practicality of confining those unwanted smells means that you can dispose of any food product without concern for the odor attaching to the upholstery of your car or tainting the air you breathe. Avoiding the escape of any odors and preventing their dissipation keeps your car’s aroma as fragrant and fresh as new.

After running extensive tests, we confidently guarantee that Snapbag is resistant to leaks. Whether it’s an empty soft drink can, a juice bottle or a disposable coffee cup, hesitate not to just throw it in. We understand that the leak-proof feature is of utmost importance as preserving and protecting your car’s interior from leakage and stains is undoubtedly a prime priority.  

expectations in an unobtrusive and discrete manner? With your needs and expectations in mind, Snapbag strives to do just that through its slim design. 

Whether you’re aesthetically conscious or more functionally-driven, Snapbag pleases the eye as much as it satisfies its purpose.  

The recycling pack allows you to separate your organic from your recyclable waste upon disposal. This eliminates the need to sort out your waste after you’ve removed the garbage bag from the car.

Ideal for couples, groups, and families, the recycling pack includes two Snapbags, one indicating "Recyclable Waste" and another "Organic Waste".

Our commitment to eco-friendly practices is unwavering and embedded in our mission.

Snapbag's unique patent pending mechanism allows for safe and distraction-free usage while on the go (hence driver-friendly). Every aspect of Snapbag was conceptually designed to give the driver and the passengers the best user-experience.

Snapbag is available in the 3 most common car interior colors to seamlessly blend with your car interior.

ADD-ONS: 

Cover your disposable waste bags roll like a ninja while keeping the choice of disposable waste bags your own.

Being committed to our functional and aesthetically driven approach in design, and given that disposable waste bags usually come in rolls of flashy colors, this cover is intended to meticulously and elegantly hide them.

The cover is black, slim, and perfect for avoiding visual clutter in your car.

 

Equip your Snapbag with a reusable, durable, washable, and impermeable inner plastic bag. 

Not only is this option easier on your pocket, but also, and more importantly, it is easier on the environment; it is a simple yet effective means to practice more eco-friendly practices by limiting the usage of other disposable alternatives.

Far from being ideal, the first prototype served to further clarify the initial concept and reassure us that it was indeed time to take things to the next level. Not undermining the essentiality of each stage of the design and development process, this step paved the way for the Snapbag we had in mind. 

Next came the schematic drawings and design improvements.

After the design process, we searched for the best materials we could find to implement the concept. No compromise was made along the way; the challenge of providing consumers with the best value was faced with utmost consciousness of our values and mission. 

An improved prototype version of Snapbag was created.

After creating a few samples to test, we had to find more durable and more functional material that would both match with the cars’ interior and serve its purpose.

And so the hunt for the ideal material continued. With new materials, new possibilities were introduced, and a better design was possible. Our idea was slowly evolving and reaching new heights, heights that once revealed could not be ignored.

In parallel to the material scouting, constant improvements on Snapbag's mechanism were taking place tackling various areas of functionality.

Among other endless improvements, we adjusted the two sides of Snapbag to ensure adequate closure of the magnets without compromising their positioning for maximum functionality.

A multitude of materials were tested and extensive research on car interiors' colors and textures took place, all in hope of satisfying the demands of our consumers.

Snapbag's colors were chosen!

Further improvements to Snapbag were made after we subjected our product to numerous endurance tests, extreme climate tests, leak-proof tests, and wear-and-tear tests.

Snapbag compared with a car interior texture

Then it was time to finalize the details!

 Confident of Snapbag's performance, we were now able to shift our attention to the add-ons to focus on enhancing the Snapbag users' experience.

Introducing Add-ons!

A disposable waste bags roll cover was made to hide the colorful rolls of waste bags.

Then the reusable/washable inner plastic bag was introduced to provide a more eco-friendly waste management solution and thus embody our core company values.

As we can all attest to, there’s only so much those tiny side compartments in the doors can hold.Snapbag is used with no distractions, allowing you to focus on what matters most while you're on the road, the road itself. Just like most of the features in your car, it stays out of the way, serves its purpose, and remains concealed. There is no need to take your eyes off the road for even a split second; you simply reach your hand back and dispose of your waste on the go. 
Snapbag is made from premium materials that match your car’s interior, allowing it to seamlessly blend in.
While accommodating as a disposable garbage bag, it is meticulously attached and perfectly concealed for maximum functionality. 
Dispose of waste, replace bag, repeat.Every inch of our car’s interior has an important role in shaping our driving experience. Measured to perfection, the specifications of every car are tailored to suit the requirements of the driver and all passengers. Mindful of not infringing upon the desirable features of a car, we designed Snapbag with particular attention to its size and position.  Strategically mounted onto the back of the front seat with an expandable yet slim body, Snapbag does not compromise the legroom for passengers in the backseat, or any other function of your car.  Snapbag is designed in a flexible V-shaped fashion with a patent pending mechanism. It expands progressively as it fills up, and conceals a standard ‘small size’ disposable garbage bag. story:
The Ninebot KickScooter F Series is feature rich yet cost effective and offers everything you need in one product: an extended 25-mile range*, a top speed of 18.6 mph*, large 10” tires, foldable design, and Bluetooth security lock to keep your Kickscooter safe.

*The 25-mile range and 18.6 mph featured here are for the Ninebot F40.

At Segway, we have accomplished over nine successful campaigns on Indiegogo. Supported by over 13,560 backers, we always find a way to give back to our early supporters by offering unbeatable prices, early delivery, and free accessories through giveaway events. Be among the first to ride the latest Ninebot KickScooter F Series and enjoy the best price before it becomes available on other channels.

The exceptional speed of the F series enables you to whiz through town. The F30 delivers a speed up to 15.5 mph, and the F40 reaches a top speed of up to 18.6 mph. The 350W output provides plenty of torque-on-demand, helping you conquer up to a 20%* grade slope.

* The 20% grade slope is achieved with the Ninebot F40.

Equipped with a high capacity battery of up to 10,200 mAh*, the F30 delivers a 17-mile range and the F40, up to a 25-mile range on a single charge. Get ready for new adventures and easier commutes.

*The 10,200 mAh featured here is for the Ninebot F40.

The 10-inch pneumatic tires, with superior shock absorption, make your ride smoother and more stable even on bumpy terrain or rough surfaces.

Enhanced with polymer lining and wear-resistant tread, the F Series offers an elevated riding experience with the combination of comfort and endurance to increase safety while riding. Compared to average tires on the market, the 10-inch pneumatic tires increase durability, prick resistance, and comfort.

Easily switch between the three riding modes with two clicks on the intuitive LED dashboard, allowing you to ride the way you want. The three modes include Eco Mode, Standard Mode, and Sport Mode.

The Ninebot F30 is equipped with a preset speed limit of 9.3 mph (15 km/h) Eco, 15.5 mph (25 km/h) Standard, and 15.5 mph (25 km/h) Sport.

The Ninebot F40 is equipped with a preset speed limit of 9.3 mph (15 km/h) Eco, 18.6 mph (30 km/h) Standard, and 18.6 mph (30 km/h) Sport.

With the powerful brushless direct current motor, the Ninebot KickScooter F Series delivers a fast and sturdy riding experience. The use of a high power heat dissipation force increases the service life of the motor, and the low heat prevents the motor from burning out. 

Equipped with a front-wheel mechanical drum brake and a regenerative electric rear brake, the dual brake system offers more stability and better steering to ensure a safe ride. In addition, the 140 mm disc brakes increase reaction time by up to 27% and respond in 0.1 s.

The F Series has a regenerative braking system that turns the scooter into a vehicle powered by electricity and recycled energy from riding. Energy will be collected from regenerative braking and distributed when you need a boost.

With forty 18,650 high-capacity lithium batteries, the Smart Battery Management System delivers a high power supply and closely monitors the battery status with multiple protection mechanisms to ensure battery safety and to notify you of any battery alerts when needed.

The F Series is designed to be easily carried on public transportation and take to any destination you desire effortlessly. Weighing in at just 34.8 lbs (15.8 kg)*, the F Series is lightweight.

*The 34.8 lb featured here is for the Ninebot F40.

With the Quick Folding System, the F Series can be easily folded in 1 second to store in the trunk. Also, equipped with the folding mechanism of the high-end folding scooters, it is safe and durable.

Connect the Ninebot KickScooter F Series with the Segway-Ninebot app through Bluetooth to check your riding speed, energy usage, and remaining battery. At 5 mph, you can set the Kickscooter in cruise control for an easy ride!

You can also upgrade the scooter firmware over-the-air and monitor riding data, which enhances your overall riding experience. ​

Our latest Ninebot KickScooter F Series powered by Segway has two exceptional models, the F30 and F40. See which kickscooter is right for you.

By integrating an electric scooter into your daily commute, you are making a difference to our environment. With the Ninebot KickScooter F Series, you can reduce your carbon footprint. Here's to making a change to protect our Earth with Segway.

Segway-Ninebot is a global leader in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. The company’s businesses are international, selling products in more than 80 countries and regions. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future.

story:
The Next Step

The Rebus Electric Scooter is like nothing ever before. Experience the thrill of 22 mph speeds, nimble handling of a magnesium alloy frame, and comfortable rides with full suspension aboard a Rebus. In addition, the 27 mi range, 1000W of power, and self healing tires make sure that no obstacle stands in the way of your commute, whether that be a hill, distance, or flat tire. 

Your Safety: Our Priority

We've designed the Rebus to be safe in all conditions: high speeds, poor weather, and even emergency stops.

K-mark LED headlight and taillight ensure night visibility. Reflective strips enhance safety in the unlikely event of a failure. Alert other commuters of your presence with the bell, and keep track of what's going on with a full color LED display.

The Rebus is designed for the long term. With our sophisticated battery management system, charge and discharge rates are closely monitored to ensure optimum battery health, and keep your battery performing at its best. 

Jaw Dropping Performance

Designed to Travel

Fully Capable Out of the Box!

No messing around with any apps or tutorials. Simply remove the Rebus from its packaging and enjoy!

What's in the Box

story:
How was Kobra born? 

Our Kobra was born from the need to face the city jungle in a safe and agile way.  After months of first-hand experiences with electric kick scooters, on city and hilly streets, we realized that there was no model capable of guaranteeing survival in this jungle ;).

The core objective was therefore to give more security to our scooter trips, in fact the Kobra is designed to guarantee the highest standards of safety and stability thanks to the wide radius front wheel and to the double disc brake combined with an electronic brake.

But these are only a few if its characteristics. The body of the Kobra has an exclusive and elegant design, inspired by the frames of motorcycles.  A tubular structure guarantees stability and flexibility which together with SAE 304 stainless steel ensure the highest resistance.  It is therefore designed to withstand the most extreme conditions and with its exclusive geometry it also has a large integrated cushioning effect.

And, Kobra technology goes much further!

It is designed to guarantee a driving experience that never ends. E-ABS assistance, combined with the Adaptive Cruise Control, take you wherever you want.

E-ABS

First of all, safety.

The anti-lock system of the tire allows you to stop with maximum stability, even in the event of emergency braking.

Adaptive Cruise Control

The innovative Cruise Control is able to keep the set speed constant, independently adapting the amount of power needed on the flat, uphill and downhill, while recharging the battery.

Automatic Regen System

Through the electronic brake, the battery regenerate its charge while driving, only by releasing the throttle.  Distances won't stop you anymore!

All of this, was only possible thanks to the help of a partner company, leader for more than 10 years in the field of electric mobility for people with disabilities. Deciding to share its knowhow, gave us the opportunity to guarantee a very high quality product with a technology extensively tested for years by more than 15,000 users worldwide and with more than 38,400 hours of research and development behind it.

 

Kobra gallery of all our extreeeeme tests ;) 

 

 

The “Kobra-Key features”

 

Process and prototypes 

We have now completed the design, engineering and testing phases. 

With more than 10 prototypes and the continuous reviews by 8 brilliant minds, we are finally ready to start production to let you have the Kobra in your hands on April 2021!

Here some funny sketches and pictures. Enjoy ;)

story:
What Is UnigGy

It a universal charger, for most phone devices. Such as Apple, android, and window devices, and it has a built in international wall plug to connect to any mobile devices such as Laptop, speakers, Removable Hard drive, coffee maker, portable blender, gaming console etc. Here is where friend could share energy together.

Its purpose:
  • Provide energy through multiple source.
  • PowerBank that store for your needs.
  • Capable to connect to multiple different mobile devices.
  • A mobile wall plug that able to accept most international plug head.
  • A wall plug that could provide energy for any electronic device.
  • Car charging capabilities. 


Power Source?

To get power it comes with a 120 cm extendable cord length plug, which able to connect power through any international wall plug, such as UK, US, CHINA, and EU countries. That makes it the best power source for frequent flyers that travel through different countries without worrying of getting multiple plug connectors. It’s also comes with a car charger.


     

     


Cool Stuff?

The device could charge 4 devices simultaneously.  It has light on each port to indicate the port is charging.

Future it will include a tiny source connect to your devices informing you that your gadget is about out of power through apps and also reminding you to charge the UnigGy internal power bank before you sleep.


The Design?

The design is sleek and compact which is easy to store. It could fit into most bag and cases and also probably most baggy pants pocket.

         


Extras?

Last but not least alternatively we also provide a model that could give access to mobile data when connected to the dock. So user could easily access their data from their mobile through different port.


Here are some of the FAQ

What problem does your idea address?

Current market people would need to buy different power extension cords for their different devices such as iPhone and Samsung galaxy tab. Also it could solve cord tangle around and tide up in the bag when trying to retrieve the cord. Also most of the time when travelling we would need to buy universal adapter for our charger.

How does your idea solve this problem?

It is a power charger that have 4 auto retractable built in outlet cords that could stretch up to 4 feet each with multiple power head that could be switch in between for multiple different or same device. Also it comes with a built in exchangeable international plug, together with a usb connect to laptop, just in case no power socket available.  Also it could connect to pc as a data cable with chosen connection. There are switches that the user could switch between the plugin devices, however only 1 device at a time to connect to pc/ laptop.

User could pull the extension from the mini box and plug it into their chosen devices to charge power, while the other end they could plug it on to a wall or onto a pc/ laptop.


The Impact

With your help energy access would be wholesome easy for everyone in anywhere and at anytime.

  • Energy could be access from any country easily.
  • Energy could be access on the go with build in PowerBank.
  • Energy could even be access through car port.
  • Easy to carry and to fit into bags.
  • Able to charge multiple device in one time.
  • Any electronic device are able to be charge, especially gaming console.


Timeline


Choice and Option Available

  • There are 9 Colors ( White, Black, Red, Blue, Green, Pink, Yellow, Grey, Tint Blue )
  • Powerbank Range ( 8,000mAH, 10,400mAH, 15,000mAH, 20,000mAH )
  • USB Slot ( 2 Slot, 4 Slot )
  • Dock Slot ( 2 Dock, 4 Dock )
  • Extension Cord Length ( 200cm, 120cm, 80cm )
  • Data Accessible ( YES / NO - 2 / 4 Slot)

connect to pc as a data cable with chosen connection. There are switches that
the user could switch between the plugin devices, however only 1 device at a
time to connect to pc/ laptop.
User could pull the extension from the mini box and plug it into their
chosen devices to charge power, while the other end they could plug it on to a
wall or onto a pc/ laptop.


The Impact With your help energy access would be wholesome easy for everyone in anywhere and at anytime.  Energy could be access from any country easily. Energy could be access on the go with build in PowerBank. Energy could even be access through car port.
Easy to carry and to fit into bags.
Able to charge multiple device in one time.
Any electronic device are able to be charge, especially gaming console.    
Timeline 



    Choice and Option Available


There are 9 Colors ( White, Black, Red, Blue, Green, Pink, Yellow, Grey, Tint Blue )


Powerbank Range ( 8,000mAH, 10,400mAH, 15,000mAH, 20,000mAH )


USB Slot ( 2 Slot, 4 Slot )


Dock Slot ( 2 Dock, 4 Dock )


Extension Cord Length ( 200cm, 120cm, 80cm )

Data Accessible ( YES / NO - 2 / 4 Slot)

story:
Biktrix over-delivers.

Our 2014 crowdfunding campaign for the Biktrix Juggernaut was successful (http://kck.st/14iX1JC). We over-delivered on every one of the 42 bikes ordered through the campaign. Specifically:

We delivered on schedule:

Every single Biktrix Juggernaut was delivered. 50% were well ahead of schedule, and the last bike was delivered on May 30, 2015. We had bumps along the way, and we spent a lot of long, hard days and nights working to solve them efficiently to keep things on schedule. We are very proud of this, and wouldn't have it any other way.

We delivered top quality:

Every Biktrix Juggernaut delivered was meticulously tested before shipping. We did run into a few quality problems, such as blown motor controllers, defective battery management systems, broken forks, scratched frames, and we caught and solved these prior to delivery. The Juggernauts we delivered were top-notch, high-quality machines, and all our backers are really happy with the quality. All of them agree that they got more than what they asked for or expected.

We delivered outstanding support:

Since delivery, we have received 20 support requests from Juggernaut owners, and have replied to them all the same day - mostly within minutes! Most of this has been advice and recommendations - you know, friendly enthusiast banter. But, we did have a couple of real warranty issues (problems with 2 of the forks), which we sorted out at no extra cost (we shipped new ones for free to the backer's local bike shop that did the installation) and promptly (both cases were solved within a couple of days).

We delivered more! 

The Juggernaut was delivered with a lot of free upgrades - not just stickers and T-shirts, but real stuff that matters. We upgraded the motor from the originally promised 500W version to a 750W beast. Then we upgraded the brakes, seat, handlebars, and rims. And to keep our customers clean and dry in the rain, we tossed in free fenders for every one of our backers.

We consider the Juggernaut a success - not because it got funded, but because we delighted every single customer.

Biktrix is back to over-deliver again with our latest model, the Stunner.

The Stunner is born to please.





Colours:

Pearl Off-white Step-thru Stunner:


Pearl Grey Step-over Stunner:



Review by EBR


More details

The heart of the Stunner is its powerful mid-drive motor and high quality battery.

Mid-drive motors have several advantages over standard hub drive motors.
  • The weight is evenly distributed along the center of the bike.
  • Mid-drives are more efficient than hub motors by using the
    drive-train (gears) of the bike as the motor's transmission. 

Powerful

The 500W rated (900W peak) crank motor is greater than 80% efficient
and gives you plenty of power and torque to climb up any incline. The mid motor uses the gears of your bike as its transmission. This enables the motor to climb up any hill seamlessly.

No drag

Since our motor freewheels about the crank, there is no unnecessary drag.
If your battery dies, just pedal the Stunner like a regular bike.

Three operation modes


Worry-free, maintenance-free, removable battery

The built-in state-of-the-art Battery Management System (BMS) allows you to leave the battery plugged in as long as you want. The BMS will intelligently cut off supply to individual cells.



Open platform

Built on an open platform, the Stunner allows the owner to swap its complete electric system to any other bike with basic bike tools (*compatible with 90% of bikes). The open platform also allows you to opt for any 36V battery. We are not interested in trying to tie you in with a proprietary battery that costs a lot to replace.

Great aftermarket support

The Stunner uses the popular Bafang mid-mount BBS02 motor. This motor is very durable and has been around for a long time. It even has great aftermarket support for upgrades.

Light, Simple, yet Powerful braking

Quality rim brakes can perform just as good if not better than their mechanical disc brake counterparts. The Stunner is equipped with the absolute best v-brakes in the market. Reviews on this brake can be found here. These brakes are really easy to maintain and service. Replacement parts can be found easily and are very inexpensive.

SwissStop brake pads deliver more than just great stopping power. They provide superior modulation and feel on all types of brake surfaces from Aluminium to carbon.

Our rubber compounds are the foundation for our line of brake pads. Special formulas have been developed for Aluminium and carbon wheels. Decades of experience stand behind every SwissStop product.

Features:

  • Top performance on dry rims and even better performance on wet
  • Complete absence of abrasive materials which damage rims
  • Consistent braking (-20°C to +40°C)
  • Silent operation

SwissStop brake pads

3 transmission options:

7-speed Derailleur:


3-speed Shimano Nexus Internally Geared Hub:


7-speed Shimano Nexus Internally Geared Hub:

Internally Geared Hubs(IGH) offer a very clean look. IGH and derailleurs have their pros and cons. We want to offer you the choice to pick one as you please.
The IGH bikes will come with a gear sensor, that will cut off motor power when the gears are being shifted. This is because IGH do  not like being shifted under load as much as their derailleur counterparts.

Range:



Who rides the electric bikes? 

The Commuter

Biking and perspiring feels great, except when you're walking into your
office sweaty and in need of a shower.

Use multiple levels of pedal assist and thumb throttle to zip your way through
to work without overexertion. On your way home, turn off pedal assist
and get that daily workout you always wanted.

The Economizer

Operating an e-bike will cost less than $1 per 100 km's.
That's more economical than public transport.
Cut commuting costs while still getting a healthy workout.

The Chaser

Are you often the chaser, trying to chase your partner on a bike? Is the fear of
not keeping up to your partner's pace keeping you from biking together?

With the Stunner, you can now get up to speed with less effort - completely adjustable levels of electric assist.

The Enthusiast

Do you always keep wanting to go farther and faster? With our mid-drive system, use your bike's rear gears in combination with the level of electric assist to go farther in your cross-country trip and faster in your uphill climb.

The De-risker

Have you stopped biking because you're concerned that you may over exert yourself? Perhaps an injury is stopping you?

Think again. The Stunner will allow you to enjoy a leisurely ride along scenic routes with maximum ease, up to more than 50 km at a time! Use different assist levels to recover from your injury and get the exercise you need.

The Active Potato

Are you or someone you know stuck to their couches watching TV or playing
video games? The Stunner can bring back the thrill to biking - motivating
you to go farther - places no other vehicles are allowed. Perfect gifts for teens!


Components and Technical Specifications

Frame: Aluminum alloy 6061 T6

Tires: 26"×2.5", puncture resistant Kenda Balloon tires

Rim: Aluminum alloy twin wall and CNC side wall

Spokes: 13ga stainless - silver

Brakes: V-brakes front and rear with motor inhibitors

Gears: Shimano Tourney 7 speed; Shimano Nexus 3-speed IGH; Shimano Nexus 7-speed IGH

Pedal: Wellgo flat shoe pedal

Chain: High strength rust resistant KMC chain

Kickstand: Heavy duty aluminum side kickstand

Saddle: Velo comfort

Motor: 36V 500W Bafang 8fun BBS02 motor with custom firmware

Display: C961 Bafang display

Battery: 36V 10.4Ah high dense Samsung Li-ion battery

Charger: 100-240V, 50-60Hz, 2A smart charger

Max speed: 32kmph or 20mph (Canada/US)

Load capacity: 125 Kg / 275 lbs

Net weight: ~22.5 Kg / ~50 lbs with battery

Range:

    Basic pedal assist: 50-60 km / 30-37 miles

    Throttle only: 15-20 km / 9-12 miles


The Stunner is in the late-stage of its design maturity. 

We have a fully tested end product, not just a prototype. We had ElectricBikeReviews review the Stunner. His full review can be found here (http://electricbikereview.com/biktrix/stunner/)

We are using the same successful manufacturing channel as we did for the Juggernaut, but with improvements. 

We have streamlined our manufacturing process, improved our quality control process and increased our production capacities to few hundred bikes a month.

As this campaign gets more funding, we will be throwing in a few goodies, just like we did with the Juggernaut campaign.

Our goal is to have 100% happy backers and customers. We are willing to do all that it takes to make that happen. We will only call this campaign a success AFTER we have delivered and delighted ALL our pledges.

We hope you join us for this amazing journey. Join the e-bike revolution.


Risks & Challenges

We have done it before and we can do it again! That being said, some risks and challenges might come our way when we start our large-scale production of the Biktrix Stunner, and we want to be upfront about that.

Indiegogo projects come with some degree of risk inherent in all product development. Our backers invest in us, so we want to do everything we can to minimize the risks involved.

We have partners in Canada, US, and China for manufacturing and assembly. The bikes will be assembled and shipped to Biktrix headquarters in Saskatoon, SK, where each and every bike will be checked for quality and then shipped out to backers.

We will strive to be very open and transparent to our backers, and will update you on every milestone. See our Kickstarter campaign for updates on our previous project.

story:
Summary

Everything we do is because we believe every person deserves access to economic opportunities .


We do this by providing dignified and reliable transportation services to increase certainty and convenience. 


We just happen to be an offline app for commuters to book public bus tickets. 

 As finalists in the world's largest business competition, the Hult Prize (www.hultprizesix.com) we are competing for $1M to start a social enterprise to double the income of 1M people in crowded urban spaces. We are among 6 finalist teams selected from 25,000 applicants to present at the Clinton Global Initiative, among the likes of President Bill Clinton, Dr. Muhammad Yunus, and Mo Ibrahim.

We are a team of recent graduates from Earlham College, three girls and one guy, from Kenya, the US, India, and Congo who collectively have lived and worked in more than 16 countries. We are a team of creators, passionate about finding innovative solutions global challenges. Between the four of us we have founded a business, a NGO, worked with exposing girls to STEM careers, taught entrepreneurship to rural women, founded a literacy program, educated students about menstrual bullying, and have now become one of six global finalists. We are a team that preserves despite all odds. We lost during the campus round at Earlham, reworked our idea and reapplied directly to Hult Prize. We don't quit, we will work to ensure that all people can access economic opportunities through optimizing transport across emerging markets. 

 

With only $10k we have developed the MVP of our our offline app and done the first round of beta testing on one route in Nairobi. With more than 3,000 booked bus tickets and more than 1,800 users now it's time to expand our service to 20 buses, to validate our impact and gain user adoption. Help us win the Hult Prize finals in September by funding our second pilot phase! 

What will we do with the money?

Our main bottleneck is the number of tablets we can purchase. The more money we have, the quicker we can implement with the 110 buses requesting our services, who are currently on our wait list. The more buses we have, the more convenient it is for riders to use our system, meaning the more user adoption we can have! 

 

Every $100 buys an Android tablet so that we can service another bus, allowing us to optimize transportation for more 600 commuters per day. 

Every $500 supports the tech cost of more than 3,000 bus tickets to be booked through our system

Every $1,000 is used for a week's salary and transportation for our staff of 20 volunteers to train bus crews, sell to commuters, and measure impact 

Milestones

  • $5,000 allows us to be fully functional on 10 buses, including operational costs (USSD testbed, marketing, WIFI, data plans for the tablets, voluntary salaries, and transportation for 3 weeks). 
    • Running on 10  buses means we could impact the transport of around 10,000 commuters over three weeks. 
  • $10,000 allows us to be fully functional on 20 buses, including operational costs (USSD testbed, marketing, WIFI, data plans for the tablets, voluntary salaries, and transportation for 3 weeks)
    • Running on 20 buses means we could impact the transport of around 20,000 commuters over three weeks
  • $15,000 allows us to be fully functional on 30 buses, including operational costs (USSD testbed, marketing, WIFI, data plans for the tablets, voluntary salaries, and transportation for 3 weeks)
    • Running on 30 buses means we could impact the transport of around 30,000 commuters over three weeks

Our Impact

We will directly be doubling the income of 1M bus driver crews across Africa, by increasing the number of trips they can make each day by making the transportation system more efficient, Magic Bus is created to have impact on everyone using the system, from the drivers to the riders, to urban planners.

Commuters will no longer have to wait long periods of times to get their buses, they can conveniently book their tickets through SMS , allowing them to better plan their day and access better services like jobs, education, and healthcare currently out of their reach. The majority of us now accept Uber and Lyft as easy and convenient ways to get around cities, but for underserved markets these technologies exclusively rely on the use of smartphones.

We are the first tech for transport solution to specifically target low income markets, to provide them with dignified and reliable transport through SMS--which means we can change the world of the 200M people relying on informal transport systems!  

By making transportation more affordable and predictable, we will also incentivize people who currently walk to take public buses, decreasing congestion in the long term and creating sustainability in cities. 

Our Track Record

  • We have already raised $18k which we used to fly to Kenya, develop the tech platform, take the prototype  to the market and do beta testing of the technology with customers. 

  • We won $10k in Nairobi's Transdev transportation tech competition, to be awarded at the end of September 
  • Help us raise the next round of funding for us to continue with the second phase of the pilot!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • SHARE with your friends, family, and co-workers! Sharing means impact. Simply use the Indiegogo tools above to share on your social media. 
  • Donate your old Android tablet or smartphone to Magic Bus! We will use them to track the buses using GPS. (8D Techno devices preferred)
  • Connect us with your contacts in Kenya 
  • Pay for housing while in Kenya (3 weeks)
  • Intern with us (graphic design, video, and social media experts)
  • Share the story with your local media

That's all there is to it!

story:
MAPS (Mobile Agricultural Power Solutions) exists to empower farmers in the developing world to be more efficient in producing and transporting their goods. Our main product, the AgRover, helps do just that!

 

The Problem

Many farmers in the developing world lack access to technologies that can help drive success to their farm. Countless hours of time and energy are spent each day on endless tasks. They endure a large workload from fetching water at a nearby well to delivering goods to market by hand or head load. This results in multiple inefficiencies that lead to lower crop yields and ultimately less income for the farmer.

 

Our Solution, the AgRover

 

Vehicle Design

 

Multipurpose Platform

We have optimized the design to be affordable and entirely manufacturable from parts and tools available across Africa. Feedback from our end users has shown us the importance of offering power to attachments like water pumps, generators, maize grinders, and field implements. The AgRover can provide users with instant access to water for irrigation of crops, electrical power to generators, and food processing equipment like grinding maize.

 

Employment Opportunities

AgRovers are produced entirely in Africa, by Africans, for Africans. Our goal is to not only produce a vehicle for farmers but to also impact the local communities across Africa by creating manufacturing jobs to build the AgRover.

 

Our technology has proven success across 4 countries in Sub-Saharan Africa, but our ability to scale production requires your help! 

Where does your donation go?

 

Towards the first wave of AgRovers

Your donation will go towards the parts and supplies for building our first 5 AgRovers at our facility in Lagos, Nigeria. We are currently manufacturing our first vehicle at this location and with your help, we can increase our inventory to take on more orders from interested customers! 

 

Towards buying new workshop tools

In addition to vehicle parts, we will be able to buy better manufacturing equipment for our workshop. We currently use welders, grinders, and drills for power tools. However, by reaching our $20k goal we could buy more power tools, like chop-saws that can help us become more efficient. Buying generators for our workshop will eliminate the reliance on inconsistent power access in Lagos.

 

Final Outcome of Reaching Our Goal

Reaching our goal of $20k will help us gain enough capital to take on more vehicle orders to reach a larger target audience. There is expressed interest in rural ambulances, fire trucks, trash collectors, taxiing, and much more! Our vehicle could double as an ambulance for sick residents and pregnant women in rural areas that need access to distant hospitals as well as a fire truck that can adequately carry 165 gallons (625 L) of water in its bed to put out fires! We can also become more effective in building a dedicated parts supply chain to drive the final vehicle costs even lower than what is possible today.

 

What do you get for donating?

Guarantee your receival of a physical item by backing our campaign at a donation level. The levels have been chosen to uniquely show you what your individual contributions will afford for our business. This is detailed in the perk list on the right. Below is a description of what you will receive as a donator to our campaign at corresponding levels! 

 

Choose Your Perk

** To chose your own custom metal print, choose a photo taken by David here! After checkout for these perks, email info@mobileagpower.com with the photo of your choice and a copy of your order confirmation to ensure your order is correct. 

Share, Share, Share!!!

Even if you can't make a monetary donation, your help in sharing this campaign within your social network helps make an impact! Our goal is to reach as many people with our story as possible and you can help with just that by sharing! Stay up to date by following us across our social media platforms.

  

                                

 

 

 

 

Have you made any AgRovers and are they adequately tested for production?

In just the past year, six AgRovers have been built in four countries across Sub-Saharan Africa. They have been built through grants and/or NGO support. To reach a larger impact and scale our business, your contributions will individually help our growths in areas like Nigeria and Kenya. Prototypes have been built each year since 2009 and we have landed on a rugged design that works across Africa at a cheap cost. The prototypes across the years have been tested rigorously by our end users and their feedback has helped drive the final design.

It's a 3 wheeler. Why?

Great question. There are several reasons for choosing a 3 wheeled vehicle, from affordability to engineering strength. Removing the need for a 4th tire and suspension kit as well as a steering linkage helps lower the selling point of our vehicles. In addition to this, our vehicle experiences less loading when compared to a 4 wheel vehicle due to the fact that a 3 wheeled vehicle offers equal ground pressure on all of its tires regardless of operating conditions. A 4 wheel vehicle sees a lot of torsion when 1 of its tires enters a rut while a 3 wheel vehicle distributes the loads accordingly. This is easily explained when compared to a tripod that supports a camera versus a 4 legged support for a camera. 

It's a 3 wheeler. Is it safe for those who use it?

Another great question. We hold safety at a top priority at MAPS and we can assure our end users that our design for safety has been accounted for. A deep investigation into the vehicle's center of gravity, tipping point under various loading conditions, vehicle wheelbase and vehicle track width allows for an adequately safe design. The design of the AgRover has taken all of these issues into account and offers a very low CG with a high roll stiffness.

Where does my money go?

Your donations will go 100% to the funding of the micro-factories producing AgRovers within Sub-Saharan Africa, and more specifically in our first worksop in Lagos, Nigeria. The donations will help fund local jobs in the region as well as cover the material costs for each AgRover.

Who are the end users of the AgRover and how many are there? 

A typical end-user for the AgRover would be a farmer or a transportation service business. The direct buyer for the AgRover would be a farming co-op, large farm, business, or local government. They have enough capital to purchase an AgRover to use it for transporting seed, fertilizer, water, crops, etc. Farmers can use the AgRover on a regular basis to irrigate, thresh, and process the crops or even to cultivate or plant fields. Farmers (or dedicated rental businesses) can also rent out the vehicle’s services to other farmers to earn more money while boosting the productivity of other farms. A smallholder farmer with no way to irrigate his crops could rent an AgRover and pump water to boost his/her field’s yield. Additionally, smallholders could rent the AgRover to transport their harvest. In Nigeria alone, we are targeting an estimated 2.8 million medium to large farms. 

Who are/What is MAPS?

MAPS, (http://MobileAgPower.com), is an LLC that owns the rights to AgRover on top of other technologies that help empower farmers across Sub-Saharan Africa. We partner with NGOs and technical centers across Africa to share our technical experience in the production of AgRovers. We bring the micro-factory setup and installation to our partners while they receive the AgRover manufacturing drawings, specs, etc to fully build the vehicle to their own specification. Helping this campaign goes 100% to our partners in Africa who are entirely focused on producing AgRovers.

Any links to view where you're featured?

Planet Forward

Big Ten Network

ASME ISHOW USA 2015

TechCon

Siemens

Edge Factor

Does the AgRover have any competitors?

No other competitor can achieve the services and delivery that the AgRover can achieve at the same cost point. Passenger cars and trucks incur importation taxes driving their costs high. Trikes and motorbikes cannot deliver comparable carrying capacity nor the ability to tow implements and power attachments. It should also be noted that the safety of these vehicles, especially the two-wheel tractor should be taken into consideration. Motorbikes and two-wheel tractors are prone to tipping over in the off-road terrain across Africa.

Our main product, the AgRover, helps do just that! The ProblemMany farmers in the developing world lack access to technologies that can help drive success to their farm. Countless hours of time and energy are spent each day on endless tasks. They endure a large workload from fetching water at a nearby well to delivering goods to market by hand or head load. This results in multiple inefficiencies that lead to lower crop yields and ultimately less income for the farmer. Our Solution, the AgRover Vehicle Design Multipurpose PlatformWe have optimized the design to be affordable and entirely manufacturable from parts and tools available across Africa. Feedback from our end users has shown us the importance of offering power to attachments like water pumps, generators, maize grinders, and field implements. story:
Surfwheel SU Electric Skateboard
Experience Surfing on Land

 

Surfwheel is a revolutionary electric skateboard. Our team has extensively researched on how to develop a patent pending wheel that mimics the act of surfing on land. We've partnered with Warners Bros. to bring you the superhero SU versions. Surfwheel brings the ocean waves and the mountain snow to you! Feel the rush of surfing a wave or boarding down a mountain just by walking out of your front door.

 
"Feel the sensation of on land surfing. The rider on the video did not make turn movement but slightly apply pressure to drift the board from left to right and from right to left. There is no need to use a remote control to control speed. Your body motion determines the speed for acceleration or stop. Surfwheel is the world closet electric vehicle that mimics the act of Surfing on land.", Ondy

Coolest riding experience ever

Surfwheel SU allows you to use your body motion to accelerate and stop. The unique tire tread is designed to simulate surfing, giving you the thrill of on-land surfing. The full color LED light enables you to show off every move of yours at night.

Carry with you to surf around the city

Easily carry the 8kg (17lb.) lightweight Surfwheel SU around the city. A single charge of Surfwheel SU supports up to 15km (9m) distance ride. Bring an extra battery and surf non-stop for the whole day.

 

Safest ride on Surfwheel SU

Equipped with anti-fall front/rear assisted wheels and auto-switch on/stop feature, Surfwheel SU provides a safe and fun ride.

Reinventing the Wheel for On Land Surfing

Over the past two years, our team has extensively researched on how to develop a wheel that mimics the act of surfing on land. Our patent-pending design includes:

  • Unique tire tread pattern and radius
  • BMX bicycle tire radius
  • Hard rubber tire provides durability and fail-proof ride
  • Assisted Stabilizing

We've partnered with Warners Bros. to bring you the superhero SU versions or alternatively you can choose from our original Surfwheel SU black or blue version.

Surfwheeling is a sport! Wear protective gear at all times. It's easy to learn but requires practice to master. Use the motion of your body to control - lean forward to move and lean sideways to stop. Follow your intuition to move and swing just like you do while surfing.

How to start

  1. Wear protective gear before you start.
  2. Step on one side of Surfwheel. Then, put another foot on the Press button.
  3. Surfwheel will be initialized and you can start your ride. When you ride, your foot must remain on the Press button.
 

How to stop

  1. Lean sideways 30 degrees to stop or remove your foot from the Press button for over 2 seconds.
 

Connect to App

The Surfwheel App is available for Android and IOS. Use the Surfwheel App to update firmware, check your battery status, adjust the LED color, and track your speed.

 

Please support us

We need your support to bring Surfwheel SU to the market.

USD399/499

Surfwheel SU MSRP is USD529 (Black/Blue)/USD599(Character version). Support us to bring the Surfwheel SU to the market with up to 40% discount. We are giving all surfwheelers surfwheel tshirts.

 

 

Awesome Experience - Nice Surf Feeling!

High Quality Product - Love it!

Chris Eberle, German Surfwheeler

Surfwheel provides the comfort of long board and the flexbility or short board. I have been having wonderful, enjoyable surfwheel ride with my family!

Lea Brandao Lopez, USA Surfwheeler

We road it for around 10 minutes, and it was a blast!

Thank you for creating such a fun product.

Chelsea Lau, USA Surfwheeler

On land surfing, this is what I have been looking for.

Jin, Korean Surfwheeler

The excitement of water surfing comes instantaneously from surfwheeling.

Joe Chan, China Surfwheeler

You deserve a better SURFING ride

Founded in 2014, Koofy Development Limited designs, develops, and manufactures light electric vehicles. We previously worked at Phillips and Belkin, but decided to follow our passion to bring the surfing on land experience to the market. We are a tech startup under Hong Kong Science Park Incubatees Program. We were selected as a Top 10 startup in 2016.

Most creators of electric skateboards and self-balanced vehicles claim to create "the last mile" vehicles to carry commuters from public transportation to their final destinations. This has never been our intention. Surfwheel is designed for fun and recreation.

Introducing the Surfwheel team

Founder/Investor - Felix Lio believes that we will become no.1 in delivering best surfing on land experience electric vechicles.

Software System Architect - Kenneth Lui, MSc/BSc, is now thinking of adding Social network game on facebook via Surfwheel App.

Founder/Surfwheeler - Ondy Ma, MA/BSc/BBA, top surfwheeler and 5 time product awards winner, execrise hard to keep in shape to compete.

Product Research Engineer - Antony, PhD. in Material Science, helped research on 350+ related patents to ensure that we are not just different but better.

COO - Alex Chiu, MBA, will hand deliver the Surfwheel SU to your door.

+ few surfwheel experts from the US, Japan, Malaysia, Korea and Sweden who supported mechincal/EE design and engineering.

2016 CES Asia Innovation Award - Surfwheel R1
2016 SME's Youth Entrepeneuship Award
2016 Top 10 startup pick 2016 China - reported by China Daily

  1. 1. Where are products made/designed?

    Koofy Development Limited is based in Hong Kong; we work with partners who are from the US, Japan, Malaysia, Korea and Sweden to design Surfwheel R1/SU. Surfwheel is produced by highly qualified manufacturers located in Shenzhen, China.

  2. 2. How do I receive the goods?

    All goods will be sent with first priority carrier. The prototypes for the Surfwheel SU were complete in early November. With your support, we are ready to move into mass production.

     

  3. 3. Why do we have Batman, Wonder Woman and Superman characters on Surfwheel SU?

    We partnered with Warner Bros. to obtain a BVS 2016 character license. We are excited to bring these superhero themes to Surfwheel SU models.

  4. 4. How do I check my order status?

    We will send out three emails to you. The first email will come to you after the campaign is complete. The second email will provide you the estimated shipment date. The third email will provide you the shipment detail. You can reach us anytime at info@surf-wheel.com for enquires.

  5. 5. Can I travel Surfwheel SU with me on flight?

    We've traveled with Surfwheel R1/SU on many occasions. We recommend adding the Surfwheel to your luggage and removing the battery to carry on separately. Consult your airline and airport authority for more details.

  6. 6. What is the Warranty for SU?

    Surfwheel warrants to the original purchaser that the batteries are free of defects in battery, motor and electronic components for 1 year from the original date of purchase.

surfwheeltd
info@surf-wheel.com
surf-wheel.com

story:
Currently building prototypes, with our 4 year proven technologies!

Join us to test-drive an EleCa Prototype from September 2018 by getting a PERK!

A Unique Journey

We want to take you on a journey with us. A unique journey of redefining urban transport. We are calling this journey EleCa. It is an exercise in renewables, a fun journey and a product that should revolutionise urban transport.

And, you can be a part of it, by selecting a PERK or by joining the "Influence Team" and help us defining our new and revolutionary EV! Based on early feedback, we recommend you place your deposit on one of the early deliveries. Check PERKS on your right-hand side of this page.

You would be joining a working group made up of amanoauto executives who for the last 5 years have been building and assisting in the builds of EVs as well as a team of UTS students with background and keen interest in EV's, rallies, robotics, autonomous driving and design.

We welcome you to be a part of this exciting and innovative initiative.

 

Background Research

According to a survey conducted by the US Department of Transport, an average driver covers 47 kms (27 miles) a day (https://www.rita.dot.gov/bts/sites/rita.dot.gov...). Another survey carried-out at the European Environment Agency shows that there are rarely more than 2 persons in a car (http://www.eea.europe.eu/data-and-maps/indicato...).

Research Comments

 

  • "Outstandingly futuristic design, shape is energy saving, less loss of energy, three wheel so less friction. Will buy if less than $10,000".
  • "Nice design, nice shape, nice to see. Opening hatch cool. Very modern. Maybe needs a bit more speed than 50km/h. Good price if less than $10 000. SDC. Probably would buy".
  • "Needs some sort of a window to see out when sitting in the back. So window design important. Needs a storage room. Would buy."
    • Comment from EleCa Team - All glass roof "dome" means there are no visibility issues!
  • "Design is futuristic, bit too much. Clashes a bit with the current trends in vehicles because its too futuristic design. Very different from todayʼs cars. If itʼs autonomous then fits its futuristic design better and people would perhaps want it more."
  • "Good aerodynamics. Probably would buy it."

Advantages

  • Lighter, wind-cheating, lower drag and tear-drop shape.
  • 2 models - One motorised cycle categorisation. The launch model of the EleCa fits the quadricycle category in Europe. The three-wheel format allows us to categorise it as a motorised cycle in those countries and territories (like Australia) where the quadricycle category does not exist; one that will arrive later, a relatively unlimited speed model for those that prefer a full-feature vehicle.
  • Following much research and development, we believe that we have come-up with a vehicle and a design that is fun, functional, cost-effective to acquire and run, for many years of fun transportation. 

 

Disclaimer
The final production EleCa. might look marginally different from our conceptual designs in order to meet legislation requirements.

 

Project Timeline

EleCa Prototype Roadshow

Technical Specifications

 

We are making the ignition key obsolete

Instead use your device to:

  • Access your vehicle
  • Check the status of the various parameters of your EleCA.
  • Precondition your EleCA for creature comfort.
  • Stay informed of your charge status and where the next charging station is.
  • Be alarmed should your EleCA sense any danger while you're away.
  • Check speed and other driving parameters.
  • (you shall also get a plastic card should you or anybody with your permission, require access to the EleCa.

 

Remote Control

Your Android or iPhone device becomes a golden trove of information about your EleCa.
Entry and starter keys are now a thing of the past. Access to your EleCa is optionally
available through your handheld device as are the key statistics and travel information.
Speed, driving-time, charge status and other key statistics are readily available on your
device that has a specific holding bay on the dash board.

Even when you leave the EleCa, it will automatically lock and keep it at your pre-set
temperature to avoid you entering the vehicle when it feels like an oven. As you get to your
destination, you’re able to monitor your car statistics like charging status remotely as well as
be alarmed of any tempering. You’re also able to follow or immobilise (where allowed by
the local roads authority) your vehicle in the unlikely event that will get stolen.

 

EleServ

Electric cars are known for their reliability. Unlike combustion engine powered vehicles, EV's do not have complex engines with complex and regular service requirements. All that drives the EleCa is a refined but simple electric motor and lithium batteries. Not much to go wrong there!
Furthermore, consumable items like brake pads last a lot longer as the EleCa utilises regenerative breaking to slow down the vehicle. So, in 80% of the cases, the mechanical brakes are not being utilised, making the brake pads last about five times longer.


However, the unimaginable can always happen and should you have any issues, EleServ is always on standby through our handheld app pre-empting a break-down or ready to assist you should something go wrong. The first support stage of EleServ is remote diagnosis and repairs wherever possible. The second stage is scheduling pre diagnosed repairs at our premises. EleCa will have a service centre in every country it sells vehicles into and will grow a network of service centres within these countries at a second stage, as required.

 

Features

 

Electric

Our motivation is renewable energy and our passion is motoring. We believe that a vehicle such as the EleCa is what may accelerate the real change of cost-effective, environmentally friendly transportation, slowly and surely cleaning the smog and toxic cities we have inherited.

 

Remote controlled

Entry and starter keys are now a thing of the past. Access to your EleCa is optionally available through your handheld device as are the key statistics and travel information. Speed, driving-time, charge status and other key statistics are readily available on your device that has a specific holding bay on the dash board.

 

EleServ

EleServ is always on standby through our handheld app pre-empting a break-down or ready to assist you should something go wrong. The first support stage of EleServ is remote diagnosis and repairs wherever possible. The second stage is scheduling pre diagnosed repairs at our premises.

 

Charging

Charging your EleCa is no different to charging your mobile device. It is able to be charged at home, the office or at friends’ place. Charging to 100% takes a bit longer as our unique battery management system has an inbuilt routine, trickle charging and balancing, ensuring long battery life.

 

And yes, there is more......

EleCa is self diagnosing many times a second and sends us alerts should anything be amiss so we may schedule a visit with a replacement part; even before it fails and at no cost to you for the first 8 years of ownership.

Furthermore, the batteries in your EleCa are guaranteed for 8 years (please find further details in our T's & C's on our site).


Charging

Charging your EleCa is no different to charging your mobile device. It is able to be charged at home, the office or at friends’ place. Charging to 80% could take as little as three hours. Charging to 100% takes a bit longer as our unique battery management system has an inbuilt routine, trickle charging and balancing, ensuring long battery life. Certainly, adapters are available to charge your EleCa through third party charging stations.

 

Who are we and why we shall succeed

AmanoAuto has been in the business of assisting in the development of electric transportation (www.amanoauto.com), specialising in customised classic vehicle electrification and battery solutions for EV's as well as home storage units (www.voltwall.com), for over 5 years.

Our motivation is renewable energy, our passion is motoring and believe our future needs to be sustainable if we are going to have one! This, and our experience and expertise in EV and battery technologies, is what the EleCa is born of. We believe that a vehicle such as the EleCa is what may accelerate the real change of cost-effective, environmentally friendly transportation, slowly and surely cleaning the smog and the toxic cities we have inherited.

We believe our perks are of significant value to our contributors. You are directly contributing to our motivation and passion to see our cities cleaned-up from toxic gases while rendering them fun places to get around with the EleCa, that puts a smile on the faces of those that see it getting-around and especially on the faces of those driving it. We intend for the EleCa to become a global phenomenon.

The amazing 1974 Citroen DS Pallas Electric

Aldo is the inventor and original designer of the EleCa. This followed on the heels of his superb Citroen DS Pallas that he conceived and converted to electric 4 years ago. The vehicle is a marvel and a joy to drive and "It brings an EV smile to my face everytime I drive it, even 4 years later". 

For 18 months he formed metal, welded brackets, created battery systems, soldered wires, programmed controllers, mated motors and spent countless hours with his friends at AEVA, the Australian EV Association to build what is billed as one of the best ever conversions in Australia.

And now all that technology, experience and more has made its way into the EleCa.

However, without the following key people this campaign could never have happened.

 

Eliminate costly complexity while protecting the environment

The Past - 3 cylinder petrol engine (traditional vehicle)

thousands of moving parts to go wrong!

 

The Future (EleCa - Simple, low maintenance AC Electric Motor (EV/EleCa)

Just one moving part!

 

How many dollars do you spend at the mechanic over the lifetime of your vehicle? You might buy 2 EleCa's!

Being electric, beyond tyres and rarely the brake pads, there is ZERO servicing costs for your EleCa and seeing it effectively runs on a trickle of electricity, EleCa provides thousands of fun and relatively free kilometers of service.

 

What we ask and what you get

We’re looking to raise USD175,000. This will assist us in the following:
Finish-off the first prototypes that includes all key aspects in making it a driveable vehicle as
well as having first reviews by the road traffic authorities and auto magazines. Build the first pre-production vehicle that would have most of the issues ironed out, including modifications to address requirements and feedback from road traffic authorities as well as the auto magazines, by around September 2018.

During this process, we shall also request feedback from you.

As early as 2018, those that have purchased a test drive perk, get the opportunity to test drive the EleCa. We believe you will love the EleCa so much that we are offering you a  holding perks that places you in a queue to be one of the first to own an EleCa. 

We shall start limited production and deliveries in  early 2019. Those holding perks and deposits, shall be allocated the first production EleCa's in a first-in first-served fashion.

 

Join us in funding a revolution

When we started converting vehicles to electric around five years ago, there was a general
disinterest in EVs. Tesla has changed all this and made EVs not only popular, but also
desirable. However, even when the Model 3 arrives, it will still cost over USD 35,000.00
placing it out of the reach of the masses. You have the opportunity of funding a revolution.
We believe the EleCa is the first fun vehicle for the masses that is not only financially
accessible but also very desirable.


EVs are relatively simple vehicles when compared to the ones with internal combustion
engines. However, much knowledge, expertise and experience is required in battery
technologies, specifically lithium batteries. Amano Auto has specific capabilities in this area
having built or assisted in building a number of battery kits for numerous vehicles as well as
developing a domestic battery unit for voltWALL (www.voltWALL.com). All this technology is
integral in the EleCa.

The inventor of EleCa is also the Chairman of a mobility software company and the vehicle
will be greatly enhanced with such things as remote monitoring and management from
your mobile device. The mobile application will also serve as your vehicle’s monitoring,
diagnostics and statistics system.

 

Risks & Challenges

We believe we have resolved many of the technological problems relating to building reliable EVs over the last 5 years. Certainly, there is no iron-clad guarantee that everything will go as planned, and as far as start-ups and new and ground-breaking projects go, unexpected situations will certainly face us.

Our network of EV and battery technology specialists as well as our track-record and experience will ensure that such unexpected situations will be resolved. We also benefit from advisers that specialize in disruptions and new technologies as well as advanced business practices. This will ensure that challenges are able to be faced, understood and resolved before our customers are impacted.
story_txt:
Currently building prototypes, with our 4 year proven technologies!Join us to test-drive an EleCa Prototype from September 2018 by getting a PERK!A Unique Journey
We want to take you on a journey with us. A unique journey of redefining urban transport. We are calling this journey EleCa. It is an exercise in renewables, a fun journey and a product that should revolutionise urban transport.And, you can be a part of it, by selecting a PERK or by joining the "Influence Team" and help us defining our new and revolutionary EV! Based on early feedback, we recommend you place your deposit on one of the early deliveries. Check PERKS on your right-hand side of this page.You would be joining a working group made up of amanoauto executives who for the last 5 years have been building and assisting in the builds of EVs as well as a team of UTS students with background and keen interest in EV's, rallies, robotics, autonomous driving and design.We welcome you to be a part of this exciting and innovative initiative. Background Research
According to a survey conducted by the US Department of Transport, an average driver covers 47 kms (27 miles) a day (https://www.rita.dot.gov/bts/sites/rita.dot.gov...). Another survey carried-out at the European Environment Agency shows that there are rarely more than 2 persons in a car (http://www.eea.europe.eu/data-and-maps/indicato...).Research Comments
 
"Outstandingly futuristic design, shape is energy saving, less loss of energy, three wheel so less friction. Will buy if less than $10,000".
"Nice design, nice shape, nice to see. Opening hatch cool. Very modern. Maybe needs a bit more speed than 50km/h. Good price if less than $10 000. SDC. Probably would buy".
"Needs some sort of a window to see out when sitting in the back. So window design important. Needs a storage room. Would buy."Comment from EleCa Team - All glass roof "dome" means there are no visibility issues!

"Design is futuristic, bit too much. Clashes a bit with the current trends in vehicles because its too futuristic design. Very different from todayʼs cars. If itʼs autonomous then fits its futuristic design better and people would perhaps want it more."
"Good aerodynamics. Probably would buy it."
Advantages

Lighter, wind-cheating, lower drag and tear-drop shape.
2 models - One motorised cycle categorisation. The launch model of the EleCa fits the quadricycle category in Europe. The three-wheel format allows us to categorise it as a motorised cycle in those countries and territories (like Australia) where the quadricycle category does not exist; one that will arrive later, a relatively unlimited speed model for those that prefer a full-feature vehicle.
Following much research and development, we believe that we have come-up with a vehicle and a design that is fun, functional, cost-effective to acquire and run, for many years of fun transportation. 
 DisclaimerThe final production EleCa. might look marginally different from our conceptual designs in order to meet legislation requirements. Project Timeline
EleCa Prototype Roadshow
Technical Specifications
 We are making the ignition key obsolete
Instead use your device to:
Access your vehicle
Check the status of the various parameters of your EleCA.
Precondition your EleCA for creature comfort.
Stay informed of your charge status and where the next charging station is.
Be alarmed should your EleCA sense any danger while you're away.
Check speed and other driving parameters.
(you shall also get a plastic card should you or anybody with your permission, require access to the EleCa.

www.capribikes.com

 

You can buy Capri E-Bikes worldwide online through Lovelybikes.com (en) or Biciclasica.com (es).
We have sold out our first production of 2021 in less than a week but we are already working on the second one of the year and our bikes will be ready for this summer.

Leave us your contact to let us know when they will be available again.

 

Our marketplace:

www.lovelybikes.com

 

Electric? Yes.

Serie Z is just a dream. Two amazing models of electric bikes different of all you have seen: Capri Metz & Capri Azur. The electric bikes of the Capri’s Serie Z are inspired by european bikes of the 70’s. Serie Z are minimalist electric bikes, stylish, light and durable.

story:
MAGMOV 3000



FEATURES

3000 watts, 120V/230V

Compact design

Super quiet

Power for camping, tailgating, and home power

MAGMOV can operate a wide variety of appliances, including microwave, refrigerators, hair dryer, small AC units, and much more up to 3000W.


Super quiet

So quiet, your neighbors will thank you. MAGMOV  operates at Super quiet. This makes it ideal for home , camping, and any other activity that requires quiet operation.


Advanced inverter technology - reliable power for computers and other sensitive equipment

MAGMOV inverter technology means stable, clean power in a small, light  package. The precision of  MAGMOV’s inverter technology ensures our inverter generator produce power that is as reliable as the power you get from your outlets at home.


3 year residential and commercial warranty

You can rest easy, knowing your MAGMOV is covered from top to bottom for 3 full years.


Recessed convenience light for ease of use in the dark

Easy to see the control panel at night.


Circuit protected

Protects the generator from being overloaded.


SPECIFICATION

Engine

Magnetic Fields

AC Output

230V 3000W (13A)

120V 3000W (25A)

Starting System

Backup Battery

Run Time

Continuously

Dimensions (L x W x H)

500mm x 250mm x 275mm

19.68” x 9.84” 10.82”

Weight

10Kg

26.5 lbs.

Residential Warranty

3 Years

Commercial Warranty

3 Years


APPLICATIONS

This generator can power the following common applications.

·  Refrigerator or Freezer (Energy Star)

·  Microwave Oven

·  Incandescent Lights

·  Portable fan

·  TV / DVD

·  Hair Dryer

·  Coffee Maker

·  Computer

·  Garage Door Opener

·  Blender


FAQ

Q: How MAGMOV does works?

A: MAGMOV uses the Magnetic Fields .


Q: Is really MAGMOV no needs any fuel or solar ?

A: MAGMOV is totally free electric generator and no need any source of energy like fuel or solar or anything else just it uses Magnetic Fields.


Q: How MAGMOV can save $300/month?

A: The average price of electricity is around $ 0.15 for 1kWh. So if we use MAGMOV continuously we will use 3kW per hour, it means $0.15 X 3= $0.45/Hour so in 1 day we will use $0.45 X 24 = $10.80 and then in 30 days we will use : $10.80 X 30 = $324 . 


Q: Is MAGMOV’s output power stable ?

A: MAGMOV uses voltage regulator so the output power is totally stable .


Q: What is the output voltage of MAGMOV?

A: MAGMOV has 2 different output voltage 120V and 230V . You can select the required output voltage by using “OUTPUT VOLTAGE SELECTOR” .


Q: Why flexible goal?

A: We are a company specialized in design and manufacture of the new technologies and different devices. And this campaign help us to produce faster and easier , so we can focus just to produce the future products .Regarding flexible goal ,No matter the fund raise be succeed or not .


Q: When does MAGMOV will ship? 

A: We expect MAGMOV to begin shipping worldwide in September 2016.


Q: Does MAGMOV  have warranty and after sale services? 

A: MAGMOV has international worldwide warranty for 3 year and our service center will service worldwide .
