story:
Meet the newest, most affordable and innovative self-balancing motion board (First 30 units only $449).

The Urby Board is incredibly easy to use, allowing anybody to hop on and drive on their first ever try. The technology behind the Urby Board is set up to guarantee a fun and safe experience for any user. Not only does the board look good, with top level design being applied to its inner and outer core, it will also allow users to travel long distances effortlessly through any kind of terrain while keeping their hands free.

After winning third price at a Startup competition at the University of Cambridge (UK), our team is humbled by the opportunity to present the Urby Board on Indiegogo, and is excited to take this innovative product to market together.


1. TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

The Urby Board has two built-in, high-quality gyro-sensors that allows 360° turns. Its 10’’ wheels provide stability, allow the user to overcome obstacles and ride through any type of terrain. Moreover, its green and reliable Samsung battery allows for up to 19.8 miles (32 km) of travel on a single charge, depending on the model. The Urby Board can also go up to a maximum speed of 8.4 MPH (14 km/h), making it the most powerful model of its kind.

2. PRODUCT FEATURES

- 3-axis gyroscopic sensor, 3-axis accelerometer, temperature sensor

- Battery level indicator

- Eco friendly (zero emissions), whisper quiet, heavy duty, 350watt, brushless electric motors

- 3 minute auto shut-down timer

- Shock/bump absorbing, 10″ (25cm) inflatable rubber tires

- 32 low-draw LED safety lights

- Compact, portable, 100-240VAC lipo balance charger w/ auto shutoff and battery condition LED

- Cast aluminum frame

- Water Resistance: The Urby board is protected from dust and small splashes of water. 



3. LEARNING MODES

The Urby Board comes equipped with an external remote control device that will allow its users to switch between riding modes, depending on their proficiency levels. The Riding Modes are: 

Beginner = less sensitive

 Advanced = more sensitive 

To switch between modes, simply turn on using the power button on the URBY Board. Before hopping on the board, press the bottom button on the remote (MODE BUTTON). The Urby board will “beep” once indicating the mode has been successfully activated. You can then switch modes again at a later time by getting off your board and pressing the same bottom button on the remote control. Urby board will always “beep” to confirm it has successfully switched between modes.


4. ABOUT US

Based in Spain and California, our team is comprised of an electrical/mechanical engineer, a product manager and a finance graduate who share a passion for creating disruptive technology.  We are incredibly excited and humbled by the opportunity to present the Urby Board on Indiegogo and to implement all feedback into the next iterations of Urby’s Boards. Funds from this project will go towards improving design, prototyping future releases, testing, and generating our first point of entry to market. We are excited to have you as a potential customer and look forward to seeing you on your Urby Board – the most powerful, affordable and fun self-balancing motion board out there!


5. FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Is the Urby Board really that easy to use?

Yes, absolutely. The Urby Board is designed to be user-friendly. No matter your age or physical ability, it will take you between 2 - 5 minutes to drive your Urby Board effortlessly.

How fast can it go?

The maximum speed is 8.7 MPH (14 km/h)

Maximum weight limit?

The maximum user weight is 220lb (100kg)

What is Urby Boards’ autonomy?

The Urby Board can ride between 8 – 20 miles (12 – 32 km) on a single charge, depending on the model.

How long will it take me to charge Urby Boards’ battery?

The charging time is 2 hours.

Can it go uphill? 

Of course! Because of the power that URBY BOARD has it can go up a 15 degree incline which should be adequate for most roads.

SUPPORT

What if something happens to my Urby Board? 

The Urby Team provides first-in-class technical support and offers a 1 year warranty for its Urby Board. we offer the possiblity of a refund if the product is not as showed in indiegogo.

SHIPPING

Spain $19

Europe $49

USA and Canada $149

Rest of the world $199

6. ORDERS

We have the product completely developed.

Order now and you will be among the first to receive your URBY Board 4-6 weeks after the end of this campaign, November 2015, Ready for christmas gift!

7.REFERRAL PROGRAM

Refer to your friends, family and acquaintances and earn 10% credit of their contribution!

This means that if 10 of your friends order a URBY BOARD, you could earn 1 URBY BOARD for free! 

How Does it Work?
1. Log into your Indiegogo account or click here to signup for an Indiegogo account if you have not yet already created an account.

2. Navigate to the Wave Electric Bike campaign page and click the "link" icon on the left side of the campaign and then paste this link into an email to send to all youre friends. Or click the Facebook, Twitter, or Google Plus icons to share your unique link on your social media accounts.

3. View your total referral contribution amount by logging into your profile in the upper right and then click "Referrals".


EXTRAS

CARRY BAG $39
story_txt:
Meet the newest, most affordable and innovative self-balancing motion board (First 30 units only $449).The Urby Board is incredibly easy to use, allowing anybody to hop on and drive on their first ever try. The technology behind the Urby Board is set up to guarantee a fun and safe experience for any user. Not only does the board look good, with top level design being applied to its inner and outer core, it will also allow users to travel long distances effortlessly through any kind of terrain while keeping their hands free.After winning third price at a Startup competition at the University of Cambridge (UK), our team is humbled by the opportunity to present the Urby Board on Indiegogo, and is excited to take this innovative product to market together.1. TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONSThe Urby Board has two built-in, high-quality gyro-sensors that allows 360° turns. Its 10’’ wheels provide stability, allow the user to overcome obstacles and ride through any type of terrain. Moreover, its green and reliable Samsung battery allows for up to 19.8 miles (32 km) of travel on a single charge, depending on the model. The Urby Board can also go up to a maximum speed of 8.4 MPH (14 km/h), making it the most powerful model of its kind.2. PRODUCT FEATURES- 3-axis gyroscopic sensor, 3-axis accelerometer, temperature sensor- Battery level indicator- Eco friendly (zero emissions), whisper quiet, heavy duty, 350watt, brushless electric motors- 3 minute auto shut-down timer- Shock/bump absorbing, 10″ (25cm) inflatable rubber tires- 32 low-draw LED safety lights- Compact, portable, 100-240VAC lipo balance charger w/ auto shutoff and battery condition LED- Cast aluminum frame- Water Resistance: The Urby board is protected from dust and small splashes of water. 


3. LEARNING MODESThe Urby Board comes equipped with an external remote control device that will allow its users to switch between riding modes, depending on their proficiency levels. The Riding Modes are: Beginner = less sensitive Advanced = more sensitive To switch between modes, simply turn on using the power button on the URBY Board. Before hopping on the board, press the bottom button on the remote (MODE BUTTON). The Urby board will “beep” once indicating the mode has been successfully activated. You can then switch modes again at a later time by getting off your board and pressing the same bottom button on the remote control. Urby board will always “beep” to confirm it has successfully switched between modes.4. ABOUT USBased in Spain and California, our team is comprised of an electrical/mechanical engineer, a product manager and a finance graduate who share a passion for creating disruptive technology.  We are incredibly excited and humbled by the opportunity to present the Urby Board on Indiegogo and to implement all feedback into the next iterations of Urby’s Boards. Funds from this project will go towards improving design, prototyping future releases, testing, and generating our first point of entry to market. We are excited to have you as a potential customer and look forward to seeing you on your Urby Board – the most powerful, affordable and fun self-balancing motion board out there!5. FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONSIs the Urby Board really that easy to use?Yes, absolutely. The Urby Board is designed to be user-friendly. Because of the power that URBY BOARD has it can go up a 15 degree incline which should be adequate for most roads.SUPPORTWhat if something happens to my Urby Board? The Urby Team provides first-in-class technical support and offers a 1 year warranty for its Urby Board. we offer the possiblity of a refund if the product is not as showed in indiegogo.SHIPPINGSpain $19Europe $49USA and Canada $149Rest of the world $1996. story:
Power-Bikes

Everyday, you can see more and more e-bikes out on our streets. They are ecological and functional. But why do they all have to look the same? Truly boring, impersonal and simply limited to their task to take you from one place to another. With such looks it’s no coincidence that many people think e-bikes are for old people only.


But we are about to change that: Power-Bikes offers you no off the rack bike but a truly unique companion! With us you can individually customize your e-bike – we make it possible.
Power-Bikes takes the concept of e-bikes on a whole new level!


What We Offer

E-bikes are fun and give you a smooth ride! Power-Bikes offers an extraordinary, modern frame for this driving experience that has never been there before!

The frame consists of two frame plates which are professionally welded and bolt together. Thereby sockets create the connection between the frame plates and together with up to 160 processed screws they give the bike its distinctive look!


These frames stand for themselves and are an absolute eye-catcher! Together with the integrated e-motor they form THE ultimate bike!
But that’s not the end of the story – there are numerous options to customize your bike as you wish – suiting your style. The amount of screws and sockets especially contribute to the possibilities for the choice of colour. Extras like side bags or a stronger motor and lighting can optionally be added to the bike as well. Let your imagination run free and design your personal Power-Bike!


And this is how you can get your dream bike …

First, you should decide whether you would like to have your up to 2,50m long bike ready for use sent to your home or if you’d rather like to order it as a building kit and assemble it yourself. In both basic versions your bike will be completely black and will be equipped with a 250W 36V motor* and a 12aH 36V battery.
Please consider that there is a certain need for expertise to assemble the bike yourself when making your decision. When you’ve made your decision you can choose between the frames ‘Dayum’ and ‘Honeymoon’.

* With a body weight more than 90kg the upgrade to 500W 36V is necessary.


Moreover you have the possibility to buy more extras for your bike to personalize it according to your ideas: free choice of colour, a lighting kit, side bags or a stronger motor. When you’ve decided what level of customization you wish your bike to have send us an e-mail and tell us which frame you wish for and especially – in case you’ve chosen to take the free choice of colour as well – in which colours your bike should shine. Therefore, tell us which part should be coated in which colour by using the corresponding RAL numbers. For orientation you can have a look at a colour table here. In cases of special colour requests like gold or chrome please don’t hesitate to contact us!

                     

If you decide to pick the „Bike Ultimate“ version you’ll impress your surroundings with your over 2,70m long bike! Your bike will be equipped with all extras and moreover it’ll have a mudguard in the back, instead of the normal double crown fork we’ll install a chromed Springer fork and also a considerably larger battery and you’ll have free choice of colour!


The technology behind e-bikes caught my attention since the first contact. That was when my father told me about his new electric bike about a year ago. But going out on the streets with a classic e-bike myself? No,that wasn’t to my taste.

So I took action myself and up till today I created the frames Dayum and Honeymoon and am constantly working on new designs. I love working on the bikes! While tightening the screws I constantly get new ideas I would like to realise. But the best thing certainly is seeing the completed bike and riding it in the end!


With Dayum and Honeymoon you can easily go on tours through the city or countryside. The strong e-motor makes it possible to drive on uneven ground as well. Whether going on a ride to a picnic at the lake or a cruise through the city – with Power-Bikes you can easily get everywhere you like.

And because of the extraordinary and individual design you’ll definitely have all eyes on you! You’ll get to talk to interested people and not only you but also passing pedestrians will be enthused by your bike! This is also why I already arrange a little extra time when going on a ride.


After having built and successfully tested the first prototypes I need your support: new materials, components, and the development of the customizing program – I’m still at the beginning. I would love to design and built more bikes and especially expand the possibilities within the customization online and make them more user-friendly.

Support the campaign by pre-ordering your personal Power-Bike right now! And being quick pays off: The early-bird offers are limited and only there for a short time.

Help me and share the campaign with all your friends and bike enthusiasts and become a fan on Facebook and a part of the Power-Bikes movement – so that we enrich the streets with awesome bikes and more power!


After reaching our campaign target, we will do our best to process your orders and produce your bikes according to your ideas. Please consider that a certain time is necessary to fulfil your wishes and that orders will be completed chronologically. First come first served.



Timeline

The Team


Shipping Costs


FAQs

Where can I buy a Power-Bike?

Shortly after finishing the Indiegogo campaign it will be possible to buy a Power-Bike on our homepage Power-Bikes.de

 

Who do I contact in case I have a question concerning the product, payment or shipping?

Don't hesitate to send an e-mail with your name and question to: info@power-bikes.de


When are the perks expected to be shipped?

The first bikes will leave the garage from January on. Your Power-Bike will arrive at your place no later than February 2016.


Do the Power-Bikes meet the legal requirements of road traffic regulations?

No. Concerning the motorisation with 250W 36V and with pedal support the bikes do meet the legal requirements of the road traffic regulations, however a chainguard, bell, required reflectors and more are missing. These information correspond to the EU regulations. Nevertheless, please have in mind that different regulations are valid in different countries and therefore consider the respective road traffic regulations.


Can I assemble the bike as a lay person?

You should have some expertise concerning the assembly of a bike and be good with your hands. In case you don't have the expertise it might still be possible but we would strongly advise you to decide on the bike that's ready for use instead.

 

How far can I get with one fully loaded battery?

The range is as follows: (with a body weight up to 90kg)

  • 432Wh battery: 25-30 kilometers
  • 1260Wh battery: 70-75 kilometers

 

Must I pedal nevertheless?

As you like it! Every bike can be additionally equipped with a speed-up handle. There is also the possibility to leave out the pedal assistance and install the speed-up handle only.


How much does a full battery charge cost?

With 20 cents per 1000Wh:

  • 432Wh: 9 cents
  • 1260Wh: 25 cents

 






Power-Bikes

Immer mehr E-Bikes sind auf unseren Straßen vertreten. Sie sind ökologisch und zweckmäßig gebaut. Doch warum sehen sie dabei immer gleich aus?Langweilig, unpersönlich und NUR beschränkt auf ihre Aufgabe, dich von A nach B zu bringen. Nicht ohne Grund sehen viele Leute E-Bikes als „Alte-Herren-Räder“ an!


Das werden wir ändern: Power-Bikes bietet dir kein Rad von der Stange,sondern einen einzigartigen Weggefährten! Mit uns kannst du dir dein einzigartiges Bike zusammenstellen – wir machen es möglich.

Power-Bikes bringt E-Bikes auf ein neues Level!



Das bieten wir!

E-Bikes machen Spaß und bieten ein gutes Fahrgefühl! Power-Bikes verpasst diesem Fahrgefühl einen außergewöhnlichen,noch nie da gewesenen, modernen Rahmen!

Dieser besteht aus zwei massiven Rahmenplatten, die professionell verschweißt und verschraubt werden. Dabei schaffen Muffen die Verbindung zwischen den Platten und gemeinsam mit den bis zu 160 verarbeiteten Schrauben verleihen sie dem Bike seinen ganz besonderen Look!


Diese Rahmen stehen für sich und sind ein absoluter Hingucker! Gemeinsam mit dem integrierten E-Motor bilden sie DAS ultimative Bike! Doch dabei bleibt es nicht – es gibt zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, dein Bike zu individualisieren und deinem persönlichen Style anzupassen.

Beispielsweise trägt so auch die Vielzahl an Schrauben und Muffen dazu bei, dass die Bikes insbesondere auch farblich vielfältig gestaltet werden können. Extras wie Seitentaschen oder ein stärkerer Motor und Beleuchtung können dem Bike hinzugefügt werden. Lass deinem Geschmack freien Lauf und stelle dir dein persönliches Power-Bike zusammen!


Und so geht's zu deinem Traumbike...

Als erstes solltest du dir überlegen, ob du dein knapp 2,50m langes Bike bereits fertig zusammengebaut zu dir nach Hause geliefert haben möchtest oder ob du es als Bausatz selbstständig zusammen bauen willst. Bei beiden Basisvarianten ist dein Bike komplett schwarz und mit 250W 36V Motor* und 12aH 36V Akku ausgestattet. Bedenke bei deiner Entscheidung bitte, dass es eines gewissen Grads an Know-How bedarf, dein Bike zusammen zu bauen und auf jeden Fall entsprechende Erfahrung vorhanden sein sollte. Hast du dich entschieden, kannst du zwischen den Rahmen Dayum und Honeymoon wählen.

*Bei mehr als 90kg Körpergewicht ist das Upgrade auf 500W 36V erforderlich.


Darüber hinaus hast du die Möglichkeit, weitere Add-Ons für dein Bike zu kaufen, um es zu personalisieren: freie Farbwahl, ein Beleuchtungsset, Seitentaschen oder ein stärkerer Motor. Im Anschluss teilst du uns in einer E-Mail mit, welches Rahmenmodell du dir wünschst und speziell auch – falls du die freie Farbwahl gewählt hast – wie genau dein Bike farblich gestaltet werden soll. Schreib dafür auf, welches Bauteil in welcher Farbe erstrahlen soll und nutze dafür die entsprechende RAL-Nummer. Zur Orientierung steht dir hier eine Farbtabelle zur Verfügung. Bei besonderen Farbwünschen wie Gold oder Chrom kannst du uns gerne einfach kontaktieren! 

                        

Falls du dich für die Variante „Bike Ultimate“ entscheidest,beeindruckst du dein Umfeld mit deinem über 2,70m langem Bike! Dein gewählter Rahmen (Dayum oder Honeymoon) verfügt über alle Add-Ons und ist zusätzlich mit einem hinteren Schutzblech ausgestattet, statt einer normalen Doppelbrückengabel ist eine verchromte Springergabel verbaut und es besitzt einen deutlich größeren Akku.


Die Technik der E-Bikes hat mich seit dem ersten Kontakt her fasziniert,doch selbst mit einem klassischen E-bike auf die Straße? Nein, das entsprach nicht meinem Geschmack. So wurde ich selbst tätig und entwarf bis zum heutigen Tag die Rahmenmodelle Dayum und Honeymoon und arbeitet stets an weiteren Ideen und Designs.

Die Arbeit an den Bikes macht mir riesigen Spaß. Beim Schrauben fallen mir immer neue Ideen ein, die ich gerne noch verwirklichen möchte. Aber am Ende letztlich das fertige Bike zu sehen und endlich zu fahren ist das Größte!


Mit Dayum und Honeymoon von Power-Bikes kann man problemlos Touren durch Stadt und Land unternehmen. Der leistungsstarke E-Motor ermöglichtes auch auf unebenen Feldwegen problemlos durch das Gelände zu gelangen. Ob also zum Picknick an den See oder zum Cruisen durch die Stadt – mit Power-Bikes kann man überall entspannt hingelangen. Dabei zieht man auf Grund des individuellen Designs garantiert die Blicke auf sich. Man kommt ins Gespräch und nicht nur man selbst sondern auch vorüberziehende Passanten sind begeistert! Dafür plane ich bei meinen Touren fast schon immer mehr Zeit ein!


Nachdem die ersten Prototypen gebaut und erfolgreich getestet sind, brauche ich eure Unterstützung: Neue Materialen, Bauelemente, die Weiterentwicklung des Customizing-Programms – ich stehe noch ganz am Anfang. Gerne möchte ich mehr Bikes entwerfen und bauen und speziell auch die Möglichkeiten im Bereich des Customizing ausbauen und sie online benutzerfreundlich gestalten.

Supportet die Kampagne, indem ihr schon jetzt euer persönliches Power-Bike vorbestellt! Und schnell sein lohnt sich: Die „early-bird“ Angebote sind nur in begrenzter Stückzahl und nur für kurze Zeit verfügbar.

Helft mir und teilt die Kampagne mit euren Freunden und allen Bike-Enthusiasten und werdet Fan auf Facebook und teil der Power-Bike Bewegung – auf dass wir die Straße mit schöneren Bikes und mehr Power versehen!


Sobald das Kampagnenziel erreicht ist werden wir eure Bestellungen schnellstmöglich bearbeiten und eure Bikes nach euren Wünschen zu produzieren. Bitte habt Verständnis, dass es einer gewissen Zeit bedarf, eure individuellen Wünsche zu erfüllen und die Bestellungen chronologisch abgearbeitet werden. First come first served.

 


Der Zeitplan


Das Team


Versandkostentabelle


FAQs

Wo kann ich ein Power-Bike kaufen?

Kurz nachdem Ende der Indiegogo Kampagne ist der Kauf eines Power-Bikes über unsere Homepage Power-Bikes.de möglich.

 

An wen kann ich mich wenden, wenn ich Fragen zum Produkt, Versand oder zur Bezahlung habe?

Bei Fragen könnt ihr euch gerne mit eurem Anliegen an info@power-bikes.de wenden!


Wann werden die Power-Bikes voraussichtlich versendet?

Die ersten Bikes werden die Werkstatt ab Januar verlassen. Spätestens soll dein Power-Bike im Februar 2016 bei dir eintreffen


Entsprechen die Power-Bikes der Straßenverkehrsordnung?

Nein. Von der Motorisierung mit 250W 36V und NUR mit reiner Tretunterstützung entsprechen die Bikes der StVO, jedoch fehlen Kettenschutz, Klingel, Reflektoren und mehr. Diese Angaben beziehen sich auf die Richtlinien der EU. Trotzdem sind die entsprechenden Regulierungen der einzelnen Länder zu beachten.


Kann ich als Laie das Power-Bikes Baukit zusammenbauen?

Du solltest schon mal ein Fahrrad zusammengebaut haben und handwerkliche Erfahrungen haben. Möglich ist es sicherlich, doch wir können davon nur abraten.

 

Wie weit kann ich mit einer Akkuladung fahren?
Die Reichweite beträgt: (Körpergewicht bis 90 Kilo)
  • 432Wh-Akku: 25-30 Kilometer
  • 1260Wh-Akku: 70-75 Kilometer

 

Muss ich trotzdem treten?

Wie gewünscht. Jedes Bike kann zusätzlich mit einem Beschleunigungsgriff ausgestattet werden. Es besteht auch die Möglichkeit, die Tretunterstützung wegzulassen und nur einen Beschleunigungsgriff zu montieren.


Was kostet mich eine Batterieladung?

Bei 20 Cent pro 1000Wh:
  • 432Wh: 9 Cent
  • 1260Wh: 25 Cent

E-Bikes machen Spaß und bieten ein gutes Fahrgefühl! Power-Bikes verpasst diesem Fahrgefühl einen außergewöhnlichen,noch nie da gewesenen, modernen Rahmen! 

Dieser besteht aus zwei massiven Rahmenplatten, die professionell verschweißt und verschraubt werden. Dabei schaffen Muffen die Verbindung zwischen den Platten und gemeinsam mit den bis zu 160 verarbeiteten Schrauben verleihen sie dem Bike seinen ganz besonderen Look!




Diese Rahmen stehen für sich und sind ein absoluter Hingucker! Gemeinsam mit dem integrierten E-Motor bilden sie DAS ultimative Bike! Doch dabei bleibt es nicht – es gibt zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, dein Bike zu individualisieren und deinem persönlichen Style anzupassen.

Beispielsweise trägt so auch die Vielzahl an Schrauben und Muffen dazu bei, dass die Bikes insbesondere auch farblich vielfältig gestaltet werden können. Extras wie Seitentaschen oder ein stärkerer Motor und Beleuchtung können dem Bike hinzugefügt werden. Lass deinem Geschmack freien Lauf und stelle dir dein persönliches Power-Bike zusammen!



Und so geht's zu deinem Traumbike...
Als erstes solltest du dir überlegen, ob du dein knapp 2,50m langes Bike bereits fertig zusammengebaut zu dir nach Hause geliefert haben möchtest oder ob du es als Bausatz selbstständig zusammen bauen willst. Bei beiden Basisvarianten ist dein Bike komplett schwarz und mit 250W 36V Motor* und 12aH 36V Akku ausgestattet. Bedenke bei deiner Entscheidung bitte, dass es eines gewissen Grads an Know-How bedarf, dein Bike zusammen zu bauen und auf jeden Fall entsprechende Erfahrung vorhanden sein sollte. Hast du dich entschieden, kannst du zwischen den Rahmen Dayum und Honeymoon wählen.

*Bei mehr als 90kg Körpergewicht ist das Upgrade auf 500W 36V erforderlich.



Darüber hinaus hast du die Möglichkeit, weitere Add-Ons für dein Bike zu kaufen, um es zu personalisieren: freie Farbwahl, ein Beleuchtungsset, Seitentaschen oder ein stärkerer Motor. Im Anschluss teilst du uns in einer E-Mail mit, welches Rahmenmodell du dir wünschst und speziell auch – falls du die freie Farbwahl gewählt hast – wie genau dein Bike farblich gestaltet werden soll. Schreib dafür auf, welches Bauteil in welcher Farbe erstrahlen soll und nutze dafür die entsprechende RAL-Nummer. Zur Orientierung steht dir hier eine Farbtabelle zur Verfügung. Bei besonderen Farbwünschen wie Gold oder Chrom kannst du uns gerne einfach kontaktieren! 
                      
                                  
Falls du dich für die Variante „Bike Ultimate“ entscheidest,beeindruckst du dein Umfeld mit deinem über 2,70m langem Bike! Dein gewählter Rahmen (Dayum oder Honeymoon) verfügt über alle Add-Ons und ist zusätzlich mit einem hinteren Schutzblech ausgestattet, statt einer normalen Doppelbrückengabel ist eine verchromte Springergabel verbaut und es besitzt einen deutlich größeren Akku. 






Die Technik der E-Bikes hat mich seit dem ersten Kontakt her fasziniert,doch selbst mit einem klassischen E-bike auf die Straße? Nein, das entsprach nicht meinem Geschmack. So wurde ich selbst tätig und entwarf bis zum heutigen Tag die Rahmenmodelle Dayum und Honeymoon und arbeitet stets an weiteren Ideen und Designs. 
Die Arbeit an den Bikes macht mir riesigen Spaß. Beim Schrauben fallen mir immer neue Ideen ein, die ich gerne noch verwirklichen möchte. Aber am Ende letztlich das fertige Bike zu sehen und endlich zu fahren ist das Größte!




Mit Dayum und Honeymoon von Power-Bikes kann man problemlos Touren durch Stadt und Land unternehmen. Der leistungsstarke E-Motor ermöglichtes auch auf unebenen Feldwegen problemlos durch das Gelände zu gelangen. Ob also zum Picknick an den See oder zum Cruisen durch die Stadt – mit Power-Bikes kann man überall entspannt hingelangen. Dabei zieht man auf Grund des individuellen Designs garantiert die Blicke auf sich. Man kommt ins Gespräch und nicht nur man selbst sondern auch vorüberziehende Passanten sind begeistert! Dafür plane ich bei meinen Touren fast schon immer mehr Zeit ein!






Nachdem die ersten Prototypen gebaut und erfolgreich getestet sind, brauche ich eure Unterstützung: Neue Materialen, Bauelemente, die Weiterentwicklung des Customizing-Programms – ich stehe noch ganz am Anfang. Gerne möchte ich mehr Bikes entwerfen und bauen und speziell auch die Möglichkeiten im Bereich des Customizing ausbauen und sie online benutzerfreundlich gestalten.

Supportet die Kampagne, indem ihr schon jetzt euer persönliches Power-Bike vorbestellt! Und schnell sein lohnt sich: Die „early-bird“ Angebote sind nur in begrenzter Stückzahl und nur für kurze Zeit verfügbar.
Helft mir und teilt die Kampagne mit euren Freunden und allen Bike-Enthusiasten und werdet Fan auf Facebook und teil der Power-Bike Bewegung – auf dass wir die Straße mit schöneren Bikes und mehr Power versehen!




Sobald das Kampagnenziel erreicht ist werden wir eure Bestellungen schnellstmöglich bearbeiten und eure Bikes nach euren Wünschen zu produzieren. Bitte habt Verständnis, dass es einer gewissen Zeit bedarf, eure individuellen Wünsche zu erfüllen und die Bestellungen chronologisch abgearbeitet werden. First come first served.
 


Der Zeitplan





Das Team





Versandkostentabelle






FAQs

Wo kann ich ein Power-Bike kaufen?
Kurz nachdem Ende der Indiegogo Kampagne ist der Kauf eines Power-Bikes über unsere Homepage Power-Bikes.de möglich. 
 

An wen kann ich mich wenden, wenn ich Fragen zum Produkt, Versand oder zur Bezahlung habe?
Bei Fragen könnt ihr euch gerne mit eurem Anliegen an info@power-bikes.de wenden!



Wann werden die Power-Bikes voraussichtlich versendet?
Die ersten Bikes werden die Werkstatt ab Januar verlassen. Spätestens soll dein Power-Bike im Februar 2016 bei dir eintreffen



Entsprechen die Power-Bikes der Straßenverkehrsordnung?
Nein. Von der Motorisierung mit 250W 36V und NUR mit reiner Tretunterstützung entsprechen die Bikes der StVO, jedoch fehlen Kettenschutz, Klingel, Reflektoren und mehr. Diese Angaben beziehen sich auf die Richtlinien der EU. Trotzdem sind die entsprechenden Regulierungen der einzelnen Länder zu beachten.



Kann ich als Laie das Power-Bikes Baukit zusammenbauen? 
Du solltest schon mal ein Fahrrad zusammengebaut haben und handwerkliche Erfahrungen haben. Möglich ist es sicherlich, doch wir können davon nur abraten.
 

Wie weit kann ich mit einer Akkuladung fahren?

Die Reichweite beträgt: (Körpergewicht bis 90 Kilo)



432Wh-Akku: 25-30 Kilometer 
1260Wh-Akku: 70-75 Kilometer


 

 Muss ich trotzdem treten?
Wie gewünscht. Jedes Bike kann zusätzlich mit einem Beschleunigungsgriff ausgestattet werden. Es besteht auch die Möglichkeit, die Tretunterstützung wegzulassen und nur einen Beschleunigungsgriff zu montieren.



Was kostet mich eine Batterieladung?
Bei 20 Cent pro 1000Wh:


432Wh: 9 Cent 
1260Wh: 25 Cent

story:
DESIGNED TO MAKE LIFE MORE ENJOYABLE

The KVAERN bike is a new type of e-bike, designed around you.

 

WHY DO YOU NEED A KVAERN BIKE?

 

It will help you go further, faster, longer

It will get you riding more

It can help keep you fit

It can help save you money

it's great for dealing with hills

It's great for crosswinds and headwinds

It will help you explore the world

It's simply huge fun to ride!

 

 

ENJOY A DYNAMIC RIDE

 

The KVAERN bike has an impressive frame that provides exceptional control. The front suspension provides a smooth ride on every surface.

 Advanced, lightweight materials are used throughout, to reduce overall weight to ensure a sporty feel with comfort on any road.

 

PERFORMANCE AND BEAUTY REFINED

KVAERN electric bicycle, fitted with German patent torque sensor technology,

which can automatically feel the strength from the pedal, and output the corresponding power to assist your riding.

 

 

PACKED WITH COOL FEATURES

LET THE BIKE DO THE WORK

Make city riding more relaxing with pedal assist. This feature provides electric power when you need it.

 

 

FOUR MODES, FOUR REQUIREMENTS

Pedal assist modes 

 

BATTERY

The built-in removable battery, disappears in the frame..

 

SPECS

 

 

PERFECT IN EVERY WAY

 

 

 

 

CHARGE YOUR BIKE WITH 100% PURE SOLAR ENERGY 

 

KVAERN+ power pack is a solar power pack system designed for your KVAERN bike.

We want to offer all our KVAERN bike owners the possibility of going from A to B on pure solar energy.

Just connect KVÆRN+ power pack to the included solar panel and install it on the roof of your garage or bicycle shed. .   

KVAERN+ power pack will then charge throughout the day, and make the stored energy available when your bike needs it. 

For those who are familiar with the Tesla powerwall system, have we tried to create a similar solution to what Tesla offers to their car owners with the Tesla Powerwall. 

 

CONNECT, CHARGE, GO!

 

 

CONNECT KVAERN+ POWER PACK TO YOUR SMARTPHONE.

 

 

SPECS

 

 

 

ABOUT US

 

KVAERN means “cool ride” in Danish, and that is exactly what we aim for, creating cool bike experiences with our truly off-the-grid e-bike solutionis.

We are a Copenhagen based startup that want to change the bike industry by making green energy solutions for electric bikes available for everyone. 

With more bikes than cars in Copenhagen, it's no wonder that a startup like KVAERN pops up in Denmark, simply because of a demand for smart bikes in our cities and across the relatively small country. 

We want you to leave the car at home and take your bike instead for smaller trips. We know KVAERN isn’t the solution to get cars completely out of the cities, but it’s definitely a step towards a more fun and easy alternative. And, best of all, you can look good while doing it.

We have set out to revolutionize the e-bike industry by adding new smart solutions that will make your life on a e-bike effortlessly fun, and we have plans to continue our journey by creating new, smart products to improve your way of transport. 

The partnership with our supplier / partner of the bike (named Kvaern to fit our brand) combined with our knowledge in battery and solar technology, is the perfect match for a  truly off-the-grid electric bike. Enjoy the ride!

Please share our dream of creating the most sustainable way of motorized transport with your friends and family.

A big THANK YOU from KVAERN.
 

FAQ

 

Where is the battery? 

- The replaceable battery is hidden in the tube of the bike frame, sheltering it from all elements.

How do you charge the battery? 

- All bikes include a charging unit that plugs directly into the bike or the battery pack and will work with any electrical outlet. 

Upgrade to KVAERN+ to get the ultimate solar power pack experience and ride your bike on pure solar energy.

What type of maintenance is required for an electric bike? 

- These bikes can be maintenance as any other ordinary bike through any professional bike shop.

What dose torque sensor mean? 

- Once you apply pressure to the pedal it immediately activates the motor giving you instance thrust. 

Once I get my bikes, how do I assemble it? 

- Our bikes come partially assembled. It fairly simple to do yourself but we’d recommend taking it to any local bike shop.

What is the working temperature range of the battery?

-The optimal working temperature range for the battery is between 0 °C  to 40 °C.  

The maximum working range is between -20 °C to 60 °C.

Do not store the battery outside or in wet conditions for longer periods. 

Is the bike waterproof? If so what is the rating?

- The KVAERN bike is not "waterproof" but all parts are water resistant. The bike can be used in light to moderate rain. We recommend you to store the bike indoor or keep the bike in dry conditions.

Am I too short or too tall to ride a KVAERN?

- The perfect rider size range is between 142 cm to 195 cm.

How much weight can KVAERN handle? 

- KVAERN is build to carry up to 120 kg. 

How much does shipping cost?

- Nothing between you and the factory, is one of the reasons KVAERN’s price is so low.

Shipping cost is €175 due to the fact that we ship worldwide directly from our factory. 

Can I get a refund?

- Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy

Who is responsible for taxes, duties or VAT?

- The backer is responsible.

How can I be sure about receiving the product?

- Don't worry! The bike is ready for shipping, we just need to do the assembly and you are good to go!

Is it legal in Europe and the US?

- Yes, the bike is road legal in most of the world.

Please contact us if you have any questions: contact@kvaern.com

 

MADE WITH ❤️ BY KVAERN

The bike is ready for shipping, we just need to do the assembly and you are good to go!Is it legal in Europe and the US?- Yes, the bike is road legal in most of the world.Please contact us if you have any questions: contact@kvaern.com MADE WITH ❤️ BY KVAERN

story:
EIN. CARRY YOUR DAY.

We’re delighted to introduce you to EIN. Referencing the German word for 'one', it is the first of its kind. An electric, single wheel, detachable trailer. Designed and engineered by Biomega. A unique choice that fits perfectly into your urban lifestyle - seamlessly making your daily life easier. With sleek Scandinavian design and lightweight materials, the EIN makes an emission-free commute the simplest of choices.

 

 

WEIGHTLESS PROGRESS.

Seamless, hassle-free mobility is essential to a busy urban life. Bearing a family resemblance to the iconic Biomega range of mechanical, e-bikes and cargo bikes, the EIN features a sleek, white, monocoque capsule, which can accommodate either a couple of kids or cargo. Whether you’re a family or a cargo carrier, the EIN conveniently adapts to what you need. The intelligent, rechargeable digital motor detects motion in the bike and responds with its own power, in proportion, creating a ‘weightless’ cruising experience. 

In other words, more assistance when you need it most and no assistance when you don’t need it at all. We call this 'weightless progress'.

 

 

BEAT THE RUSH HOUR.

Because with the EIN, there isn’t one. With the EIN, you can forget about the rush hour and seamlessly cruise past congested traffic to wherever you want, whenever you want. The EIN is so slim you can even pass a standard three-wheel cargo bike on a bicycle lane. 

 

 

ATTACH AND DETACH.

The EIN single wheel trailer comes with a universal latching system that can be attached just beneath the saddle. Standard toddler seats can easily be fitted to the trailer and custom foam seats also allow for multiple configurations suited to your needs. 

 

 

LATCH ON, LATCH OFF.

It’s as simple as that. The simple and safe locking mechanism means you can cruise with ease, knowing that the e-trailer is secure and will only detach when you decide. It is conveniently designed for multiple users: drop your kids off at school in the morning, park the EIN securely and let your partner pick them up in the afternoon.  

 

EIN. IS THE FIRST.

EIN redefines what we expect of cargo transport. As the first of its category, no other cargo bike option is quite like it. We looked at what could make your daily life better and created a solution for just that, rather than trying to fix the limitations of the ordinary cargo bike. A solution that will carry your day. 

 

BUILT TO BE SEEN.

Lighting and visibility are integral to Biomega’s bike designs. As such, the trailer comes with two regulatory reflector badges and reflective bands on the sides, making the trailer visible from all directions. Be seen and be safe.

 

 

SECURE TRANSPORTATION. 

Protect your kids. Protect your cargo. Seated inside the trailer in the regulation approved seats, you can safely commute without worrying about your kids releasing their seatbelts. Built to comply with strict industry standards, the casing of the e-trailer is both durable and visible.

 

 

ENJOY THE EXPERIENCE OF THE EIN.

Biking is an experience. An experience of noticing your surroundings, feeling the breeze as you cruise through town, talking to your kids when day-tripping in the park. Stopping when you want, taking a breath of fresh air and enjoying the full experience of free mobility. 

 

 

A CONSCIOUS CHOICE.

Not all progress is difficult. Choose a conscious way of transportation and a smarter way of living. Choose a better environment and move forward. Choose weightless progress, easy movement and new opportunities. By choosing the Biomega EIN, you’ll take a step in that direction. 



 

 

UNCLUTTERED DESIGN.

To reduce weight, price and the use of materials, the EIN is built for simplicity with no unnecessary parts included in the design. Easy on the eye, the trailer has a detachable battery pack, rubber lids, a single arm and attachment tube linked with the internal aluminium frame and a double PP shell. The double kickstand allows easy parking and the wheel is the perfect fit for a standard bicycle.

 

 

BIOMEGA — FURNITURE FOR LOCOMOTION.

At Biomega, we’ve been designing bicycles for more than 25 years. Our bikes are known for their durability, aesthetics and most importantly for delivering the best in urban bicycle design. For us, bicycles are a lifestyle choice empowering you to move freely and comfortably. With EIN, we’ve created something unique and special, ready-made to carry your day.

story:
The E-rim contains in the form of a bicycle wheel all the required elements of an e-bike.


Swap your bike front wheel simply to make your bike a wonderful electric bicycle.

The technology is the most intuitive and easy-to-use in the world.
E-rim works seamlessly with you as you pedal.

Instead of going for a new e-bike, use your idle bicycles in the garage.

 

Get The E-rim Wheel

 


Plug & Play.

 

 

 

And put on more miles in a breeze.


Others, electric bike wheels ( kits )

 

Cycling Mode:

 

 

 

Route view of power test.

Power meter: Pedotec PA1.  

APP: Wahoo Fitness.

"5 laps for each sprint. Due to the restriction of the road. It's difficult to accelerate to higher speed. Besides, it's pretty hard to handle the bike with one hand. We found the diagram to be easier to read. So we chose  Cycling Analytics to show the results. Please refer to the change of cadence, power watt and speed."

 

 

 

Simply put, when you pedaled for 2min/500M. E-rim added an average of 7 watts of extra power. (Note: Total weight 75kg/bike+rider. Tested by 700x32c wheel. Gear ratio: 42x14T).

 

Advantages of E-rim:

Clean and green.

It's assistive, but it's still a bicycle.

It offers the speed of running, but with the effort of walking.

You can cover more distance per day with the same effort.

It can balance out two cyclists with varying fitness or abilities.

It entices non-cyclists to give bike travel a go.

It is great for people with injuries that stop them riding regular bikes. (knee pain, back pain, asthma)

 

 

Business Development:


The E-rim Wheel is all about becoming the best of all the various e-bikes available, including all-in-one type wheels. We are committed to bringing you the best modern alternative transportation.

The story: E-rim represents an incredible, unplanned life journey and how one life challenge created an innovative opportunity to impact many lives. My wife would support by joining my cycling workout on occasions. Every time I plan for a triathlon event. But my speed and the distance did not allow her to keep up as she later developed cancer. It was at that moment that E-rim was cultivated. My passion for IT, love for my wife-her desire to be at my side, and my commitment to a healthier lifestyle came to a perfect crossroad. I launched the E-rim campaign. My wife's condition inspired me to find a way to help her journey with me regardless of her illness and inspire others to fight beyond their limits...

This is not a story. C'est la vie.

Founder of E-rim Tech.

 

 

FEATURED ON:

Media italiani: ebikemag | vaielettrico

Medios españoles: topgear | autobild | ecoinventos | movilidadelectrica
story_txt:
The E-rim contains in the form of a bicycle wheel all the required elements of an e-bike.Swap your bike front wheel simply to make your bike a wonderful electric bicycle.The technology is the most intuitive and easy-to-use in the world.E-rim works seamlessly with you as you pedal.Instead of going for a new e-bike, use your idle bicycles in the garage. Get The E-rim Wheel 
Plug & Play.
 
 
 And put on more miles in a breeze.
Others, electric bike wheels ( kits ) Cycling Mode:   Route view of power test.Power meter: Pedotec PA1.  APP: Wahoo Fitness."5 laps for each sprint. Due to the restriction of the road. It's difficult to accelerate to higher speed. Besides, it's pretty hard to handle the bike with one hand. We found the diagram to be easier to read. So we chose  Cycling Analytics to show the results. Please refer to the change of cadence, power watt and speed."   Simply put, when you pedaled for 2min/500M. E-rim added an average of 7 watts of extra power. (Note: Total weight 75kg/bike+rider. Tested by 700x32c wheel. Gear ratio: 42x14T). Advantages of E-rim: Clean and green. It's assistive, but it's still a bicycle. It offers the speed of running, but with the effort of walking. You can cover more distance per day with the same effort. It can balance out two cyclists with varying fitness or abilities. It entices non-cyclists to give bike travel a go. It is great for people with injuries that stop them riding regular bikes. (knee pain, back pain, asthma)  Business Development:The E-rim Wheel is all about becoming the best of all the various e-bikes available, including all-in-one type wheels. We are committed to bringing you the best modern alternative transportation.The story: E-rim represents an incredible, unplanned life journey and how one life challenge created an innovative opportunity to impact many lives. My wife would support by joining my cycling workout on occasions. Every time I plan for a triathlon event. But my speed and the distance did not allow her to keep up as she later developed cancer. It was at that moment that E-rim was cultivated. My passion for IT, love for my wife-her desire to be at my side, and my commitment to a healthier lifestyle came to a perfect crossroad. I launched the E-rim campaign. My wife's condition inspired me to find a way to help her journey with me regardless of her illness and inspire others to fight beyond their limits...This is not a story. C'est la vie.Founder of E-rim Tech.  FEATURED ON:Media italiani: ebikemag | vaielettrico

story:
FuelSrv's Story: A Canadian Company

Pumping gas is an age-old experience that many people hate. After a long day, in a congested city, or in the rain/winter cold, pumping gas is the last thing anyone wants to do! Which is why we created FuelSrv.

I used to work as a full serve gas attendant in Nova Scotia, Canada, and enjoyed making people happy with little things like pumping their gas, cleaning their windshield, filling their car tires, and topping off their fluids. It's a simple thing that can go a long way, especially in a busy world where car maintenance and fillups are a huge hassle!

The purpose of our campaign is to help bring FuelSrv to more people in Vancouver, and throughout Canada. We currently have an amazing app, website, and fueling truck ready to deliver gas and services to our customers, but we just need a bit more financial help to get us going. Your contribution would mean so much in terms of bringing ease and convenience to those like you and I who hate, or can't, pump their own gas.

 

What FuelSrv Needs

Our financial goal is simple: We're hoping to raise $2,500 to help pay for the startup costs associated with servicing our first customers. This includes purchasing fuel, motor oil, and windshield wash so that our first customers can enjoy quick, reliable service without delays. These funds would also help pay for a power inverter to install in our truck, which would allow us to power the air compressor we use to fill car tires, which we currently need to power and fill at-home multiple times each day!

Each contribution goes a long way, and each contributor will receive full recognition for their funding across our social media profiles, as well as on our website on a new page titled, "Supporters".

If we do not reach our target goal, the funds will remain extremely valuable as each contribution goes towards purchasing the first fuel and fluids that will go directly to our first customers.

 

FuelSrv's Impact: Helping Canadians

FuelSrv's goal is to make life easier for those who hate pumping gas, can't pump gas, or simply don't have the time in a busy, congested world. Trust me, we get it! Direct-to-consumer services make life so much easier for people, and the act of keeping someone on the road with less effort (and great peace of mind) can make a world of difference.

Your contribution would directly support an effort that seeks to enrich the lives of others, and would directly make peoples' lives better; putting a smile on their face after experiencing getting gas in a brand new way.

We have a successful track record to-date, from which you can trust your contribution will be used properly and efficiently, which includes:

  • Purchase and installation of an innovative, one-of-a-kind fueling system for our company truck, which delivers both Regular and Premium right to your car
  • Development of the FuelSrv mobile app for iOS and Android, which allows you to request fuel and full service at your finger tips
  • Creation of the FuelSrv website for simple account services and ordering processes
  • Full insurance coverage (Auto, Garage, and Commercial General Liability) and regulatory compliance (Measurements Canada-, Transport Canada-, and Technical Safety BC-approved)

FuelSrv is a real company, looking to make a real difference.

 

Risks & Challenges

The challenge of developing any new service is getting people to consider replacing an age-old experience with an easier, more convenient one. The risks that FuelSrv faces involve monetary loss as a result of slow growth and challenges related to customer traction. However, FuelSrv is uniquely qualified to tackle these challenges with its proven track record of developing new, innovative hardware and software that are field-tested and ready to operate.

 

Other Ways You Can Help: Support Local

For those that cannot contribute, that doesn't mean you cannot help! FuelSrv benefits from every referral of its service to friends and family in the Vancouver area, as well as from social media Likes and Follows, including @fuelsrv on Instagram and /fuelsrv on Facebook. At the end of the day, we are here to make a difference, and getting the word out helps a lot! Please use the Indiegogo share tools to enrich the experience of sharing our campaign, and thank you for your support and consideration!

story:
About

Featuring electric warning triangle, jump starter, power bank, work light and more, TRILIGHT leads the way for safety, convenience and quality. It’s the 7 in 1 car partner you've been searching for.

Warning triangles on the market do NOT give enough warning. They are NOT reflective

•When car headlights from behind are off in the daytime, or at dawn

•When the visibility is relatively low when raining, snowing or on a foggy day

TRILIGHT turns a passive warning into a proactive warning.

We know such events occur infrequently and normally the possibility is low, but really this could save your car or even your life.

To DO or NOT TO DO?

To set up a regular warning triangle is easy but risky. According to UK traffic rule, a warning triangle should be placed on the road at least 45 metres/147 feet(the figures vary from country to country) behind your broken-down vehicle on the same side of the road. The question is how to make the process of "put a warning triangle at least 45 meters behind your vehicle" safe.

Therefore, we integrate SOS mode into TRILIGHT.

In SOS mode, please point the TRILIGHT directly at the ground. It’s still bright and noticeable enough for the driver of a car behind to notice.

We also know that this does not happen often, but really it could save time and even a lot of money by not having to call for road service or replacing with a new battery.

Also, TRILIGHT can jump start at least 15 consecutive times with just a single charge.

We know there are a lot alternatives but this is better than nothing, and it is always a perfect backup.

The 3 detachable magnetic light bars are designed with an individual control system for various applications. Warning light, bike light, ambient light and more.

Individual Control Mode

Auto Breathing Light Mode

Built-In Magnet

The Bike Light

The TRILIGHT and TRILIGHT S feature rotating handles which are designed as a light stand and a drop light.

The Work Light

The Drop Light

The TRILIGHT PRO features a rotating handle with a strong built-in magnet. It can be used as a standing light, a drop light and a hands-free light for various working conditions.

Simply press the power button, you can easily switch modes between work light(high brightness mode), camp/ambient light(low brightness mode), SOS light(flashing mode) and warning triangle(on/flashing/off).

Unlike some design teams who launch projects before they find a manufacturer, we are a qualified team with both design and manufacturing experience. Therefore we are extremely confident in both our product quality and the delivery time.

UPDATE #1

The T-dock & LED light bar

We've got a multitude of messages to ask if the light bar can be separately purchased. Now we are releasing the T-dock, both a dock to charge the light bar and a clip to connect the regular warning triangle to make it electric warning triangle featuring our ultra-high-visibility technology.

This combo makes any warning triangle currently in your car an electric warning triangle. Please refer to the below section for more details on our ultra- high-visibility technology.

UPDATE#2

The Pumpkin Box

This is a key upgrade for backers pledging TRILIGHT, TRILIGHT S and TRILIGHT PRO. We will provide the pumpkin box as the packaging design. Meanwhile, it can be used as a spare stand that the light bars could stick to while users are trying to repair cars with the work light or jump starter features.

ADD-ON

1. The magnetic handle ($10)

This is mainly for those pledging TRILIGHT standard version but still looking for a hands-free work light with built-in magnet so that you can easily adjust TRILIGHT up to 220 degree.

2. The foldable storage bag (Size S - $10, Size M - $20, Size L - $30)

Since we upgrade the packaging design to the pumpkin box, we have sourced this add-on for those who expect a much well-organized trunk. This is a foldable storage bag with reflective stripe on the side. It comes with 3 sizes and is perfect for storing TRILIGHT, the jumper, the cable and other tools while making the trunk well organized. Also, this bag will keep TRILIGHT from extremely freezing temperature to extend the standby time.

Unlike the creative industry, lighting is a more traditional industry with high standards both in technology and quality. We are a lighting company. With our experience of ODM for big names in the industry, we know how to make products with better quality, right up to military grade levels. With one big step forward, we are bringing our latest technology and creativity to Kickstarter, to make people’s lives safer and more convenient.

story:
"The game changing hub" - Cycling Weekly - London Bike Show 2015

Hello cycle lovers, my name is Jan Deckx,engineer and artist, passionate about cycling and bikes since before I can remember. I'm from Belgium, homeland of Eddy Merckx, Tom Boonen, Philipe Gilbert and many other famous pro-racers.

Most of us know about the challenge of changing a rear wheel fast and easy and keeping your hands clean at the same time. A year ago I came up with the idea to separate the rear wheel from the cassette so the cassette stays attached to the frame. The biggest challenge was to overcome the internal weakness of the axle and to make the construction as simple as possible. These challenges have been overcome in my game-changing hub D-Fix!

This hub can also be used in mountain bikes.

In the Cycling Weekly video (see link below), you can see the wheel taken out in about 3 seconds. The wheel can be taken out and put back in 6,5 seconds.

http://www.cyclingweekly.co.uk/news/latest-news/will-game-changing-freehub-design-ever-make-market-157363 

I have built two prototypes D-Fix I and D-Fix II.

 ° D-Fix I is a totally new rear wheel hub creation.

 ° D-Fix II is a modification of an existing hub, a famous high-quality brand.

Both are patented.

Both are tested by myself in a race bike under hard condiditions. Climbing Mont Ventoux, Alpe D'Huez, most of the steep climbs of Liège-Bastogne-Liège, Tour de Flanders and sprints on very steep short slopes and all this for over 15,000 km. 

 The next step I want to take is to start the production of D-Fix II, the modified hub.

Your contribution will help me turn this project into reality and, most of all on your bicycle! In the future, changing a rear wheel will be as simple as taking off a front wheel. Transportation and maintenance will also become a lot easier.

Switching a wheel from a Campa cassette to a Shimano - or a Sram cassette will also be easy.

The exact price of a modified hub will be known after the first production run. 

I am being supported by Flanders Bike Valley, an independent organization in Belgium.  For start-ups in the bike business, they offer mentoring and  provide facilities and opportunities for production and networking in their incubator building in Flanders. 

http://www.flandersbikevalley.be/

Needs

The design is complete, so now I need your help to raise funds for:

° Independent testing. Estimated at 2,000€ for two prototypes and axle strength test. I know this construction is as strong as a conventionel hub, an independent test however can give a max. torque.

° Materials: the construction is built in aluminium 7075 and titanium, this means   high quality materials.

° Machinery: teach-in lathe. Approx. 35,000€

° Premises: "Flanders Bike Valley" offers me a low rent unit in their incubator building.

° Packaging and Distribution

° As the business grows, and to ship the hub or the wheel world wide, I will also need to change the patent to a PCT patent for world wide protection during the first couple of years. Max. 25,000€


The Impact

http://www.pedalnorth.com/content/jan-deckx-interview

This link shows an interview with James Ward of the bike magazine PedalNorth

Risks & Challenges

With this hub I want to break-through the existing conventional hub system and show that this innovative construction improves the cycling experience of the biking community.   This is the challenge!

story:
About this project


What is STEAM

   The Steam board is designed bo be smaller ,lightweight,long running,and fast.The oversize is 78.5x21x12cm.Smaller than any longboard in the world.It has enough power to go 22 MPH uphill, will take you 11 real world miles per full charge.


   If your working place is only 3km from you , how do you get there? Drive your car ,ride a bike ,take a bus or subwany? 

 In a car we deal with traffic, parking, and of course rising fuel costs. On a bicycle, we work up a sweat and then have to find a safe place to lock up.For this short trips,we felt there had to be a better way to handle these short trips.What we want  is a portable and intesting transportation.Never worried about parking and traffic.And you can take it anywhere.

  Today, we are happy to present Steam, a super portable electric vehicle.



  Whether it is commuting to work, getting to the subway or bus stop, running errands, or trying to just get across a college campus, short trips and urban travel have always been frustrating. 


 

  Through the concentrated and collaborative efforts of mechanical engineer，electrical engineering,we finally developed the most powerful, compact  wheel on the market.Even more,we try our best to make it Ultra-quiet and low heat production.

Relying on in-wheel direct drive , Steam board can achieve  not only high speed, but also excellent grade  ability, instead of short-lived and clumsy belts.

  

The motor is  sensored & brushless DC Motor .Its  accurate design make it very high efficiency (95%).

          You can use STEAM, not only on the flat ground, but also for inclines

  Our battery technology is very similar to what you would find in a Tesla . The farthest distance you can ride per full charge is 11mles(18km). In real world conditions, most of our test riders are getting more 11 miles per charge. When you do need to recharge, it takes only 90 minutes .  


  •   You can control the throttle and braking of the board with our handheld remote. To accelerate forward, you simply push the slider forward. The farther you push it forward, the faster you will go.   If you pull the slider back it will apply the brakes to slow you down and eventually bring you to a stop.
  •     Press the DIRECTION button ,you can ride both forward and backward.

 

It has a top speed of 35km/h (22 mph) and it is faster  than  riding a bicycle!

It has a range of about 18km (11miles), more than what you need for the short daily commute in the city.

     

TECHNICAL SPECS

  • Size:  78.5×21×12cm(30.9*8.2*4.2inches)
  • Weight:-   4.8kg/10.5 pounds
  • Top speed:  around 35.5km (22mph)
  • Max Rider Capacity: Tested to 220lbs
  • Drive System:  In-Wheel Direct Drive Technology
  • Range:  Up to  18km/11 mile(depending on the load and stability)
  • Brake type: Electronic Regenerative Braking
  • Charge time：90 minutes
  • Connectivity：Bluetooth Low-Energy
  • Deck Material:      Canadian maple
  • Wheel:  89mm  80a
  • Battery Cycle Life: Over 1,000 full charge cycles
  • 1 year Warranty (drive system and remote)

  


 

                        Modifying the DC Motor before Assembly


  The Steam board was designed and will continue to be produced and assembled in CHINA.  We will use a combination of imported and domestic components to assemble all of the boards in our  manufacturing facility. To ensure the quality of each board is good.


The Story

  My name is JACK(Wang) , I ever worked in  JAPAN. I'm a mechnical ergineer and  a a commuter.Every day I take a bus or ride a bike to my work place which is 3km  away from my living place . For such a  short trip , I aslo will encounter a traffic jam and take a few minutes to parking.  I've counted that this spend me the same time as walking if I take a  shortcut. I found many people have a similar experience with me especially  within 3km.distance. 

 I thought that how to move more quickly without traffic and parking.After thinking about it I realized that the ideal means of transport would have to be small enough to take . For this reason my team  created Steam: the smallest and longest  running electric skateboard with in-wheel motor.And this is what we want.


Rewards

 We have great swag like decals, t-shirts, and hoodies.  But the best reward is getting your own board.  We've got an early special for our first 30 backers, normal pricing for the rest, and special discount.  We also offer personalized engraving (your choice, within reason) on the motor mount of the truck.  Finally, we have a limited run of beta units that we will deliver two months before the rest of the boards.  Please contact us for more details if you're interested.


We are a group of engineers and designers who passionately believe in sustainable transportation.  We are fortunate enough to have an outstanding group of advisors and mentors, as well as strong support from TONGKE'S WORLD. We hope to show people new ideas about what an electric vehicle can be and share with them new possibilities when it comes to short range transportation. We hope to build excitement about the practicality and efficiency of great electric transportation.

Development process pictures



UPCOMING TIMELINE

UPCOMING TIMELINE


Join us at our Facebook & Twitter

 https://www.facebook.com/#!/zongduozhu

 https://twitter.com/steam_board
or send us an E-mail:steam_board@yahoo.com
  

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

  Now we need your help to start production of Steam. Our  funding goal is based on placing orders with our suppliers to build a minimum of 100 Steam Boards, having our molds manufactured for a large-scale production of the fundamental material decks.INDIEGOGO  is the only place in the world where you can buy a Steam Board. Supported us and receive amazing perks. If you like the project, please tell your friends using Indiegogo share tools. For this, we really cannot thank you enough!


RISK

SAFETY

Steam is an electric skateboard, it is not like a normal skateboard. It is a different riding feeling, so you should first get used to this new feeling before you speed up. Always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear in case anything happens. Do not ride the board out of your skills and care about your environment.

LEGALITY

  Laws and regulations regarding electric vehicles, and electric skateboards, vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product before you ride it.

Risks and challenges

  Thanks to our incredible supporters, suppliers and industry partnerships,, our manufacturing agenda at Steam  has been moving forward at an exciting pace. That being said, getting any product into full scale production is no easy task.
   There are ongoing risks associated with product development that could prevent us from delivering the product as planned,(e.g. FCC/CE electronic  certification   
 could possibly take more time than we anticipate ), but we have worked hard in the design phase to mitigate them. We will closely manage these risks until the final product is manufactured, tested and delivered to you.

FAQ

1.What's the rider weight limit of STEAM?

Tests showed that it can bear the weight of 220 lbs people in a running state.

2.Is STEAM waterproof?

   The in-wheel motor is 100%  water  and dust risistant.

3.Can Steam be use as a traditional longboard when it runs out of battery?

     Yes ,it is.Steam can be used as a traditional longboard

4.What's the warranty period?

 All board rewards will come with a one-year warranty (from the day you receive it) on manufacturing defects.

5.Whether the charger is universal? 

   we are looking into the electric socket and living power from different country
story_txt:
About this project





What is STEAM


   The Steam board is designed bo be smaller ,lightweight,long running,and fast.The oversize is 78.5x21x12cm.Smaller than any longboard in the world.It has enough power to go 22 MPH uphill, will take you 11 real world miles per full charge.




   If your working place is only 3km from you , how do you get there? Drive your car ,ride a bike ,take a bus or subwany? 
 In a car we deal with traffic, parking, and of course rising fuel costs. On a bicycle, we work up a sweat and then have to find a safe place to lock up.For this short trips,we felt there had to be a better way to handle these short trips.What we want  is a portable and intesting transportation.Never worried about parking and traffic.And you can take it anywhere.
  Today, we are happy to present Steam, a super portable electric vehicle.




  Whether it is commuting to work, getting to the subway or bus stop, running errands, or trying to just get across a college campus, short trips and urban travel have always been frustrating. 





 
  Through the concentrated and collaborative efforts of mechanical engineer，electrical engineering,we finally developed the most powerful, compact  wheel on the market.Even more,we try our best to make it Ultra-quiet and low heat production.
Relying on in-wheel direct drive , Steam board can achieve  not only high speed, but also excellent grade  ability, instead of short-lived and clumsy belts.

  
The motor is  sensored & brushless DC Motor .Its  accurate design make it very high efficiency (95%).


          You can use STEAM, not only on the flat ground, but also for inclines
  Our battery technology is very similar to what you would find in a Tesla . The farthest distance you can ride per full charge is 11mles(18km). In real world conditions, most of our test riders are getting more 11 miles per charge. When you do need to recharge, it takes only 90 minutes .  






  You can control the throttle and braking of the board with our handheld remote. To accelerate forward, you simply push the slider forward. The farther you push it forward, the faster you will go.   If you pull the slider back it will apply the brakes to slow you down and eventually bring you to a stop.

    Press the DIRECTION button ,you can ride both forward and backward.


 







It has a top speed of 35km/h (22 mph) and it is faster  than  riding a bicycle!

It has a range of about 18km (11miles), more than what you need for the short daily commute in the city.



     
TECHNICAL SPECS







Size:  78.5×21×12cm(30.9*8.2*4.2inches)

Weight:-   4.8kg/10.5 pounds

Top speed:  around 35.5km (22mph)

Max Rider Capacity: Tested to 220lbs
Drive System:  In-Wheel Direct Drive Technology
Range:  Up to  18km/11 mile(depending on the load and stability)
Brake type: Electronic Regenerative Braking
Charge time：90 minutes
Connectivity：Bluetooth Low-Energy
Deck Material:      Canadian maple
Wheel:  89mm  80a


Battery Cycle Life: Over 1,000 full charge cycles

1 year Warranty (drive system and remote)





  




 


                        Modifying the DC Motor before Assembly


  The Steam board was designed and will continue to be produced and assembled in CHINA.  We will use a combination of imported and domestic components to assemble all of the boards in our  manufacturing facility. To ensure the quality of each board is good.
The Story

  My name is JACK(Wang) , I ever worked in  JAPAN. I'm a mechnical ergineer and  a a commuter.Every day I take a bus or ride a bike to my work place which is 3km  away from my living place . For such a  short trip , I aslo will encounter a traffic jam and take a few minutes to parking.  I've counted that this spend me the same time as walking if I take a  shortcut. I found many people have a similar experience with me especially  within 3km.distance. 
 I thought that how to move more quickly without traffic and parking.After thinking about it I realized that the ideal means of transport would have to be small enough to take . For this reason my team  created Steam: the smallest and longest  running electric skateboard with in-wheel motor.And this is what we want.




Rewards
 We have great swag like decals, t-shirts, and hoodies.  But the best reward is getting your own board.  We've got an early special for our first 30 backers, normal pricing for the rest, and special discount.  We also offer personalized engraving (your choice, within reason) on the motor mount of the truck.  Finally, we have a limited run of beta units that we will deliver two months before the rest of the boards.  Please contact us for more details if you're interested.






We are a group of engineers and designers who passionately believe in sustainable transportation.  We are fortunate enough to have an outstanding group of advisors and mentors, as well as strong support from TONGKE'S WORLD. We hope to show people new ideas about what an electric vehicle can be and share with them new possibilities when it comes to short range transportation. We hope to build excitement about the practicality and efficiency of great electric transportation.

Development process pictures




UPCOMING TIMELINE

UPCOMING TIMELINE



Join us at our Facebook & Twitter



 https://www.facebook.com/#!/zongduozhu


 https://twitter.com/steam_board

or send us an E-mail:steam_board@yahoo.com

story:
A Brief History

Now this isn't a new concept, the steering wheel bike made its first appearance in the 1960s and faded out by the 1970s. But good news, as a new generation of bike enthusiasts emerges unaware of the strange and cool innovations of the past so too emerges the rebirth of the steering wheel bike, I call THE WHEELSTER.



The Wheelster, What Is It......

Finally something other than handlebars to steer your bike with. Very simply, The Wheelster is a cool and fun steering component that allows a steering wheel to be mounted to a bicycle eliminating the need for those boring old handlebars. It's safe and easy to use, it also gives your bike a unique look and allows for more maneuverability when riding in tight situations. A real car steering wheel gets mounted securely to the Wheelster stem disk which is then inserted into the bike fork steering tube. Currently The Wheelster is designed to work on single speed, coaster brake bike with threaded forks. (No hand brakes and or gear shifters, but I am already working on design concept to accommodate them)


        




THE WHEELSTER IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR OFF ROAD USAGE! It's meant for cruising so you can look cool and be seen.

 The most common sizes of  handlebar stems measure 21.1mm, 22.2mm and 25.4mm in diameter. If you are not sure what size you need look at your old stem quill towards the bottom and the size should be stamped on there.




Specifications.....

Made from high grade steel and welded for added strength

Approximately 9 in. In length without steering wheel attached, 11 in. with

Steering wheel measures 14 in. In diameter with a 2 in. depth

Weighs about 5 lbs. total

Available in the 3 most common sizes of stem/quills to fit different types of bicycles 21.1mm 22.2mm and 25.4mm.

Security screws provided for theft prevention


▫️▫️Proudly Made in the U.S.A.

▫️▫️ Patent Pending Design



Available in these materials and colors:
Vinyl; black matte, glossy black, sky blue, navy blue, teal, brown, tan, burgundy, orange, red, cream, ivory glossy, silver glossy, white.
Marble plastic, wood grain plastic, real wood pine unstained 

What Your Contribution Means....

Your contribution means that I can confidently manufacture and bring to market a SAFE, reliable and fun enhancement to the bicycling experience. With enough funds raised I plan to purchase machines that will allow me to manufacture the parts needed for The Wheelster myself, which will keep costs way down, making it more affordable for everyone. I also plan on getting CPSC and CE certified. 


Risks And Challenges..... Without risk there is no reward.

The risks and challenges I face are pretty significant, I basically quit my  job to pursue this endeavor full time and I am all in. Another challenge I face is mainly due to the fact that I am a one man operation. Although I am actively interviewing potential partners who share my passion and dedication to ensuring this campaign and eventual product launch will be successful. I know this product has value based upon the positive feedback I receive every time people see one of my Wheelster bikes, not to mention that this kind of product ISN'T being offered anywhere else.


Funds Allocation By %.....



F.A.Q s 
Q. Is it easy to ride?
A. Yes, it's very easy to ride. After several design concepts I found that having The Wheelster mounted directly in-line, over the front forks make it more stable and maneuverable.
Q. How easy is it to install?
A. Very easy, instructions are included and available on my website. www.felonyflatscruisers.com
Q. Will it fit my bike?
A. Yes, it should.  *The Wheelster is available in the 3 most common sizes of THREADED fork steerer tubes and is currently designed to work with any single speed coaster brake bike. Make sure to specify which size is currently on your bike. See my website for help.


Q. Is The Wheelster safe and legal?
A. Absolutely, 100% Safety is first and foremost with me and my products. Satisfaction Guarenteed.
Any questions or suggestions you may have, please feel free to ask me I'll try to answer as quickly as I can.
In Closing.....
I want to say THANK YOU. Thank you for donating if you donated, thank you for viewing, even if I didn't compell you to get a Wheelster get a patch or a sticker maybe a hat every little bit helps and is greatly appreciated or let someone you think might be interested in this product know about my campaign. Thanks
Ride With Pride, Felony Flats.
