story:
Wivel is the worlds 1st performance tracker that is engineered by a group of car enthusiasts and highly skilled specialists. It works with all kinds of vehicles: cars, motorbikes, go-karts and basically anything else with an engine. Wivel collects and saves the driving data from the different types of Motorsports (circuit racing, autocross, drifting, drag racing etc.).

The recorded data is saved to the internal memory and transmitted via Bluetooth to any smartphone, tablet, smart watch or computer.

The idea of creating Wivel was born nearly two years ago on a racetrack. At that time, we could not find any well engineered, accurate and a low-cost tracking device that would be open for the software developers. 


We have packed Wivel with all kinds of high-end technologies, so you could benefit from using just one device! Wivel is a small and compact device for measuring the car performance as well as your skills as a racecar driver. 


It was a matter of a great research to be able to turn it into one of the most accurate performance meters which measures all the possible acceleration and braking times, cornering forces, laps and distances. Moreover, Wivel can estimate your car wheel power and the torque.


Wivel will not sacrifice the precision to making itself invisible like many other OBDII dongles do.

It is easily noticeable that a GPS signal is the best in the open fields with clear sky and it does not get satellite fixes inside the buildings. Due to Wivel using a patch antenna, it is easily mounted inside the vehicle in a way, so that the GPS antenna is located horizontally with the best position being beneath the windshield. 

If this is still insufficient, the antenna can be removed from the device and placed outside, on top of the car.

However, it should be noted that the position of the device itself is not restricted – it can be mounted as desired, since the device calibrates its position automatically.

Our superior accuracy is provided through sophisticated digital filtration, signal processing and data fusion algorithms that take conventional GPS accuracy down from 5 m to 50 cm. 

The advantage of Wivel is that it combines all the possible measurements of the vehicle dynamics’ parameters into one compact package. By doing so, the ultimate precision is achieved through several sensors’ data fusion in the firmware of the device. Using the data derived from the disparate sources allows Wivel to provide information that is more accurate than it would ever be while using the individual sources.

After digitally filtering the individual sensor data, sensor fusion will take place, using the extended Kalman filter implementation, which in it’s turn, combines an output that uses weights by the quality of measurements. Wivel also contains secondary sensors, namely magnetometer and a barometric altimeter that improve such calculation parameters as drift angle, lean angle etc.

In addition to the OBDII interface, Wivel has an extra power source and a few inputs for additional sensors. 

For the vehicles manufactured before 1996 and motorcycles we use some additional inputs to monitor the engine speed, throttle position, coolant temperature, brake and oil pressure etc. 

On OBDII equipped cars we use analog inputs to log the additional sensors that register brake pressure, steering angle, etc. We use linear potentiometers to measure the suspension, but it can also be used with any kind of a custom setup. 


Since Wivel is going to develop over the next few years, it is very important for us to be at your disposal. With the help of our service app we can constantly update the device firmware, improve its accuracy, as well as create the new features and connect new apps to it. In case something happens with Wivel, we can we can find possible problems remotely. 

  • Works on iOS and Android.
  • Pairs the device with the user (Facebook or Google log-in).
  • Displays Wivel information (serial number, firmware version).
  • Updates Wivel firmware automatically via Bluetooth LE.
  • Calibrates device and its sensors after installation.
  • Configures frequency and analogue inputs, scales them.
  • Enables you to set up the output type (binary, ASCII etc.).
  • Enables you to set up output parameters allowed.
  • Checks vehicle parameters from database for configuration (weight, length, height, power etc.).
  • Displays and decodes connected vehicle information (VIN).
  • Scans and deletes ECU fault codes.
  • Acts as real-time display for all sensors connected to Wivel (OBDII, internal sensors, analog, frequency inputs).
  • Allows you to create custom real time displays (engine temperature, oil pressure, engine speed, throttle position, G-force, pitch/roll).
  • Displays Wivel GPS vs phone GPS location on the map in real time.
  • Displays raw vs filtered data simultaneously.

(MRSP 19.99 EUR)

We are proud to announce that Wivel is already merged with Harry's Laptimer, world's bestselling data recording tool for car and bike enthusiasts. Wiveltracker and Harry's LapTimer are a great fit and share a common idea. Both of the products were born on the racetrack, they are developed by racers for racers

NB! We are offering this proven solution as a  bonus to our perks
It is a proven solution that has more than 750 track included globally. Its users have already logged more than 5.2 million miles with 61% users drive in USA, 30% drive in Europe

Wivel platform is an open source. We have designed Wivel to be able to work with many useful mobile applications that can help you to connect with your car or motorcycle. We offer you the cutting edge technologies, the data gathering and streaming like none of our competitors can include. We are constantly working on the integrating and developing more apps. 

If we don’t support your favorite app or if you want to develop further your app, please contact us:  info@wiveltracker.com 


Try to think about Wivel in the same way you think about your smartphone or a wearable tracker that is customized for you, only that Wivel is customized for your car or your motorbike. Wivel connects itself to a vehicle directly for a maximum integration into its dynamic processes. Smartphones cannot achieve that and have to compromise on precision.

Beside that, most of our mobile phones are equipped with a 1 Hz GPS. This means that your phone is asking for its coordinates once every second. A car passes 27,78 meters in one second when travelling 100 km/h. This means that cell phones accuracy at 100km/h is 27.78 meters. Accepted rate of accuracy for performance measurement is max 0,5 meters at 100km/h and that's why we use 50 Hz GPS instead of 1 Hz.

vehicles don’t have any restrictions on the energy consumption. Therefore your device can always concentrate on the high frequency measurements and calculations without being disturbed by any other functions. High sensor update rate means that there is more data available for calculations, however it appears to be meaningless if uncertainty is also high. That is the reason why the data mining inside the firmware is dynamic and adapting to the conditions. 

as well as other internal sensors including (gyroscope, accelerometer, digital compass, magnetometer and altimeter) that are averaged with the several times higher frequencies. OBDII parameters are inquired at a car’s maximum allowed rate. Data transmission over Bluetooth is also dynamic and adjusts itself to the situation. It means that stopping at the traffic lights generates less data than the high speed driving on a circle track.



Sami Sivonen (APR Finland)

"Even though we do have a highly sophisticated data logging system from Motec installed in our Audi R8 1:1, we choose Wivel to make sure that we have the records of every outing with our car. Automatic saving of the drive data and a backup into a cloud allows us to always have our key performance data available, even in case something goes wrong with our primary system. Weighing mere 35 grams it is a no sacrifice to have such a device on board at all times." 


Marko Rohtlaan (Vihurmoto)

"The most important things in racing are knowing what you are doing and analyzing data. You can only win if you are consistent, precise and fast. For that you need a data logger.  It will help you to monitor the smallest of the details, ensure the best driving line, pin-point your own mistakes and see how the bikes’ parameters change after adjustments."



Kristjan Klemets (Team Ghost)

“Go into a corner, know your entry angle. Make a suspension adjustment, know you’re making more g’s or not. Tune the engine, see the result.”



Gustaf Bürström (Revline Time Attack)

"By constantly following up and analyzing the data I can make sure that I develop the car the right way and improve my driving in the areas where I can cut the most lap time. Without data logging it would have been like navigating without a map."

included globally. Its users have already logged more than 5.2
million miles with 61% users drive in USA, 30% drive in Europe







Wivel platform is an open source. We have designed
Wivel to be able to work with many useful mobile applications that can help you
to connect with your car or motorcycle. We offer you the cutting edge
technologies, the data gathering and streaming like none of our competitors can
include. We are constantly working on the integrating and developing more apps. 
If we don’t support your favorite app or if you want to develop further your app, please contact us:  info@wiveltracker.com 







Try to think about Wivel in the same way
you think about your smartphone or a wearable tracker that is customized for
you, only that Wivel is customized for your car or your motorbike. Wivel
connects itself to a vehicle directly for a maximum integration into its
dynamic processes. Smartphones cannot achieve that and have to compromise on
precision.Beside that, most of our mobile phones are equipped with a 1 Hz GPS. This means that your phone is asking for its coordinates once every second. A car passes 27,78 meters in one second when travelling 100 km/h. This means that cell phones accuracy at 100km/h is 27.78 meters. Accepted rate of accuracy for performance measurement is max 0,5 meters at 100km/h and that's why we use 50 Hz GPS instead of 1 Hz.



vehicles
don’t have any restrictions on the energy consumption. Therefore your device
can always concentrate on the high frequency measurements and calculations
without being disturbed by any other functions. High sensor update rate means
that there is more data available for calculations, however it appears to be meaningless
if uncertainty is also high. That is the reason why the data mining inside the
firmware is dynamic and adapting to the conditions. 





as well as other internal sensors
including (gyroscope, accelerometer, digital compass, magnetometer and
altimeter) that are averaged with the several times higher frequencies. OBDII
parameters are inquired at a car’s maximum allowed rate. Data transmission over
Bluetooth is also dynamic and adjusts itself to the situation. It means that
stopping at the traffic lights generates less data than the high speed driving
on a circle track.
















Sami Sivonen (APR Finland)

"Even though we do have a highly
sophisticated data logging system from Motec installed in our Audi R8 1:1, we
choose Wivel to make sure that we have the records of every outing with our
car. Automatic saving of the drive data and a backup
into a cloud allows us to always have our key performance data available, even
in case something goes wrong with our primary system. Weighing mere 35 grams it
is a no sacrifice to have such a device on board at all times." 


Marko Rohtlaan (Vihurmoto)

"The most important things in racing
are knowing what you are doing and analyzing data. You can only win if you are
consistent, precise and fast. For that you need a data logger.  It will help you to monitor the smallest of
the details, ensure the best driving line, pin-point your own mistakes and see how
the bikes’ parameters change after adjustments."




Kristjan Klemets (Team Ghost)
“Go into a corner, know your entry angle.
Make a suspension adjustment, know you’re making more g’s or not. Tune the
engine, see the result.”



Gustaf Bürström (Revline Time Attack)
"By constantly following up and
analyzing the data I can make sure that I develop the car the right way and
improve my driving in the areas where I can cut the most lap time. Without data
logging it would have been like navigating without a map."

story:
Go to our website www.xkuty.com

Xkuty is an extremely light, easy to handle electric scooter that can be recharged by solar energy. Each charge will last you 60 miles.  Have you ever imagined anything like this?

      



Almost three years after the first prototype, our team have the following goals: 

1. Being a referral of mobility solutions for commuters around the world.

2. Reach the American market, Xkuty needs an approval to be in the streets of America, opening worldwide distribution.

3. Offer affordable prices around 20% less than web, to people committed to the environment.

4. Spark’s commercialization, we believe in this concept 100% adaptable to all situations, this item is not available at the Xkuty Store yet.

We have a Timeline which explains the details step by step the full project:

                                 

5 Most Interesting Gadgets: Xkuty Electric Bike
Smartphones become a control panel for an Xkuty driver. Thru a smartphone, the owner of the bike can set such parameters as maximum speed, acceleration type and battery life. 


Smart mobility Xkuty can be steered by iPhone
"Xkuty" is the electric bicycle that can be controlled by the iPhone to be the world's first. It is a smart mobility of the future that can be steered directly from a dedicated app iPhone.


Xkuty One electric bike by Electric Mobility Company

Xkuty was born out of our belief that we need to change the way we travel. "The objective was to develop an affordable, intuitive and simple alternative to the more traditional urban transportation".

   


Thanks for those who have supported us:

Human beings need to change the way they move. Traditional transportation and the use of fossil fuels are affecting the climate and degrading our planet. Talking about it is not enough. It is urgent to act and give people the opportunity and tools to change their habits now. Xkuty design and technology arise from basic principles such as efficiency, cleanliness, sustainability and environmental friendliness. It does so in an accessible, intuitive and simple way.

Spark: Generate the Energy where you need it

Help Us to give life to the Spark, our Sun Park station that will give you all the Energy you need directly from the Sun

The Spark parking unit is able to use this energy to optimize the Xkuty's levels of sustainability and energy saving. You only have to park up in order to automatically recharge it.

The Spark concept is easily adaptable to all situations, being able to be fitted into houses, buildings and communal spaces, being specially designed for environments committed to sustainability and energy saving.



  

You already control many gadgets and everyday life activities through your iPhone which acts as a control hub from which you'll get all the precise information required to run your Xkuty making possible the modifying of all Xkuty main parameters... A real iBike!


You can control almost any parameter of the Xkuty from you iPhone


With the Xkuty helmet, you can count on the integrated Bluetooth system and will be able to connect to your iPhone, so making hands-free conversations possible, or listening to your favourite music while on the move around the city.

    

The aim of Xkuty One is to provide sustainable solutions for commuters and leisure traveling during the weekend. In the city, the average distance traveled ranges from 1.5 km to 20 km, also depending on where you live. Xkuty One is a definitive solution to the balance, between range and recharge time.



Spanish tradition for motorbikes is related to great brands, high quality products and awesome racers. The Spanish supremacy on the Moto Gp championship comes from both: the use of motorcycles as a part of tradition and years of experience producing fantastic products.

In Spain, motorcycles are mainly used in traveling for leisure and sport activities, as a great alternative to the common urban transportation by car. The two most typically used bikes are the mopeds and scooters which have a regulated speed limit of 28 Miles per hour (45 km/h).

Spain is also a leader in sustainable energy. Thence, we are confident about the use of innovative technology in order to develop sustainable mobility solutions and therefore, to save the Planet.

2012

Electric Mobility Company, S.L (EMC) is a Spanish company, located in Alicante which was founded by a group of professionals (Engineers, Economists and Race Riders). EMC aims at developing and distributing the electrical vehicles as well as at meeting the sustainability, design and innovation requirements. In additions, it focuses on safety, simplicity, lightness and easy to manage mean of transportation, with integrated mobile devices.

Public presentation of the first prototype of the Company, the Xkuty One, at the Museum of Modern Art of Alicante. The Company  registered the brand Xkuty Electric Bikes as a sign of a blend between a Scooter and a Cute Bike.

2013

Final European Approval for the Xkuty One as a L1E category (electric moped) permits its usage in roads of 28 EU countries. E13*2002/24*0645*00. Limited production (10 units) for showing the product to media, distributors and customers.

Final Approval from Apple for MFI@ Program for Hardware Development. The starting point for the development of new electronic for Bluetooth connection with Apple Devices and integration with the Xkuty One and the Xkuty Helmet.

Signing of the agreement with the Aspar Team for technical development and sponsorship in the MotoGP championship. Aspar Team owner, Jorge Martinez Aspar, 4 times World champion, is one of the best race riders in the history.

2014

The design and the building of the EMC assembling factory are completed. Xkuty Helmet with Bluetooth connection is final developed allowing the users to hear music, use the telephone and enjoy multiple Apps while riding their Xkuty.  EU Approval for Helmet uses in 28 countries.

The Xkuty App is available in the Apple Store, it is free to download and start to enjoy the Xkuty & iPhone synchronization. This is another step that describes Xkuty as the first and unique moped in the world that allows you to turn on-off your Xkuty from your iPhone.

2015

The first 200 Xkutys are produced. Great feedback from testers and consumers, final adjustments made in electronics, power curve and app control.  New colors avalaible.

Feed the Team & Urban Farmers

Help us to sow plants and develop a city farm for the Xkuty hardworkers, you can contribute to their healthy lifestyle. We will sow a seed of vegetables in the office to help the enviroment and feed our people

Fast Charger 5A

In your Xkuty you will find incorporated in the saddle a charger for the battery. With this accessory, you will have a second charger so that your way home or to office will become shorter. (48V DC 5 A)

Xkuty Helmet

What matters is on the inside. Ultra light open face composite helmet with carbon fiber outer shell. Comfortable, perfect fitting and compact dimensions for daily trips. 

Xkuty Bluetooth Helmet

You will have at your disposal an integrated Bluetooth system and will be able to connect to your iPhone, so making hands-free conversations possible, or listening to your favourite music while on the move around the city.

Early Bird Xkuty One 

Be one of the first to receive the Xkuty One

Available in 25 or 60 miles range. Pick your favorite color.

Spark

A sun parking unit designed to optimize the Xkuty One’s sustainability, charge during the day and be 100% Green


Sponsorship in the MotoGP 2013 championship. Aspar Team owner, Jorge Martinez Aspar, 4 times World champion, is one of the best race riders in the history.

EMC makes its first International presentation at Silverstone Circuit (UK) 2013 with international media and Aspar Team. In this show, Xkuty turns out as a new manufacturer in the international motorbike market.

During January 2014, the Xkuty team was working to introduce the Xkuty One in the coolest Commercial Center in Europe, Selfridges. The Xkuty One image was displayed during three months at the Selfridges Imagine Shop. Its presence in Selfridges along with other marketing activities contributed to raise the Xkuty Brand international awareness.

Xkuty is approved as a support vehicle for the Volvo Ocean Race Team in Alicante 2014.

Xkuty One is selected to participate in Paris Dakar Rally 2014 as a support vehicle in South America. Xavier Foj team, involved in the race for the last 25 years, uses the Xkuty to move around the Paddock area with all big teams and brands.

Special Mention Award by the German Council of Design 2015 to the Xkuty One. New homologation obtained for the 25 Km/h maximum speed version with a big potential market in Netherland & Germany.


Presence in the Formula One Race at Monaco with Virgin Racing Formula e-Team 2015. Jaime Alguersuari rides the Xkuty One to check the circuit before the race.

Should you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at: info@xkuty.com

story:
There are several ride-sharing apps on the market, but they have major flaws. We are a group of programmers who have been ride-share drivers and ride-share passengers, and therefore know the features needed in a great ride-sharing app. We are now creating an app to address those flaws.

Actual screenshots of app in development:

 

The current apps on the market have significant issues that curtail drivers' satisfaction with their jobs and subsequently lead to poor customer service by unhappy workers. Some of these flaws include:

− Drivers being matched with passengers located long distances away and the expense of getting to the customers being passed on to the drivers.

− Occasional sporadic surge pricing, with no indication as to when or where it will occur.

− No ability for drivers to accept a customers' scheduled ride requests in advance.

 

They also lack important features for passengers:

− No option for passengers to select favorite drivers. Being able to select favorite drivers would give customers a feeling of continuity and comfort, something that many customers prefer, instead of always getting an unknown factor.

− No rate discount for longer rides 

 We have learned from our experiences and know all the things a great ride-share app needs to make both drivers and passengers happy.

 

Oshyer is different.  It's better.

In creating our app, we have followed a particular philosophy: 

− To us, the driver is equally as important as the customer, and we have created app features which acknowledge the value of both.

− These added features do not add any additional cost to customers. 

 The video above highlights some of the major features, with more features to be announced.

We now need your support to complete the app.

Please check us out at http://oshyer.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/oshyernyc

YouTube: https://youtu.be/coLmNFI3Srs

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/oshyernyc

story:
Smart cities need smart transit for a smart future

Picture a world where the streets of cities and suburbs are free of cars.

Sounds like science fiction?  It’s not — it’s Transit X.

Transit X is rethinking transportation.

Roads? Where we’re going, we don’t need roads.

Transit X is a safe, sustainable, low-cost mass transit alternative with the potential to replace cars, buses, trains, trucks, and even short flights as the travel method of choice.

We’re gearing up for our first demonstration in Boston, Massachusetts, which will be ready in 2018.

Rethinking mass transit

Cars remain the dominant mode of transportation, yet billions of people suffer from the negative impact of our cars and roadways: long commutes, costly infrastructure, carbon emissions, air pollution, and crashes.  We call this “Roads Disease” — and we all suffer from it.

Transit X is a cure for Roads Disease.

The exciting thing is — cities are taking action. Across the country, cities and towns are migrating towards “smart city” initiatives in an effort to update their infrastructure with smarter, safer, more eco-friendly and economic ways to structure their transportation systems. This is further bolstered by the private sector paying diligent attention to the opportunities with the Smart City momentum. Transit X will help push our transportation into a new era through private financing for Smart City infrastructure without having to depend on public financing.

Many assume that it looks like an evolution of the system we already have: ridesharing, electric vehicles, and self-driving cars have all become media darlings of the venture capital world.

But what if the real answer is more radical than that? What if, instead of just modifying our existing modes of transportation, there was a way to fundamentally redesign the way we get from point A  to point B?

 

The Transit X Factor

Transit X is a completely new approach to transportation that combines the convenience of personal cars, the capacity of trains, the speed of flying, and the sustainability of bicycles.

With Transit X, passengers travel in pods suspended from a narrow track. Pods carry up to five passengers. Special pods carry wheelchairs and freight. Tracks run alongside existing roads and highways, so Transit X is minimally disruptive to cities’ existing infrastructure.

Passengers board at stops that are more convenient than subway stations or bus stops. Simply enter your destination via smartphone or kiosk, then climb aboard. Once you board your pod, it takes off, flying above the cars on the road and carrying you nonstop to your destination.

 

Transit X is:

Green

Transit X is 100% solar powered, carbon free and zero emissions. Solar panels on the track provide the energy to power electric pods.

Fast

Transit X pods travel non stop at 45 mph (72 km/h) along main roads and 135 mph (217 km/h) along highways.

Seamless

Transit X pods are quiet and smooth. Transit X fits seamlessly into cities. Tracks can be installed along roads, highways, and railways. Installation is fast and not disruptive to neighborhoods.

Safe

Transit X is incredibly safe — similar to the safety of commercial airlines and orders of magnitude safer than cars — even autonomous cars.

Economical

Transit X is economical for individuals and municipalities alike. Transit X arranges private financing for projects — and does not require public financing. Passenger fares are affordable — comparable to existing mass transit.

 

Our next destination: a city near you

To date, the Transit X team has met with representatives from more than 100 cities around the world who have expressed interest in Transit X.

When we pitch municipalities, a common reaction is: “So you’re proposing to solve our congestion, pollution, and parking issues, and you’ll privately finance it? Yes, we are very interested!”

It’s the strength of our value proposition that has enabled us to build a sales pipeline of $100 billion in projects — with minimal marketing or sales costs. Now, we need to build the demonstration.

Why we will win

Cost: Low cost to government and passengers alike. Privately funded with high margins

Convenience: Provides last-mile, car-like convenience to both cities and suburbs. Fast, nonstop travel.

Compactness: Fits above existing streets, highways, and railways

Carbon-free: 100% electric and pollution-free to minimize environmental impact

Capacity: The high capacity to replace mass transit and serve the smallest towns to the largest cities in the world.

Consistency: Dependable and resilient service that eliminates possible disruptions.

Coverage: Low-cost and scalable to serve all areas equitably. 

Competitive barriers: Extremely high barriers to entry. A natural monopoly.

Crash-free: Extremely high levels of safety due to automation, redundant systems, and grade separation.  100,000 times safer than cars.

Partnership with Altran

Transit X is proud to be partnering with Altran to bring our system to life. Altran is a global engineering firm that has designed, built, and operated automated transit and high-speed rail systems around the world. The Altran team has spent hundreds of hours reviewing our design, and they are confident they can certify, build, and operate Transit X.

 

Meet the Founder and CEO

Mike is an entrepreneur, designer, and engineer who started building robots at the age of 12. He graduated from the Sloan School of Management, and from MIT in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. His experience spans software, web applications, consumer products, user interface, networks, robotics, and transportation.

 

How will we use this funding?

The next step is to show a full-size pod and track.  Many potential customers need to see a  demonstration before proceeding with air rights. The notion of crowd funding the development of a new mass transit system may sound impossible — but it's not. The incredible process that we've made so far shows how we can go a long way with a small amount.

We made a full-size mockup last year, and a carbon-fiber pod and short track will cost us about $100,000.  We have a fully engineered design and quotes from our suppliers. 

Within 4 months from the end of our fund raising campaign, we will demonstrate a full-size Transit X pod operating on a track. It’s going to be awesome!

The demonstration is an important step towards a full safety-certified system and first pilot. That will take about $10M and 12 to 18 months to complete.  A demonstration system will help us close more agreements with municipalities for air rights. These agreements become valuable currency to raise additional funding for the certified system. 

When you buy a Transit X Pass, you are investing in the future of our planet that will improve the quality of life for billions.  Transit X is a viable solution to help us solve the serious challenges that we face.  Governments and large companies are pursuing solutions along the status quo, and venture investments shy away from startups requiring large physical infrastructure.

When I show people what Transit X is doing, they say "That makes so much sense." and "How can I help?".  Buying a Transit X pass will fund a revolution in transportation that will help create a better world.

Happy Mass Transit!


Mike Stanley, CEO, Transit X

 

Main video produced by Ecodeo

Transit X will help push our transportation into a new era through private financing for Smart City infrastructure without having to depend on public financing.
Many assume that it looks like an evolution of the system we already have: ridesharing, electric vehicles, and self-driving cars have all become media darlings of the venture capital world.
But what if the real answer is more radical than that? What if, instead of just modifying our existing modes of transportation, there was a way to fundamentally redesign the way we get from point A  to point B?
 
The Transit X Factor
Transit X is a completely new approach to transportation that combines the convenience of personal cars, the capacity of trains, the speed of flying, and the sustainability of bicycles.
With Transit X, passengers travel in pods suspended from a narrow track. Pods carry up to five passengers. Special pods carry wheelchairs and freight. Tracks run alongside existing roads and highways, so Transit X is minimally disruptive to cities’ existing infrastructure.

Passengers board at stops that are more convenient than subway stations or bus stops. Simply enter your destination via smartphone or kiosk, then climb aboard. Once you board your pod, it takes off, flying above the cars on the road and carrying you nonstop to your destination.
 
Transit X is:
Green
Transit X is 100% solar powered, carbon free and zero emissions. Solar panels on the track provide the energy to power electric pods.
Fast
Transit X pods travel non stop at 45 mph (72 km/h) along main roads and 135 mph (217 km/h) along highways.
Seamless
Transit X pods are quiet and smooth. Transit X fits seamlessly into cities. Tracks can be installed along roads, highways, and railways. Installation is fast and not disruptive to neighborhoods.
Safe
Transit X is incredibly safe — similar to the safety of commercial airlines and orders of magnitude safer than cars — even autonomous cars.
Economical
Transit X is economical for individuals and municipalities alike. Transit X arranges private financing for projects — and does not require public financing. Passenger fares are affordable — comparable to existing mass transit.
 
Our next destination: a city near you
To date, the Transit X team has met with representatives from more than 100 cities around the world who have expressed interest in Transit X.

When we pitch municipalities, a common reaction is: “So you’re proposing to solve our congestion, pollution, and parking issues, and you’ll privately finance it? Yes, we are very interested!”
It’s the strength of our value proposition that has enabled us to build a sales pipeline of $100 billion in projects — with minimal marketing or sales costs. Now, we need to build the demonstration.
Why we will win
Cost: Low cost to government and passengers alike. Privately funded with high margins
Convenience: Provides last-mile, car-like convenience to both cities and suburbs. Fast, nonstop travel.
Compactness: Fits above existing streets, highways, and railways
Carbon-free: 100% electric and pollution-free to minimize environmental impact
Capacity: The high capacity to replace mass transit and serve the smallest towns to the largest cities in the world.
Consistency: Dependable and resilient service that eliminates possible disruptions.
Coverage: Low-cost and scalable to serve all areas equitably. 
Competitive barriers: Extremely high barriers to entry. A natural monopoly.
Crash-free: Extremely high levels of safety due to automation, redundant systems, and grade separation.  100,000 times safer than cars.
Partnership with Altran
Transit X is proud to be partnering with Altran to bring our system to life. Altran is a global engineering firm that has designed, built, and operated automated transit and high-speed rail systems around the world. The Altran team has spent hundreds of hours reviewing our design, and they are confident they can certify, build, and operate Transit X.

 
Meet the Founder and CEO

Mike is an entrepreneur, designer, and engineer who started building robots at the age of 12. He graduated from the Sloan School of Management, and from MIT in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. His experience spans software, web applications, consumer products, user interface, networks, robotics, and transportation.

 
How will we use this funding?
The next step is to show a full-size pod and track.  Many potential customers need to see a  demonstration before proceeding with air rights. The notion of crowd funding the development of a new mass transit system may sound impossible — but it's not. The incredible process that we've made so far shows how we can go a long way with a small amount.
We made a full-size mockup last year, and a carbon-fiber pod and short track will cost us about $100,000.  We have a fully engineered design and quotes from our suppliers. 

Within 4 months from the end of our fund raising campaign, we will demonstrate a full-size Transit X pod operating on a track. It’s going to be awesome!
The demonstration is an important step towards a full safety-certified system and first pilot. That will take about $10M and 12 to 18 months to complete.  A demonstration system will help us close more agreements with municipalities for air rights. These agreements become valuable currency to raise additional funding for the certified system. 
When you buy a Transit X Pass, you are investing in the future of our planet that will improve the quality of life for billions.  Transit X is a viable solution to help us solve the serious challenges that we face.  Governments and large companies are pursuing solutions along the status quo, and venture investments shy away from startups requiring large physical infrastructure.
When I show people what Transit X is doing, they say "That makes so much sense." and "How can I help?".  Buying a Transit X pass will fund a revolution in transportation that will help create a better world.
Happy Mass Transit!
Mike Stanley, CEO, Transit X
 
Main video produced by Ecodeo

story:
Short Summary

In a private-public partnership, LG Construction + Development Group, Alderman Moreno’s First Ward, and the Chicago Department of Transportation (CDOT), are working together to install a Eco-TOTEM bike counter. LG Construction + Development aims to set the bar for being bike friendly for residents. By encouraging alternative transportation options, LG's goal is to provide residents access to all parts of Chicago without the expense and headaches of car ownership.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $10,000 to assist with the cost of the Eco-TOTEM bike counter installation. This is a beautiful opportunity for Chicagoans to take pride and ownership in an innovative, progressive contribution to the city with a positive impact. Fun t-shirts will be distributed to those who contribute to our campaign.

The Impact

The Eco-TOTEM is a counting system with a real-time display. The interactive system encourages cycling by communicating to cyclists that they count!

The bike counter will bring awareness to bicycling in Chicago, especially along the busy Milwaukee Avenue corridor and encourage biking as a transportation alternative to cars.  This will help reduce traffic, encourage fitness, and overall improve the quality of life for northwest neighborhood residents.

The sensors are installed on the bike lane, adjacent to the Eco-TOTEM display unit. The system displays daily and cumulative year-to-date bike counts. You can access these stats anytime, anywhere in real-time on its very own website too!

Risks & Challenges

The current sidewalk is 9 feet wide, leaving not much room for the 18” totem.  

LG Construction + Development recommends extending the existing sidewalk around the curve to create a small, protected side walk for the Eco-Totem. This will keep the totem out of the way of pedestrians without interfering with traffic or parking.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not in the position to contribute? That's ok! Help by giving us a shout out on your social media pages, and to your friends! You can also help by using Indiegogo share tools.

Plus, once the Eco-TOTEM bike counter is installed, take a little bike ride to check it out for yourself in Fall 2016; make your trip count!

story:
SunChek is one of those things - once you have it, you don't understand how you managed without it ! !

Do you also drive frequently with direct sun at your eyes and on your face - mostly from front and left - too low or sideways that the visor cannot shade ?

Are you also tired of wiggling and extending your neck to avoid the sun in your eyes, so you can still see cleary as you drive ?

Have you also wished you had a light, simple,  easy to move visor extender, that can reach  any point you need to shade your eyes & face from direct sun ?

WELL now, with SunChek it finally looks like your wish is coming true 

Safe, fun driving with SunChek shading from direct sun, much beyond the car visor's range – sideways and down, easily and friendly.  With SunChek on your visors, driving is safer,  pleasant & relaxed again.   And -  your eyes and  face  are protected, and kept younger and healthier 

SunChek is a light, simple board, shaped and dimensioned much like your car's visor.  It is attached to the visor by two close, flexible bands, wrapped around the visor and the top part only  of SunChek.  There are products on the market, that can move sideways to block the sun where the visor ends,  but none like SunChek. Here is the little big difference -

The SunChek bands only wrap around the top part of SunChek, separated from its bottom part by a long, narrow slot – which is the secret to its ability to move in all directions  and angles - simultaneously ! !

The slot extends almost the length of SunChek, leaving only one connection point at each end between top & bottom, so you can move SunChek simultaneously sideways and downwards, and in any desired angle - to protect against low and sideways sun, much beyond the car visor's range, and selectively – such as hiding the sun up front, while leaving the traffic light  ahead in plain, clear view ! !

Like most of us, I drove years with the occasional direct sun at my eyes & face (where the visors could not cover),  and its damaging consequenses, and just waited it out each time - until my present job for the last year or so.   

I now drive daily an hour to work –  south bound, with low sun at left and sometimes up front.  Driving back home its north bound – with low sun again at left and sometimes up front.  So  the sun hit my eyes frequently from left and front - although I used the visors -  as it left the visor area.  Also when driving very early to work or very late back home, the sun hit my eyes from below the visor too, forcing me to narrow my eyes, wrinkle my face and wiggle to avoid direct sun and keep clear sight of the road.  All this - day in and day out - made driving to and from work an unacceptable nuisance, with degraded safety of driving, and frankly - direct sun did no good for my eyes and face, either. 

Looking for a solution to extend visor shaded area,  I found marketed visor shade extenders to be  too cumbersome to install and use, and leave vital open areas around the visor, unprotected from the sun.  

I then tried to make a shade extender that's light and simple,  without elaborate guide ways, clips  and the like, simultaneously movable sideways, down, and in an angle - beyond the visor area, but be no wider than the visor  itself when folded back. And take up no usable space when not in use.  And – with range as large as possible, when extended.

I toyed with different shapes of shade extenders made of available material, rubber strapped to the visor, until it hit me -  for the shade extender to move in all directions simultaneously, it must be held by its top only so it can be lowered below the visor, and have a horizontal slot between top &bottom so it can simultaneously move laterally without the strap/s stopping it.


With the slot applied – it worked like a charm. I made ones for my car,  and for the wife, then was asked to make two each for each of our best friends' cars, and it keeps on and on since. Especially content were the kids, who always get hit first by  "below visor" sun.

 Everyone using SunChek nowadays is hilarious about it, and report they find more use for it daily – even just extra shading both windows at hot sun for enjoyable, tireless driving, and shading the sun from angles & spots they never thought possible.  Most importantly – they all report safer, more comfortable &  relaxed driving all over, with SunChek on

We then decided to share SunChek with everybody to enjoy safer, healthier and more enjoyable driving.  We had SunChek patented, made prototypes and mass production patterns, and put this campaign on Indiegogo for you, your family and friends to join & enjoy.

 for you and the passenger beside you -  for a pleasant, relaxed and safe ride, and protect your eyes and face while at it ! !

Beauty and Health

To keep your eyes and face healthy and young looking for years ahead, you need to protect them from direct sun. Its more than just sun UV rays that age your skin directly - it also makes you wrinkle your face without noticing. 

So when driving under direct sun, this means first and foremost – use your car's visors, even if you are wearing sun glasses (recommended too !).  In fact, best use the visors anytime you drive under hot sun, even if not facing direct sun.  Indirect, strong sun radiation can also be damaging to your eyes and face, and this also has an accumulating effect. Control it, and your eyes and face will be and look younger for much longer.

Note – when facing direct sun you instinctively strain your face to narrow your eyes. The "hotter" the sun, the more you strain your face, even without noticing.  Over time, this strain creates small, permanent wrinkles. These can make your face look older than it really is.  Use the visors and keep your face younger and healthier!

 How hot is "hot sun" for you to use the visors ?  Your eyes and face will tell you. Just flip down the visors upon feeling the slightest inconvenience with the sun at the time, and at any need to narrow your eyes.

But since the visor's size cannot offer protection from the sun beyond its perimeter,  apply SunChek to each visor, and use it extensively ! !  This way you get the most protection available to your eyes and face from damaging  sun radiation.

 In fact, use SunChek to shade as much of your face as is practical, beyond just hiding the sun from your eyes.  Besides making for a safer, more relaxed and comfortable driving, it directly protects your face and keeps it younger.

Test this way to feel the difference -

a) Drive regulary with the visor folded up, and the sun shines (even if not hitting your eyes directly). Now flip the visor down. Feel how your face relaxes and your eyes widen  ?  This is exactly what will keep your face wrinkle free, healthy & young looking.  

b) With the visor down against direct sun, when you reach a strech of the road such that the visor cannot protect your eyes from direct sun anymore - move your SunChek to hide the sun from your eyes, and better yet your face also. 

Feel how much more comfortable  and relaxed your face and driving becomes ? !   Now it's not only  protected eyes and face - it's plain old driving safety for you and your loved ones, and the other drivers sharing the road with you


How to use SunCheck

Whenever you feel the sun radiation makes you a bit uncomfortable, first flip down the visor, and turn it to the sun side.  If still feeling uncomfortable with too much light or heat, or if the sun still hits your eyes – even from an angle – slide your SunChek far enough so as to hide the sun, shade your face and restore comfortable, relaxed and fun driving

when you need to only hide one part of the scene that's sunny, while leaving the rest exposed -  Such as when both the sun and a traffic light are ahead - just angle and lower one corner of your SunChek to hide the sun, leaving the traffic light in plain sight.



SunChek is presently made in only one size, which serves well for most cars, and measures 122mmX366mm =  4.80"X14.41"  across.  It is formed from  opaque plastic, enhanced with carbon black for better sun resistance. 

Each band is 50mm=0.98" wide and approximately 380mm=15" long.  Its middle, white section if flexible, fabric protected rubber, and it has two opposing (male/female) velkro ends, coloured black,  one shorter and one longer.

SunChek Logo is attached to each SunChek  in the middle.  This leaves room for two  50X100mm=2"X4" stickers of your choice on each side - so you can promote your preferred project, candidate, firm,  or flag  -  see SUPER EARLY PROMOTION BIRD perk.  Send us the graphics - we will post your stickers on each SunChek - See example below -


Our team

 Haya Karni, campaign manager

Mother of two, grandmother of six, managing engineering firm

Amit Karni, inventor & developer, projects manager, weekends yard carpenter

Gil Aizenman, graphics & media , one and only graphics ninja


Cookie & Bugs, support team

In charge of  mental & general support of our team, which can be very tiring at times. Cookie (right) and Bugs (left) after a demanding  work day 


What will the money raised be used for

The initial capital required for producing the design, patenting,  first prototypes' production and testing, and tooling up for mass production, was raised by the campaign team out of pocket. In fact, we can start shipping as soon as this Indiegogo campaign goal is reached, or even earlier !

 Most of the money now raised at the campaign,  will be used to finance purchasing of materials, components and services, for mass production of SunChek units and shipment to contributors.

The funds raised will also be used to develop more versions of SunChek – such as larger sizes for trucks and pickups, with yet even wider coverage range, and some more applications which will be revealed when the time comes.  You are more than welcome to suggest your desirable development directions for us to take on, based on your own field experience. This is the kind of advice we appreciate the most! 

for you and the passenger beside you, have a pleasant & safe drive, and keep your eyes & face healthier and younger  !  Join & Enjoy

story:
At REVA Electric, we believe the future is electric - raw electric power along with the most advanced technology, all built into a bike that was designed from the ground up to change the way you define ‘excitement’.

We built the REVA ROKT with the concept of maximizing power, utility, and enjoyment. The ROKT is the first environmentally friendly high-performance bicycle to put technology first, allowing us to implement features that have never before been seen on ebikes - features that save you time and money, and revolutionize the way you live your life. The REVA isn’t just an electric bike, it’s your next gen adventure bike from the future.

BELIEVE IT - The ROKT is equally proficient as a city commuter, as it is an off road dirt bike. Our revolutionary electronics and crank-centric gearbox work together seamlessly - pedal as much (or as little) as your heart desires. 750 watts of power in street mode will propel you down bike paths and sidewalks, zipping around at speeds of 28mph without even breaking a sweat. 

When you’re ready for some excitement, switch to competition mode to feel just how quickly 6.5 kilowatts of angry electrons will get you to 45mph. At whatever speed you ride, The ROKT’s high quality downhill suspension will keep you comfy, without sacrificing any handling control. 

The ROKT was designed from the ground up, to be anything but ordinary - you won't find our catalog of features, ridiculous range, or high quality engineering anywhere else. Each and every component was hand picked in an effort to align with REVA’s mission: maintain unparalleled quality without any compromises.

After four tireless years, and 3 prototype generations of meticulous focus, we’ve come up with  the ultimate crossover ebike - fast as HECK, capable of basically ANYTHING, and built like an absolute TANK - The ROKT will last you a lifetime. 

Designed and assembled in Gainesville FL USA

REVA ROKT was designed to push the limits while remaining useful and practical. Perfect for ripping down trails, or riding through sandy dunes - we don't judge.  No matter the situation you find yourself in, the ROKT is a no-compromises bike that will get you there - and guarantee you have fun while doing it.

 

Let the ROKT’s massive 1500wH battery pack carry you up to 100 miles on every charge. Recapture your momentum to extend your ride, and never touch your brake pads again via REVA’s 1.5kW+ of variable regen braking. Once you need a fill up, recharge from 20-80% in only one hour using our fast charger.

In ECO mode, 750w of assistance keeps you safe and capable on city streets. Once off public roads, switch to COMPETITION mode to instantly unlock up to 6500w of raw power.

Thanks to its wide 26” tires and excessive 200mm of front & rear travel, the ROKT can tackle even the most challenging terrains. Adjustable suspension preload, rebound, and lockout allows you to tweak your ride on the fly - for maximum comfort, performance, or anywhere in between. 

By hyper focusing on efficient design, we were able to keep the slender and lightweight. Measuring a slim base width of 80mm, and weighing in at only 90lbs, your ROKT fits into ordinary bike racks, and lifts into your truck with only one person - Try that with your motorcycle.

 

Ride around unheard, but definitely not unseen. Show off your REVA pride with four astoundingly attractive color choices - Pick from Arctic White, Stealth Black, Electric Yellow, or REVA Blue. Our durable powder coating application process - on REVA’s lifetime warranty frame - will ensure your bike stays as tough and eye catching as you, for years to come.

 

 

REVA stuck to its roots in Gainesville, FL to maintain access to quality components and top-tier talent from the local community. The city has a rapidly-growing ecosystem of innovative startups and resources that help companies like REVA thrive. It doesn’t hurt that Gainesville is also a charming town with a low cost of living and a killer quality of life. With our dedication to quality and innovation, we don’t plan on going anywhere anytime soon.

REVA Electric Technologies was founded in 2016 with the aim of creating exciting, well engineered, high quality electric bikes - built to last a lifetime. What started as a fun hobby project built an apartment living room, quickly became a much bigger vision as friends and neighbors began showing interest. Today, REVA has grown to a diverse and talented team dedicated to making the revolution in ebikes come to life.

 

REVA’s team is familiar with launching and designing products, and have been diligently working the last few months establishing relationships with manufacturers and suppliers. Having our supply chain setup before our Indiegogo campaign even launches will significant reduce the risk of the project running over schedule.

Our manufacturers are tooling up right now, so that we can accept delivery of the final production units by the end of December 2019 and ensure a February 2020 delivery for you.

Our team is so grateful that you read THIS far! The ROKT’s crowdfunding campaign represents the beginning of REVA’s much larger vision - introduce the world to what electric bikes SHOULD be. Our goal is to listen to our customers and continue launching innovative products that are fun, affordable, and useful - but we won’t be able to do it alone! 

Even if you don’t plan on purchasing a bike or a shirt, please share our campaign and interact with us on our social media channels! With everyone’s help and support, we will be able to change the way people think of electric bikes - and begin - the REVAlution.

The ROKT is the first environmentally friendly high-performance bicycle to put technology first, allowing us to implement features that have never before been seen on ebikes - features that save you time and money, and revolutionize the way you live your life. The REVA isn’t just an electric bike, it’s your next gen adventure bike from the future.BELIEVE IT - The ROKT is equally proficient as a city commuter, as it is an off road dirt bike. Our revolutionary electronics and crank-centric gearbox work together seamlessly - pedal as much (or as little) as your heart desires. 750 watts of power in street mode will propel you down bike paths and sidewalks, zipping around at speeds of 28mph without even breaking a sweat. When you’re ready for some excitement, switch to competition mode to feel just how quickly 6.5 kilowatts of angry electrons will get you to 45mph. At whatever speed you ride, The ROKT’s high quality downhill suspension will keep you comfy, without sacrificing any handling control. The ROKT was designed from the ground up, to be anything but ordinary - you won't find our catalog of features, ridiculous range, or high quality engineering anywhere else. story:
Carbon Electric Bike HÜTTLIN, type E-Roadster

Introducing the HÜTTLIN E-Roadster: innovativ mid-motor carbon electric bike has an unbeatable power-to-weight ratio 47% higher than any normal E-Bike! Normal E-Bikes weigh at around 25kg. The E-Roadster weighs 16.9kg/37.5lbs. 

This cool, rugged looking bike has all the makings of a faithful companion, made for your everyday commute. This is a reliable, durable, and most of all fun riding machine.

Carbon electric bikes are rare so far, if any they retail for about USD 4,000 - USD 7,000. In this Indiegogo campaign, we offer you the chance to own your very own carbon electric bike with middle motor for USD 2999 (or less). It is all up to you!

The components chosen for this bike are high level (also, we check and test ride every bike extensively). What is currently the best e-bike in the market? Hard to say, but: We think this one comes very close to it. First of all the weight is similar to a normal bike, and second it combines decent precision components, that have proven to be reliable with this fine riding machine. Think of the mid-motor only: it comes from the biggest manufacturer in the world. Never heard of? Well, check it out.

Do you think you find a better ebike / Pedelec somewhere else? Let me say it: I don't think you will: See the Highlights of your HÜTTLIN E-Roadster


TOP 6 HIGHLIGHTS


1. CARBON COMPONENTS EVERYWHERE!

Weighing at only 16.9kg the E-Roadster owes its light weight to its bountiful carbon components, making it the number one highlight of this bike! 

As everybody knows Carbon is a modern compound material. The key feature of carbon is its great weight-to-strength ratio.  Carbon fiber has both phenomenal stren

gth and superior fatigue resistance when compared to other commonly used materials such as aluminium or steel.


The greatest benefit of a lightweight e-bike is easy handling. That means that you can treat this e-bike as you would a regular bike. The handling while riding is much more easy than a regular "heavy-weight" ebike. In addition, you can also easily lift the bike up a flight of stairs or lift it into your car.

2. MID-MOTOR PLUS INHOUSED SINE-WAVE CONTROLLER

A mid-drive system offers numerous technical advantages over a more traditional hub motor system, including:

  • Higher performance and torque - the motor drives the crank instead of the wheel. Imagine the gears on the bike as the gears on the motor. When driving up a hill, switching to a lighter gear allows you to maintain the same pedaling cadence which in turn allows the motor to run efficiently and provide more power.
  • Easy handling - the motor is positioned in the middle of the crank creating a low center of gravity. 
  • Easy maintenance - patch a flat tire the same way you would for a regular bike. 
The BBS01, 36V motor from Bafang (250W as Pedelec for Europe, 350W as ebike for the U.S.) is the chosen mid-motor on the E-Roadster. The BBS01 with its very high 80Nm torque provides ample power for you. This is 30% stronger than most other competitors!
For Europe the bike can be delivered as pedelec (limit 25kph) or speed-pedelec (limit 45kph). The price does not change.

The supplier factory of the mid-motor system named Suzhou Bafang is a well-run, high capacity factory that firmly holds its place as the biggest manufacturer of e-bike motors in the world (sales figures show 830,000 e-bike motors and 260,000 e-bike systems were sold in 2014 alone). We know the people well and we know the factory.
 

The motor comes with its own sine-wave controller integrated into the mid-motor case. It has a high max current of 15A/18A. Controllers are the intermediary between your commands on the display and the motor power. The display is your interface to motor performance. The controller receives your command from the display and tells the battery how much power (current) to channel into the motor. 


3. BIG LCD-DISPLAY GREAT VISUAL

The Bafang C961 is a 4"-LCD-Display that comes with great visual design. At a glance it gives you all information you need, including:  

  • Current Speed, max speed, avg. speed (km/h or miles/h), Powermeter
  • Duration and distance of a single trip
  • Total distance travelled
  • Battery level
The display can be read under direct sunlight or in the dark with its built-in backlight. 

The control buttons of display are right next to your thumb. Easy to control power (motor assistance level). 
You can also choose motor assist level 0 (PAS Level 0). The Display (Speedometer) is still operational.

4. RELIABLE BATTERY WITH USB-PORT

The 36V/12 Ah battery (with special USB-charging port for your electronic devices) is packed with Panasonic NCR18650 PF 2900mAh cells and is equipped with a battery management system (BMS) that protects the battery pack from overcharging and overheating. NCR18650 cells are also used in TESLA cars (thousands of pieces per battery pack) - in our batteries, it's 40 cells.

Additional features include a lock on the battery case to secure the battery against theft. There is also a battery charging level indicator.

To charge the battery, simply plug one end of the charger into the wall socket and connect the other end into the charging port on the battery case  – just like charging a laptop. You can easily remove the battery and charge it elsewhere, at home or in the office. Or you simply charge while the battery is on the bike.


5. SHIMANO DEORE 10-SPEED

The Shimano Deore 10-speed derailleur allows for precise gear shifting.  10 gears allow you to always adjust to the right pedaling speed (rpm) and this way enjoy the efficiency of you mid-motor. See our option below: We allow an upgrade with SRAM Dual Drive for around 200 Dollars. This will give you 27 gears. Internal gear ratios are 1:0.73   1:1  &  1:1.36. Please contact us for this great option!


6. HYDRAULIC DISC BRAKES WITH BIG DISK ROTORS

The Shimano hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm disc rotors for rear and 203mm for front provide a powerful and effective braking system for the E-Roadster. The brake levers are designed to cut-off the motor power when braking is applied. This ensures your safet and immediate stop even when using the motor's highest power. 

Please click on word "Gallery" on top of the site to get more information on the look of the E-Roadster and its components.


TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS – AN OVERVIEW

Thhe HUTTLIN E-Roadster only has components that were selected based on three main qualities: Reliability, Functionality, and Performance. A combination of high level components create a seamless machine. It's for your riding pleasure. Hopefully we give you excitement. The blend of great components give you amazing features, see below.

Motor

Bafang mid-motor, BBS01, 36V / 250W-350W, Torque 80Nm, IP54

Controller

36 Volt 15 Amps Peak, Sine Wave Integrated in motor housing, IP54

Display

LCD-Display King-Meter, type C961. Features nclude Speedometer, Odometer, Wattmeter, Backlight, and many more

Front fork

Tapered Steerer Carbon; as an option: aluminium suspension fork

Battery

36V / 12Ah Panasonic Li-ion Cells including BMS and USB Charging Port, including lock and key

Charger

42 Volt 2-3 Amp Intelligent Smart Charger Operates On Both 110 And 220 Volt AC Power Outlets, easy-to-use, easy to carry with you.

Pedal Assist

Intelligent 6  Level Pedal Assist (No Throttle), easily controlled with your thumb

Frame

Full Carbon, 43cm (Mid crank axis to top of seat post tube), size M, 17inch

Headset

Full Carbon

Stem

Full Carbon, Bearing Headsets

Handlebar

Full Carbon

Grips

Light foam rubber Grips OR anatomic handlebar grips / barends

Front Brake

Shimano M395 Hydraulic Disk Brake (180mm)

Rear Brake

Shimano M395 Hydraulic Disk Brake (180mm)

Brake Levers

Shimano Aluminum Alloy Grip Levers, for hydraulic disc brakes, with electrical interruptors

Rear Derailleur

10 Speed Shimano Deore M610; Option: SRAM Dual Drive for 27 gears instead of 10. Internal gears 3, derailleur 9 gears. See options below.

Chain

Shimano HG54 Chain Specially for 10 Speed Hub

Shift Levers

Shimano M610 thumb shifter Deore

Cassette

10 Speed Shimano Deore M610 Freehub, 11-32 teeth

Crankset

48 Tooth chain wheel, crank arm 170cm, Bafang system BBS01; Option: 44t or 50t or 52t chain wheel

Pedals

Aluminum pedals with high quality bearings

Rims

Carbon, 27.5 inch

Spokes

13 Gauge Stainless Spokes And Nipples, 32 Spokes

Hubs

Aluminum hubs, anodized red, with sturdy 6-Pawls and industrial sealed bearings OR optional SRAM Dual Drive: See options below.

Tires

27.5’’ Maxxis Tires, big profile tires OR slick tires as an option

Saddle

very light sports saddle

Front and rear light

Not included could be requested as an option

Chain Guard

around front chain wheel

Kickstand

non

Net weight of bike

16.9 kg

Please click on the word "Gallery" on top of this site to get more information on the look of the E-Roadster and its components.

In general, the E-Roadster should fit to a rider between 165cm – 195cm (or 5 ft. 4 – 6 ft. 4) tall and whose weight does not exceed 110kg or 242.5 pounds.

If you have any doubts if this bike fits you, the first thing you will need to measure is your step length. To do this, you can use the following link which guides you how to do it: http://www.wikihow.com/Measure-and-Buy-the-Correct-Bike

Once we know your step length we can give you a definite answer if you can fit on this e-bike.


WHO ARE WE

We are Holger and Cheri Hüttlin (it's us in the video above). We both live in Shanghai, China, and together we established and run HÜTTLIN Pedelecs (www.huttlin-pedelecs.com). Living and working in the manufacturing hub of the world China, we are able to carefully select the most reliable factories and suppliers and work with them for concept, design and manufacturing and quality control of our bikes. 

Please also follow our  contributions and information on  Huttlin E-Roadster  on FB: (https://www.facebook.com/huttlineroadster?fref=nf)

With our experience and the successful co-operation with our suppliers around Shanghai, we have worked for several brands from other countries to produce their own bikes in China. But we have our own vision of the future. We want to realize this vision through our brand HÜTTLIN. The pledges we receive in this campaign will not only secure the development and consolidation of the carbon E-Roadster but will also help to develop other models that we would like to present to you and also offer to you. We think this direct communications is a wonderful way to offer you cheap the best you can get. Directly from the manufacturing line into your hands. Nobody else to earn money along the line. It is just your money to be saved.


HOW IT ALL STARTED:

Holger’s life as a cyclist started early. As a teenager, he attended a boarding school for athletes and his sport was road cycling. His first bike was an Italian ALAN, then Colnago, Muesing, fourth was an Eddy Merckx, and the latest one which he still riding, a Belgium Duell with the fine parts of Campagnolo Record.

Holger's education in Berlin and at Miami Adschool in South Beach, Florida gave him the foundation for creative design. Growing up in Germany and spending many years working alongside his father in their family's pharmaceutical machinery business taught him about Engineering and Good-Manufacturing-Practice. 

Holger was studying e-bikes for some time but it wasn’t until he came to live in China that he bought his first mid-drive e-bike from a local manufacturer in late 2011. Holger rode 14,000 km (approximately 8,700 miles) in his first year. Although this e-bike came with its share of technical and quality issues, Holger continuously worked to solve the issues and still owns this bike today.

As for Cheri, she came to China to study the Chinese language. And not too much  after startig Chinese class she worked in market research in small firm in Shanghai. After Cheri met Holger, Cheri was infatuated by Holger's passion for e-bikes and cycling, and together they run HÜTTLIN Pedelecs. Cheri is a great talent in Research and Organisation. Together they want to produce the best bikes - QUALITY - RELATIONSHIP - INNOVATION.

And that's how it all started. 



RECENT EDITORIALS ON HUTTLIN E-ROADSTER


In the UK: "The HÜTTLIN E-Roadster is described as ‘super lightweight’ at 16.9kg with a carbon frame, forks, handlebars and seatpost." (Pedelecs.co.uk)                                     http://www.pedelecs.co.uk/news/carbon-e-bike-se...

In Germany: "Mit dem neuesten Projekt möchten die Macher hinter HÜTTLIN Pedelecs interessierten Leuten ein E-Bike aus Carbon anbieten können, welches gerademal knappe 17 Kilogramm wiegt, bestens ausgestattet ist und dazu knapp die Hälfte dessen kostet, was die Konkurrenz für solch ein E-Bike aufruft." (pedelec-elektro-fahrrad.de). http://pedelec-elektro-fahrrad.de/news/huettlin...


In the U.S.: Electric Bike Report, Pete Prebus, E-Bike News, Reviews, Guides, Tips & More... "

My primary goal is to get the word out about electric bikes and all of their benefits through Electric Bike Report." This is the HÜTTLIN E-Roadster mid drive ebike with carbon fiber frame, fork, rims, stem, handlebar, and seatpost. Claimed weight is 37.5 pounds.

 https://www.facebook.com/ElectricBikeReport/posts/1061494993880499

http://electricbikereport.com/tag/huttlin-e-roadster/

http://electricbikereport.com/richard-branson-lightweight-kit-carbon-e-bike-solar-bicycle-e-bike-share-videos/

https://twitter.com/EBikePete/status/598924292680650753


Additionally E-Roadster was featured or recommended by:

http://showyou.com/t/Electric+bicycle/recent
