TO HÜTTLIN E-ROADSTER  Z RAMĄ Z WŁÓKNA WĘGLOWEGO, WIDELEC, FELGI, KIEROWNICA I SZTYCA.

http://emmoto.blogspot.com/


https://twitter.com/Lohas_de/status/596223384033370112


Huttlin E-Roadster - leichtes Carbon E-Bike bei Indiegogo

http://www.greentech-germany.com/huettlin-e-roadster-leichtes-carbon-e-bike-bei-indiegogo-a1632713


Steve Bell@stevefbell

Tech Expert Steve Bell: Make it happen for Huettlin E-Roadster:...

https://twitter.com/stevefbell



TOTAL-QUALITY-MANAGEMENT

“Quality has its price but the absence of quality has a price much higher”

During the time Holger was studying the competitive advantage of German supermarket chain ALDI, he came across the works of the late Edward Deming. Deming used a scientific approach to quality management and his ideas and teachings of this fact is very powerful : Quality cannot be inspected, it can only be produced. 

We also believe that innovative and smart combinations of reliable and exciting components can make the most wonderful bikes for daily use. Holger and Cheri are always looking for intelligent ways to create an e-bike that is both beautiful and powerful.

We hope you are just as passionate about our ideas as we are and trust our commitment to deliver only quality bikes.


WHY INDIEGOGO? 

The contributors at Indiegogo have great empathy for start-ups and entrepreneurs who have a clear vision. 

The HÜTTLIN E-Roadster is a bike that is ready for mass production. With our experience and dedication we know we can make it a success not just for us, but for you too. We just need your help to get it out there. Let's make the earth a less polluted place and get you out of traffic and in shape. 


THE IMPACT

We want to explain more about our campaign, why it is so important to us and we want to let you know the difference your contribution will make.

We have some customized solutions that we would like to implement on the bike and the funds we raise in this campaign will help us do just that. Each pledge goes directly into the further development and consolidation of the carbon bike and also provides us funding for our next production that we want to share with you. We are convinced that the HUTTLIN E-Roadster is the right bike for many thousand people. But how can we communicate? Let us give it a try.

Your pledge also gives you the unique opportunity to have your very own HÜTTLIN E- Roadster which is offered at a good price here on Indiegogo. A lot of thought and planning went into it and we are really confident that this is the only e-bike that most of you need.  If you are an avid bike rider, think of the dangerous situations you sometimes face in traffic. A car cuts into your way. A bus did not see you. How about your survival skills? Everything has to happen very quickly, yet intuitively. And you know what helps most in a situation like this where a swift change of direction is your MUST? It is the light handling of your bike. Pledge for the HUTTLIN E-Roadster.


WHY YOU NEED THIS E-BIKE


Multiply the destinations around you that you can possibly reach by pedal: Riding a bike is a great thing but with riding an e-bike multiplies your reach, you reach your destination with ease, you can go further and higher - across mountains and hills. An e-bike opens up the possibility for more people to use a bicycle for commuting and not just as a sport or hobby. We want to help congested cities to breathe again and encourage people to be more active and healthy.


HOW MUCH ENERGY DO WE NEED: How far can I ride?

In the diagram above, you can see the different amounts of energy you'll need to climb hills - depending on the inclination of the hill and your cycling speed. This energy can come entirely from your own pedaling or with the help of the motor. For some, cycling seems like a daunting task. An e-bike can contribute most of the power you'll need on a normal ride and make the cycling journey less daunting, and even fun?

In summary, we offer a light weight e-bike that really excels. This is why the HUTTLIN E-Roadster is made for you, is made for everybody. If you want to be exclusive buy it now.


YOUR PLEDGE

AND THE ECONOMIES-OF-SCALE

When developing something new - as everyone knows there is a development cost. Only later when the product comes to the market, prices can drop thru production increases. The more you produce, the more numbers you buy of each part, the cheaper it gets. Similarly the more bikes we assemble, the more experience we obtain, the more efficient we become and the cheaper we produce. 

This also means the more pledges we receive, the cheaper the bike will be.

So, our offer is this:

  • Between 1 and 10 pledges, the price of the bike starts at USD2999 for all contributors.
  • Between 11 and 20 pledges, the price of the bike will be reduced to USD 2899.
  • Between 21 and 40 pledges, the price of the bike will be reduced to USD 2799.
  • If we get 41 pledges and more, the price of the bike will be reduced to a final price of USD 2699 for all contributors.
  • To reserve a HÜTTLIN E-Roadster, each contributor must pledge USD 1699 as a downpayment during the course of the campaign. The balance will be paid at the end of the campaign.

Lead times:
  • For 1-5 e-bikes: 8 weeks
  • For 6-15 e-bikes: 9 weeks
  • For 16-40 e-bikes: 11 weeks
  • For 41 and more e-bikes: 13 weeks



OPTIONS

To make us and our product more interesting for you and to give you choices we have thought of modular upgrades that really give more great value.

So, the other features to choose from are:

  • Tires: All terrain MTB tires with high profile pattern OR smooth slicks for everyday road riding quality - no extra charge.


  • SRAM Dual Drive upgrade to 27gears: 3 internal hub gears, 9 derailleur gears. Extra cost around 200 $.  The Dual Drive cassette: 11-36t. In the first gear the 36t cog equals to 49t. So your smallest gear, the first gear has a big cog in the rear hub equal to 49t, on the front chain wheel the smallest available is 44t. The gear ratios in the 3 internal gears of Dual Drive are: 
    • 1st gear: 1:0.73; 2nd gear 1:1; 3rd gear 1:1.36

  • Handlebar grips: Regular round hand grips OR we can get you hand grips with extended horns, also made of rubber - no extra charge.  We personally think the best currently available. See photo here: 


  • Full Suspension front fork: If you decide that your Huttlin E-Roadster is made more for the trials than for the road you can choose a light full suspension aluminium fork (27.5") - not extra charge.


  • Frame integrated Pro-Bag: Store your stuff inside this intelligent custom-made bag. For smartphone and bike lights to charge and other electronic devices. Also store your wallet and other personal belongings. Low extra charge of 99$. See below.


FOR TOURING GUYS - THE TRIANGE FRAME BAG

Upgrade this rugged Crossover Bike into a full-fledged touring bike. Create a lot of space where you can stash your personal stuff. Professional bike bags like the special frame-integrated battery bag offer you a lot more space than e-bikes normally offer. Apart from that your battery is protected. And don't forget you can charge smartphone or bike lights on the battery's USB-Port any time. Please contact us. Soon we want to offer those items here as an extra pledge. We can also offer you mobile front and rear lighting.


Don't you think those features we have prepared for you will give you a lot more great value to choose from? We do this all for you, for our customer.



COST OF SHIPPING AND IMPORT TAX & DUTIES 

We will ship by sea freight so that your shipping cost will not be too expensive. Delivery costs vary according to your location and also final number of bikes that can be shipped to each location. We promise we will not charge you more than USD350 for delivery charges to any location and final delivery charges will be updated closer to the shipping date. We also promise we will not overcharge you in any case. 

Import tax and duties are also different for different countries. Contact us to find out the import tax and duties for your country.


RISK & CHALLENGES OF OUR CAMPAIGN

With this campaign, the anticipated risks are:

•  Delay in parts delivery – This is a real issue with any manufacturing process, whether in large or small scale. But this is where our position of being in China and speaking Chinese comes into great value because we will be able to follow up on suppliers and push for deadlines to be met.

•  Shipping and customs – Dealing with shipping and customs is always tricky no matter the product. Our team has a lot of experience with the shipping of electric bikes and often times the process runs smoothly but it also happens that bikes get held up at customs and need inspection. If this happens it usually doesn't take more than a few days to clear. We cannot control these situations but we will do our very best to ensure that the bikes arrive as soon as possible to you. So far 100% of our past shipments have arrived with our customers safe and sound. 


WARRANTY AND AFTER SALES SERVICE

We offer a 1 year warranty on the HÜTTLIN E-Roadster, except for wear and tear parts (such as tires). We will also help you afterwards, this is a promise.

In case of any faulty or defective parts, the warranty procedure is as follows:
  1. Contact us and send us the details of the problem, including photos and videos where possible.
  2. We will troubleshoot the problem with you and if the problem is not repairable, we will send you a spare part for free.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Please help us spread the word so we can focus on innovative e-bike technologies

THANK YOU!

We want to express our gratitude that you made it all the way down here to study everything we had to say. We really hope we could entertain you and be a great delivery company to you.

To prepare for this campaign we had help from an international team of friends and family. We are most grateful for them. We want to express our special thanks to them – they know who they are, they know how they helped us.

We also want to thank you, dear customer and e-bike enthusiast for checking out our campaign. Your Contibutions and Pledges mean a lot to us. We thank you for your support.

If you have any questions or ideas to share, please feel free to contact us at huettlinholger@163.com
story_txt:
Carbon Electric Bike HÜTTLIN, type E-RoadsterIntroducing the HÜTTLIN E-Roadster: innovativ mid-motor carbon electric bike has an unbeatable power-to-weight ratio 47% higher than any normal E-Bike! Normal E-Bikes weigh at around 25kg. The E-Roadster weighs 16.9kg/37.5lbs. This cool, rugged looking bike has all the makings of a faithful companion, made for your everyday commute. This is a reliable, durable, and most of all fun riding machine.Carbon electric bikes are rare so far, if any they retail for about USD 4,000 - USD 7,000. In this Indiegogo campaign, we offer you the chance to own your very own carbon electric bike with middle motor for USD 2999 (or less). It is all up to you!The components chosen for this bike are high level (also, we check and test ride every bike extensively). What is currently the best e-bike in the market? Hard to say, but: We think this one comes very close to it. First of all the weight is similar to a normal bike, and second it combines decent precision components, that have proven to be reliable with this fine riding machine. Think of the mid-motor only: it comes from the biggest manufacturer in the world. Never heard of? Well, check it out.Do you think you find a better ebike / Pedelec somewhere else? Let me say it: I don't think you will: See the Highlights of your HÜTTLIN E-RoadsterTOP 6 HIGHLIGHTS
1. CARBON COMPONENTS EVERYWHERE!
Weighing at only 16.9kg the E-Roadster owes its light weight to its bountiful carbon components, making it the number one highlight of this bike! As everybody knows Carbon is a modern compound material. The key feature of carbon is its great weight-to-strength ratio.  Carbon fiber has both phenomenal strength and superior fatigue resistance when compared to other commonly used materials such as aluminium or steel.The greatest benefit of a lightweight e-bike is easy handling. That means that you can treat this e-bike as you would a regular bike. The handling while riding is much more easy than a regular "heavy-weight" ebike. In addition, you can also easily lift the bike up a flight of stairs or lift it into your car.


2. MID-MOTOR PLUS INHOUSED SINE-WAVE CONTROLLER






A mid-drive system offers numerous technical advantages over a more traditional hub motor system, including:



Higher performance and torque - the motor drives the crank instead of the wheel. Imagine the gears on the bike as the gears on the motor. When driving up a hill, switching to a lighter gear allows you to maintain the same pedaling cadence which in turn allows the motor to run efficiently and provide more power.

Easy handling - the motor is positioned in the middle of the crank creating a low center of gravity. 

Easy maintenance - patch a flat tire the same way you would for a regular bike. 

The BBS01, 36V motor from Bafang (250W as Pedelec for Europe, 350W as ebike for the U.S.) is the chosen mid-motor on the E-Roadster. The BBS01 with its very high 80Nm torque provides ample power for you. This is 30% stronger than most other competitors!

For Europe the bike can be delivered as pedelec (limit 25kph) or speed-pedelec (limit 45kph). The price does not change.

The supplier factory of the mid-motor system named Suzhou Bafang is a well-run, high capacity factory that firmly holds its place as the biggest manufacturer of e-bike motors in the world (sales figures show 830,000 e-bike motors and 260,000 e-bike systems were sold in 2014 alone). We know the people well and we know the factory.
 
The motor comes with its own sine-wave controller integrated into the mid-motor case. It has a high max current of 15A/18A. Controllers are the intermediary between your commands on the display and the motor power. The display is your interface to motor performance. The controller receives your command from the display and tells the battery how much power (current) to channel into the motor. 

3. BIG LCD-DISPLAY GREAT VISUAL


The Bafang C961 is a 4"-LCD-Display that comes with great visual design. At a glance it gives you all information you need, including:  


Current Speed, max speed, avg. speed (km/h or miles/h), Powermeter

Duration and distance of a single trip
Total distance travelled
Battery level

The display can be read under direct sunlight or in the dark with its built-in backlight. 

The control buttons of display are right next to your thumb. Easy to control power (motor assistance level). 

You can also choose motor assist level 0 (PAS Level 0). The Display (Speedometer) is still operational.



4. RELIABLE BATTERY WITH USB-PORT



The 36V/12 Ah battery (with special USB-charging port for your electronic devices) is packed with Panasonic NCR18650 PF 2900mAh cells and is equipped with a battery management system (BMS) that protects the battery pack from overcharging and overheating. NCR18650 cells are also used in TESLA cars (thousands of pieces per battery pack) - in our batteries, it's 40 cells.
Additional features include a lock on the battery case to secure the battery against theft. There is also a battery charging level indicator.
To charge the battery, simply plug one end of the charger into the wall socket and connect the other end into the charging port on the battery case  – just like charging a laptop. You can easily remove the battery and charge it elsewhere, at home or in the office. Or you simply charge while the battery is on the bike.

5. SHIMANO DEORE 10-SPEED



The Shimano Deore 10-speed derailleur allows for precise gear shifting.  10 gears allow you to always adjust to the right pedaling speed (rpm) and this way enjoy the efficiency of you mid-motor. See our option below: We allow an upgrade with SRAM Dual Drive for around 200 Dollars. This will give you 27 gears. Internal gear ratios are 1:0.73   1:1  &  1:1.36. Please contact us for this great option!

6. HYDRAULIC DISC BRAKES WITH BIG DISK ROTORS



The Shimano hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm disc rotors for rear and 203mm for front provide a powerful and effective braking system for the E-Roadster. The brake levers are designed to cut-off the motor power when braking is applied. This ensures your safet and immediate stop even when using the motor's highest power. 
Please click on word "Gallery" on top of the site to get more information on the look of the E-Roadster and its components.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS – AN OVERVIEW

Thhe HUTTLIN E-Roadster only has components that were selected based on three main qualities: Reliability, Functionality, and Performance. A combination of high level components create a seamless machine. It's for your riding pleasure. Hopefully we give you excitement. The blend of great components give you amazing features, see below.





Motor


Bafang mid-motor, BBS01, 36V / 250W-350W, Torque 80Nm, IP54




Controller


36 Volt 15
  Amps Peak, Sine Wave Integrated in motor housing, IP54




Display


LCD-Display King-Meter, type C961.
  Features nclude Speedometer, Odometer, Wattmeter, Backlight, and many more




Front fork


Tapered
  Steerer Carbon; as an option: aluminium suspension fork




Battery


36V / 12Ah
  Panasonic Li-ion Cells including BMS and USB Charging Port, including lock and key




Charger


42 Volt 2-3
  Amp Intelligent Smart Charger Operates On Both 110 And 220 Volt AC Power
  Outlets, easy-to-use, easy to carry with you.




Pedal Assist


Intelligent 6  Level Pedal Assist (No Throttle), easily controlled with your thumb




Frame


Full Carbon, 43cm (Mid crank axis to top of seat post tube),
  size M, 17inch




Headset


Full Carbon




Stem


Full Carbon, Bearing Headsets




Handlebar


Full Carbon




Grips


Light foam rubber Grips OR anatomic handlebar grips / barends




Front Brake


Shimano M395
  Hydraulic Disk Brake (180mm)




Rear Brake


Shimano M395
  Hydraulic Disk Brake (180mm)




Brake Levers


Shimano Aluminum Alloy Grip Levers, for hydraulic disc brakes, with electrical interruptors




Rear
  Derailleur


10 Speed
  Shimano Deore M610; Option: SRAM Dual Drive for 27 gears instead of 10. Internal gears 3, derailleur 9 gears. See options below.




Chain


Shimano HG54
  Chain Specially for 10 Speed Hub




Shift Levers


Shimano M610 thumb
  shifter Deore




Cassette


10 Speed Shimano Deore M610 Freehub, 11-32 teeth




Crankset


48 Tooth chain wheel, crank arm 170cm, Bafang system BBS01; Option: 44t or 50t or 52t chain wheel




Pedals


Aluminum
  pedals with high quality bearings




Rims


Carbon, 27.5
  inch




Spokes


13 Gauge
  Stainless Spokes And Nipples, 32 Spokes




Hubs


Aluminum hubs, anodized red, with sturdy 6-Pawls and industrial sealed
  bearings OR optional SRAM Dual Drive: See options below.




Tires


27.5’’ Maxxis Tires, big profile tires OR slick tires as an option




Saddle


very light sports saddle




Front and rear
  light


Not included could be requested as an option




Chain Guard


around front chain wheel




Kickstand


non




Net weight of
  bike


16.9 kg








Please click on the word "Gallery" on top of this site to get more information on the look of the E-Roadster and its components.
In general, the E-Roadster should fit to a rider between 165cm – 195cm (or 5 ft. 4 – 6 ft. 4) tall and whose weight does not exceed 110kg or 242.5 pounds.
If you have any doubts if this bike fits you, the first thing you will need to measure is your step length. To do this, you can use the following link which guides you how to do it: http://www.wikihow.com/Measure-and-Buy-the-Correct-Bike
Once we know your step length we can give you a definite answer if you can fit on this e-bike.


WHO ARE WE
We are Holger and Cheri Hüttlin (it's us in the video above). We both live in Shanghai, China,
and together we established and run HÜTTLIN Pedelecs (www.huttlin-pedelecs.com). Living and working in the
manufacturing hub of the world China, we are able to carefully select the most
reliable factories and suppliers and work with them for concept, design and manufacturing and quality control of our bikes. 
Please also follow our  contributions and information on  Huttlin E-Roadster  on FB: (https://www.facebook.com/huttlineroadster?fref=nf)
With our experience and the successful co-operation with our suppliers around Shanghai, we have worked for several brands from other countries to produce their own bikes in China. But we have our own vision of the future. We want to realize this vision through our brand HÜTTLIN. The pledges we receive in this campaign will not only secure the development and consolidation of the carbon E-Roadster but will also help to develop other models that we would like to present to you and also offer to you. We think this direct communications is a wonderful way to offer you cheap the best you can get. Directly from the manufacturing line into your hands. Nobody else to earn money along the line. It is just your money to be saved.


HOW IT ALL STARTED:
Holger’s life as a cyclist started early. As a teenager, he attended a
boarding school for athletes and his sport was road cycling. His first bike was
an Italian ALAN, then Colnago, Muesing, fourth was an Eddy Merckx,
and the latest one which he still riding, a Belgium Duell with the fine parts of
Campagnolo Record.
Holger's education in Berlin and at Miami Adschool in South Beach, Florida gave him the foundation for creative design. Growing up in Germany and spending many years working alongside his father in their family's pharmaceutical machinery business taught him about Engineering and Good-Manufacturing-Practice. 
Holger was studying e-bikes for some time but it wasn’t until he came to
live in China that he bought his first mid-drive e-bike from a local
manufacturer in late 2011. Holger rode 14,000 km (approximately 8,700 miles) in
his first year. Although this e-bike came with its share of technical and
quality issues, Holger continuously worked to solve the issues and still owns this bike today.
As for Cheri, she came to China to study the Chinese language. And not too much  after startig Chinese class she worked in market research in small firm in Shanghai. After Cheri met Holger, Cheri was infatuated by Holger's passion for e-bikes and cycling, and together they run HÜTTLIN Pedelecs. Cheri is a great talent in Research and Organisation. Together they want to produce the best bikes - QUALITY - RELATIONSHIP - INNOVATION.
And that's how it all started. 


RECENT EDITORIALS ON HUTTLIN E-ROADSTER



In the UK: "The HÜTTLIN E-Roadster is described as ‘super lightweight’ at 16.9kg with a carbon frame, forks, handlebars and seatpost." (Pedelecs.co.uk)                                     http://www.pedelecs.co.uk/news/carbon-e-bike-se...




In Germany: "Mit dem neuesten Projekt möchten die Macher hinter HÜTTLIN Pedelecs interessierten Leuten ein E-Bike aus Carbon anbieten können, welches gerademal knappe 17 Kilogramm wiegt, bestens ausgestattet ist und dazu knapp die Hälfte dessen kostet, was die Konkurrenz für solch ein E-Bike aufruft." (pedelec-elektro-fahrrad.de). http://pedelec-elektro-fahrrad.de/news/huettlin...



In the U.S.: Electric Bike Report, Pete Prebus, E-Bike News, Reviews, Guides, Tips & More... "My primary goal is to get the word out about electric bikes and all of their benefits through Electric Bike Report." This is the HÜTTLIN E-Roadster mid drive ebike with carbon fiber frame, fork, rims, stem, handlebar, and seatpost. Claimed weight is 37.5 pounds.
 https://www.facebook.com/ElectricBikeReport/posts/1061494993880499
http://electricbikereport.com/tag/huttlin-e-roadster/
http://electricbikereport.com/richard-branson-lightweight-kit-carbon-e-bike-solar-bicycle-e-bike-share-videos/
https://twitter.com/EBikePete/status/598924292680650753

Additionally E-Roadster was featured or recommended by:


http://showyou.com/t/Electric+bicycle/recent

Huttlin E-Roadster - leichtes Carbon E-Bike bei Indiegogo


http://www.greentech-germany.com/huettlin-e-roadster-leichtes-carbon-e-bike-bei-indiegogo-a1632713





Steve Bell@stevefbell
Tech Expert Steve Bell: Make it happen for Huettlin E-Roadster:...
https://twitter.com/stevefbell




TOTAL-QUALITY-MANAGEMENT

“Quality has its price but the absence of quality has a price much higher”
During the time Holger was studying the competitive advantage of German supermarket chain ALDI, he came across the works of the late Edward Deming. Deming used a scientific approach to quality management and his ideas and teachings of this fact is very powerful : Quality cannot be inspected, it can only be produced. 

We also believe that innovative and smart combinations of reliable and exciting components can make the most wonderful bikes for daily use. Holger and Cheri are always looking for intelligent ways to create an e-bike that is both beautiful and powerful.
We hope you are just as passionate about our ideas as we are and trust our commitment to deliver only quality bikes.


WHY INDIEGOGO? 
The contributors at Indiegogo have great empathy for start-ups and entrepreneurs who have a clear vision. 

The HÜTTLIN E-Roadster is a bike that is ready for mass production. With our experience and dedication we know we can make it a success not just for us, but for you too. We just need your help to get it out there. Let's make the earth a less polluted place and get you out of traffic and in shape. 


THE IMPACT
We want to explain more about our campaign, why it is so important to us and we want to let you know the difference your contribution will make.


We have some customized solutions that we would like to implement on the bike and the funds we raise in this campaign will help us do just that. Each pledge goes directly into the further development and consolidation of the carbon bike and also provides us funding for our next production that we want to share with you. We are convinced that the HUTTLIN E-Roadster is the right bike for many thousand people. But how can we communicate? Let us give it a try.
Your pledge also gives you the unique opportunity to have your very own HÜTTLIN E- Roadster which is offered at a good price here on Indiegogo. A lot of thought and planning went into it and we are really confident that this is the only e-bike that most of you need.  If you are an avid bike rider, think of the dangerous situations you sometimes face in traffic. A car cuts into your way. A bus did not see you. How about your survival skills? Everything has to happen very quickly, yet intuitively. And you know what helps most in a situation like this where a swift change of direction is your MUST? It is the light handling of your bike. Pledge for the HUTTLIN E-Roadster.

WHY YOU NEED THIS E-BIKE



Multiply the destinations around you that you can possibly reach by pedal: Riding a bike is a great thing but with riding an e-bike multiplies your reach, you reach your destination with ease, you can go further and higher - across mountains and hills. An e-bike opens up the possibility for more people to use a bicycle for commuting and not just as a sport or hobby. We want to help congested cities to breathe again and encourage people to be more active and healthy.

HOW MUCH ENERGY DO WE NEED: How far can I ride?




In the diagram above, you can see the different amounts of energy you'll need to climb hills - depending on the inclination of the hill and your cycling speed. This energy can come entirely from your own pedaling or with the help of the motor. For some, cycling seems like a daunting task. An e-bike can contribute most of the power you'll need on a normal ride and make the cycling journey less daunting, and even fun?
In summary, we offer a light weight e-bike that really excels. This is why the HUTTLIN E-Roadster is made for you, is made for everybody. If you want to be exclusive buy it now.


YOUR PLEDGE
AND THE ECONOMIES-OF-SCALE

When developing something new - as everyone knows there is a development cost. Only later when the product comes to the market, prices can drop thru production increases. The more you produce, the more numbers you buy of each part, the cheaper it gets. Similarly the more bikes we assemble, the more experience we obtain, the more efficient we become and the cheaper we produce. 
This also means the more pledges we receive, the cheaper the bike will be.

So, our offer is this:

Between 1 and 10 pledges, the price of the bike starts at USD2999 for all contributors.
Between 11 and 20 pledges, the price of the bike will be reduced to USD 2899.
Between 21 and 40 pledges, the price of the bike will be reduced to USD 2799.
If we get 41 pledges and more, the price of the bike will be reduced to a final price of USD 2699 for all contributors.
To reserve a HÜTTLIN E-Roadster, each contributor must pledge USD 1699 as a downpayment during the course of the campaign. The balance will be paid at the end of the campaign.



Lead times:


For 1-5 e-bikes: 8 weeks
For 6-15 e-bikes: 9 weeks
For 16-40 e-bikes: 11 weeks
For 41 and more e-bikes: 13 weeks



OPTIONS
To make us and our product more interesting for you and to give you choices we have thought of modular upgrades that really give more great value.
So, the other features to choose from are:


Tires: All terrain MTB tires with high profile pattern OR smooth slicks for everyday road riding quality - no extra charge.







SRAM Dual Drive upgrade to 27gears: 3 internal hub gears, 9 derailleur gears. Extra cost around 200 $.  The Dual Drive cassette: 11-36t. In the first gear the 36t cog equals to 49t. So your smallest gear, the first gear has a big cog in the rear hub equal to 49t, on the front chain wheel the smallest available is 44t. The gear ratios in the 3 internal gears of Dual Drive are: 
1st gear: 1:0.73; 2nd gear 1:1; 3rd gear 1:1.36

Handlebar grips: Regular round hand grips OR we can get you hand grips with extended horns, also made of rubber - no extra charge.  We personally think the best currently available. See photo here: 







Full Suspension front fork: If you decide that your Huttlin E-Roadster is made more for the trials than for the road you can choose a light full suspension aluminium fork (27.5") - not extra charge.





Frame integrated Pro-Bag: Store your stuff inside this intelligent custom-made bag. For smartphone and bike lights to charge and other electronic devices. Also store your wallet and other personal belongings. Low extra charge of 99$. See below.




FOR TOURING GUYS - THE TRIANGE FRAME BAG
Upgrade this rugged Crossover Bike into a full-fledged touring bike. Create a lot of space where you can stash your personal stuff. Professional bike bags like the special frame-integrated battery bag offer you a lot more space than e-bikes normally offer. Apart from that your battery is protected. And don't forget you can charge smartphone or bike lights on the battery's USB-Port any time. Please contact us. Soon we want to offer those items here as an extra pledge. We can also offer you mobile front and rear lighting.



Don't you think those features we have prepared for you will give you a lot more great value to choose from? We do this all for you, for our customer.

COST OF SHIPPING AND IMPORT TAX & DUTIES 
We will ship by sea freight so that your shipping cost will not be too expensive. Delivery costs vary according to your location and also final number of bikes that can be shipped to each location. We promise we will not charge you more than USD350 for delivery charges to any location and final delivery charges will be updated closer to the shipping date. We also promise we will not overcharge you in any case. 
Import tax and duties are also different for different countries. Contact us to find out the import tax and duties for your country.

RISK & CHALLENGES OF OUR CAMPAIGN
With this campaign, the
anticipated risks are:
•  Delay in
parts delivery – This is a real issue with any manufacturing process, whether
in large or small scale. But this is where our position of being in China and
speaking Chinese comes into great value because we will be able to follow up on suppliers and push for deadlines to be met.
• 
Shipping and customs – Dealing with shipping and
customs is always tricky no matter the product. Our team has a lot of experience
with the shipping of electric bikes and often times the process runs smoothly
but it also happens that bikes get held up at customs and need inspection. If this happens it usually doesn't take more than a few days to clear. We cannot control these situations but we will do our very best to ensure that the bikes arrive as soon as possible to you. So far 100% of our past shipments have arrived
with our customers safe and sound. 

WARRANTY AND AFTER SALES SERVICE
We offer a 1 year warranty on the HÜTTLIN E-Roadster, except for wear and tear parts (such as tires). We will also help you afterwards, this is a promise.
In case of any faulty or defective parts, the warranty procedure is as follows:

Contact us and send us the details of the problem, including photos and videos where possible.
We will troubleshoot the problem with you and if the problem is not repairable, we will send you a spare part for free.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Please help us spread the word so we can focus on innovative e-bike technologies

THANK YOU!
We want to express our gratitude that you made it all the way down here to study everything we had to say. We really hope we could entertain you and be a great delivery company to you.
To prepare for this campaign we had help from an international team of friends and family. We
are most grateful for them. We want to express our special thanks to them –
they know who they are, they know how they helped us. 
We also want to thank you, dear customer and e-bike enthusiast for checking out our campaign. Your Contibutions and Pledges mean a lot to us. We thank you for your support.
If you have any questions or ideas to share, please feel free to contact us at huettlinholger@163.com

story:
GERMAN
ENGLISH
ESPANOL



Kurzbeschreibung

2 Wheels Balance Scooter der neue Trend in Europa und bald auch an der Playa de Palma...

  • Ich betreibe seit 3 Jahren einen Rent a Bike & Rent a Car direkt an der Playa de Palma auf Mallorca. Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach neuen Trend um den Umsatz des Unternehmens zu steigern.
  • Egal ob jung oder alt wir wollen Ihnen Ihren Urlaub mit diesem neuen Trendprodukt verschönern
  • Sie helfen dabei die Produkte zu Produzieren und in unser Sortiment aufzunehmen. Wir bauen eine eigene 2 Wheels Scooter Marke auf mit dem Namen "BikeKing"


Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

  • Wir benötigen ca. 8.000 bis 10.000 Euro für die erste Produktion von ca. 20 Scooter der Marke BikeKing. Sollte das Ziel 8.000 Euro nicht erreicht werden Produzieren wir im ersten Stepp weniger Scooter.
  • Die 2 Wheels machen Jung und Alt Spaß um die Playa de Palma zu entdecken und sich sportlich zu betätigen im Urlaub.
  • Erreichen wir das Ziel nicht Produzieren wir einen kleinen Teil Scooter.

Die Folgen

Verrate mehr über deine Kampagne und lass die Leute wissen, was sie mit ihrem Beitrag bewirken:

  • Einfach wieder Spaß im Urlaub haben und die Natur genießen 
  • Ich betreibe seit 3 Jahren erfolgreich einen Rent a Bike und Rent a Car. Ziel ist es weitere Läden zu eröffnen und ein neues Trendprodukt auf Mallorca zu bringen was es hier noch nicht gibt.

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Es gibt keine Risiken wir Produzieren in jedem Fall die 2 Wheel der Marke BikeKing. Wenn der Betrag nicht erreicht wird werden es im ersten Stepp weniger.

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann


  • Sie finden unsere Idee gute aber können uns zur Zeit nicht unterstützen mit einem Betrag X? Kein Problem helfen Sie uns das Ziel zu erreichen indem Sie für uns Werben z.B. auf Facebook usw.

English

What will you give us and what you get

The 2 Wheels make young and old to discover fun at the Playa de Palma and to play sports while on vacation.

The Consequences

Telling more about your campaign and let people know what they do with their contribution:

Just back having fun on vacation and enjoy nature

I've been running for 3 years successfully a Rent a Bike and car rental. The goal is to open more stores and to bring a new trend product on Mallorca which does not yet exist here.

Risks & challenges

Other ways you can help

You will find our idea good but can not support us with an amount X at the time? No problem, you help us to reach the goal by going for us Advertise eg on facebook, etc.


Español

Breve descripcion

2 Ruedas Scooter Equilibrio es la nueva tendencia en Europa y pronto también en la Playa de Palma ...

He estado corriendo durante 3 años una renta de alquiler de bicicletas y coches directamente en la Playa de Palma en Mallorca. Siempre Mejoramos en la búsqueda de nuevas tendencias a las ventas de la Compañía.

Ya sea joven o viejo, queremos embellecer sus vacaciones con este nuevo producto de tendencia

Ellos ayudan a producir los productos de nuestra gama y tomar. Construimos su propia marca de 2 Ruedas Scooter llamado "Bike King"

¿Qué vas a darnos y lo que se obtiene

Necesitamos aproximadamente 8.000 a 10.000 euros para la primera producción de alrededor de 20 scooters de la marca de bicicletas Rey. Si el objetivo no se alcanzó € 8.000 que producimos en el primer Stepp menos Scooter.

Las 2 Ruedas hacen grandes y pequeños a descubrir la diversión en la Playa de Palma y para hacer deporte durante sus vacaciones.

No logramos el objetivo que producimos una pequeña porción de la vespa.

Las Consecuencias

Decir más sobre su campaña y que la gente sepa lo que hacen con su contribución:

Acabo de volver divertirse en vacaciones y disfrutar de la naturaleza

He estado corriendo durante 3 años con éxito un alquilar una bicicleta y alquiler de coches. El objetivo es abrir más tiendas y llevar un nuevo producto de tendencia en Mallorca que todavía no existe aquí.

Riesgos y desafíos

No existen riesgos que producimos, en cualquier caso, el 2 Rueda de la marca de bicicletas Rey. Si no se alcanza el importe, que será la primera Stepp menos.

Puedes ayudar de otras formas

Va a encontrar nuestra idea buena, pero no nos puede apoyar con una cantidad X en el momento? No hay problema, usted nos ayuda a alcanzar la meta de ir por nosotros Publicidad ejemplo en facebook, etc.
story_txt:
GERMANENGLISHESPANOL



Kurzbeschreibung 2 Wheels Balance Scooter der neue Trend in Europa und bald auch an der Playa de Palma...  Ich betreibe seit 3 Jahren einen Rent a Bike & Rent a Car direkt an der Playa de Palma auf Mallorca. Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach neuen Trend um den Umsatz des Unternehmens zu steigern. Egal ob jung oder alt wir wollen Ihnen Ihren Urlaub mit diesem neuen Trendprodukt verschönern Sie helfen dabei die Produkte zu Produzieren und in unser Sortiment aufzunehmen. Wir bauen eine eigene 2 Wheels Scooter Marke auf mit dem Namen "BikeKing"     Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst 
Wir benötigen ca. 8.000 bis 10.000 Euro für die erste Produktion von ca. 20 Scooter der Marke BikeKing. Sollte das Ziel 8.000 Euro nicht erreicht werden Produzieren wir im ersten Stepp weniger Scooter. Die 2 Wheels machen Jung und Alt Spaß um die Playa de Palma zu entdecken und sich sportlich zu betätigen im Urlaub. Erreichen wir das Ziel nicht Produzieren wir einen kleinen Teil Scooter.    Die Folgen Verrate mehr über deine Kampagne und lass die Leute wissen, was sie mit ihrem Beitrag bewirken:  Einfach wieder Spaß im Urlaub haben und die Natur genießen  Ich betreibe seit 3 Jahren erfolgreich einen Rent a Bike und Rent a Car. Ziel ist es weitere Läden zu eröffnen und ein neues Trendprodukt auf Mallorca zu bringen was es hier noch nicht gibt.    Risiken & Herausforderungen Es gibt keine Risiken wir Produzieren in jedem Fall die 2 Wheel der Marke BikeKing. Wenn der Betrag nicht erreicht wird werden es im ersten Stepp weniger.
    Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann   Sie finden unsere Idee gute aber können uns zur Zeit nicht unterstützen mit einem Betrag X? Kein Problem helfen Sie uns das Ziel zu erreichen indem Sie für uns Werben z.B. auf Facebook usw.

story:
THIS IS YIIBOARD

It's the First Electric Skateboard on Two Wheels allowing you to turn sharper compared to traditional 4 wheel skateboards.

It's also portable, weighing only 13 lbs! Take it with you on your casual ride session or local commute. You wouldn't want to stop riding it. It's that fun!

Watch this short video to see all the cool features:

 

Yiiboard in the Press

"It has a tighter turning radius than a regular four-wheeler, allowing riders to really carve into turns." - New Atlas

"The stake boarding experience is about to reach heights never heard of before." - Wonderful Engineering

"This electric board is ready for off-road action." - Gadgetify

Just Drop and Ride

Don't let the hassle of telescoping handle bars, or tricky folding mechanisms hold you back - just jump on for the ride! The intuitive design self-balances just like your bicycle.

 

Easy to Carry and Ride

Yiiboard weighs only 13 lbs. with no handle bars making it so convenient to carry around when you're not riding.

 

Ultra Versatile

Yiiboard can conquer most roads including hard surface, grass, ramp, sand gravel, low steps, and even groovy roads with speed up to 12.4 mph.

 

All Weather Ride

Yiiboard has waterproof grade IP54 waterproof grade so you can use on wet surfaces and ride even when it's drizzling outside.

 

 

High Performance

Yiiboard can climb hills up to 15 degree angle to take you where you need to be without the sweat.

 

 

Trusted Tesla Battery Technology

Yiiboard uses the same ultra-safe and powerful Panasonic batteries used by Tesla. These batteries are ideal for an electric skateboard because of their high performance and reliability. Charge up to 1000 times with a high performance 18650 rechargeable lithium battery. Fully charged in just 3-4 hours and go up to 18 miles before you run out of steam.

 

Regenerative Breaking

The skateboard even has a rear wheel energy recovery braking system so as you slow down, the battery recharges itself.

 

Safety LED Light

Yiiboard's cool lighting system improves the level of safety when riding. It has LED brake lights and logo lamp that makes riding in the daytime and nighttime safe and enjoyable.

 

You're in Control

It comes with an easy-to-use remote control that lets you start, accelerate and brake, and also lets you know when the Yiiboard needs a charge.

 

Why Yiiboard?

Traditional electric skateboards have very low agility and a large turning radius. With Yiiboard only having 2 wheels, it has a smaller turning radius to give you that unique carving sensation you can never have with a traditional skateboard.

 

 

 

Wireless Remote

The remote control features 4 lights to show the battery life. The slider controls the speed when it's turned on. Turn the sliding block higher to accelerate and lower to slow down and brake. The left side has switch for Easy or Hard mode and the right side has the charging port. When the 4 lights turn red, it means it's time to re-charge the remote control.

 

Yiiboard Life

 

 

Technical Specification

 

Yiiboard vs. Others

 

Meet the Team

 

 

R&D

We dedicate to the research, development, production, and sales of various products with the world's cutting edge technology that includes electric skate boards, self-balancing vehicles, and so on. Our purpose is to provide everyone with access to a more convenient, ecological, and effective transportation for everyday life.

 

Timeline

FAQ

PRODUCT

Is Yiiboard water resistant?

Yiiboard is waterproof with grade of IP54.

How much does the Yiiboard weigh?

Yiiboard weighs in at a lean 13 lbs. (6 kg) with the battery installed.

How fast can Yiiboard go?

Yiiboard can go up to 12.4 mph.

How far can the Yiiboard travel on a charge?

It has a range of up to 18.6 miles (30 km) on a single charge,

What powers the Yiiboard?

Yiiboard is powered by a powerful 18650 Li-ion rechargeable battery

How do you recharge the Yiiboard?

It uses a charger that plugs into any standard 120-220 volt wall outlet and fully recharges in 3 to 4 hours.

How long will the batteries last?

The battery can be charged more than 1000 times.

Where are the battery and the motor located?

The battery and electronics are embedded in the aviation aluminum alloy body. The motor is in the back wheel.

How do I control the Yiiboard?

Yiiboard is controlled using a handheld remote control. Push the sliding block forward to accelerate and backward to brake.

Can children ride a Yiiboard?

Absolutely! Children are very quick  to learn but should be under parental guidance when riding a Yiiboard.

Is Yiiboard easy to ride?

Yes it is! Adults are often scared about skateboards and balancing in it but just think about riding a bicycle that also has 2 wheels. Yiiboard is very stable on the ground and can be learned how to ride easily.

What is the weight capacity of Yiiboard?

Yiiboard has a maximum carry load of 331 lbs. (150kg).

SHIPPING

If the project is funded, when will it be shipped?

We are set to ship the product in February 2017 and will keep you updated on our progress and your order's expected delivery date for any changes.

Will it ship world wide? 

Yes!

Do I have to pay local taxes / VAT?

Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; Yiimix has no control over these charges.

What is your refund policy?

You can cancel your contribution for a full refund at any time when the campaign is still LIVE. For instructions on how to request a refund, click here. When the campaign ends, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

Risks & Challenges

We are confident we can produce the Yiiboard and deliver to you on our estimated timeline. As with any other product development process, there are ongoing risks associated with it that could prevent us from delivering the product as planned. We will closely manage these risks until the final product is manufactured, tested and delivered to you. We will always be transparent about any issues we discover along the way and we will be very open to any suggestions. 

 

Spread the Word

We would be so grateful!

 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Worum geht's?

Schneider's Kola-Elixier ist ein leckerer Kolasirup, der durch reinste Handarbeit entsteht. Er wird in einer Apotheke in Laakirchen, Oberösterreich mit natürlichen Zutaten hergestellt und ist vollkommen frei von Phosphorsäure.

Nun vertreibt unser kleines Familienunternehmen Schneider's Kola-Elixier seit Mitte 2017 in und um Vöcklabruck, zB bei Unimarkt Vöcklabruck, aber wir wollen noch mehr Städte besuchen, damit wir unser Kola mehr Leuten in Österreich zeigen können. Deshalb möchten wir einen witzig-spritzigen Kastenwagen von Piaggio kaufen, und mit deiner Hilfe werden wir es schaffen.

Ein kleiner Lieferwagen zu Präsentationszwecken auf Festivals und Feiern wäre ein großer Hingucker mit Wiedererkennungswert. Genau diesen Werbezweck wollen wir damit erreichen, um so bekannt wie möglich zu werden. In dieser jungen Phase der Geschäftsentwicklung ist Wiedererkennung und Bekanntheit natürlich von enormer Bedeutung.

Warum Crowdfunding als Finanzierungsform? Ich habe die Arbeit für mein Master-Studium über Crowdfunding geschrieben und möchte meine Ideen auch in der Praxis beweisen. Deshalb versuche ich auf diesem Weg dich als Unterstützer meines Vorhabens zu gewinnen.

Wie viel brauchen wir?

Für einen Piaggio APE Kastenwagen brauche ich insgesamt 6.590,00€ (inkl. Steuern und Abgaben laut http://www.piaggio-ape.at/preise). Insofern werde ich mein Ziel bei 7.000€ setzen, damit ich die Folierung auch gleich finanzieren kann. Ich halte diesen Betrag für realistisch, denn es müsste ungefähr nur jeder von unseren Facebook-Fans das Paket Bronze bestellen, um ca. 50% des Finanzierungsziels zu erreichen.

Was bekommst du für deine Hilfe?

Für deine Spende für den Kastenwagen gehst du natürlich nicht leer aus. Ich habe eine Reihe von verschiedenen Geschenken vorbereitet - um so mehr du spendest, desto mehr bekommst du dafür im Gegenzug. Nicht vergessen: Es geht nicht nur um die Geschenke, sondern um deine Hilfe dieses Projekt zu realisieren. Insofern ist hier kein passives Zuschauen wie bei 'Höhle der Löwen' gefragt, sondern aktive Teilnahme, die auch belohnt wird. Natürlich sind diese Geschenke auch für Geburtstage und besondere Anlässe eine Superidee!

Wenn das Projekt erfolgreich ist und ich den APE kaufen kann, werde ich einen kurzen Online-Werbespot drehen, und alle Spender werden als Filmproduzenten angegeben. Unsere großzügigen Spender werden somit geehrt und verewigt!

Was passiert, wenn ich das Ziel nicht erreiche?

Wir haben Schneider's Kola-Elixier vor ca. einem Jahr ins Leben gerufen, und der Erfolg bis jetzt kann sich sehen lassen. Wir arbeiten ständig an der Weiterentwicklung des Produkts und am Händlernetz und möchten mit deiner Hilfe weiterwachsen!

Falls wir das Finanzierungsziel nicht erreichen, werden die Spenden angespart und für die Gründung der Schneider's Kola GmbH verwendet. Die Gründung der Schneider's Kola GmbH ist ein wichtiger bevorstehender Meilenstein, den wir bald erreichen werden.

Und wenn ich das Ziel übertreffe?

Falls wir über das Ziel hinausschießen, so wird die GmbH gegründet und an weiteren Werbemaßnahmen gearbeitet, damit Schneider’s Kola-Elixier in ganz Österreich und auch in Deutschland bekannt werden kann.

Noch nicht in Spendelaune?

Falls du selber noch nicht spenden möchtest, bitte teile diese Kampagne mit Freunden, die uns eventuell unterstützen möchten. Dies ist auf sämtlichen Socialmedia-Netzwerken, per Whatsapp, Instagram & Co und per E-Mail möglich. IndieGoGo bietet dafür hilfreiche Sharing-Tools an - frag uns einfach!

story:
QHAUL.com handles Customer delivery requests and selects qualified drivers to deliver their goods and belongings securely, "on-time", and at moderate cost. The QHAUL.com website will be launched in the next several weeks!

Drivers from all across the country  “sign-up” to become eligible to be a driver and make extra cash to deliver Customer's packages and goods. If you own an SUV, VAN or Light Truck you are eligible.

The QHAUL brand is about timely, safe and secure delivery of your packages and belongings. QHAUL provides Quick Haul Service by the masses .The QHAUL Website quickly identifies qualified drivers to deliver your packages and goods to the location of your choice. The drivers are rated by the customer on each delivery. The drivers need to maintain a high-rating in order to gain new requests for delivery services.

Typical Delivery Examples

  • You are at store and you find a great deal on a bicycle or furniture set, but your car is too small, and you don’t want to bother a friend, a job that’s a perfect fit for QHAUL.com.
  • You are at Home Improvement store and need to transport lumber, doors and paint but don’t have access to a truck, a job that’s a perfect fit for QHAUL.com.
  • You are moving and need to quickly haul your furniture off to an apartment, don’t call an expensive moving company, a job that’s a perfect fit for QHAUL.com.
  • You have a delivery of multiple boxes and must get there today just across town, you don’t need to spend a lot of money or run to a Post Office or Delivery company, a job that’s a perfect fit for QHAUL.com.
  • You have a basement or garage of junk, perfect, just contact QHAUL.com to deliver to the local junk yard.
  • You have a small package, an envelope that is time critical, QHAUL.com will deliver!

NOTE: Whether you are going across town or farther contact QHAUL.com for a quick quote!
story_txt:
QHAUL.com handles Customer delivery requests and selects qualified drivers to deliver their goods and belongings securely, "on-time", and at moderate cost. The QHAUL.com website will be launched in the next several weeks!
Drivers from all across the country  “sign-up” to become eligible to be a driver and make extra cash to deliver Customer's packages and goods. If you own an SUV, VAN or Light Truck you are eligible.

The QHAUL brand is about timely, safe and secure delivery of your packages and belongings. QHAUL provides Quick Haul Service by the masses .The QHAUL Website quickly identifies qualified drivers to deliver your packages and goods to the location of your choice. The drivers are rated by the customer on each delivery. The drivers need to maintain a high-rating in order to gain new requests for delivery services.
Typical Delivery Examples


You are at store and you find a great deal on a bicycle or furniture set, but your car is too small, and you don’t want to bother a friend, a job that’s a perfect fit for QHAUL.com.
You are at Home Improvement store and need to transport lumber, doors and paint but don’t have access to a truck, a job that’s a perfect fit for QHAUL.com.
You are moving and need to quickly haul your furniture off to an apartment, don’t call an expensive moving company, a job that’s a perfect fit for QHAUL.com.
You have a delivery of multiple boxes and must get there today just across town, you don’t need to spend a lot of money or run to a Post Office or Delivery company, a job that’s a perfect fit for QHAUL.com.
You have a basement or garage of junk, perfect, just contact QHAUL.com to deliver to the local junk yard.
You have a small package, an envelope that is time critical, QHAUL.com will deliver!


NOTE: Whether you are going across town or farther contact QHAUL.com for a quick quote!

story:
Our Project

Once a year, we get together to ride naked through the streets of our good city. We ride: 

  • To highlight the vulnerability of cyclists
  • To protest oil dependency and car culture
  • To celebrate all bodies and promote a more inclusive beauty standard

Afterwards, we celebrate together at one of the best free parties in Columbus. The event is a safe space for bodies of all races, sexes, and gender identities to express themselves. 

What We Need

The World Naked Bike Ride is entirely free and completely volunteer-run. We rely on donations to provide everything, from pre-ride activities such as body painting, to bike repair gear and sag wagons for a safe ride, to the venue & DJs & portopotties & refreshments & security at the afterparty. 

Each year we have to provide more and more to help keep the party safe and fun for our ever-growing event (best problem ever!) and this year we have a budget shortfall to provide all of the necessities (and trust us, you want to have a place to pee). YOU can help 2015 be the best year ever!

Gallery of T-shirt sizes and designs



Other Ways You Can Help


If you want to help but can't contribute, there are lots of other ways you can help! We need volunteers before, during, and after the event to help us set-up, tear-down, clean up, manage the door, pour the drinks, maintain a safe space, do bike repairs, paint bodies, and more.  Click here to sign up to volunteer your time

story:
Summary

We understand that the vast majority of people with disabilities never have the experience of independently riding a conventional two-wheel bicycle during their lifetime. Research shows that over 80% of people with Autism and 90% of people with Down syndrome never experience this thrill. Defying these odds is why we exist!

What We Need & What You Get

iCan Bike, hosted by Crimson Center for Speech and Langugage, a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization, needs your support to help run the Bike Camp this upcoming May.  

  • Funds go toward helping families pay for the program through scholarships and aid.
  • No family has ever been turned away due to financial reasons.  We beleive that everyone deserves a chance to ride.

The Impact

Your donation goes directly toward helping San Diego children with developmental disabilities have access to the iCan Bike program. 

  • Help underpriveledged families afford the bike program.
  • No family has ever been turned away because of financial reasons.
  • Trained volunteers and staff organize and implement the program.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share the campaign!  The more folks we can get involved, the better!
  • Volunteer!  We need lots of sets of hands to help out the week of the event.

story:
I’m Sam Frons and I’m an artist, designer, entrepreneur, and recovering addict. I built an award winning addiction recovery app called Addicaid, and have spoken about technology and behavior change from Davos to Palo Alto. Walking is hard for me so last year I bought an e-scooter from Swagtron. It was loud, it couldn't get up the hill I lived on, and then it broke.

Instead of buying another one, I made a personal custom prototype scooter that is cheaper, more energy efficient, lighter, better balanced, and better looking than anything else out there. I also made sure it can climb all the hills of my adopted hometown of San Francisco.

I wasn’t planning on selling it, but people kept asking, and scooter rentals are trending hard (Byrd, LimeBike), so as an entrepreneur I thought:

  1. Time to spread the scooter gospel, and,
  2. Renting scooters makes less sense than just selling/buying them, since they are so light and portable you can take them anywhere, unlike bikes and cars, so...

 

Meet Göner:

 

The future of transport is here - faster, stronger, smarter than you previously hoped. It's versatile, modular and built with the highest-grade materials. Take it on airplanes, sidewalks, and in the rain. You can use it every day and charge it once a week with a USB cord.

Göner is perfect for the urban commuter of 2018. With a top speed of 22 mph / 40 kph, and a 20 mile / 35 km range, it will get you there in speed and security with versatility. Want to never wait for a bus again while keeping up with city traffic? No problem. Want to still take the bus or train, but save time travelling from station to door? No problem either. Keep up with bikes without breaking a sweat and without worrying about storage. Power it with your leg any time, so you will never be stranded and you can exercise if you want. Spend less money on ride shares, or put it in the trunk for an urgent meeting. Take it home for the holidays in the carry-on. Charge your phone with it 20 times. The world is your oyster with Göner!

 

I can't walk. So I scoot. Me on crutches (NYC), me with my former scooter (Sydney), me with göner (Zürich).

 

 

  


 

 

This scooter comes with an app that can tell you where you are going, how fast you are going there, and how far you have gone. It can also control your scooter and tell you if anything needs fixing.

 

 

 

Credible Creator.

 

Background: previous stints with McKinsey and IBM Watson. Worked on projects for T-mobile, Prudential, Hasbro, Chipotle, Harmon Kardon, Chevron, Bloomberg.

Studied at: BFA from NYU Steinhardt School of Culture, Education & Human Development in industrial design & digital art. Additional studies at Carnegie Mellon School of Design  and Cooper Union Advancement of Science & Art. 

Taught/spoken at: Harvard Business School, Columbia University School of Public Health, Berkeley, Drexel, UPenn Perelman School of Medicine, NYU and Davos.

Featured in: CNN, Fortune, Forbes, Medcity, Buzzfeed

 

A Scooter With a Social Mission.

 

Everyone should help combat the opioid epidemic, which has become the #1 cause of death for Americans under 50, a number which has doubled over the last 10 years. You can help by getting a Göner since 20% of all proceeds will be used to fund charitable addiction treatment programs, including giving free scooters to addicts with mobility issues. This will be done in partnership with Addicaid which is a company I founded that specializes in addiction treatment.

So get Göner today, and revolutionize your life while helping those suffering from addiction!

story:
The StewardTech Turbine: An Engine Without Equal.

With our turbine, we have created what is without a doubt the next great step forward in transportation and propulsion, for everything from lawnmowers to locomotives and everything in between.

That's because we have developed patent-pending technology that makes our engine more efficient at higher output than anything else out there.

The StewardTech Turbine has higher efficiency than conventional piston engines found in gas-powered cars.  Our engine lasts longer and packs more horsepower relative to its size. Our turbine is a model of efficiency and durability while being environmentally friendly; the turbine itself can be used in wind and tidal generators, so it's greener, too. This turbine is a big winner, and you could become an essential part of the victory and scoring turbine-powered products for yourself, perhaps even securing the right to produce the turbine yourself (or license an individual or organization to produce it) at our guaranteed lowest royalty rate for the next 20 years. We expect this turbine to become the center of a multi-BILLION dollar business, so that right could become extremely valuable.

Changing The Way The World Moves

Our turbine engine can be scaled down to power a toy like a skateboard.  Or a lawnmower.  Or scaled up to power a locomotive.  Or an airplane or an automobile.  To scale, our technology can propel practically anything anywhere at average or even higher speeds but with greater potential for energy efficiency.

 

What Makes the StewardTech Turbine Better

The StewardTech Turbine is a centrifugal turbine with a bit of a twist. In most centrifugal turbines, the working fluid only acts once on the turbine vanes: when it contacts them. In our turbine, however, the working fluid remains active in the turbine for as long as it can do work in the turbine. It is therefore a long cycle turbine, which gives it the ability to transmit more energy to the turbine, which can make it more efficient than most centrifugal turbines.

The chief advantage of the StewardTech Turbine over axial and radial turbines is that the StewardTech turbine is a long cycle turbine, that is, the working fluid remains in the turbine until the maximum amount of energy is extracted from it. In an axial turbine, the working fluid passes through the turbine along its axis in a single pass. To make up for this, additional layers of blades or vanes are stacked one behind another to allow multiple extractions to take place. Unfortunately, that adds significantly to the size, weight and complexity of the turbine.

In a radial turbine, the working fluid passes through the turbine perpendicular to its axis. Again, this is a one-shot, all or nothing deal. The working fluid typically passes through the turbine with significant energy unextracted.

In the StewardTech turbine, the fluid moves neither axially nor as a one-shot radial pass as is the case with conventional engines.

Instead, the fluid in our engine is forced into a circular path around the outside of the turbine’s flow control surfaces. These surfaces are arranged radially in layers around the axis. This way, the centrifugal force operating on the working fluid forces the highest energy fluid to the outermost layer of flow control surfaces. By putting additional layers at smaller and smaller radii from the axis, multiple extractions can occur without changing the size of the turbine. By centering the exhaust port on the turbine’s axis, we ensure that only the lowest energy working fluid can exit the turbine. This allows a more efficient process in a smaller package.

Focus on the Perks You Can Own.

Your pride and joy will be the Cobra replica powered by our turbine.  Check it out...

 

Pick a Perk And Pack Your Bags - We'll Give You a Free Vacation!

Order any perk at the $500 level or above and we'll issue you a free vacation certificate.  Watch this video and choose your destination.
 

 

No strings.  No fine print.  When you back our campaign at the $500 level or higher we'll put you up at the resort destination of your choice.  You're helping us to move the world and we want to to show our thanks and move you to a sweet getaway for a few days,

About The Company

In many ways, StewardTech is a different kind of company. We want to be so much more than just a place to build a career or make a buck. We want to be a place where we help our people to build rewarding lives, both inside and outside the company. It also helps us make better decisions along the way. We also want to create an environment of family. We firmly believe we were put here to serve one another, and to help one another along the road of life. Our unity is one of our greatest strengths.

We want to build products that make life better - in terms of being highly efficient and environmentally friendly. We want our products to use our natural resources more wisely, both in the production of the product and as it performs over its lifetime. We want to create for you not just products that do the job, but that do the job better with less waste along the way.  This is one way in which we can do our best to make the world a better place.

What We Need & What You Get

We have the design, we proved the technology and we filed the patents to prove it. Now we need to ramp up product and move the world in a whole new way.

That means we need hardware, software, facilities, and the ability to hire more people to get this done. Like any business venture, there is some risk here.  We perceive this as low risk as people the world over are open to new forms of transportation and the technologies behind them.  Consider the hybrid engine, the electric car and the driver-less car as relevant examples.

We know our design is technically sound and solid. We know beyond any doubt the potential value of our product far outweighs the risk. We're certain this turbine is a real winner, and when it goes into wide production, it will make people's lives better by reducing their fuel usage, and creating less pollution in the process.

The most important perk is not on our list. The most important perk is the knowledge that you made a difference in making life better for yourself, your children and your fellow man. Isn't that what makes life worthwhile? That said, look over the perks offered. Some of them are quite valuable such as our turbine-powered sports car.

So what happens if we don't get to our goal for this phase? Well, from a financial standpoint, we buy what we can with the funds from this campaign, and try to get funding for the rest of this phase elsewhere such as equity crowdfunding or an ICO.  Failure to get funding in this phase does NOT mean the project is dead. It only means we have to find other ways to to bring our vision to reality. We will make this happen, one way or the other. And we want you at the finish line with us when that first series of production turbines comes rolling off the line.

What happens if we completely overshoot the goal for this phase? We'll devote the extra funds to building more capacity. Whatever happens, every dollar we get will go towards funding the ongoing development of our engines to fit into every sector of industry. 

What If You Can't Afford To Be a Backer?

So what if you cannot contribute financially? Well, whether you can contribute financially or not, you can still help out, and maybe in the process, take away a little bit of history for yourself:

Tell people about the turbine and about StewardTech. Talk to friends, relatives, coworkers and other associates about what we are doing here. Be a valuable part of the team by using your network to get us on the radar. Hit every social media outlet you can think of, and get the word out about us.

Find people who you think can be investors and let them know what's going on here.

Score Valuable Perks With our Referral Contest

So, what's in it for you? We're SO glad you asked (no, really, we are). When you use the Indiegogo sharing tools (sign in to Indiegogo, or create an account, then click on one of the social media icons on the upper right of the campaign) to refer others to the project, 10% of all new contributions you refer go towards getting YOU the perks we offer. For example, if the total contributions of everyone you refer exceeds $1000, you get a working model turbine. If the total contributions of your referrals exceeds $10,000, you get a wind turbine-powered gazebo with charging station and a wireless repeater so your home office can move outdoors! And if one of the backers you refer buys a Piece of the Action perk, we'll give you the car! That's right, you might wind up with a brand new, turbine-powered sports car, just for using your network to refer contributors to us!

story:
New Pre-Order Campaign - October 2017

We are accepting pre-orders for Vostok Kits - Forks, Rear Triangles, Rear Racks and Chain Tensioners on our new Indiegogo Campaign Page. 

Consider checking out the Campaign Page.
 

Our website | Our Facebook | Our Instagram 

 

Our custom rear triangle was born after a talk with a friendly titanium bicycle frame company here in Russia. Having a wealth of expertise in all things Brompton and working on titanium frame sets since 1991, they were excited to join efforts to produce and market an internal hub specific rear frame assembly for touring enthusiasts, DIY builders and weight weenies! To fit the wide range of hubs, we have also developed a chain tensioner with the varying chain line. 

 

 

The triangle

  • Titanium alloy, superior to Grade-9
  • 0.5 kg
  • 135mm OLD (standard hub spacing)
  • Rohloff (TS or CC OEM) dropouts
  • IS Disk brake mounts (install any disk brake) and a caliper brake mount (original brake)
  • Trailer eyelets M10 (Bob Nutz etc)

The chain tensioner

  • CNC-machined aluminium, black anodized
  • 225 g
  • Adjustable chain line (from Alfine to Rohloff and anything in between)
  • 13T aluminium jockey wheels with ceramic bearings, black anodized

Design details

The triangle

The rear triangle is manufactured in accordance with the Brompton's quality standards for titanium rear frame assemblies. The triangle has been tested by harsh everyday riding, folding and transporting around the snowy streets of Moscow.

With the triangle installed, the bicycle folds and unfolds as a standard Brompton.

The dropouts were designed with Rohloff and Alfine in mind, but you can also go with any standard internal hub or the cassette for an ultralight setup. If you wish to do so, give us a shout to talk about derailleur hanger options. 

There are M10 eyelets on the dropouts - they can be used to install Bob Nutz and the like for hauling a trailer. The triangle is compatible with a standard fender and rack with a bit of adjustment of the stays. The disk brake rotor should be 160 mm in diameter or less. There is also an option to keep the original caliper brake.

The chain tensioner

The chain tensioner is manufactured and assembled in house out of aluminium alloy and anodized black. It is designed to fit varying chain lines (from 46 mm to 56 mm) by simple adjustment of the jockey wheels's axles. The jockey wheels are a sourced quality product: CNC-machined aluminium with full ceramic bearings and are anodized black (please disregard the silver ones pictured). 

The chain tensioner sits on top of the Shimano's anti-rotation washer. With the Rohloff, a nut (or a QR) just goes on top of the tensioner.

Ordering and shipping

We are launching production as soon as the campaign ends. You have the option to choose to get:

  • our rear triangle alone
  • a kit with the included chain tensioner.

This production run, however big or small, will be ready to ship by the beginning of February, after the Russian New Year and Christmas holidays. This campaign does not have a strict go/no go threshold - we will fulfil any number of orders. The shipping will be handled by DPD - it is a safe, quick and reliable way to ship out of Russian Federation. 

Installation

The triangle can be installed at home if Brompton's instructions are followed. The job is pretty straightforward and takes around 30 minutes, but expect to spend about an hour if you have never done this before. The triangle swap will require taking off the crankset. 

Warranty

Our rear triangle warranty is 5 years from the date of purchase and the chain tensioner's aluminium arms are covered with a 1 year warranty from the date of purchase. Each triangle has a serial number, which you will be able to register upon receiving your kit. 

The details of our Warranty Policy are covered in our docs section.

Communication

Please do ask any questions in the appropriate section of this campaign page and I will be happy to answer them. I will be updating this page with relevant information regarding the progress of the campaign, the production process, fulfilment and shipping. Stay in the know! 

I've also created our docs section for the sole purpose of posting relevant updates. Please feel free to post on our Facebook Page too.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't wish to order your Vostok triangle right now, please help us spread the word among fellow Brompton enthusiasts and share this campaign! The success of this campaign will help us design and build more accessories and components in the future. We are set to launch the production of custom titanium forks and rear racks for touring purposes.

All the best,

Sergey Vodwood at Vostok.bike

We are accepting pre-orders for Vostok Kits - Forks, Rear Triangles, Rear Racks and Chain Tensioners on our new Indiegogo Campaign Page. 

Consider checking out the Campaign Page. 
Our website | Our Facebook | Our Instagram 

 
Our custom rear triangle was born after a talk with a friendly titanium bicycle frame company here in Russia. Having a wealth of expertise in all things Brompton and working on titanium frame sets since 1991, they were excited to join efforts to produce and market an internal hub specific rear frame assembly for touring enthusiasts, DIY builders and weight weenies! To fit the wide range of hubs, we have also developed a chain tensioner with the varying chain line. 
 

 
The triangle

Titanium alloy, superior to Grade-9
0.5 kg
135mm OLD (standard hub spacing)
Rohloff (TS or CC OEM) dropouts
IS Disk brake mounts (install any disk brake) and a caliper brake mount (original brake)
Trailer eyelets M10 (Bob Nutz etc)





The chain tensioner

CNC-machined aluminium, black anodized
225 g
Adjustable chain line (from Alfine to Rohloff and anything in between)
13T aluminium jockey wheels with ceramic bearings, black anodized
