story:
Short Summary

The 2008 Market Meltdown taught us, that we need a simpler alternative. Where any level of experience investor can understand, stay informed and visualize the financial light at the end of tunnel. In return allow our subsidiaries and potential trucking partners to provide one source transport solution to new or existing clients.

At Cargo Shares, we have developed a business model that is fairly simple and straightforward: lenders provide funding through our Cargo Shares Loan Chart, which entails loan requested amount, interest earned on each delivery and pre-determined vehicle amount. Funds provided cover vehicle purchase, operations, and maintenance for pending contract hauls. As we have all witness, the investment industry does not care about the people who are involved in it, paying attention only to executive bottom lines. Cargo Shares is the solution to this problem.

We have in place a 10-year exclusive hauling contract worth 5-6 million a year and have a few pending contracts. The business model upon which Cargo Shares operates would ensure that contracts such as this one never hang out limbo. Plus, all of our vehicles will be equipped with the latest technology, and participating lenders will have full access to GPS tracking, instant pick up, delivery notification messages, you will also be able to view daily, weekly, monthly and yearly productions.  There is no other method that is simple and effective that rewards lenders base on productivity of each vehicle. In addition these vehicles are activate on contracts.

What We Need

We have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $ 5,000,000.00. This start-up capital will cover the cost of vehicle, trailer and equipment acquisition, site improvement, technology, marketing and operation cost of launching our platform, which will make it possible not only for more lenders to participate in the transportation industry but also for everyone involved to take advantage of the latest technologies and innovations in the field. Email support@cargoshares.com for a copy of contract.

 

Trucks, Trailers, Equipment, Supplies

$ 3.5 million

Operation Cost, Insurance and Fuel

$ 350,0000.00 4 weeks.

Woodyard Site Improvement incl. additional Scale house.

$ 1,150,000.00

 

Contract Overview

Contract Projection annual amount: 6-8 million

Contract Duration: 10 years with automatic 5 year renewal, with written notification. 

Monthly operation Cost: $350,000.00

Payment Schedule: 7 day net.

Projected approximate gross weekly Billing: $146,000.00

Projected approximate gross monthly billing: $584,000.00

Projected net profit: 3.5 million

NOTE: 20-30% increase in production with site improvement completion not included with above projections.

 

What You Get

Contributors will receive 3% ownership pool in B.A.M.N Trucking LLC and earn 8% return on total of 25 designated vehicles as a group for 36 months. Each vehicle is fully equipped with the latest notification and GPS technology. Contributors/Lenders will be kept in the loop at all times. Partners will receive ownership certificate via mail. 

 

The Impact

Cargo Shares is designed to grease the wheels of the business machine, positively impacting the economy and creating new opportunities for entrepreneurs and businesses to expand their operations. Our plan is to get the word out about Cargo Shares and make sure that everyone knows exactly what we are up to and how they can benefit. We want to establish a viable alternative to the lending industry that – let’s be honest – has failed many of us in a big way.

 

We are driven by our social mission to impact the communities we work and live. We operate in a Hub Zone area (Historically Underutilized Business Zones). We want help build thriving and productive communities. Provide training and a work environment that employees can be proud of. We want to encourage and inspire those who lost hope an opportunity to be self-sustaining and not rely on the government to provide. This causes a burden on so many hard working Americans and it can be unfair. But again we need your help.

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Due to the enormous size of the Cargo Industry there is not one company that can dominate the entire market. By delivering phenomenal and safe returns through a method that anyone can understand. This will allow for rapid growth of fleet. Cargo Shares is actively pursuing potential contracts that enable to start other wholly owned subsidiaries or majority controlling interest partnerships. We will provide our clients with a one-source solution. It’s a win-win situation. 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

One person can’t do much but a group of people can bring about a storm of change. Lets become that storm.

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you may use. The more people who know about Cargo Shares early, the smoother our launch will be. We can use all the support we can get right now.

Your contributions, monetary and otherwise, are greatly appreciated. From the whole Cargo Shares team, thank you for your time.

story:
Hello World

We are Network Sorcery, a network solutions provider since 1999. Developing decoders and software applications for vehicles has been our focus for the past five years.

Our plans for expanding our vehicle decodes and applications further are very ambitious. Network Sorcery has the tech and know-how to bring more hardware to the table and inspire application development within our expanding community. Our goal is to provide a better decoding solution for vehicles than what OBD2 can produce. 

We need your help to unify vehicle languages into a consistent set that is easy to use. We provide the tools that allow you to create and host applications for vehicle monitoring.

Please view our website for a full list of available tags, and check out our supported vehicle list

What's new?

We have added the 2012 Toyota Yaris, 2016 Chevy Volt and 2016 Lexus RC as supported vehicles.

We now support graphical displays for Race Render 3 and Dashware. We can customize a video for your recorded test drives, please send a message detailing what you need.

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the plan, we need capital to perform the following:

  • Perform test drives to collect research data.
  • Analyze the data we collect and expand our database of decodes for both currently supported as well as new vehicle models. This allows us to expand our coverage of tagged data to enable the applications you want to be developed.
  • Migrate UCAN to more hardware/software platforms. In particular, to provide an industrial strength solution as well as the research platform currently implemented on the Raspberry Pi.
  • Create and support a backend for applications written by our community.
  • Develop applications to display data on (or from) external devices. Potentially includes third-party hardware integration.
  • To develop applications that can track location and performance data over time: such as tire monitoring, engine monitoring, preventative maintenance.
  • Enable existing compatible applications to be used in tandem with our displayed data.
  • Enable integrated safety, reminder, and alert applications within our user's connected network. This includes distributing sensor outputs to relevant applications and analyzing usage.

Wheel speed and tire pressure display

Door status display

Our plan

Our initial release comprises the results of five years of prior development to support a set of Infiniti, Nissan, and GM vehicles.

Check out our sample applications for a guide on how to develop your own applications for the UCAN system. Currently, we are iterating on a data logger.

Our goal is to increase our coverage of performance data for the currently supported vehicles and expand the list of supported vehicles as requested by our community.

If we exceed the success threshold for this campaign, then the direction we take in expanding our support will be determined by votes for manufacturers and models for further exploration.

We are looking to our community to drive our development by voting for the vehicle lines that matter most to you.

The funding will be split between: adding more decodes for vehicle lines, expanding the number of vehicle lines supported, and adapting to new hardware/software platforms.

Risks & Challenges

Some assembly is required. The CAN adapter, case, video display, power supply, and vehicle interface cable are not included.

This is our experimental research grade version. We are currently developing an automotive grade version that could be a stretch goal tier but is currently not available.

This initial setup is intended for those of you that want a head start on developing applications and researching your vehicle(s).

We will require time and effort to test more vehicles. We will keep our backers updated on our progress in a timely manner, and will provide regular software updates.

Other Ways You Can Help

Each referred purchase from a friend will earn you a $5 token!

If you care about making the roads safer, bringing more smarts and more tools to your vehicle(s) of choice, then please tell your friends and family about our awesome decoder!

You have our deepest gratitude for taking the time to read through our campaign. Please let us know if you have any questions, feel free to post a comment about our system or anything else that comes to mind. Thank you!

Please tell us when you want to use one or more referral tokens, and we'll apply them to your next purchase.

Expansion (aka stretch goals)

The most basic and essential elements for the success of the UCAN system is for us is to expand our support to the widest variety of vehicles and the performance data they can provide.

Architecture

The UCAN architecture consists of three pieces:

The data reader service reads raw data from a CAN-adapter that presents a Socketcan interface and publishes a stream of text strings containing the CAN data. 

The data decoder subscribes to that data stream and outputs a stream of tag/value pairs that contains the decoded data. This data can then be utilized directly by applications.

The data reader and decoder reside on a Raspberry Pi, the applications can be run on any external device such as a cell phone, tablet, or another computer. 

FAQ

Q: Why did we choose the Raspberry Pi 3?

A: It is an impressive single-board computer. It has the performance and reliability needed for high volume decoding at a very affordable price.

Q: Why is native protocol decoding better than OBD2?

A: Since the data comes to us without requests it is the fastest possible way to extract data from the vehicle. Without generating requests, there is no possibility of interfering with normal vehicle operation. Finally, it allows us to process data that OBD2 has no access to.

Q: How many vehicles can I run the UCAN system on?

A: For personal use, users may use their license for up to four vehicles simultaneously. For fleets exceeding four vehicles, please contact us for a quote. 

Q: Is there a subscription fee? (And how much is it)?

A: One free year of updates are included when UCAN is purchased. There is an optional $25 fee per year for additional updates.

Q: How can we contact your team?

A: For most questions, you can message Shawn Conner at shawnlconner@gmail.com. Ask anything you'd like regarding the UCAN project or about life in general. We're happy to help in anyway we can.

 

 

As seen on LinuxGizmos

story:
“Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world.  Indeed it is the only thing that has.” -Margaret Mead

We are grateful that Patrice and Girls Auto Clinic’s story has resonated with women nationwide! The question we get every day since we opened is, “When will Girls Auto Clinic open in my city?” Our first goal is to raise $100K to help us build the team we need to lead and execute our expansion efforts.

The flagship location in Philadelphia has been a huge success, and we have learned a lot from our first year and a half in business!  We are ready to apply the knowledge we gained from our first location and use it to build an even larger, stronger Repair Center model that can be replicated nationwide.  

The funding from this campaign will help us grow our team, but more importantly contributing to this campaign will help us validate our business to potential investors and prove that Girls Auto Clinic has national audience and customer base.  By making a contribution you are saying I support Girls Auto Clinic’s mission to reach every woman driver and I want to see a Girls Auto Clinic Repair Center in my city!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

       

           

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Watch to learn more about our Car Care Workshops:

story:
Welcome to the home of ATOM FLIYE

            


Idea for design and mobility is what made ATOM FLIYE as good as it is.
We started to work with this project 18 months ago, we wanted to make the best hover board on the market but for a reasonable price.

ATOM FLIYE is not just a hover board, it is a transportation vehicle that will take you where ever you want, it doesn't matter if it is on the road or off road.

         

We did put a big front wheel 15 cm / 5.9 inches so you can feel the stableness of the board.
The wheel has deep marks for off roading, we had many options when we had to choose the battery and we did go with the best quality battery out there Samsung Li-ion battery's.


Featured in:
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 



Front Light

           

   Rear Light

           

You have both front and rear lights for safe hovering at night, it also swift it's place when you choose to turn your board, so you will always be safe and have the right light covering you.

        

We did the ATOM FLIYE hover board in four different colors so it can fit everyones style.
The up scale shape is made to make your stay on the board comfortable and safe.

                            We didn't save on anything when it comes to safety and design

         

The material is carefully chosen by our team to keep the weight down and make it stronger and more durable, that's why went with aluminum alloy frame.


Aluminum frame for high quality and low weight

         

Hills, Dirt, Rock, Bumps?
No problem, with your ATOM FLIYE these things is just fun to run over

        


Before all of this we had a long journey to make our idea into a complete product.
This is Luke Wang, he is our technician, we want to salut him for all countless hours, days, months Wang has put into making our project  flawless.

                          

This image is from our early days while testing many of our prototypes before finding the perfect match components for ATOM FLIYE.

Our home made test ramp, ATOM FLIYE has been tested for different obstacles and surfaces.
It's been a uphill but we have enjoyed every moment of it good and the worst :) 

                           

We don't want to deliver just a okay product,
We want to present and deliver the perfect product.
That's why we have done so many testings with many many components to finally finishing ATOM FLIYE.

Our test lab

                         


You have to ride it to understand it.
Surf the waves of the streets.

 

Color availability 


Black Panther 

            

Ocean Blue

            

Silver Surfer

            

 Pink Panther 

            

           
We are using a high quality rubber material, our rubber is a non-slip and resistance to puncture, you wont wear out this rubber anytime soon. 

Our early prototype of ATOM FLIYE

Always fun to find your balance for the first time

 

ATOM FLIYE'S Story

This is me, just a simple guy that loves to travel around the world and meet new people and see new country's so who am I?
My mom calls me Jamil and my friends for Jamie :) I was born and raised in Stockholm Sweden. 

The idea of ATOM FLIYE came when I traveled to Singapore 2 years ago, I notice that people in Singapore used different types of electric vehicle as a transportation for traveling to work or even the park, and I loved it so i wanted to make the ultimate electric transportation vehicle that can be used in all sorts of terrain and that's how ATOM FLIYE came into work.

Almost 2 years after I started my idea I'm here on Indiegogo asking your help to get ATOM FLIYE to the market so everyone can use it for transportation or just to have a lot of fun.

What I can promise if you contribute is that I will deliver the best high quality Hover Board on this planet for you, we have equipped everything on ATOM FLIYE with the best quality and high performance components.

 

We are also developing our ATOM FLIYE application for both iOS and Android

You can use the app to start your ATOM without touching your board via bluetooth, it will have a anti-theft so you can not turn on your ATOM without you first turning off the anti-theft function.

 

ATOM app will show you exact speed, milage and battery-life, it can also check the your ATOM'S condition so you always are safe to use it.

A great feature is that you can adjust everything on your ATOM, like the speed, power, sensitivity and much more with the app.

ATOM app will have tutorials on how to use the hover board, it will show how to begin and feeling out process to be a advanced driver.

Feel the POWER of your ATOM FLIYE

 

F.A.Q

  • Can ATOM go uphill?
    Yes of course, ATOM can go up 12 degrees, this is one of the best on the market today.
  • What is the weight limit?
    250 pounds
  • What is the top speed?
    The top speed is 20km / 12MPH
  • How long is the range per fully charged battery?
    12km / 7.5 miles depending on the terrain you use it on
  • Does it work in wet conditions?
    Yes it does, ATOM is water resistance
  • Do you ship worldwide?
    We do ship worldwide, we want everyone to have a ATOM
  • What happens if a part or the wheel gets damaged?
    We will have parts for sale, if it's a production defect then we will replace you without any extra charge
  • Can I be a re-seller for ATOM?
    Yes, we are looking for business partners so please send us a email after our campaign and we will get back to you

 

            

 

Risks & Challenges:

We have faced many challenges while making ATOM, right now we feel very confident that we have faced the most challenges out there, right now the last challenge we have is to finalizing the application for ATOM, we are ready for production and we have already done every testing there is to find the best components for ATOM.

The only thing we need is your help to make ATOM go to production and we will reward you with your own early bird ATOM, we will release the news of the app as soon as we have it working perfectly.

MAKE SOME NOISE FOR ATOM FLIYE:

Please share our campaign if you enjoyed it as much as we have, we will deliver the best hover board on the market.

 

 

THE END

story:
Hello.

We are Texas Guadaloop, a team of students and researchers from the University of Texas at Austin, who are building the first working Hyperloop transportation vehicle using air bearing technology.

What's the Hyperloop?

In 2013, Elon Musk released a white paper discussing a new mode of transportation called the Hyperloop that would transport people and cargo from major city to major city in 20-30 minutes. By levitating a pod on a bed of air and propelling it through a partially evacuated tube, speeds of up to 700mph can be reached. It's as fast as a plane, but still as convenient to ride as a train.

 

 

This is crazy. Could this really work?

There is no doubt a Hyperloop will be built. Hyperloop One conducted their first full-scale test in vacuum a year ago, and several other Hyperloop companies have raised millions to build transport systems in South Korea, Dubai, and Europe.

In 2015, SpaceX announced an international competition for student teams to design and build a working prototype pod to compete on a one-mile test track that SpaceX has built at their HQ in Hawthorne. The first few teams hit the track in January, and Texas Guadaloop was one of 22 teams left competing on the track last August. This year we're coming for more. We're preparing yet another pod to go compete this July. Our team has worked tirelessly these past three years to create a cost-effective and energy-efficient solution to make the Hyperloop a reality.

Air Bearings.

Elon's original idea for the Hyperloop was to use air-bearings to levitate in a frictionless environment. Imagine an air hockey table, but where air comes out of the puck instead of the table. Since the SpaceX-Hyperloop competition was announced, there has been no team or company to test the viability of air bearings at high speeds.

We are one of the first teams in the world who are building an air bearing pod and are preparing to test it at high velocities on the SpaceX-Hyperloop test track. The implications for transportation fueled off of air are groundbreaking and have the power to disrupt the transportation industry. 

 

 

 

Why not MagLev?

MagLev utilizes magnets to levitate the pod whereas air-bearings utilize pressurized air. MagLev is a proven technology and has no doubt been tested thoroughly,  but the advantages of utilizing air-bearings are enormous. Air-bearings do not need to hit a specific speed to levitate and they do not exhibit drag. This means we could use air bearings for shorter distances and destinations without costly expenditures of MagLev. There is a reason why MagLev trains haven't popped up in America. Imagine putting them in a more expensive vacuum tube.

Will the Hyperloop really become the world's next major mode of transportation?

The prototype we are building for the Hyperloop can support thousands of pounds at a fraction of cost and energy. Building a full-scale system has the potential to make goods and supplies flow more efficiently than current methods. Additional highways and cars won't solve traffic problems, but a Hyperloop can let you work in one city and live in another. Texas Guadaloop wants to be the team to bring Hyperloop to Texas. 

 

 

Long-term vision

The Texas triangle contains the largest number of super commuters in the U.S. Our dream is to build the Hyperloop in Texas, connecting major growth cities such as Austin, Dallas, and Houston.

 

Will you join us and make this happen? 

After presenting in front of SpaceX engineers at Design Weekend in January 2016, our team was not selected to build a pod for Competition Weekend I last January. But we had full faith in our design, and decided to build a pod anyways. Fast forward a year later, and SpaceX chose us to compete at Competition Weekend II in August 2017. Move one more year ahead and we're coming back to the competition at full throttle with our best version of the Pod so far. We're a team of graduate and undergraduate students and researchers with a never quit attitude, and we are going to scrap our way to the finish line no matter what. Will you help us get there?

story:
The Future of Roadside Assistance

Are you tired of the current roadside assistance model? Do you want to be a part of something that is going to disrupt an industry?

 

Join us with the first roadside assistance app to truly automate the industry.

Our patent-pending process is going to change the way roadside assistance gets done- making it easier, faster and more cost-effective for both customers and providers.

  

Select the service you need.

A provider is automatically dispatched based on proximity.  

You get help faster and get back on the road. 

Back Mach1 and let's revolutionize roadside assistance!  

                                                                                                             Scott Kelly, Equity Holder of Mach1

Media Coverage

What We Need & What You Get

Here's how you can help. 

We are building four native apps. Two on the customer side (iOS and Android) and two for the service provider's (iOS and Android). We are working with a company out of Silicon Valley to build this thing and let me tell you, it's one of a kind. The integration is the most difficult part as we're focusing on automating the heck out of this baby.  Right now, we need to raise funds to finish development. 

Perks:

  • Bronze Level $25: Gets you $40 towards services
  • Silver Level $40: Gets you $60 towards services
  • Gold Level $75: Gets you $100 towards services
  • Platinum Level $100: Gets you $130 towards services
  • Diamond Level $200: Gets you $250 towards services 

The Technology

Mach1's patent-pending processes and technology have the potential to change the whole roadside assistance industry. 

Mach1 is solving pain points for customers, service providers and also for businesses that currently offer roadside assistance. Mach1 has a business to business offering in which dealerships, insurance companies, and even auto clubs can white-label or license their patent-pending technology. The offering is expected to save companies money in dispatch, accounting, and all the time to execute those processes, not to mention improve customer satisfaction.

“Technology is moving the roadside assistance industry in a new direction,” said Founder and CEO Rick Narpaul, “Our hope to is to create a new standard across the industry.”

The Impact

Our app not only changes the experience for the consumer but also brings opportunities to service providers. You don't need a tow truck to bring someone fuel or even change a tire opening up doors for just about anyone to be a part of Mach1. Our model especially allows industry providers to save time and money. *Mach1 is veteran-owned & veteran providers supported.

The Difference

There are some giant companies in this space. None of them have an automated dispatch process like us.  In a $9 Billion dollar industry, it's hard to believe technology is not leveraged more. That's why we're disrupting the industry to make some much-needed changes for everyone. 

Our motto is: People helping people. First, we take care of the service providers, they take care of the consumer, our customer satisfaction goes up... Not to mention all of our sweet features competitors don't have. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute, but want to help?

  • If you like what you see, please share this campaign now! 
  • Hint: It's easy to spread the word with Indiegogo sharing tools! 

Let's do this together!
